58b3(rgyud): g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung gis snying po byas nas g.yon pa'i mthe bo'i rtse mor bzhag cing / g.yas pa'i mthe bong de'i steng du bzhag pa ni nyi ma'i shing rta'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas/
58b4(rgyud): sam mdzub mo dang srin lag bkug pa ni sgra gcan gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa gar gyi tshul gyis g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag cing lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo dang gung mo
58b5(rgyud): brkyang nas mthe bong gis mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi sen mo mnan pa ni dga' ba'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// khu tshur so sor tha dad par bcangs te mthe'u chung 'khyud pa ni lha mo dka' bzlog
58b6(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ka gdengs ka ltar bstan te spyi bor bzhag pa ni dpal lha mo'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do// thal mo sbyar nas nam mkha' la bskyod pa ni zla ba'i phyag rgya'o// khu tshur so//
58b7(rgyud): sor bcangs la mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo 'khyud pa ni lha mo zla ba ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rin chen rgyan can ma'i phyag rgya bshad pa/ khu tshur so sor bcangs te mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas rin
59a1(rgyud): po che'i rnam pas dpral ba'i phyogs su 'phreng ba bcings te bzhag pa ni rin chen rgyun can ma'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni/ oM rat+na shIswA hA/ de nas dbyangs can ma/
59a2(rgyud): phyag rgya bshad pa/ sor mo phan tshun 'khyud de mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas khar bzhag pa'o// thig le mchog ma'i phyag rgya bshad pa/ sor mo phan tshun dri pad+ma 'khor ba'i sbyor bas bskor te
59a3(rgyud): spyi bor bzhag pa ni thig le mchog ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rtsom pa mo'i phyag rgya bshad pa/ lag pa so sor sor mo gcig la gcig bskor ba'i sbyor bas snying khar bzhag pa ni rtsom pa mo'i
59a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ oM sha krA ya swA hA/ sha ra du brgya byin no// oM ag+na ye swA hA/ mer me lha'i 'o// oM ya mA ya sA hA
59a5(rgyud): gshin rje'i phyogs su gshin rje'o// oM rak+Sha sa a d+hi pa ta ye/ dza ya dza ya swA hA/ bden bral du srin po'i bdag po'o// oM ba ru Na nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ nub tu chu lha'o//
59a6(rgyud): oM bA ya be tsa la tsa la swA hA/ rlung du rlung gi lha'o// oM ku be rA ya/ yak+Sha a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ byang du lus ngan po'i'o// oM tsan+d+rA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su zla ba'o//
59a7(rgyud): oM I sha nA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su dbang ldan nyid do// de nas gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dbang phyug ma sdug gu mdzes ma'i phyag rgya bshad pa/ khu tshur so sor bcangs
59b1(rgyud): te mthe'u chung rab tu brkyang ba'o// de nas 'thung mo'i phyag rgya bshad pa/ khu tshur so sor bcangs te mthe'u chung gnyis 'khyud nas sdigs mdzub byas te 'dzin pa ni 'byung po'i dbang
59b2(rgyud): phyug 'byung mo thams cad kyi rgyal mo'i phyag rgya'o// de nas 'byung mo sgo skyong ma brgyad kyi phyag rgya bshad pa/ khu tshur so sor bcangs te mdzub mo gnyis 'khyud pa ni 'byung mo brgyad
59b3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa ni/ lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo mnyam par byas te mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sor mo mnan nas sor mo lhag ma
59b4(rgyud): bkram pa ni brgya byin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo mnyam par byas te cung zad bskyod pa ni ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas par khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo brkyang ba
59b5(rgyud): ni gshin rje'i dbyug to'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo dang gung mo brkyang ba ni srin po'i bdag po'i ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshu
59b6(rgyud): bcangs te mdzub mo brkyang nas bsgril ba ni chu lha'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo brkyang ba ni rlung lha'i ba dan gyi phyag rgyu'o//
59b7(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mthe bong brkyang ba ni rnam thos kyi glang po che'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te maze'u chung gis ser mo ma na na nas sor mo lhag ma
60a1(rgyud): brkyang ba ni dbang ldan gyi hrI shwa la'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rdzogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya bshad pa/ thal mo sbyar ba ni rdzogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags bshad/
60a2(rgyud): pa oM sid d+hi badz+ra/ a sur ya a su ra ya hU~M/ rdzogs par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas dngos grub dgug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ba shad pa/ khu chu ras sar bcangs
60a3(rgyud): nas mthe'u chung gnyis 'khyud de mdzub gnyis brkyang nas bskyil ba ni dngos grub dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra ro Sha Na ma hA kro d+ha sid d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaH/ dngos grub
60a4(rgyud): dgug pa'i sngags so// rgyal po chen po'i dngos grub ni/ khro bo'i bstan pa'i dngos grub ste// lha rnams kun gyi dngos grub mchog/ bdag la myur du sgrub tu gsol// rdo rje
60a5(rgyud): gsor zhing sngags de dang 'di brjod par bya'o// de nas 'byung mo'i gdong gi phyag rgya bshad pa/ lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo mnyam par byas nas mthe bong ba sgreng ste/ lag pa
60a6(rgyud): g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis lag pa g.yon pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya btsangs te/ g.yas pa'i mthe bong bsgreng ba ni rdo rje 'chang gi 'byung po gdan gyi phyag rgya'o// oM
60a7(rgyud): dza ya dza ya ma hA kro d+ha a d+hi pa ti kro d+ha rA dza oM ma b+hU ta A san/ daR+sha ya rak+Sha swA hA/ gdan gyi sngags so// de nas lha'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bshad pa/ zil ma skyer ba byas te sor
60b1(rgyud): mo thams cad bkram pa ni badz+ra'i phyag rgyar brjod pa ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ oM pad+mo b+hag pa ni Shan Na sarba de ba traM swA hA/ lha thams cad kyi gdan gyi pad+ma'i phyug rgya dang
60b2(rgyud): sngags so// pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yon pa bskul bas lha thams cad spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni/ oM sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bis ra/
60b3(rgyud): gats+tsha gats+tsha sarba de ba tA nAM/ shrI badz+ra d+ha ra sa ma a dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// khro chen thams cad grub mdzad pa/ dngos grub bde bar sbyin mdzad
60b4(rgyud): pa mthu chen bla na med pa ni// bdag la stsal te gshegs su gsol// bstod pa 'dis bstod par bya'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ dngos grub
60b5(rgyud): kyi cho ga dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa rdzogs so// // de nas khro bo'i bdag po chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong ba tsam
60b6(rgyud): gyis khams gsum pa'i rgyal srid 'thob cing / 'di'i rdo rje 'chang bzlas pa tsam gyis rdo rje 'chang dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// gal te ma grub na'ang gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur/
60b7(rgyud): ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po bzlas pa tsam gyis 'byung po thams cad bran du 'gyur ro// gal te sngags pa khros na khros pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa'i
61a1(rgyud): lha thams cad dum bu brgyar zhig par 'gyur ro// klu dang gnod sbyin thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis gsod cing 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad hUM ga sgra tsam gyis
61a2(rgyud): 'bros par byed do// de nas dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen po'i sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba bshad pa/ bdag nyid srung ba'i sngags 'bum bzlas na myur du 'grub par byed pa'o// de nas dpal/
61a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang sgrub par 'dod na zla ba gcig tu dus gsum du stong phrag re bzlas nas de nas zla ba nya la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings te mtshan thog tha ga bzlas
61a4(rgyud): so de nas tho rangs sa g.yo ba dang phyag rgya 'bar ba ra 'gyur te/ 'bar ba tsam gyis rdo rje 'chang dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhing / rga ba dang 'chi ba med la lha'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/
61a5(rgyud): de nas lha mo sgrub par 'dod na lha mo dka' bzlog rkang pa g.yon pas ma nan na sa khri bzlas na lha mo rang nyid 'ong zhing dngos grub kyi rdzas dang dngul chu dang bcud kyis len gyi grub pa ster zhing
61a6(rgyud): chung mar 'gyur ro// gal te ma grub na dug dang lan tshwas byugs te rkang pa g.yas pas mnan nas khro bo'i sngags 'di bzla bar bya ste/ oM hA na ha na badz+ra mA ra ya che ge mo dzu baT/ khro bon/
61a7(rgyud): dang bcas pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas na/ bzlas pa tsam gyis spyi bo 'gas pa'am bskams nas 'chi'o// de bzhin du khro bo'i sngags kyis gsad pa thams cad la sbyar bar/
61b1(rgyud): bya'o/ de nas dpal lha mo sgrub par 'dod na dpal lha mo rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te khri bzlas na dpal lha mo 'ong ste/ me tog gi stan byin zhing legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod la chung ma
61b2(rgyud): gyis shig ces bsgo nas ji ltar 'dod pa ltar spyan na rgyal srid ster bar byed do// de nas 'jigs byed ma rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te khri bzlas na 'jigs byed ma rang gi gzugs kyis
61b3(rgyud): 'ong ste bran mo'i las rnams byed do// tsa mun ti rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te khri bzlas na tsa mun ti rang gi gzugs kyis 'ong ste tsa mun ti bran mor 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ma mo'i
61b4(rgyud): sgrub pa thams cad la ma nan te bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba dang /
61b5(rgyud): po rdzogs so// / phyag na rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba mchog tu drag po chen po'i sgrub pa'i thabs shin tu drag po las
61b6(rgyud): thams cad sgrub par byed pa gsungs pa ling ga gcig pa rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun na lha chen po de myur du 'ong ngo // gal te ma 'ongs na de'i
61b7(rgyud): mod la 'chi'o// sred med kyi bu mnan te nyi mdun du stong phrag mdun bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa la nges par 'ong ngo // gal te ma 'ongs na spyi bo 'gas pa 'am bskams par 'gyur ro//
62a1(rgyud): nges par sred med kyi bu 'khor dang bcas pa mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun na myur bar 'ong ste/ gal te/
62a2(rgyud): ma 'ongs na bskams te mchi'o// mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// brgya byin rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma mdun na nges par 'ong ste/
62a3(rgyud): gal te ma 'ongs na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'dis brgya byin mngag gzhug par 'gyur zhing pang na gnas pa blangs te ster bar byed do// gal te ma 'ongs na spyi bo 'gas shing
62a4(rgyud): dum bu brgyar 'jig la/ rang gi rigs pa rgyud rnams rlag par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun na myur du 'ong ste gzhon nu mngag ga zhug par
62a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gzhon nu'i gdon thams cad bran du 'gyur zhing che ge mo 'tsho bar gyis shig/ che ge mo song cig ces smras na de dag thams cad byed do// tshogs kyi bdag po mnan te
62a6(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun na myur du 'ong ste/ gal te ma 'ongs na rigs brgyud rlag cing 'chi bar 'gyur ro// log 'dren thams cad mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// nyi ma
62a7(rgyud): rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te brgyad stong bzlas na nyi ma bdun na myur du 'ong ste rgyal srid ster ro// gal te ma 'ongs na 'chi ba 'am rang gi brgyud rlag par 'gyur ro// zla ba mnan te brgyad
62b1(rgyud): slong bzlas na nyi ma bdun na slar du 'ong zhing mngag gzhug par 'gyur la gser srang brgya ster ro// gal te ma 'ongs na spyi bo 'gas shing bskams te 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rang gi rigs
62b2(rgyud): dang ba rgyu phung bar yang 'gyur ro// 'di ni zla ba 'khor du sgrub par bshad pa'o// 'jigs byed rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na yang mtshan mo mchod pa
62b3(rgyud): chen po byas te sha chen pos mchod pa byas nas sha chen po'i gtor ma byas te/ sha chen po nyid kyi til gyi sa mar me rab tu sbar te/ nam phyed na sgra chen po byung ste drag tu dgod cing bsdad
62b4(rgyud): na kye skyes bu chen po 'di bza' yis slang zhig ces zer ro// des skrag par mi bya ste/ gal te skrag par gyur na yi ge hUM bzlas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jigs byed
62b5(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa bran du 'gyur ro// khams gsum pa'i rgyal srid ste ra zhing yi ge hUM bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad 'joms so// gar gyi dbang phyug rkang pa
62b6(rgyud): g.yon pas ma nan te nyi ma bdun du brgyad stong bzlas na skad cig de la 'ong zhing ma ngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// gal te ma 'ongs na bskams pa 'am 'chi bar 'gyur ro// nag po chen po rkang
62b7(rgyud): pa g.yon pa sa ma nan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun na 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas te 'ong ngo // gal te ma 'ongs na skad cig de nyid la 'chi zhing rang gi rigs pargyud bung bar 'gyuraro// /
63a1(rgyud): lha nag po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// gdong bzhi pa phyug po'i khang par song ste rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas khri phrag
63a2(rgyud): bzlas na nyi ma bdun na 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas te 'ong ngo // gal te ma 'ongs na rigs dang brgyud rlag par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad kyi sa g.yog 'khor du 'gyur la/ rgyab tu/
63a3(rgyud): zhon na mtho ris su'ang 'khyer ro// pang pa na gnas pa blangs nas ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len bzang po ster ro// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs
63a4(rgyud): so 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las mngag gzhug sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u rdzogs so// // de nas stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag
63a5(rgyud): tu med pa 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa'i bran mo sgrub pa'o thabs khro bo nyid kyis mi rnams la phan pa'i don du gsungs pa dngos grub kyi mchog rgyas pa ra bshad par bya ste/
63a6(rgyud): le lo can dang / sdig pa byed pa dang / rdzun du smra bas kyang 'grub par byed do// tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang zang zing spangs pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la rtag tu gnas
63a7(rgyud): pa dang / rtag tu khro bo'i bzlas pa la gnas pa sa 'byung mo dang / klu mo dang / gnod sbyin mo sgrub par 'dod na sngags kyi tshogs kyi sa dgug pa la sbyar bar bya'o// lha mo u ma sgrub
63b1(rgyud): par byed pa rnams la phan pa'i don du bsnyen bkur mar bya bar bshad pa'o// dang por bsgrub par bya zhing de'i 'og tu dngos grub kyi mchog bzang po rig 'dzin dang / phyogs kyi bdag po/
63b2(rgyud): dang nor gyi char dang / gter chen po dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang bum pa bzang po la sogs pa dang / gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa dang sha za mo dang / sa la 'joms
63b3(rgyud): ma la sogs pa gsungs pa rnams 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'grub na tha mal pa 'byung mo bran du bya ba rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur ro//
63b4(rgyud): 'byung po 'dul byed kyi rgyud chen po la ni sgrub pa po rtag tu khro bo'i zlos pa la gnas na slob dpon la smod pa dang / lha thams cad smod pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / thams cad
63b5(rgyud): du dam tshig nyams pa dang / med pa dang / sngags dang / rgyud spangs pas kyang gal te 'dod na nges pa ra de'i mod la myur du 'grub par 'gyur pa ra khro bo nyid kyis gsungs so//
63b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po sa 'di skad ces gsungs so// de nas 'dir mchog tu gsang ba chen po 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i sgrub pa'i thabs
63b7(rgyud): gsungs padang po re zhig bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par byed pa/ bran po dang bran mo thams cad sgrub par byed pa dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po bzlas pa tsam
64a1(rgyud): gyis myur du 'grub par byed pa/ don yod cing bgegs 'joms la grub par byed pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams so// oM hrI hU~M ka Tu ka D+ha/ che ge mo hUM hUM hUM dza/
64a2(rgyud): khro bo 'di dang bcas pas brgyad brgya bzlas pa tsam gyis myur du 'ong ste/ thams cad bran dang bran mor 'gyur ro// gal te ma 'ongs na spyi bo 'gas shing bskams te 'chil/ rigs/
64a3(rgyud): dang rang gi rigs pargyud rlag par 'gyur ro// 'byung mo'i gzugs pa lang gi gi'u wang gis bris terkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na skad cig de la kye ma kye ma zhes
64a4(rgyud): zer zhing 'ong ste/ 'gum mo 'gum mo// kye sgrub pa po bka' ci stsol zhes zer ro// sgrub pa pos kye 'byung mo bdag gi khol mo gyis shig ces smras na de khol mo'i les tha mas cad byed de//
64a5(rgyud): gro ba'i shun pa la ba lang gi gi'u wang gis gzugs ba rA na bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na de'i mod la 'ong ngo // gal te de'i mod la ma 'ongs na nyungs kA ra
64a6(rgyud): gyis kha la bsnun cing sgra chen pos bsgul na 'byung mo de rims drag pos 'chi'o// phyir gso ba ni ma ra dang sbrang rtsi khar bcug na slar 'tsho'o// 'byung mo 'dis bran mo'i las byed cing
64a7(rgyud): sgrub pa po bdag nyid dang gsum la gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba nyi ma re re ster ro// gtsug lag khang gi sgor song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'dis bgrang mo'i blo gros zhes bya
64b1(rgyud): ba'i 'byung ngo 'ong / 'ongs pa la gtor ma byin na sdug pa ngas tsi b+ha zhes smra'o// ma gyis shig ces bskon ma dang 'dra bar yongs su stong zhing bdag nyid dang lnga la gos dang / rgyan dang
64b2(rgyud): bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bran mo sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u rdzogs so// / de nas mchog tu
64b3(rgyud): gsang ba shin tu gsang ba chen po 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'byung ma sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya ste/ 'bul po rnams la phan pa'i don du
64b4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi sgrub pa'i thabs khro bo nyid kyi sa gsungs pa'o// de la 'byung mo rnams kyi ming bshad pa/ rgyan can ma dang / rna canA ma dang / do shal can ma dang
64b5(rgyud): seng ge ma dang rgod byed ma dang / gar byed ma dang / dga' ba ma dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma dang / lha mo rnams so// 'byung mo brgyad po rnams chung bar don du
64b6(rgyud): gnyer ram ma ra gnyer ram/ yang na sring mor gnyer na sgrub pa po shing gcig par song ste/ mtshan mo dang nyin mo dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas nas/ bzlas
64b7(rgyud): pa'i mthar mchod pa chen po byas nas gu gul gyi 'dug pa byin te bzlas na de nas nam phyed kyi dus su rgyan can ma nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chu'i yon chab
65a1(rgyud): byin na dga' bar 'gyur ro// ma dang / sring mo dang / chung mar 'gyur te/ gang mngon par 'dod pa de smra bar bya'o// gal te mar gyur na ni 'khor brgyad
65a2(rgyud): brgya'i gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro// gal te chung mar gyur na ni dong che stong stong ster zhing / dngul chu dang bcud kyi sa len ster ro// gal te sring mor gyur na ni
65a3(rgyud): dpag tshad stong nas bud med bzang mo blangs nas ster zhing / dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster la/ lha'i gter ster ro// mtshan mo dur khrod du song ste khri bzlas nas/ bzlas pa'i
65a4(rgyud): mthar rna cha dang dogal can gyi 'byung mo nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la khrag gi mchod yon byin na dga' bar 'gyur ro// ma gyis shig ces bsgo na ma dang 'dra bar yongs su skyong bar byed do// /
65a5(rgyud): mtshan mo lha khang stong par song ste khri bzlas na 'byung mo do shal can myur du 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la chags pa spyad na chung mar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba bcu gnyis yongs su skyong bar byed cing dong tshe
65a6(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa lnga dang ra sa zung gcig ster ro// de nas seng ge ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo ling ga gcig par song ste khri bzlas na rang nyid 'ongs shing / kye sgrub pa po bka' ci stsal zhes
65a7(rgyud): smra zhing sgrub pa pos chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na lha'i dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing / dong che brgyad dang ras zung gcig ster ro// de nas rgod byed ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/
65b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i 'ang bar song ste phyag na rdo rje dang nye bar 'dab ma la bris la/ ka ra wA ra'i me tog byin te nam byed kyi bar dub zlas na/ rang nyid rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du rim par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la tsan/
65b2(rgyud): dan gyi chu'i mchod yon byin na/ kye sgrub pa po bka' ci stsol zhes smra'o// sgrub pa pos bdag gi mngag gzhug gyis shig ces brjod na rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing ras dang / rgyan dang / bza'
65b3(rgyud): ba la sogs pa ster ro// de ma lus pa zad par byas te/ gal te cung zad bzhag na phyis 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshan mo gzhal yas khang skyed par byed do// de nas gar byed ma'i sgrub
65b4(rgyud): pa'i thabs bshad pa/ chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste/ brgyas stong bzlas nas nyi ma bdun na mchod pa chen po byas la nyi ma sha ra ba tsam gyis bzlas pa rdzogs par bya ste/ tsan
65b5(rgyud): dan gyi bdug pa byin nas yang bzlas na nam phyed kyi dus na nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la 'dod pas longs spyad na chung mar 'gyur ro// lha'i gser srang brgya mal du dor nas tho rangs kyis 'gro'o// /
65b6(rgyud): de bzhin du nyi ma re re rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de'ang ma lus par zad par byas te/ gal te cung zad lus na phyin chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas zan mo chen mo sgrub pa'i thabs
65b7(rgyud): kyi cho ga rgyas pa dngos grub sna tshogs grub par byed pa/ bzlas pa tsam gyis rtag tu 'grub cing sbyin sreg gi las mi dgos la/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas phyag na rdo rjes ji ltar gsungs pa
66a1(rgyud): ltar skad cig de la 'grub pa'i dga' byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo rang gi khyim sgor bzlas na nyi ma gsum na nges par 'ong ngo // bran mo'i las byed cing /
66a2(rgyud): sa bon thams cad dang / zhing gi las dang / khyim gyi bya ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed do// de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa sha'i zas khyer te ma mo'i gnas su
66a3(rgyud): song nas mtshan mo nya dang shes bya ba byas te lan stong bzlas na nyi ma bdun na nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la khrag gi mchod yon byin na bdag po bka' ci stsal zhes smra bar byed do// sgrub pa pos lha
66a4(rgyud): mo chung mar gyur cig ces smras na chung mar 'gyur zhing re ba thams cad skong la rgyal srid ster bar byed do// de nas lha mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo lha mo'i khang par song ste stan
66a5(rgyud): bshams pa/ tsan dan dkar po dang sna ma'i me tog gis mchod cing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i mthar nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la 'khyud pa dang
66a6(rgyud): 'o byas pa dang / ji ltar dga' ba 'dod pa byas na lha mo gser gyi mdog can gzhon nu ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa chung mar 'gyur ro// dong tshe brgyad dang / ras zung gcig dang /
66a7(rgyud): gnas rnams dang / bza' ba bzang po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa la ster ro// 'di nyid kyis rnam thos sras kyi khang par 'jug na gsang ba'i mtha' dang / bzlas pa'i mtha' la shin/
66b1(rgyud): tu myur bar rdzas blangs nas ster bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'byung mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi/
66b2(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// / dpal rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs lha chen po thams cad gsod par byed pa'i sngags
66b3(rgyud): kyi cho ga gsungs pa/ oM ha na ha na/ sarba mA ra ya badz+ra dz+wa le hUM phaT/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rnon po 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug
66b4(rgyud): pas gang bar gyur to// hUM ha na phaT/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad dang / rig 'dzin
66b5(rgyud): du ma dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / lha'i bu mo dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / nam mkha' lding rnams
66b6(rgyud): dum bu brgyar byas te dgug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med
66b7(rgyud): pa'ang 'khor der 'dus pa rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te 'di skad ces smras so// dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen po ma 'ongs pa'i tshe ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gdug pa dang lha thams cad
67a1(rgyud): tshar gcod pa ni legs so legs so// de nas lha'i bu mo rnams langs te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der dpal rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rang gi snying/
67a2(rgyud): po phul ba/ oM shwA/ zla ba'i lha mo'i'o// oM shrI/ thig le mchog ma'i'o// oM shI/ gser gyi 'phreng ba ma'i'o// oM shI/ 'khyil ba'i 'phreng ba ma'i'o// oM druM/ rin chen
67a3(rgyud): 'phreng ba ma'i'o// oM sa/ rtsom pa ma'i'o// oM sru / brang na gnas pa ma'i'o// oM baM/ dpal rgyan ma'i'o// de nas lha'i bu mo brgyad kyi dngos grub kyi sgrub pa thams cad kyi cho ga bshad/
67a4(rgyud): pa ri'i rtse mo la song ste 'bum bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba nya ba la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas mtshan thog thag bzlas na zo rangs
67a5(rgyud): lha mo rang nyid 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chu'i mchod yon byin na dga' tshig smra bar byed do// sgrub pa pos bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces smras na dngos grub kyi rdzas dang
67a6(rgyud): dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len la sogs pa ster ro// de'i bcud kyis len gyis ni lo stong 'tsho'o// de nas thig le mchog ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ tsan dan dang 'o ma'i zas
67a7(rgyud): kyis khri bzlas nas nyi ma bdun na mchod pa rgyas par bya ste/ yar gyi ngoro tshes brgyad la ri'i rtse mor song la mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs nges par 'ong ste cung zad rgod pas chags pa
67b1(rgyud): byas nas mdun du sdod do// 'khyud pa dang 'o byas shing dga' bas chags par byas nas 'di ltar 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang 'dod pa de ster zhing rgyab tu zhon na mtho ris su'ang 'khyer bar byed do//
67b2(rgyud): gzhan yang rgyal srid ster bar byed do// de nas gser gyi 'phreng ba ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas nas nyi ma bdun pa la
67b3(rgyud): mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas mtshan thog zag bzlas na de'i tho rangs nges par 'ong ste 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// de nas 'khyil ba'i 'phreng ba ma'i sgrub
67b4(rgyud): pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ tshes grangs mi dgos shing rgyu skar yang mi dgos la/ smyung ba'ang mi dgos par 'grub par byed pa ste/ ri'i rtse mor song ste khri bzlas na de nam phyed na
67b5(rgyud): nges par 'ong ngo // chung mar gyur la dong tshe stong ster zhing / dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len dang / grub pa'i rdzas ster ro// de nas rin chen 'phreng ba ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ lha'i
67b6(rgyud): khang par song ste zla ba gcig tu stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas nas zla ba de'i tha ma la zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas na nam phyed na rkang gdub kyi sgra chen pos 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la me tog gi mchod yon
67b7(rgyud): byin na/ lha mo legs par 'ongs sam zhes smras na bdag po bdag gis ci bya zhes zer te/ sgrub pa pos chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na/ chung ma'i las byed cing lha mos 'dod pa sbyin par
68a1(rgyud): byed do// lo stong 'tsho bar byed do// de nas rtsom pa mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ tshes gcig la brtsams te mchod pa byas nas tsan dan gyi chus dkyil
68a2(rgyud): 'khor byas te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas shing zla ba nyal mchod pa chen po byas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas nas nges par 'ong ngo //
68a3(rgyud): gal te myur du ma 'ongs na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs pa na chung mar 'gyur la/ dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing ji ltar 'dod pas chags par byed la lo khri 'tsho'o// gang gi/
68a4(rgyud): tshe 'chi ba na rgyal rigs su skye'o// de nas brang na gnas pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa mtshan mo lha'i khang par song ste/ tsan dan gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing khri khri bzlas nas zla ba de
68a5(rgyud): 'das pa dang / ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mtshan thog zag bzlas na zo rangs myur du 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la me tog gi stan sbyin zhing legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod na sgrub
68a6(rgyud): pa po bka' ci stsal zhes zer ro// sgrub pa pos chung ma gyis shig ces smras na dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len dang / dngos grub kyi rdzas ster ro// gzhan gyi bud med la mngon par
68a7(rgyud): bgrod pa spang bar bya ste/ lo stong phrag lnga 'tsho'o// mtshan mo gcig gtsang sbra byas te tho ba'i 'dab ma la gur kum gyis dpal gyi rgyan can bris te tsan dan gyi bdug pa sreg cing bzlas la/
68b1(rgyud): zla ba de'i tha ma la mchod pa rgya cher byas te re zhig bzlas na nam byed na nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la myur du chags par byas na dga' bar 'gyur te/ dbyig dang / gser dang / mu
68b2(rgyud): tig la sogs pa ster ro// nyi ma re re zas bzang po ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// lha'i bu mo rnams kyi cho ga
68b3(rgyud): rgyas pa'i le'u'o// // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// gal te lha'i bu mo rnams ma grub de'i tshe 'gro ba 'di dang bcas te
68b4(rgyud): bzla bar bya'o// oM hrIHA kab+d+ha A kar+N+Na/ che ge mo hUM dzaHphaT/ khro bo 'di dang bcas te bzlas pa tsam gyis spyi bo 'gas shing dum bu brgyad du 'jig go/ sngags 'dis bcing bar bya'o//
68b5(rgyud): oM ban d+ha ban d+ha ha na ha na/ che ge mo hU~M phaT/ sngags 'dis dbang du bya'o// oM tsa la tsa la/ che ge mo sa ma ya na ye hUM phaT/ lha mo thams cad sgrub pa'o// de nas 'dir ni ma
68b6(rgyud): rnams la phan pa'i don du lha mo brgyad kyi phyag rgya rab tu bshad par bya ste/ dngos grub sna tshogs grub par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gnas par byed pa/ sngags bzlas
68b7(rgyud): pa bde bar grub pa'i phyag rgya khro bo nyid kyis bshad pa/ rgyud rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa 'byung po 'dul byed kyis gsungs pa 'di nyid la myur du bde ba sbyin pa'i lha mo rnams
69a1(rgyud): grub par byed pa/ bzlas pa tsam gyis 'byung mo rnams dang / sring mo dang / de bzhin du chung ma dang bran mo sgrub par byed pa/ zla ba zlos pa rnams la 'jig
69a2(rgyud): rten 'di'i bde ba sbyin pa'i bsnyen bkur mar sgrub pa'i thabs so// khu tshur so sor bcangs te lag pa gnyis ka pad+ma 'khor ba'i tshul du byas nas/ gung mo'i sor mo khab ltar byas
69a3(rgyud): pa brkyang ba ni lha mo brgyad po'i phyi'i bde ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// lag pa gnyis ka sor mo gcig gi steng du gcig bskyon pa'i sbyor bas gzung ba ni lha'i bu mo thams cad
69a4(rgyud): dbang du byed pa'i phyag rgya ste/ nye bar byed cing mngon du phyogs par byed la/ thams cad du 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ka pad+ma 'khor ba'i sbyor bas gzung
69a5(rgyud): ba ni lha'i bu mo thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i phyag rgya ste/ bcings pa tsam gyis skad cig de nyid la bran mor 'gyur ro// oM sarba a ba sa ra sa ra/ oM A gats+tsha hUM dzaHdzaH
69a6(rgyud): sngags 'dis lha'i bu mo thams cad bod par bya'o// oM sarba sad+d+hi b+ho ge shwa ri swA hA/ nye bar byed pa'i sngags so// oM kA ma pri ye swA hA/ mngon du byed pa'i sngags so// oM baM hUM hU~M/
69a7(rgyud): hUM dzaHdzaH/ lha'i bu mo thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i sngags so// 'byung po'i 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las/ lha'i bu mo rnams sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// /
69b1(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin mo thams cad langs te/ dpal rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te rang gi snying po phral ba/ oM Ak+Shats+tsha sur su nAd ri s+yAhA/ sdug gu mdzes ma'/
69b2(rgyud): oM na mo ha ri na maHswA hA/ yid 'phrog ma'i'o// oM ka na ka me b+hun pri ye s+t+wa~M hA/ gser ldan ma'i'o// oM A gats+tsha kA me shwa ro swA hA/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i'o// oM ra ti pra la
69b3(rgyud): swA hA/ rgan ma'i'o// oM pad+mi nA ye swA hA/ pad+ma ma'i'o// oM narti ma hA ti ni su rU pa ma ti swA hA/ gar byed ma'i 'o// oM a nu rA gi ni mai thu ni swA hA/ rjes su chags ma'i'o//
69b4(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du song ste gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing dus gsum du stong phrag re bzlas na zla ba gcig gi nang du
69b5(rgyud): nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chus mchod yon byin nam dang / sring mo dang / chung ma'i las byed do// gal te mar gyur na sems sun dbyung bar mi bya ste/ dngul chu dang bcu
69b6(rgyud): kyis len ster zhing nyi ma re re dong tshe stong ster ro// gal te sring mor gyur na ni grub pa'i rdzas dang / dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len ster zhing lha'i bu mo bzang mo blangs nas ster la/ 'das pa dang /
69b7(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba smra bar byed do// gal te chung mar gyur na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed cing nor gyi bdag po chen po byed do// de nas yid 'phrog ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs
70a1(rgyud): bshad pa/ chu bo'i 'gram du song ste tsan dan gyis maN+Dal nye bar byugs te/ mchod pa shin tu chen po byas na a ka ru'i bdug pa sbyin zhing nyi ma bdun du khri bzlas nas nyim
70a2(rgyud): bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na de ni nges par 'ong ngo // gal te ma 'ongs na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// bka' stsol cig ces smra bar byed cing / des bdag gi zan mo
70a3(rgyud): gyis shig ces bsgo na 'khor brgyad brgya'i zhal ta byed cing dong tshe brgya nyi ma re la ster te/ des kyang ma lus par zad par bya'o// gal te cung zad 'jog na phyin chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas
70a4(rgyud): gser ldan ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ ba ru ra'i shing gnas par song ste/ nya dang shas sgrub cing chang yang byin nas bdag nyid kyang btung zhing spags par gnas par bzla bar bya ste/ stong
70a5(rgyud): phrag re re bzlas so// de bzhin du nyi ma bdun pa'i mtshan mo bsgrub par bya ste/ ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te 'khor brgyad brgyas bskor nas rang
70a6(rgyud): nyid 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur ro// 'khor bcu gnyis kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba bzang po rnams nyin gcig bzhin du ster zhing dong tshe brgyad ster ro//
70a7(rgyud): de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ gro ga'i 'dab mal ba lang gi gi'u wang gis gzugs brnyan bris te gcig pu stan la 'jug la stong phrag re re bzlas so// de nas zla ba'i/
70b1(rgyud): tha ma la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas mi smra bar gyur pas bzlas na mtshan mo de'i phyed na nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la chags pas longs spyad na chung mar 'gyur ro//
70b2(rgyud): lha'i rgyan ma la du dor te tho rangs kyis 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi chung ma la mi bgrod par yang bya ste/ gal te bgrod na rnam par 'joms par byed do// de nas rgan mo'i sgrub thabs bshad pa
70b3(rgyud): gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan ma/ lag na ut+pal thogs pa/ gzhon nu ma ras la ri mo bris te sna ma'i me tog gis mchod cing gu gul gyi 'dug pa byin la stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzla/
70b4(rgyud): te zla ba tha ma la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar te/ ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la dga' bas chags pa byas na chung
70b5(rgyud): mar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa po 'khor dang bcas pa yongs su skyong bar byed cing / lhas 'dod par bya ba'i zas dang / dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len ster zhing dong tshe nyi shu rtsa lnga ster bar byed de/
70b6(rgyud): de nas pad+ma ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ rang gi khyim du mgo'i gnas su tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor byas te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing zla ba phyed du bzla bar bya'o// de nas zla ba nyal ci 'byor pa'i
70b7(rgyud): mchod pa byas te ji srid nam kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur te/ lha mos 'dod pa ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster bar
71a1(rgyud): byed do// de nas gar byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ a sho ka'i shing gi rtsar song ste bslab par bya'o// sha'i bza' ba dang / spos dang / dri dang / me tog sbyin
71a2(rgyud): zhing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na zla ba gcig gi nang du nges par 'ong ngo // mdor bsdus na 'ongs na ma dang / sring mo dang / chung mar 'gyur ro// gal te chung mar gyur na bza' ba dang / ras zung
71a3(rgyud): re dang / dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len ster zhing dong tshe brgyad ster bar byed do// gal te mar gyur na bza' ba bzang po dang ras zung re ster zhing gser srang brgya ster ro// gal te sring mor gyur
71a4(rgyud): na dpag tshad stong nas bud med bzang mo blangs nas ster zhing gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba bzang po ster ro// dngul chu dang bcud kyis lan yang ster bar byed do// de nas sring mo sgrub pa'i thabs/
71a5(rgyud): bshad pa/ gur kum gyis gro ga'i 'dab ma la gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs bris te/ de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams nas spos dang / me tog dang / mar me sbyin zhing dus gsum du bzlas pa/
71a6(rgyud): byas nas zla ba nyal ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas mtshan thog zag bzlas na de'i tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la 'dod pas longs spyad na chung mar
71a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lha'i dong tshe stong ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing lo stong 'tsho'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga
71b1(rgyud): rgyas pa'i le'u'o// / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// gal te dam tshig la mi gnas na khro bo 'di dang bcas te dgug pa'i phyir/
71b2(rgyud): bzla bar bya'o// oM d+h+r-i ka Tu ka Tu che ge mo yak+Shi Ni hrIHdzaHdzaH/ khro bo 'di dang bcas te sngags stong bzlas na myur du 'ong ngo // gal te myur du ma 'ongs na mig dang spyi bo 'gas shing de'i modo la 'chi ste
71b3(rgyud): dmyal ba chen po brgyad du lhung ngo // de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa/ khu tshur so sor bcangs te mthe'u chung gnyis 'khyud nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste bkug pa 'di ni khro bo'i mi phyed
71b4(rgyud): pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'dis 'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs par byed do// de nas gnod sbyin mo'i phyag rgya bshad pa/ gung mo'i sor mo gnyis mi mnyam par byas te srin lag
71b5(rgyud): rnam par brkyang zhing mdzub mo gnyis sbyar bar byas nas/ mthe'u chung gnyis snying por byas pa ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya dam pa ste/ 'di bcangs pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin
71b6(rgyud): mo thams cad 'ong ngo // phyag rgya 'di nyid la mthe bong g.yas pas bod par bya'o// oM hrIHA gats+tsha Ar+g+haM/ sarba yak+Shi Ni swA hA/ bod pa'i sngags so// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong
71b7(rgyud): g.yon pas slar gtang bar bya'o// oM yak+Shi A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ che ge mo lak+Shi Ni/ shI g+h+ra~M pu na rA ga na ma ya swA hA/ khu tshur so sor bcangs te gung ma'i sor mo rab tu brkyang ba ni gnod
72a1(rgyud): sprin mo thams cad mngon du phyogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// oM ma hAs d+hA mthun tshwa ya hA d+ha/ thA rbu raban tshun bcangs la mye chung brgya smye khrug pa na kadzaH/
72a2(rgyud): sbyin mo thams cad nye bar byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// oM kA ma b+ho ga shwa ra~M swA hA/ khu tshur phan tshun bsnol te lag pa gnyis mdzub mo gcig gi steng du gcig bskyon pa'i sbyor ba gzhag pa ni gnod sbyin mo thams
72a3(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// k+Shi/ snying po'o// khu tshur phan tshun bcangs te mdzub mo dang gung mo brkyang ba ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri dang / mar me'i phyag
72a4(rgyud): rgya'o/ oM sarba me no ha ra pri ye swA hA/ 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// / de nas klu'i
72a5(rgyud): rgyal mo rnams langs te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der/ dpal rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la spyi bos mngon pa rab tud nas rang gi snying po phul ba oM a/ oM pu/ a na d+ha mu khi phu/ shrI phu bA su la/
72a6(rgyud): mu khi phu/ i phu pad+ma ma Ni pu/ a phu ma hA pad+ma ma Ni pu/ d+hi pu karko Te mu khi pu/ sa pra shang khi ni bu/ dzu pu dza la mu khi phu/ tru lu dru ma mu khi phu/ klu mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cha
72a7(rgyud): ga rgyas par bshad pa/ klu'i khang par song ste 'bum bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// klu mo rnams dga' bar 'gyur zhing klu mo thams cad 'tshig par 'gyur ro//
72b1(rgyud): sgyus yang par rgyul gas/ dang / dang / dang / 'am rnams kyi sa brju pa sa tshad pa m+b+ha / rnas cu
72b2(rgyud): na myur du klu mo'i bu mo rnams rang gi khyim nas 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod cing / bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces bsgon nyi ma re re dong tshe brgyad brgyad so sor ster bar
72b3(rgyud): byed do// che ge mo 'tsho bar shog cig/ che ge mo sod cig ces bya ba la sogs pa thams cad grub par byed do// chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste 'o ma'i bza' bas stong phrag brgyad bzlas
72b4(rgyud): nabazlas pa'i mthar klu'i bu mo bzang mo 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la spyi bor me tog sbyin zhing chung mar gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// lha'i bza' ba bzang po dang dong tshe lnga lnga nyi ma re re ster
72b5(rgyud): bar byed do// klu'i gnas su mtshan mo song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i mthar skad cig de nyid la klu mo spyi bo'i nad chen po dang tsha bar gyur pas 'ong zhing / sdug pa ngas ci bya zhes smra
72b6(rgyud): bar byed do// chung mar gyur cig ces smras na/ bdag nyid dang lnga la ras dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba la sogs pa ster zhing dong tshe lnga lnga ster ro// mtshan mo pad+ma'i tshal du song ste stong phrag
72b7(rgyud): brgyad bzlas na klu'i bu mo rnams myur du 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur ro// dong tshe brgyad brgyad ster te des kyang ma lus par zad par bya'o// gal te cung zad
73a1(rgyud): 'jog na phyin chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshan mo chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i mtha' la klu'i bu mo nges par 'ong ngo //
73a2(rgyud): 'ongs pa la gser gyi pad+ma'i gdan byin te legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod cing bdag gi chu ngam gyis shig ces bsgo na/ nyi ma re re gser srang re re sbyin par byed do// mtshan mo rgya mtsho chen por/
73a3(rgyud): song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na de nam bzlas pa'i mtha' la klu'i bu mo 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na dong tshe gcig dang ras zung gcig ster bar byed do//
73a4(rgyud): klu'i khang par song ste lte ba nub tsam du chur zhugs te stong phrag brgyad pazlas na de nas bzlas pa'i tha ma la klu'i bu mo 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la spyi bor me tog byin te legs par 'ongs so zhes
73a5(rgyud): brjod cing chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na/ dong tshe brgyad dang lha'i zas bzang po ster bar byed do// mtshan mo klu'i khang par song ste mtshan thog thag bzlas na de'i tho rangs rgyan thams
73a6(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan te klu'i bu mo skad cig de la 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la me tog dang tsa na dan gyi mchod yon byin te legs so zhes brjod cing chu ngam gyis shig ces bsgo na/ lha'i dngul chu dang
73a7(rgyud): bcud kyis len dang / grub pa'i rdzas ster zhing ba sam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed la rgyal srid ster bar byed do// mtshan mo klu'i gnas su song ste khri bzlas na klu'i bu mo nges
73b1(rgyud): par 'ong ngo // klu'ongs pa la myur du chags par byas nas chung ma gyis shig ces brnyan/ nyi ma ren dang cha brgyad dang / lha'i byab 'ab bzang po dang / gos rnams ster bar byed do// ma
73b2(rgyud): mo klu'i khang par song la stong phrag brgyad bzlas na/ de nas bzlas pa'i tha ma la klu'i bu mo rings par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la klu'i me tog spyi bor byin na chung mar 'gyur zhing / lha'i ras dang
73b3(rgyud): rgyun dang bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro// de nas klu mo'i dam tshig gi sngags bshad pa/ oM pu/ A gats+tsha nA ga ni phu/ bod pa'i sngags so// oM i phu/ spos dang me tog gi sngags so//
73b4(rgyud): oM phu a phu/ dri dang mchod yon gyi sngags so// a dra/ i phu/ he lu/ ba~M phu/ klu mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sngags so// pra A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ shI g+h+nAM phu nA ya swA hA/ slar
73b5(rgyud): gtang ba'i sngags so// de nas klu mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa/ thal mo mnyam par byas te sor mo rnams mgo bo'i tshul du sbyar la mdzub mo kha bsgyur bas mthe bo'i sor mo brkyang ba ni
73b6(rgyud): klu mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// las thams cad byed cing grub pa'o// dgug pa'i phyag rgya dang / slar gtang ba dang / mchod pa'i phyag rgya ni khu tshur so sor bcangs te/ mthe'u chung gi
73b7(rgyud): sen mo mthe bos mnan nas sor mo lhag ma brkyang ba ni klu mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las klu mo rnams kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u
74a1(rgyud): 'o de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro zhing gsor te khro bo 'di dang bcas nas gsungs pa/ oM b+hA ra Na badz+ra hUM che ge mo nA gi ni A kaR+Sha ya hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ de nas 'dra/
74a2(rgyud): bshad pa tsam gyis klu thams cad brgyal zhing 'gyel te spyi bo'i nad chen pos shi'o// gal te dam tshig las 'das na khro bo 'di dang bcas te bzlas pas myur du 'chi zhing dmyal ba chen po brgyad du ltung bar
74a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes/ dpal rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las klu mo rnams sgrub par byed pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// /
74a4(rgyud): de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der mi 'am ci mo drug langs te kabacom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la spyi bos btud nas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM ma no ha ri swA hA/ oM su b+ha ge swA hA/
74a5(rgyud): oM bi shI la ne tri swA hA/ oM su ra b+hi pri ye swA hA/ oM a sha mu khi swA hA/ oM pi pra ka ra mu khi swA hA de nas mi 'am ci mo drug gi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa ra bshad pa ri'i rtse mo la song ste stong phrag/
74a6(rgyud): brgyad bzlas na mi 'am ci mo drug gi bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang mchod pa shin tu chen po byas te/ ba lang gi sha dang gu gul dang ldan pa'i bdug pas bdug cing ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na nges
74a7(rgyud): par 'ong ste/ de la 'jigs par ma byas na kye sgrub pa po bka' ci stsol zhes smra bar byed do// sgrub pa pos kyang kye bzang mo bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces smras nas/ rgyab tu zhon na lha'i 'jig rten du
74b1(rgyud): 'khyer bar byed cing bza' ba bzang po ster bar byed do// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs phyi ma bshad pa/ ro'i drung ngam gtsug lag khang du khri bzlas na bzlas pa'i mtha' la rang nyid 'ong zhing / lha mo'i lag
74b2(rgyud): pa 'jam pos rkang pa la nyug par byed cing myur du chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur zhing / dong tshe brgyad dang gos zung gcig ster bar byed do// chu bo'i 'gram du song nas khri bzlas nas yang mtshan
74b3(rgyud): thog zag bzlas na tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs nas chung mar 'gyur zhing nyi ma re re dong tshe lnga lnga ster bar byed do// mtshan mo chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i mtha'
74b4(rgyud): la nges par 'ong zhing lta bar byed do// nyi ma gnyis pa la mdun du 'dug cing gtam smra bar byed do// nyi ma gsum pa la chags pa spyad na nges par 'grub cing chung ma'i las thams cad byed la dong tshe brgyad
74b5(rgyud): dang ras phrugs gcig ster bar byed do// nyin gcig bzhin du ri'o rtse mor sha za zhing khri khri bzlas na lha mo'i gzugs kyis myur du 'ongs shing mdun du sdod do// 'khyud cing 'o byas te mi smra bas chags pa byas
74b6(rgyud): na chung mar 'gyur te/ dong tshe brgyad stong ster zhing lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster bar byed do// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga
74b7(rgyud): rgyas pa'i le'u'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dbang phyug chen po lha chen po khyod nyon cig/ 'jig rten gsum gyi
75a1(rgyud): bdag po lha rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa mngag gzhug ma lus pa sgrub par byed pa/ ma rungs pa rnams dang lha rnams la bstan par bya'o// de nas dbang phyug chen po/
75a2(rgyud): lha chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi byed pa bstan pa/ 'jig rten gsum gyi lha rnams kyis 'da' bar byab ma yin pa sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u dang / byas
75a3(rgyud): rgya dang / sngags kyi rim par phye ba bshad du gsol/ de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na gnas pa rnams kyis/ lha chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shin tu gdul dka' ba rnams
75a4(rgyud): 'dul bar byed pa gsol ba btab pa ni legs so legs so// de nas rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa
75a5(rgyud): rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// cha rnams bcu drug dag dang ldan// rdo rje rabs mdzes pa'o// de yi dbus su drag po che// rdo rje khro bo dgod bya ba// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug cing gsal/
75a6(rgyud): bskal pa mtha' ma'i me 'od 'dra// lha chen mig sman sbyar 'dra zhing // thod pa'i 'phreng bas rgyan du byas// drag shul bzhad cing cher 'jigs pa// 'jig rten gsum po 'jig mdzad pa'o//
75a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su// lha chen po ni bro bya ste// bzho mu tig ltar dkar zhing // de bzhin dkar po dung 'dra zhing // mig gsum pa la lag bzhi pa// zhi zhing lag pa g.yon pa na/
75b1(rgyud): mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa'o// g.yon pa'i phyogs kyi ma ru ni// sred med kun phra bya ste// g.yas pa nani rnga yab dang // g.yon na 'khor logs la shing ngo // rgyab tu brgya byin rgyal ba ste/ dengan/
75b2(rgyud): sprin drug mdun du'o// tshangs pa lag na gdugs 'dzin pa// kha ba me tog kun da dang // zla 'dra brgya byin mdun bri ste// rang gi stan la 'khod par ro// yang na sngags pas mu tig dang // ba li/
75b3(rgyud): zho 'dra dkar po ni// rnga yab thogs par smin drug bri// tshangs pa kha dog dmar po za// brgya byin kha dog gser po bri// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam smras shing // rnga yab thogs par khyad 'jug bri//
75b4(rgyud): de bzhin khyu mchog la zhon par// lha chen po ni bri bya ste// kun 'gyed lag na 'khor lo can// ngang pa la zhon bri bar bya// brgya byin glang chen zhon pa ste// smin drug rma bya zhon pa'o// phyi rol dang ni
75b5(rgyud): grwa rnams su// 'byung mo brgyad ni bri bar bya// pad+ma can dang pad chen dang // rnam 'byung ma dang lha 'joms ma// 'phrog ma mchog dang rin po che// rgyan ma 'gro ba skyong ma rnams// dpal gyi sgra
75b6(rgyud): yis rab grags pa'i// 'byung mo chen mo brgyad po ste// pad+ma can dang pad can ma// pad+ma dkar po lta bur bri// rnam 'byung ma dang lha 'joms ma// kha dog dmar por bri bar bya// 'byung
75b7(rgyud): bzhi rnams mtshungs par ni// gser gyi mdog tu bri bar bya// rdzu 'phrul che ldan 'byung mo brgyad// ji ltar bstan bzhin de lags bri// de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad pa/ rdo rje slob
76a1(rgyud): dpon bdag nyid me tog sngon po'i 'phreng bas brgyan cing gtsug tor sngon po bcings nas ras sngon po thung gcig bgos te/ sngon bzhin du zla za'i snying po 'di brjod par byaste/ sem/
76a2(rgyud): can kun la phan don du// myur du dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa// grub pa'i rdo rje khro bo ste// lha nyid dam tshig la bzhugs shig/ oM hUM badz+ra phardzas/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyi lha thams cad grub par byed do//
76a3(rgyud): de nas 'dir rdo rje gsor ba bshad pa// 'di ltar yi ge hUM zlos shing phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa ltar/ lha thams cad gzhom zhing lha'i bu mo thams cad dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / klu mo dang / 'byung /
76a4(rgyud): mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo can rnams skad cig de nyid la gzhom par bya ste ga/ rdo rje gsor ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas oM badz+ra dIp+ta ma hA kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa ma ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/
76a5(rgyud): skad cig de nyid la lha thams cad gsod cing 'khrug par byed do// hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sbyor ba 'dis kyang nges par sangs rgyas rnams kyang zhig par byed do// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/
76a6(rgyud): bo'i phyag rgya go cha byas pa sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o// oM bi sh+ya kro d+hA hUM hUM a dz+wa laM/ ma la a ku la/ b+hI Sha Na badz+ra a/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis phyi rol gyi dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang /
76a7(rgyud): lhung bar bya ba rnams nus par 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ oM b+hU shrI sing ha d+ha dza d+hi ri dzAH/ khro bo'i mdu/
76b1(rgyud): dam madz+nyAdz+dza/ mahA pa ba tin nu banaHd+ha/ rgyaga'o// a n+d+raHn+nati/ a.u Sh+Tas d+harmA ShAdA/ b+h+yana'o// d+hUT+Tas rA hA / !d+hA!/ gsan
76b2(rgyud): oM shrI ba ra ha ri Ni puSh+pa ha re hUM/ me tog dbang ldan gyi grwa ru'o// oM shrI rat+ne shwa ri d+hU pa ha ste hU~M/ spos ma'i grwa ru'o// oM shrI b+hU Shi Ni gun d+ha has+t+ri hUM/ bri bden thal du'o// oM shrI dzags/
76b3(rgyud): pA li ni A dI pa te hUM/ mar ma rlung du'o// de nas 'byung mo brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ khu tshur phan tshun bcings te mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni seng ge'i rgyal
76b4(rgyud): mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te gung mo rkyang ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid rkyad pa'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni/
76b5(rgyud): gzhu dang mda'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo brkyang ba nas bskyil ba ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo mnyam par byas te mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni maM
76b6(rgyud): tog gi phyag rgya'o// sor mo rnams phan tshun 'khyud de mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni spos kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa so sor brkyang ste dpung pa'i rtsa ba gnyis su gzhag pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o//
76b7(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyang ba ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o// 'byung mo 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas
77a1(rgyud): pa'i le'u'o// / de nas 'byung po brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ oM nAdzaH/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i'o// oM/
77a2(rgyud): hUM dzaH/ rgyal ba'i'o// oM hrI dzaH/ rdzogs byed kyi'o// oM sru dzaH/ dur khrod kyi bdag po'i'o// oM ru dzaH/ rig sngags kyi dbang phyug gi'o// oM hrIHhUM dzaH/ 'byung po
77a3(rgyud): dbang phyug gi'o// oM aM dzaH/ mngag gzhug mchog gi'o// 'byung po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du song ste sngon du 'bum bzlas te sngon
77a4(rgyud): du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te ji ltar gsungs pa'i 'bras chan dkar po dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zho dang / bu ram dang / 'o ma dang / sha rnam
77a5(rgyud): kyis mchod cing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas mtshan thog zag bzlas na tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo // gal te nges par ma 'ongs na skad cig de la 'chi'o// 'ongs na bsgo ba don med par mi byed do//
77a6(rgyud): sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bskon de man chad mngag gzug gi las byed la/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal srid ster bar byed cing dgra thams cad tshar gcod par byed do// tha ba'i
77a7(rgyud): mthangs nas ster zhing rgyabargya nan lha'i 'jig rten du'ang 'khyer bar byed do// brgya byin nyid kyang ster bar byed cing bskal pa bdun 'cha'o// de nas rgyal ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa
77b1(rgyud): mtshan ma sbyin byed ma'i mdun du song ste/ nyi ma re re stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ gtor ma sbyin zhing gu gul gyi 'dug pa byin nas bzlas na/ badz+ras/
77b2(rgyud): pa'i mtha' la nges par 'ong ste/ kye sgrub pa po bka' ci stsol zhes smra bar byed do// sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo nas rgyab tu zhon na gling bzhi pa rnams su'ang 'khyer bar byed
77b3(rgyud): cing du gzhan yang rgyal srid ster la lo lnga stong 'tsho'o// de nas rdzogs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi pho brang du song ste nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas
77b4(rgyud): nas nyi ma bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ 'bras chan dkar po dang zhos ji ltar gsungs pa ltar byin nas/ ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na rang nyid 'ong ngo //
77b5(rgyud): 'ongs pa la me tog gi mchod yon byin na dga' bar 'gyur te rgyal srid ster bar byed do// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing lo stong 'tsho'o// ji srid 'tsho ba de
77b6(rgyud): srid du mngag gzhug gi las byed do// che ge mo 'tsho bar gyis shig/ che ge mo sod cig ces smras na de dag thams cad byed do// kun tu rdzogs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/
77b7(rgyud): sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du khri bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba nyal ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/ ji srod nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na/
78a1(rgyud): nam byed na rings par 'ongs nas mdun du sdod do// kye sdug pa ngas ci bya zhes snga bar byed do// sgrub pa pos mngag gzug gyis shig ces bskon de phan chad mngag
78a2(rgyud): gzhug gi las thams cad byed do// gnod sbyin gyi bu mo bzang mo blangs nas ster zhing gter thams cad ster la lhas 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster ro// nyin gcig bzhin du ras dmar po zung
78a3(rgyud): re ster zhing dong tshe lnga ster la lo lnga brgya 'tsho'o// de nas dur khrod kyis bdag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ mtshan mo dur khrod du song ste nyi ma bdun du stong phrag
78a4(rgyud): brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa la 'byung po la sha dang / nya dang / til dang / 'dzam pU ti dang mngar gsum zan gyis gril ba'i ril bu dang ka rtag kham tshad du gtubs pa bsregs/
78a5(rgyud): nas ma ral brngos la 'dzam bu ti ka dang / 'bras chen dang / zho dang / bu ram dang / 'o zug dang / sran tshod dang / snum 'khur rnams kyis ji ltar gsungs pa byin nas
78a6(rgyud): gu gul gyi bdug pa'ang byin te/ ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par byed do// 'jigs par ma byas na rang gi 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
78a7(rgyud): 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la gtor ma byin na dga' bar 'gyur te 'byung po'i mngag gzhug byed do// nyi ma ri re dong tshe brgyad brgyad ster zhing dgra thams cad 'joms te lo lnga stong 'tsher/
78b1(rgyud): de nas rigs kyi dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ lha'i khang par song ste spos dmar po dang / me tog dmar po dang / gu gul gyi 'dug pa sbyin zhing khri bzlas na sngon du bsnyen/
78b2(rgyud): pa byas par 'gyur ro// mtshon mo nag po'i tshes bcu bzhi la nya dang / sha dang / til dang / 'dzam bu ti dang / 'bras chan dmar pos ji lta bar sgrub cing / du ru ka dang me tog
78b3(rgyud): sbyin te/ ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na snang ba chen po dang / 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs kyis 'ong ste/ de la 'jigs par ma byas na sdug pa ci bya zhes smra bar byed do//
78b4(rgyud): sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo na/ nyi ma re dus gsum du dong tshe lnga lnga ster bar byed do// lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster bar byed cing lo lnga stong 'tsho'o// de nas
78b5(rgyud): 'byung po dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo ling ga gcig par song ste/ gcig pu nub gsum du 'bras chan dmar po dang / nya dang / shas gtor ma sbyin zhi bar skyes kyi
78b6(rgyud): sha dang / gu gul dang / sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i bdug pas bdug cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma dang po la rmi lam du mthong bar byed do// nyi ma gnyis pa la rang nyid mthong bar byed do//
78b7(rgyud): nyi ma gsum pa la rings par 'ong zhing mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smra bar byed do// bka' ci stsol/ de nas sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o// rtag tu phyi bzhin
79a1(rgyud): 'brang bar 'gyur zhing / rang nyid song nas mi zad pa'i gter ster zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams sba bar byed do// gos dang / rgyan dang /
79a2(rgyud): bza' ba bzang po rnams ster bar byed cing lo nyis stong 'tsho bar byed do// de nas pho nya mchog gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi khang par song ste nag po'i tshes bcu bzhi la/
79a3(rgyud): khri bzlas nas nyi ma bdun pa la sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing me tog dkar po dang / 'bras chan dkar po dang
79a4(rgyud): mar dang 'o thug sbyin zhing ku sha'i khri la 'dug ste/ mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas mtshan mo ji srid na ma phyed kyi bar du bzlas na mngag gzhug mchog rang nyid 'ong ste/ 'ongs pa la
79a5(rgyud): tsa na dan gyi mchod yon byin na/ kye sgrub pa pos bdag gis ci bya zhes smra bar byed do// de nas sgrub pa pos bdag gi mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo na/ de phan chad mngag gzhug par
79a6(rgyud): 'gyur zhing lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster ro// dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing gter rnyed par byed la rgyab tu zhon nus mtho ris su'ang 'khyer bar byed cing / gzhan yang
79a7(rgyud): rgyal srid ster bar byed do// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ mngag gzhug sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i la'u'o// / de nas 'dir yang dag par/
79b1(rgyud): bshad pa ni/ dngos grub sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa slob dpon rnams la phan pa'i don du ji ltar gsungs pa mngag gzhug pa'i thabs te/ bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'i le lo can dang
79b2(rgyud): sdig pa byed pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / tshul 'chos can dang / dbul po dang / nad kyis gdungs pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / sems mi brten pa'i mi rnams kyang spang bar mi bya ste/
79b3(rgyud): gal te longs spyod dang / nor dang / grags pa 'dod na'ang skad cig gis phun sum tshogs par ster ro// sngags 'dis dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len pa'i dngos grub dang / lha'i
79b4(rgyud): rgyal srid kyi dngos grub kyang grub par byed na/ mi rnams kyi rgyal srid grub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bzhin du 'di lha'i bu mo thams cad skad cig tsam gyis grub par byed do/
79b5(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di ni bklags pas grub par byed cing shin tu brtson 'grus dman pa rnams la'ang ji ltar bde ba ltar myur du grub par byed cing / sems cad thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin
79b6(rgyud): pa/ yi ge bzhi po cher gsang ba/ dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed pa/ bklags pa tsam gyis mngon par grub par byed pa ste/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i
79b7(rgyud): rgyud chen po las/ dngos grub kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// // de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'byung po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan
80a1(rgyud): nyid bshad pa/ sor mo rnams phan tshun 'khyud de/ gung mo brkyang nas kha ba ltar gzung ba ni 'byung po chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid/
80a2(rgyud): las gung mo bkug cing mdzub mo brkyang nas bkug pa ni rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yon pa bskyil zhing mthe'u chung brkyang ste so sor gzung ba ni rdzogs byed kyi phyag rgya'o//
80a3(rgyud): sor mo phan tshun 'khyud de gzung ba ni kun tu rdzogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung dang mthe bong nang du bkug ste gzung ba ni dur khrod kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o//
80a4(rgyud): mthe'u chung gnyis rab tu brkyang ste gzung ba ni rigs kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// thal mo kha sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni pho nya mchog gi phyag rgya'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal
80a5(rgyud): po chen po lasa'abyung po'i rgyal po chen po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
80a6(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje slob dpon la phan pa'i don du bsnyen bkur ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i 'byung mo rdo rje slob dpon gyis bsgrub par bya ste/ 'byung mo rnams
80a7(rgyud): kyis ni yid la dga' ba skyed cing phan tshun tshim par byed pa'o// de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyad chen po las/ 'byung mo dpal chen mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par ba shan pa/
80b1(rgyud): dpal rtsa ba bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'bum bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas zlab nyal ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa spyom ni
80b2(rgyud): mtshan thog thag bzlas so// de nas tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi mchod yon sbyin zhing legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod na/ kye sgrub pa po tsa bka' stsol zhes sba'o// sgrub
80b3(rgyud): pa pos bdag nyid kyi chung ma gyis shig ces brjod na lha'i dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing / dngos grub kyi rdzas dang / gter dang / rgyal srid rnams ster bar byed do// zhi ba'i sgrub pa'i
80b4(rgyud): thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa dang po'o// / de nas gzhan yang nan tur gyis sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ gro ga'i 'dab ma la 'byung mo dpal chen mo bris te/ mtshan mo gcer bur gyur
80b5(rgyud): pas dpal rdo rje 'chang gi mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na myur du 'ong ngo // 'ongs pa la chags pa byas na dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid kyang ster bar byed do// brgya
80b6(rgyud): byin yang ster ro// rgyab tu zhon na mtho ris su'ang 'khyer zhing lo khri 'tsho'o// gal te ma grub na mig dang spyi bo 'gas shing bskams la/ skad cig de nyid la 'chi'o zhes khro bo nyid kyis
80b7(rgyud): gsungs so// gur kum gyis ming bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas rdo rje gsor zhing yi ge hUM hUM phaT phaT lan bdun brjod na brjod par gyur pas nges par skad cig gis 'chi bar byed do//
81a1(rgyud): 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// / gu gul gyi 'jug pa sbyin zhing gtor ma bshams te ras
81a2(rgyud): dkar pos bkab la sngags 'di lan ga sum brjod do// de ba saM b+hU ta ma hi ta/ pra Ni pa ta ya/ bi ba dza yed pri thag ma hA b+hU ta/ swa s+tha na ma/ ta tra gats+tsha ti swa shA ni de ba a la ye Sh+ya na dI ta te/
81a3(rgyud): tsatum the/ e ka li gai wa/ de ba a ya ta ne wa/ shI g+h+ra gats+tsha n+tu/ b+hU tA na ma ma sa mA ya/ pra tI pA la nu ya/ ya sa i ben gats+tsha ti tak+SheN+Ta/ mUr+ha ni/ mal yed/ b+hutA nA rar/
81a4(rgyud): wa na ra ka pa ted/ ya tha ya tha/ swa s+thA ne gats+tshan+sa/ ya tha su Shi swA hA/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis sa rnams nye bar bsdu bar bya'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rim par/
81a5(rgyud): phye ba gnyis pa rdzogs te/ 'byung po 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu drug pa las ji snyed pa rnams rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+ha A ka ra barma dang /
81a6(rgyud): lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA nI lAm bar d+ha ra badz+ra pA
81a7(rgyud): kalpa na ma d+ha ra / 'od skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen pa
81b1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can/ sangs rgyas gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa/ mig me mngag gi phung po 'dra ba
81b2(rgyud): dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ra can/ lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas nA na
81b3(rgyud): byas pa/ sbrul 'bar ba'i rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba zab/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ gshin rje/
81b4(rgyud): cha byad can/ lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/ gsos po che sbrul za ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings pa/ a la la zhes sgrog par byed pa/ rgya mtshog
81b5(rgyud): zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la bskur ba/ klu thams cad rlag par byed pa/ gad rgyangs chen po sgrogs pas kun tu 'khrugs par byed
81b6(rgyud): ga gshin rje'i gzugs can/ khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa/ klu rnams 'chi bar rnyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi byem med kyis
81b7(rgyud): gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho pan nA ga/ a d+hi pa ta ye/ i dan ni lA~M bar d+ha ra ga rI ra/ badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da yan/ ya sa mA ti/ kra ma tha/ utas
82a1(rgyud): nas b+ha siSh+Tha ti/ taHhA/ prar+d+ha bud+d+ha/ biTam+b+ha bi prad+d+ha/ mA ti kram tha/ ha ra ha ra/ nA kA nAn/ rba ha ra pra ha ra/ nA gA nAn/ tsin+da tsin+da/ nA ga rbad yAn
82a2(rgyud): b+hin+da bin+da/ nA ga marmA Ni bi She maH/ nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi swo Ta ya/ nA ga na ya nA ni/ tad+ya thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dwe rA ya hUM phaT/ nA ga go ta sA da nA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba sa nA ya paH
82a3(rgyud): a pra ti ha ta ba la ya paH/ pa ra kra mA ya baT/ ka tAn tra ya phaH/ kr-i tAn+ta rA bA ya paH/ ro lardza ya laH/ thA sa nA ya phaT/ s+ya dz+nyo sA da nA ya barba/ br-i ta bi shwA tsa khar+tha
82a4(rgyud): sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pa sA ra/ bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA shaM ka rA ya phaT/ sarba sha truM saM brta ra bi
82a5(rgyud): nA sha ka ra ya phaT/ nI lA s+pha ra d+ha ra/ badz+ra pA Ni rA dzA pa ra ti swA hA/ de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la ni tshu la sngags kyis btab la gtor na gtang bar 'gyur ro// klu ba zlog par bya
82a6(rgyud): na smra gshad kyi lcug ma'am bal po se'u'i lcug mas bya'o// yi dgas dang brjed byed rnams la ni skud pas bya'o// rims nad med par bya ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ka
82a7(rgyud): 'chus pa la ni srid pa sngon pos bya'o// nor 'dod na zhag gcig smyung ba byas te pog por gyis bdugs na/ rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad smon la gser gyi dong
82b1(rgyud): tshe bdun stong sbyin par byed do// rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o// sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na nyungs kar gyis bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba'i
82b2(rgyud): las ni mar rnying pa'am/ thal ba'am/ yungs kar gyis bya'o// nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po las srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i
82b3(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur// byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sas bya'o// dus
82b4(rgyud): la ni rtsa ku shas bya ba par bya'o// bdag srung ba la ni yid kyis sam chus bya'o// gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// las de thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni sngags lan gsum mam/
82b5(rgyud): bdu na na ma/ bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon pos mchod/
82b6(rgyud): de sngags stong bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na
82b7(rgyud): gar+b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo//
83a1(rgyud): oM mu tsi li swA hA/ mu kha se swA hA/ mo ha ni swA hA/ dan+ti ri swA hA/ cho ga ni chu khyor ba gang la bzlas pa byas te 'thungs nas sems bzhin du nyal na lag na rdo rjes rmi lam bsta/
83a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa/
83a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na
83a4(rgyud): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po gsang ba dang
83a5(rgyud): bcas pa/ gsang chen dang bcas pa bdag gis bshad lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i pho brang lung lo can du mchis la sems can rnams gdul bar 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol na/
83a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje gang khyod kyis rig pa mchog go cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bshad pa ni khyod gtum pa yin/
83a7(rgyud): bsten par dka' ba yin/ shin tu thub par dka' ba yin ka 'phags pa'i tshul med pa yin te/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po bshad pa gang yin pa de dag thams
83b1(rgyud): cad ni gsang ba med par las mi byed do// lag na rdo rje de bas na rdo rje'i rigs 'di dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bde blag tu 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ khyod kyi ming brgyad pa gsang ba
83b2(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa gang thos na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'ang sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang / lag na rdo rje khyod kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams
83b3(rgyud): cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang / log 'dren bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang / gang thos na tshangs par ma spyad pa'ang tshangs par
83b4(rgyud): spyod par 'gyur ba dang / thub par ma byas pa'ang thub par byas par 'gyur ba dang / spung bar ma byas pa'ang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ba dang / dge sbyong ma yin pa'ang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang ldan
83b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la srung bar mdzad pa dang / las kyi dngos grub kyang stsol bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
83b6(rgyud): 'das lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mong brgyad pa gsang ba gsang sngags kyi
83b7(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje ngas bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ khyod na glang po che'i rna ba can yin/ khyod ni rgyan bzang po dang ldan
84a1(rgyud): pa yin/ khyod ni rnam par gnon pa yin/ khyod ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin/ khyod ni bden pa nyid yin/ khyod ni gzugs sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni 'bar ba'i
84a2(rgyud): me lce dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni gzugs mdzes pa yin no// khyod kyi ming 'di dag mkhas pa dag gis thos na/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bar du sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur
84a3(rgyud): ro sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun na bzhugs shing de dag de la chos ston par mdzad do// chos bstan pa des na de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi
84a4(rgyud): nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro// na mo bud+d+ha s+ya/ na mo d+harma s+ya/ na maHsaM g+ha s+ya/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ an+te/
84a5(rgyud): man+ta / kha ran+te/ so mo so me su khi/ hi ro hi ri/ mi ri ki ri/ b+hi ro bo sa ni sad+d+han+sa/ sarba kAr+ya Ni/ sA d+ha ya man+ta pA pa swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
84a6(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so// 'di ltar gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa gang lags pa de ni legs te/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// de de lags te/
84a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog sgrub pa na bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang sgrub pa'i tshe mchod pa bgyis la ming brgyad pa bklag par bgyi'o// bklags na bdag bstod par 'gyur te/ dga' nas dngos grub
84b1(rgyud): sbal bar 'tshal lo// bgegs kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ lha rnams kyang dga' nas myur du dngos grub stsol bar bgyid do// nyal ba'i tshe bklags na rmi lam ngan pa mthong bar mi 'gyur/ sku gdung dang /
84b2(rgyud): ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du la na 'bum du bzlas brjod bgyis na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa'ang bskal pa bzang por byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro//
84b3(rgyud): zhes bdag mchi'o// lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na slob dpon du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
84b4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
84b5(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
84b6(rgyud): zhugs so// de nas lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi sa brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi sa brlabs kyis/ rdo rje khro bo las byung ba rdo rje snying pos
84b7(rgyud): rab tu smras te/ mi chod pa/ mi shigs pa/ bden pa/ sra ba/ brtan pa/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa/ thams cad du ma pham pa/ sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa/ sems can thams cad
85a1(rgyud): 'jil bar byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad gnon par byed pa/ las thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gzhan gyi las tha ma/
85a2(rgyud): cad 'jig par byed pa/ gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa/ gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa/
85a3(rgyud): ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ sems can thams cad srung ba/ zhi ba/ rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad reng
85a4(rgyud): par byed pa/ rmugs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes rab tu smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta
85a5(rgyud): ye taH0/ oM trAT d+har+tha tro Ta ya tho Ta ya/ sUT+Ta s+sa na/ s+pho Ta ya wa \u0f7f/ g+hur+d+hak+Sh+maH/ g+hUr+Na pa ya g+hAr+NA pa ya~M/ sar+b+ba satwA ni/ bi d+ha ya bo dz+ha ya/ ma~M rba d+ha la ma tha r+d+ha ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ ma
85a6(rgyud): ya saM b+h+ra ma ya/ sarba b+hU tA ni/ kun+da kun+da/ saM kun+da ya saM kun+na ya/ sarba sha trA na/ g+haD+D+h+ya g+har+b+r-i/ sa g+hoT+Ta ya so g+hon+da ya/ sarba bid+d+ha badz+ra badz+ra/ s+pho Ta ya badz+ra badz+ra/ ka Ta ya badz+ra badz+ra/ ma Ta ya badz+ra badz+ra/
85a7(rgyud): ma tha badz+ra badz+ra/ adz+dza hA sa nI la badz+ra/ su badz+rA ya swA hA/ he phu lu/ ni ru phu khru/ gr-ih+Na ku wu/ mi li tsuwu/ ku ru kulpa/ badz+ra bi dza yA ya swA hA/ kI li kI lA ya sA hA/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta
85b1(rgyud): ra Tar na/ mo zan/ pra mo Ta nA ya swAhA/ tsa ra ni tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya ma ra ya/ badz+ra ba dA ra ya sAhA/ sIn+da N+Din+da/ byin gyin/ ma hA kA li ko lA la swAhA/ bstuts+tsha/ krod+ha kro d+ha badz+rags/
85b2(rgyud): kI lA ya swA hA/ tsu ru tsu ru tsa n+da kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ trA sa ya trA sa ya badz+ra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ha ra ha ra/ badz+ra d+ha ra ya swA hA/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ badz+ra pra b+hany+dzan ya swA hA / ma ta s+pho ra badz+ra ka su tis+thi ra baH/
85b3(rgyud): pra tis+thi ra badz+ra/ mahA badz+ra/ a pra ti ha ta badz+ra/ a mo g+ha badz+ra/ e hi badz+ra/ shI g+h+raM badz+rA ye swA hA/ d+ha ra d+hA ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sarba badz+ra ku la~M A brta ye swA hA/ a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/
85b4(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM / sarba ba laM a bar+d+ha ye ma hA ba le ka Ta be ta dza le/ a tsa le/ maN+Da la mA ye/ a ti badz+ra/ ma hA pa le be ga ra Na/ a dzi te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ti Ti ti Ti/ piM ga le da ha da ha NeH
85b5(rgyud): ba ti ti li ti l-i/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ma hA ba le/ badz+rI ku sha dz+wa lA ya swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha ra ha ra badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra d+hAn d+hA
85b6(rgyud): nabadz+ra da ha da ha badz+ra/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ d+hu ra d+ha ra badz+ra/ d+ha ra ya d+hA ra ya badz+ra/ dA ru Na dA ru Na badz+ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da badz+ra/ b+hin+di b+hin+da badz+ra hUM phaT/ na ma sh+tsan+ta badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/
85b7(rgyud): ban+d+ha ban+d+ha / ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hUM phaT/ sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed// rgyud de cog gi rtsa ba ste/ dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan// sems
86a1(rgyud): can dbang po nyams pa dang // tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // /
86a2(rgyud): bran bza' la sogs gtses pa dang // phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang // nor 'grib pas gnod pa dang // mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni 'phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu skar
86a3(rgyud): byung stems dang // mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang // des ni rab bkras gtsang ma yin// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag
86a4(rgyud): yid dge sems dang zhing // gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na// mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// srog chags dag ni thams
86a5(rgyud): cad kyis// mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kyang // de dag thams cad zhi bar blta// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// nor bu yungs kar du ra ba dang //
86a6(rgyud): rin chen rma med tsan dan bcas// shel dang rdo rje me tog dang // chu yi gser ram yang na ni// dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung // gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkri zhing dgang kalan grangs nyi shu rtsa
86a7(rgyud): gcig gam// yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad// rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas ni// rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// /
86b1(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa//
86b2(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ma hA badz+ra me ru shi kha ra kru Ta grA ra d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas
86b3(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting
86b4(rgyud): nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas/ rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen
86b5(rgyud): bo'i bye ma bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje chen po'i seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig 'bum drag
86b6(rgyud): stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang cho 'phrul can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/
86b7(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba nabyang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag
87a1(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
