87a2(rgyud): cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid snyan
87a3(rgyud): cing rgya che la zab pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i
87a4(rgyud): dang rnga gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / la ma dang / sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang rgathabs la mkhas
87a5(rgyud): pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / dben pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha
87a6(rgyud): stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje'i mig dang / rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu
87a7(rgyud): bopo che dang / rdo rje rnam pa 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje nga ro dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje tog ces bya ba dang / de dag
87b1(rgyud): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba zad pa/
87b2(rgyud): yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad
87b3(rgyud): kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /
87b4(rgyud): dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga la 'od srungs dang / tshe
87b5(rgyud): dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris
87b6(rgyud): kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med gzhal du med pa dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab
87b7(rgyud): bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi lha'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can
88a1(rgyud): dang l+h+wa ma yin gyi dbang po zags pa sangs ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sim dang / skrag can dang / rnam par snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbyung /
88a2(rgyud): po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / ma thos pa dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / drang skyong dang / stongs kyi rgyu dang / badz+ra dang / badz+ra chen po
88a3(rgyud): dang rnga mtha' yas dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug
88a4(rgyud): pud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig
88a5(rgyud): nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lngas rtse na gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i g.yog
88a6(rgyud): du ma can dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / sring mo chen mo bdun dang / drang srong chen po bdun dang / bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang / gza'i lha thams
88a7(rgyud): cad dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang / bgegs rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / yi dgas dang /
88b1(rgyud): 'byung rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / ra'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten myong bachu lhag lob tu mtsha'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig slong bang drung / na/
88b2(rgyud): btson dang / bden bral dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor can dang / sred med kyi bug yog dang @
88b3(rgyud): ba dang / byin pa po dang / 'phreng ba can dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / sprin ta la dang / log 'dren dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseng
88b4(rgyud): lha drug cu dang / sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang / ma bdun dang / rdo rje lcags kyu can dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag bzang dang / gtsug gis
88b5(rgyud): 'gro rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham/
88b6(rgyud): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / ba dang / spu byed dang / brjed byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang /
88b7(rgyud): gnon po tshad med dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / dus tshogs kyi lha dang / nub ka'i lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / gnam sa'i lha thams/
89a1(rgyud): cad dang yang thabs cig go// de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin tu yongs su mthar phyin kha so//
89a2(rgyud): nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / byang chub chen po dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa brnyes pas ni shin tu yongs su bzung / skyes bu chen
89a3(rgyud): po'i mtshan 'bar ba sum cu gnyis kyis ni sku brgya na/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus ni yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rnam par spras/ spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong
89a4(rgyud): bdud kyi tsher ma thams cad ni dkrugs/ de kho na nyid mkhyen pa nyid ni rim par thugs su chud/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen
89a5(rgyud): pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni ldan/ bdud dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ brjod pa'i sgra dang tshogs su bcad pa
89a6(rgyud): ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni sgrog/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang /
89a7(rgyud): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dka' ba spyad pas mngon
89b1(rgyud): par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku brgya na pas ni mdzes shing / rin po che rdo rje'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la ni bzhugs/
89b2(rgyud): te gdan rin po che dang / rdo rje'i pad+ma'i seng ge'i khri ri rab tsam rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.ye ra ka'i dra ba du ma sil sil sgra 'byung ba/ rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i
89b3(rgyud): stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brten pa/ rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i 'phreng ba dang ldan pa'i snam rten dang bcas pa/ rin po che du ma'i pad+ma'i
89b4(rgyud): snying po la chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las du ma'i 'od zer 'bar bas snang bar gyur pas kun tu mdzes pa
89b5(rgyud): rin po che dang rdo rje'i thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas mdzes par byas
89b6(rgyud): pa rgya che ba la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byor pas sa phyogs mdzes par gyur pa/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig
89b7(rgyud): rten kun gyis mthong na dga' ba/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis yang dag par rgyas par chos ston te tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba
90a1(rgyud): bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshog 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs sud/ rab yang dag par ston to// de nus/
90a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong
90a3(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas gsal bar byas par gyur to// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des gsal bar snang
90a4(rgyud): bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang seng ge'i khri du ma bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang rnams na chos ston
90a5(rgyud): nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po dag dang thabs cig go/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
90a6(rgyud): tri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go// de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje'i ldan pa chen pa'i rtse ma'i kha pa brtsegs pa'i
90a7(rgyud): gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston to// de dag thams cad kyang kun tu snang ngo // skad cig de la sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyis tshim par gyur to// 'on pa rnams ni sgra
90b1(rgyud): thos so// long ba rnams ni mig thob bo// smyon pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed do// nad pa rnams ni sos par gyur to// smras ma rnams ni bde bar btsas so// sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngam/
90b2(rgyud): rnams ni med par gyur to// yud tsam de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyi ming yang mi grag par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi bar gang dag sun
90b3(rgyud): pa mun nag dang / mun pa mun nag chen por 'dug pa de dag thams cad kyang gsal bar snang bar gyur to// der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad dang / sems can gzhan 'dir
90b4(rgyud): skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig shes so// de nas sems can de dag thams cad kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi dga' ba thob ste bde ba mchog gis tshim par gyur nas kun tu
90b5(rgyud): bltas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ste/ de dag gis gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis
90b6(rgyud): mngon par 'phags pa de mthong nas de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo // skyabs su dong ma thag tu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bdag son pa
90b7(rgyud): snyam du shes so// snang ba des bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par kun tu snang ngo // bdud rtsi
91a1(rgyud): ris kyi lha de dag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i slar ngu zhing skrag nas byer ro// bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po rnyirI bor gyur cing lus rdul nas bdud kyi ris
91a2(rgyud): kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'ab ra/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lde gcig tu gyur pa dang / dge sbyong go'u ta ma
91a3(rgyud): ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na chos bstan pa 'di la ltos/ des bdag cag phung ngo // mtho ba tsams so// phyogs gang na gnas su gtol med do// longs la dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i
91a4(rgyud): gan du dong ste bdud kyi yul 'di thal bar byas par ma gyur kyi bar du gzhom mo// de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis je bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras
91a5(rgyud): nas rngarang rang gi gnas su dong ste/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs can/ lus la go cha sna tshogs pa/ cha byad dang rgyan sna tshogs can/ mche ba mi bzad par 'jigs su rung ba bzhin mi sdug
91a6(rgyud): par bsgyur ba/ mig dang / bzhin dang / skra kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'o bar bdag skad cig de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas/ bdud sdig can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di
91a7(rgyud): skad ces smras so// bzhengs bzhengs thog mar bzhud la ji tsam du dge sbyong ge'u ta ma nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de ci nas kyang phyis bdag cag gi yul du gnod pa
91b1(rgyud): cung zad kyang mi skyed pa dang / bdag cag gi yul gnod par mi 'gyur bar deng nyid du phye mar brlag go// rnam par gzhom mo// de nas bdud sdig can dga' zhing mgu ste shin tu dga' bas spu'i khung
91b2(rgyud): bu khyab nas skad cig de nyid la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / bdud kyi sde chen pos bar snang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa
91b3(rgyud): bzhir khyab par byas te/ dung dang / rnga dang / rnga rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / lcags kyi sil khrol dang / rnga bo che rdung zhing hu hu zhes bya ba dang / po tsa zhes bya ba dang / zung zhig zung zhi/
91b4(rgyud): sod cig sod cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing gshol dang / gtun shing dang / gtun rked nyag dang / phur bu dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung zung dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri
91b5(rgyud): dang 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang / mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha lag na thogs shing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste skad cig de nyid la a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas bcom ldan
91b6(rgyud): 'das la mtshon cha thams cad kyi char bab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus mtshon cha de dag thams cad me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin chen por gyur par snang ngo // bdud kyi sgra de dag thams cad kyang
91b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / yang dag par 'gro ba'i sgra rnams su grag go// bdud sdig can ni zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bdag nyid bcings par mthong ngo // de nas
92a1(rgyud): bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ngo mtshar chen po de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das/
92a2(rgyud): de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo // bdud sdig can ni bdag nyid dgrol bar 'dod na 'grol ma nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin
92a3(rgyud): du rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'gyel to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byams pa chen po'i thugs dang / thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i spyan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi
92a4(rgyud): khyams thams cad du gzigs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i dag po lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'di 'khor gyi khyams 'di nas slong la
92a5(rgyud): stan la zhog ste/ rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab par bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya
92a6(rgyud): ba gang gis bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'di dag dang / bdud sdig can 'di sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'dong ba dang / gzhan yang gang dag sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang /
92a7(rgyud): 'byung po dang / gdon dang / nam mkha' 'gro ma dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po dang / zas su btsas pa za ba la sogs pa sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rab tu sdang ba'i sa
92b1(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mgus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa de dag thams cad gang gis 'dzud pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su
92b2(rgyud): 'gro bar byed pa'ang ston cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ngan 'gro log par lhung bar 'gro ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
92b3(rgyud): kyi bka' mnyan nas/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
92b4(rgyud): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs pa// gzhig
92b5(rgyud): pa'i slad du 'dren par byung // khyod ni bdud rnams kun las rgyal// 'jig rten rtsa lag gcig pu khyod// thar pa'i grong khyer 'jug pa'i lam// ye shes ma lus khyod gcig pus// yang dag
92b6(rgyud): brnyes nas thugs rje yis// snyan pa'i gsung gis bstan pa mdzad// khyod sngon sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang / shes rab la sogs yon tan gyis//
92b7(rgyud): bdag mdzad slad kyis sems can btsud// khyod kyis chos rnams skye med par// bshad cing de bzhin rnam bya yang // 'bras bur 'ogs pa ma mchis pa// kye ma mgon po khyod kyis bshad//
93a1(rgyud): 'khor lo yan lag bcu gnyis pa// khyod nyid mkhyen nas rab tu bskor// mu stegs can dang bdud btul te// chos kyi snang ba gsal bar mdzad// nyon mongs brag chen rnam/
93a2(rgyud): kun tu// ye shes rdo rjes rab bcom nas// sus kyang thob par ma gyur pa'i// byang chub bla na med pa brnyes// gang gis mtshan yang rdzogs pa yi// byang chub sa bon nyid 'gyur ba// khyod ni 'jig rten
93a3(rgyud): mchog gcig pu// dam pa rab sbyin bdag po lags// khyod ni mgon po khyod ni pha// khyod skyabs khyod ni dpung gnyen lags// thugs rje chen po ye shes nyid// mya ngan 'das nas gcig pu khyod//
93a4(rgyud): khyod nyid gshegs nas sems can rnams// sems can dmyal las rnam par dgrol// rang gi sku yang yongs btang nas// khyod kyis srog chags rnams kyang bsrungs// lus can kun gyis ma/
93a5(rgyud): thob pa'i// ye shes khyod kyis brnyes gyur nas// grol te 'jig rten rnams kyang grol// kye ma khyod ni rtsa lag bzang // mgon po khyod kyi 'od zer gyi// dra bas 'jig rten khams khyab ste/
93a6(rgyud): mya ngan 'das las lhag pa bde// lus can kun gyis thob par mdzad// khyod kyi 'od kyi gzis bcom pas// gza' rnams kun dang dgung zla dang // gdugs rnams dang ni lugs rnams dang // nor bu
93a7(rgyud): lam mar mgyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag pa lagan rdo rjes tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas kyang rin ma tsha'i 'dra'i gling ba la
93b1(rgyud): 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so//
93b2(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe
93b3(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos te/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs
93b4(rgyud): mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ steng mtho na 'og dma'/ 'og mtho na steng dma' bar gyur to// phyogs thams cad dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyang dga' ba dang
93b5(rgyud): yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje kun tu 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu
93b6(rgyud): btu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag byung bar kun tu snang ngo // rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa ji snyed pa dag na
93b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ za mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru/
94a1(rgyud): bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par ston pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems pa'i//
94a2(rgyud): dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi 'khor gyi khyams rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag na kun tu snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spyan snga na/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i
94a3(rgyud): snang ba rgya chen po des snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la so sor zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba rgya chen po kun tu gda' ba 'di su'i lags/ de nas sangs rgyas
94a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ so so'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
94a5(rgyud): rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab kyi steng na chos ston to/ bcom ldan 'das des bdud sdig can zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings te/ bcom ldan
94a6(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel ba gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rje zhes bya ba la 'di skad du/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyed
94a7(rgyud): kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston cig ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
94b1(rgyud): de'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen ba byin gyis brlabs so// de skad ces bka' stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis gnang nas/ rigs te/
94b2(rgyud): bu de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i
94b3(rgyud): cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
94b4(rgyud): dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i sprin dang / gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyan 'phreng gi sprin dang / dbu rgyan gyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / na bza'i sprin chen pos mchod
94b5(rgyud): pa chen po byas nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhung rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan la btsugs nas
94b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la logs su lta zhing bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas rang rang gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan de dag la 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe/
94b7(rgyud): shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje tog ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba da
95a1(rgyud): ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di nyid las brtsams te chos kyang ston to// rdo rje 'bar ba na/
95a2(rgyud): snang ba des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas snang bar gyur to// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po zhes
95a3(rgyud): bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des ngo mtshar de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i
95a4(rgyud): snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba de la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad/
95a5(rgyud): kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad cing sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad mi gda' bar gyur/ lha dang /
95a6(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul che zhing dbang che bar grags pa thams cad
95a7(rgyud): kyang kun nas mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ nub phyogs su mchi bar gda' ba 'di su'i lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
95b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
95b2(rgyud): nub phyogs kyi logs na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi
95b3(rgyud): rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ rdo rje che'i ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to// bcom ldan 'das des spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod
95b4(rgyud): spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po phyung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des 'jig rten gyi khams der bdud sdig can bskul ma thag tu kun tu khros nas lha'i bu thams cad dang / gzhan yang bdud kyi ris kyi
95b5(rgyud): lha'i bu rnams dang / dpung gi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la gtse ba'i phyir lhag pa dang / de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de nyid
95b6(rgyud): du zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bcings nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel te/ de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas
95b7(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la ston cig par bka' lung byin nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje des rdo rjes rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
96a1(rgyud): yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje rnams bstan te/ 'don rdo rje de dag nyid kyi rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang phyogs
96a2(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom
96a3(rgyud): ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang bskul/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang bskul bas ngo mtshar thob par gyur pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
96a4(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang so sor zhus so// rigs kyi bu de nyid kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
96a5(rgyud): pa de'i spyan snga na 'dug cing bsnyen bkur byed pa'ang mthong ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu
96a6(rgyud): 'joms pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
96a7(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya grub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag brgya ba dang / bzer bkur bgyi ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag pa lagan rdo rje de'ang blta bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de skad
96b1(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i stong ba dam
96b2(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ bcom ldan
96b3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur
96b4(rgyud): nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
96b5(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang lhan cig smra ba na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa las
96b6(rgyud): grub pas byin pa'i rin po che de dag las 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang sngon dang / ljang ser dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gse/
96b7(rgyud): dang pad+ma rA ga dang / rdo'i snying po dang / ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las dang / go mu ta ra ga dang / mu tig dmar po'i kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag
97a1(rgyud): gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang khyab par byas nas/ lha'i snang bas snang bar byas te 'dus nas 'ja'
97a2(rgyud): lta bur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa/ 'jam pa/ mnyan pa/ rab tu gzhan/
97a3(rgyud): pa sha rgyas pa/ snum pa/ long bu gnyis kyi rtsa mi mngon pa/ pad+ma ga sar du kha bye ba lta bu/ dung dang / nya dang / rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu dang / pad+ma dang / chu srin ma ka ra'i mtshan dang ldan pa
97a4(rgyud): gnyis la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas nub par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'od zer re re'i rtse mo las pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam la/ rin po che
97a5(rgyud): sna bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba 'di lta ste/ gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dang / an da rnyil dang / dngul dang / byu ru dang / shel dang / ke ke ru dang / dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag 'thon to// de las gser gyi rgyu las
97a6(rgyud): byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying po ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni ke ke ru'i rgyu
97a7(rgyud): las byung ba'o// an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying po no b+hi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni ke ke ru
97b1(rgyud): rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o//
97b2(rgyud): ze ba ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// bya ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba
97b3(rgyud): dag go// snying po ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// shel gyi rgyu las
97b4(rgyud): byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// snying po ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u
97b5(rgyud): 'bru ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dul las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying po ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las/
97b6(rgyud): byung ba'o// chu ba ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying po ni an da rnyil gyi
97b7(rgyud): rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni bya ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i/
98a1(rgyud): pad+ma dag go// rin po che'i pad+ma re re la'ang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu mdzes pa'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag ting nge/
98a2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' re re'i lte ba nas kyang 'od zer 'bum 'bum byung ngo // 'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las byung ba'i khang pa brtseg
98a3(rgyud): pa nor bu dang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i zla bas spras pa'i khang bran gyi rtse mo la seng ge'i rna ba'i steng na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam
98a4(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i ba dan sbyangs pas nam mkha' kun tu khebs pa/ pad+ma rA ga dang / a nad rnyil dang / mar gad dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / ke ke ru las byas pa'i ka ba chen po'i klad la dzaH
98a5(rgyud): bu chu bo'i gser gyi shing las gcod pa lta bu'i tshogs bkod pas rnam par spras te mdzes par byas pa/ dngul las byas pa'i phug ron gyi 'phreng gi mtha' mu tig dmar po dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer
98a6(rgyud): ka'i dra ba sbyangs pa'i sgras sad par gyur nas/ rab tu dga' zhing dregs pa'i phug ron dang / bya bang dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / rma bya'i nga ro dag gis nyams dga' ba/ khyams dang 'dun khang chen
98a7(rgyud): po'i nyen kor stegs bus bskor bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i sgo khang can/ shel gyi rgyu las byas pa'i stegs bu dang ldan pa/ bkra shis kyi gser gyi bum pa
98b1(rgyud): du ma nas spos chu dri zhim pos chag cha ga btab pa/ rdzing chen po 'gram gyi ne'u gsing mar gad kyi rgyu las byung ba/ ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde bas mdzes pa'i phyogs na bde bar nyal ba'i ngang pa dang /
98b2(rgyud): khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / ka lan ta ka'i khyu gnas pa/ gser gyi phye ma bdal ba'i gtos chen po rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas kyi 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu sa yongs
98b3(rgyud): su gang ba grangs 'bum phrag du mas kun nas yongs su bskor ba dag byung ngo // rdzing bu re re nas kyang rin po che'i pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rtsa dgu byung ngo // rin po che'i pad+ma
98b4(rgyud): re re'i snying po la'ang sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyi sgra byung bas lha'i bu mo dag glu len gar byed cing yongs su spyod do// sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / gru dbyangs kyi sgra byung
98b5(rgyud): ba de dag las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo // sbyin dang tshul khrims kyis ni gang zhig dpag med cing // de bzhin bzod dang brtson 'grus dag gi stobs ldan la// bsam gtan gyi//
98b6(rgyud): ni zhi zhing dbang gis kun 'byor pa// ye shes sgron ma de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis// bsam gyis mi khyab stobs dang smon lam rnams dang ldan// thabs dang byang chub yan lag ting 'dzin
98b7(rgyud): rnams kyi bdag/ rnam par grol ba'i lam dang stobs bcu ldan pa yi// thub pa gang yin de la mchod phyir 'dong bar gyis// 'dam rdzab nas ni pad+ma rgyas pa ji bzhin du// gang zhig nyon mongs
99a1(rgyud): 'dam gyis rtag par mi gos pa/ tshe dang skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par gsal ba yi// rgyal ba 'jig rten mgon po de la blta phyir deng // gcig kyang mi ldan par gyur pa gang
99a2(rgyud): zhig gis// skye dgu rnams kyi gti mug sgo glegs rnams bshig cing // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyod pa rab zhi ba// shAkya'i tog ldan de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis// de ltar khang pa brtsegs pa
99a3(rgyud): dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nam mkha'i dkyil na kun tu snang ste/ kha cig tu ni rin po che'i sprin gyi char 'bab par kun tu
99a4(rgyud): snang ngo // kha cig tu ni me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni go sha ra sha'i tsan dan dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni gos kyi 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi char/
99a5(rgyud): kha cig tu ni ka shi ka'i ras dang / du ku la'i ras dang / za 'ug gi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i sprin gyi cha ra/ kha cig tu ni me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dkas
99a6(rgyud): po dang / dri mchog dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / ka tsa lin da dang / ma hA ka tsa lin da dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / man da ra ba dang / man
99a7(rgyud): dar ba chen po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// me tog gi char de dag las dri gang byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa gang dag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang
99b1(rgyud): mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rgyas par khyab bo// 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa de dag thams cad dri des mchog tu bde bas tshom zhin
99b2(rgyud): sems dga' bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral nas phan tshun 'dri ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sdong po byang chub sems dang
99b3(rgyud): cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // de dag gis de nas mthong nas kyang phyag 'tshal to// skyes bu dam pa de la phyag 'tshal ma thag tu sems can gang dag ngan 'gro log
99b4(rgyud): par ltung bar 'dod pa de dag kyang mchog tu bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / dad pa thob nas skad cig de nyid la ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las grol te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi
99b5(rgyud): nang du skyes nas bar sdang la 'khod de/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje
99b6(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod nas lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdoH
99b7(rgyud): 'khor gyi khyams chen po thams cad dang ldan pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas lha rnams par snang las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang gi khang pa
100a1(rgyud): brtsegs pa dag na lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum grag du ma dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / reg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra 'byin cing tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad/
100a2(rgyud): pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// gang srad ngan 'gro mchog tu sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa yi// ming yang bde gshegs stobs kyis deng du med mdzad dang // bsod nams ma
100a3(rgyud): ldan sems can rnams la'ang rgyal ba mchog/ byams par mdzad ma kye mngo mtshar rmad du byung // bdag cag rnams kyi rmongs pa'i snying gis bsgrubs pa yi// sdig pa'i las gang shin tu bgyid dka' sna
100a4(rgyud): tshogs pa// de dag thub pa'i bya dag de ring glo bur du// skad cig tu ni ji ltar rnam par zhig par 'gyur// ji ltar gdugs kyis mun pa mun nag kun bcom dang // ji ltar zhugs 'bar bas ni ras rnams
100a5(rgyud): sreg pa dang // gser mas shing bal ltar yang sprin 'thob ji bzhin du// de ltar 'gro ba'i sdig pa bde bar gshegs kyis bcom// bde gshegs sras po mthong ngam thos sam dran gyur na// lhan
100a6(rgyud): cig skyes dbang 'od zer dra bas sdig 'phrog pa// 'gro ba yongs kyi srid pa'i spros pa zhig pa yi// thugs dang rtag tu ldan zhing skyo bar 'gyur mi mnga'// mig dang mgo dang spying dang sha khrag tshil rnams dang /
100a7(rgyud): srog dang sdug dang bu rnams rtsa ltar bor nas ni// mi mtshungs sems can don phyir thugs rjes thugs brlan pa// 'jig rten mgon sras de dag rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yi dgas ltogs la chu dang ro
100b1(rgyud): brgya pas rnams dang // de banan mya banar 'a dang snying dang ldan pa la// thugs rje chud cing rnam pa sa tshogs tshim mdzad pa// byang chub sems dpa' khru mchog del skyabs su ma chi// gang das mnar mad pa
100b2(rgyud): yang rab tu gsol mdzad pas// mchog tu tsha bas sems can dmyal ba'ang bsil bar 'gyur// rang bde mi gzigs sems can brtsom 'as cwa ldan pa// 'jig rten mgon sras mnyam med de la phyag
100b3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// gang dag srid par 'khor ba'i srid pa'i skyon las grol// stong pa gsum yang las kyi 'bras bu mi 'dor zhing // ye shes me yis rnyog pa bsregs kyang thugs rjes brlan// /
100b4(rgyud): spyod pa brtag med dbang ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma dpal ldan rdo rje snying po bde gshegs sras// mtshan gyis mtshan btab sku las 'od stong ma byung ba'i// dri ba rnams dang sna
100b5(rgyud): tshogs glu yis bdag cag sim// skad cig gis ni dmyal las sum bcu'i lha dbang gyur// bdag cag rnams kyis rgyal dang rgyal sras rnams dang ni// de dag rnams kyis gsungs pa
100b6(rgyud): mchog tu zhi chos la// gus bstod dge ba rgya chen de ring gang thob pa// des myur 'jig rten thams cad bde gshegs thob par shog/ de ltar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis
100b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gnang ste/ de dag rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su 'khod de chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig/
101a1(rgyud): tu 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ bcom
101a2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po dang ldan/
101a3(rgyud): pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po rnams kyis mchod nas/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs te bar snang las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas
101a4(rgyud): mu med par bskor ba byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la lta'o// rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang dag
101a5(rgyud): ba dang mgu bskyes nas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lta'o// bltas nas kyang sgra skad kying rogacog tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// dran sa
101a6(rgyud): gzhus 'phangs pa ye shes rab mda' mang gis// ma 'phangs mthur ldan bdud bzhi pam mdzad cing // 'jig rten nyon mongs nyen pa'i mun pa gsal mdzad nas// bla ma sprin med zla ba bzhin du lgang nge'o//
101a7(rgyud): dam chos 'od mang gti mug bcom pa'i dra ba yis// 'dul ba'i pad+ma'i gnas rnams kha phye nas// ye shes nam mkha' che la dri med 'bar ba'i gzugs// nyi ma ji bzhin gdung bar bgyi ba'i bdud sde gdung
101b1(rgyud): mu stems can gying rgyal mtha' dag pam mdzad cing / 'gro ba 'dod chags rab gdung ma lus rab 'i mdzad/ dam par mnyan rtsa chen yang dga' phel ma dzad pa// das pa'i rab bcing 'jug sbyar/
101b2(rgyud): skrag tu gsol// mtshan po su stegs can gyi la brgya pa ma mdzad cing // bdud rnams bcom ste byang chub dam pa rab brnyes nas// ma 'dres bsags pa'i bden pa'i stobs kyi mthu mnga' ba// skye
101b3(rgyud): 'jigs lam rab grol seng ge ji bzhin sgrogs// spyod pa zab cing brtan la brtag pas mi dpogs pa// sems can gnas gyur stobs dang ting 'dzin nor bu bkram// dri med chos lhun 'dul ba'i ri bo rnams
101b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa// ye shes rgya mtsho mchog khyod skye dgu mchog gtso ba// tshul khrims bzang po'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i chus btab 'phel// byams dang bzod pa'i me tog yal ga 'khrungs pa mdzes// byang chub lam gyi yan
101b5(rgyud): lag 'bru chags 'dod byas bstan// bsod nams dpag bsam shing khyod de ring ga las byung // sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bar ba'i mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan// dpe byad bzang mchog rin chen man shel gyis bsko/
101b6(rgyud): cing sa dang dbang dang dam chos phur pa brtan btab pa// lhun po bzhin du mi ga yo khyod na 'grol mdzes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
101b7(rgyud): chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rin po che'i brla'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu
102a1(rgyud): 'jug go// rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
102a2(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal byung ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
102a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'ad/
102a4(rgyud): kyis gnang nas rigs kyi bu de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
102a5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces
102a6(rgyud): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzed
102a7(rgyud): 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod
102b1(rgyud): pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mchog rang bzhin gyis rnam par nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang
102b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad 'byung ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su
102b3(rgyud): bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i
102b4(rgyud): phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan
102b5(rgyud): mtha' yas rab gsal dbang phyug rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal brtsegs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
102b6(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing /
102b7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/
103a1(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams the tsom dang bral ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
103a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po zla gas bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du 'dar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'ad/
103a3(rgyud): kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing // rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs na
103a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa nas/
103a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdza
103a6(rgyud): 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas chos nyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams
103a7(rgyud): cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
103b1(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa'i ro dbang gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma bkod pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' tha
103b2(rgyud): gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang
103b3(rgyud): nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du steng gi phyogs na bcom
103b4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi tsher ma dkrugs pa
103b5(rgyud): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi slob pa las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du
103b6(rgyud): 'dar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan
103b7(rgyud): pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
104a1(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa du ma bstan pas gzhal med khang dang / me togag sprin dang / rin ma cha'i sprin dang / phye ma'i sprin dang / spos dang / drug pa dang / gdugs dang /
104a2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan gyi sprin dang / rin po che'i spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / bai TuR+Ya dang / an da rnyil dang / byu ru dang / mar gad dang / mu tig dmar po dang /
104a3(rgyud): 'dzam du chu bo'i gi ser gyi sprin dang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che'i pad+ma du mas khebs pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji lta ba de
104a4(rgyud): bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa gzhal du med cing brjod du med par btogs pa/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las shin tu
104a5(rgyud): 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du legs par brgyan
104a6(rgyud): par kun tu snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad de na bzhugs
104a7(rgyud): bzhin du phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste 'jam zhing gnyen la rab tu gzhon zhing / pad+ma dang yal ga gzhon ga chags shing 'jam pa'i sor mo'i ngos can gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
104b1(rgyud): dang / lcags kyu dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / sgo khang dang / gzhal med khang dang / dung dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / dpal be'u dang / 'char la'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'dra/
104b2(rgyud): phrag du ma nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rgyu mthun pas mngon par grub pa'i dpe byad bzang pos rnam par spras pa/ sen mo zangs 'dra zhing rgyas la skum zhing srab
104b3(rgyud): pa'i nor bu'i mdongs kyi me tog gi 'od zer gyis khrigs ma mdzes par gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang yang dag par mthun pa'i phyag rnams kyis/ gsang ba pa'i
104b4(rgyud): bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir spyi bo la byugs nas dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go
104b5(rgyud): bar mdzad cing 'di skad ces/ kye rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir bdud sdig can dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma dad cing sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren drag shul gyi sems dang
104b6(rgyud): ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa thams cad tshar bcad pa rnam par gzhig pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang
104b7(rgyud): bskyed pa sems zhum pa brtson 'grus brtan po ma yin pa'i go cha bgos pa rnams kyang yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / rab tu dga' bar byas pa nas khams gsum par gtogs pa'i sems
105a1(rgyud): can thams cad kyi bar dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir/ khyod rdo rje'i rnam par
105a2(rgyud): thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsags pa/ yongs su rdzogs pas grub pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos sbas pa/ ting
105a3(rgyud): 'dzin dang / dbang dang / gzungs dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthu grub pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang nyon mong/
105a4(rgyud): pa'i sgrib pa nye bar zhi ba/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i dus kyi tsher ma ma lus par 'don pa dang //
105a5(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs
105a6(rgyud): pa'i 'khor mngon par dga' ba can dag la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dga' ba du ma kun tu skyed pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni lags sa lags so zhes bka' stsal to// de ltar sangs rgyas bcos
105a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gzengs bstod de rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas rang rang gi phyag bskums te/ rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na/
105b1(rgyud): chos gan du sazud pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad 'dir brtse'o// de dag gis gnang nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'achan po da dag thams cad kyis kyang / de brnyan gshegs pa
105b2(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul/
105b3(rgyud): pa chen pos ji tsam du skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskums pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskums pa tsam gyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi
105b4(rgyud): mjed der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
105b5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ de'i tshe gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'di rdo rje'i/
105b6(rgyud): zhags pas bcings pa 'di las khrol la/ ci nas kyang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / chos la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
105b7(rgyud): gzhan yang gang dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang dag ji tsam du de bzhin gshes
106a1(rgyud): pa'i bstan pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs nas kyang ci nas khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal/
106a2(rgyud): pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal/
106a3(rgyud): nas yang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo
106a4(rgyud): rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
106a5(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// chem che ma/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
106a6(rgyud): rdo rje'ang me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te/ 'bar/ rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'jigs su rung ba'i mche ba rnon po drag po gzangs can 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa gtsigs te/
106a7(rgyud): mche ba mnan nas me lce chen po ltar s+pha ra ser zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug ste/ mi bzad pa rna ba las 'phyang ba'i sbrul dug 'thor dang / ba lang sna lta bu dang / gzar bu lta bu dang / sbrul chen po/
106b1(rgyud): kha gdangs pa'i 'anas byung ba'i mche ba'i rtse mo nas dug drag po 'bar ba 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi 'phreng bas bzhin du me 'bar ba/ lag pa stong phrag du ma la rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / gtun shing dang / gtan
106b2(rgyud): shing rke da nyag dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lcags sgrog la sogs pa thogs pa'i mtshon cha'i rtse mo la me stag rab tu 'phro ba'i snang bas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs
106b3(rgyud): su gtogs pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / ma mo dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa sdang ba rab tu sdang ba'i sems can skrag par byed pa/
106b4(rgyud): ri dgas kyi dbang po'i pags pa khrag dang bcas pa sham thabs su bgos pa/ sbrul chen po'i lus kyis rgya gram du dam du bcings pa/ 'jigs pa bas kyang 'jigs par byed pa/ 'chi bdag kyang skrag
106b5(rgyud): par byed pa/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyis bsdus pa lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa'i khro bor gyur nas/ lus kyi tshogs thams cad las kyang khro bo kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ kha dog sngon po dang / ser/
106b6(rgyud): po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / nag po ste/ thams cad kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin can/ khro gnyer mi mnyam pas rnam par spras pa'i gnyer ma'i khrim gnyer can gyi dpral ba'i dbyes nas me
106b7(rgyud): stag lta bu'i rdul gyi thigs pa rtsub po 'dzag pa las dug 'chang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu byung bas yan lag dang / nying lag kun tu dkris pa'i mngon rtags can du gyur cing rdo rje drag shul
107a1(rgyud): can du snang ste/ mche bas mi bzad par 'dug pa'i kha gdangs pa las ha ha zhes gad mo rta gang 'byung zhing / 'jig pa'i dus kyi rlung gis char pa dang bcas pa'i sprin dkrugs
107a2(rgyud): pa las char gyi rgyun rags pa 'bab pas yongs su gang bas rgya mtsho dkrugs nas rlabs chen po g.yo ba dang / rta rgod ma'i kha nas me byung ba lta bu'i hUM zhes bya ba zab cing brtan pas rgyu ba'i 'byung
107a3(rgyud): po'i tshogs 'jigs skrag ste 'byer zhing 'thor nas spangs te skyabs su 'dong zhing 'dud pas/ nyi ma stong pas 'bar ba'i lus rnams mthong ba na/ sna skar sgur can zhom pa lta bu bu ga zab mo'i
107a4(rgyud): sbubs kyi nang nas sbrul sna tshogs 'khyil ba'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od kyis 'gram pa rnam par mdzes pa/ glog stong 'dus pa ltar ser zhing dmar ba'i mig gi 'bras bu'i 'od zer gyis sgra'i tshogs
107a5(rgyud): rtsub cing ga shor la gyen du 'greng ba'i rtse mo brgyan cing 'dres te gsal bar gyur pa/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka stong gis gdugs byas shing / sbrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / ska rags dang / dpung
107a6(rgyud): rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / rna chas lus brgyan pa/ rdo rje 'bar ba dri ma med cing drag shul can mi bzad pa lag na thogs pa/ mdzub mo rnams las hUM zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgra chen po dag gis bgegs dang
107a7(rgyud): srog 'dren thams cad kun tu sdigs pa dga'athon te/ gang de dag gi mig dang kha rnams nas gnas rnam pa lta bu'i sgra chen pa'i tshogs las me lce chen po 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi snang ba zung ste/ des
107b1(rgyud): snang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams tshig par
107b2(rgyud): byed do// mongs par byed do// 'chog par byed de/ mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ rtsub pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed do// de dag tshor bas nyen pas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs
107b3(rgyud): dong ngo // de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis bgegs dang log 'dren de dag tshor ba chen pos nyen te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su dong ba mthong nas 'jigs sngangs skrag ste skyabs ma rnyed nas rlung
107b4(rgyud): drag pos bskyod pa'i shing bzhin du 'dar/ rab tu 'dar te ngu bar 'dod na'ang du ma nus nas ri mo bzhin du lus thams cad g.yo ba med par gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs
107b5(rgyud): rgyas kyi mthus bdud sdig can 'dul bar byed de sdang ba gdon dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ rdo rje'i rnam
107b6(rgyud): par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de lta bu'i gzugs su 'dug pa'i rkang pa gnyis las khro bo 'bar zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ drag
107b7(rgyud): shul gyi gzugs can seng ge'i sgra chen po hUM zhes bya ba 'di gnyis phyung ste/ de gnyis skar mda' bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil du rgyang ring du 'phur te nam mkha' la gnas pa
108a1(rgyud): shugs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lan 'bum zag du ma mtha' ya/
108a2(rgyud): mu med par bskor ba byas te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ci bgyi bka' stsol cog/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje cang mi smra
108a3(rgyud): bar 'dug ste/ yang dpral ba'i dkyil nas rdo rje khro bo 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs can mche ba mi bzad pa drag pas 'jigs su rung ba'i kha gdangs te/ mchu ma rungs par bsgyur ba'i/
108a4(rgyud): kha nas dus kyi tha ma 'jig pa'i tshe rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung drag po'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i sprin nag po'i tsho gas rab tu sgrog pas rnam par dkrugs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgra drag/
108a5(rgyud): po lta bu'i hUM zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgras gang ba/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jigs nas 'bros shing sgyid lug nas phyogs smad par byed pa/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / sen mo pa
108a6(rgyud): mig dang / ag tshom dang / skra thams cad rdo rje 'bar bar snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzi brjid thams cad kyi gzi brjid
108a7(rgyud): rnams rang gi gzi brjid kyis zil du rlag par byed cing / rgyang ring du byed pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rnams kyi 'od lham mer ma yin/ lhan ner ma
108b1(rgyud): yin lhang nger ma yin par byed pa/ gang nyi ma dang zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa/ mthu che ba'ang lham mer ma yin/ lhan ner ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs/
108b2(rgyud): pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcu la rab tu gnas pa rnams kyi 'od ma gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad 'od mogamog por byed pa gzhan phyung ngo // de nas rdo rje tshe/
108b3(rgyud): bo des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
108b4(rgyud): kyis gnang nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ci bgyi bka' stsol cig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag
108b5(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa dag deng la bdud sdig can dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'dzin du chu ga cig/ 'di dam tshig la gnas par gyis shig/ gzhan yang gang dag sdang ba
108b6(rgyud): gdon dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /
108b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mi 'jug pa dang / mi rtogs pa dang / yid mi ches pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas par gyis shig dang / des sems can thams cad kyi yun/
109a1(rgyud): ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / khro chen po rdo rje khro ba de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i chog mnyan nas de bzhin
109a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bstan pa'ang bzung ste/ dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu seng ge'i sgra chen po hUM zhes bya bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing / gsang sngag/
109a3(rgyud): kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chu
109a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i lcags kyu la
109a5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i gnam lcags la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i shugs la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje be con la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje yan lag dmar la
109a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro lding ba la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i khro
109a7(rgyud): ngo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya3/ oM tra Ta traT/ tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ mo Ta mo Ta/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ g+hur+ha k+ShAr+Na/ g+hur+N+Na pa yam+bur+N+Na pa ya/ sarba satwA ni/ tra sa tra sa/
109b1(rgyud): tras ya trAs pa/ b+h+ram rnam/ sa rnam mam ldam la/ sarba g+hA tAn/ kum+b+hal sal/ sa rgyams rdul/ sarbashad+hAn/ kAT+Ta9\u0f7f/ sa b+han las hAs pa/ sar+b+ba ba d+ha 'ja hA/ sa la badz+ra ba/
109b2(rgyud): kaT la 'adz+re badz+ra/ ma Ta ya badz+ra badz+ra/ uts+tshi Ta ya badz+ra badz+ra/ ha na badz+ra badz+ra/ da ha badz+ra badz+ra/ pa tsa badz+ra badz+ra/ mthe badz+ra badz+ra/ uta sA da ya ma hA badz+ra badz+ra/ hA ra badz+ra pA Ni pri ye/ ka tsa ka ha/ has
109b3(rgyud): ha sa/ ma hA nA Ta Ta rdzas/ kha cig tu rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'khrugs pa lta bur zab cing 'jigs su rung ba'i chu zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgra sdang ba rab tu sdang ba bgegs dang log 'dren kun tu skrag par
109b4(rgyud): byed pa dang / sdang ba thams cad gzhom du gsol/ 'joms su stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ badz+ra ba ra prad s+phoT/ bsgrub par bya ba lha dang / lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang /
109b5(rgyud): srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / ma mo dang / 'byung po dang / gdon gyi tshogs mthar 'byin pa 'byer bar mdzad pa hUM hUM phaT/ he he phaT/ a mo g+ha phaT/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha khang
109b6(rgyud): khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du/ sol/ hUM hUM phaT/ 'byer bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ sum cu rtsa gsum
109b7(rgyud): kyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phrugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hU~M phaT/ 'byer bar bgyid du tshul du gsol/ hUM hU~M phaT/
110a1(rgyud): lha'i dbang po brgya byin khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hU~M phaT/ 'thang bral gyi
110a2(rgyud): khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ dga' ldan gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ba dang /
110a3(rgyud): phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ 'phrul dga'i lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo/
110a4(rgyud): bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/
110a5(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT/ de bzhin du 'od gsal dang tshangs ris nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris 'og min gyi bar gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa
110a6(rgyud): g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ 'byer bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams rengs par mdzal du gsol/ rmugs par mdzad du gsol/ rmongs par/
110a7(rgyud): mdzad du gsol/ gcu bar gsol/ gcad du gsol/ gzhig tu gsol rnam par gzhig tu gsol/ mnan du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM khro bo khro bo chen po rnam par bkrab/ ser skya bo/ nag po/
110b1(rgyud): dmar po/ ser po/ mi pham pa/ rtag tu 'bar ba'i zag/ sarba su ru sa rba/ su ru su ru sa ru/ tu ru rba ru hu ru/ g+ha ru g+hA rA g+hu rA/ d+ha nam+barA ng+kA ru/ bar thar bar/ nAr thA raHra/ ga sa 8/
110b2(rgyud): ya ra ya ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ku hu ku hu/ tsi li tsi li/ ma la ma li/ su Tu lu Tu/ sar+b+ba dz+wa lA ma ma hU~M/ pu u pu lu/ len to lo ha si len te/ mu lu lang khA se/ tsu lu tsu len taM/ ma lu pu len to/ mas
110b3(rgyud): ru bi[:]ku bi pur+b+ba/ le t+yA s+phu ra g+ha d+h+ya/ s+phu bi ri tsu/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ su mu su mu ruM/ a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka za bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka Tang+ka Te/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dza yan+ti/ bi dza yan+ti/
110b4(rgyud): ti ming+ga si/ ma hA ti ming+ga si/ g+hu tang+ga me g+hu ta/ ba ra ya Ne/ sdang pa rnams la rjes su 'doms pa/ ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba/ drag shul can rnams 'byer bar mdzad pa/ dpa' bo rnams kyi/
110b5(rgyud): nang na dpa' ba/ nges pa rnams kyi nang na nges pa/ ma grub pa rnams grub par mdzad pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs/
110b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis gnas bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyer bkur mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi rig sngags thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/
110b7(rgyud): rdo rje ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto'i 'phye chen po la
111a1(rgyud): sogs pa thams cad kyi mdun du dam tshig gang bcas pa de rjes su bsgyung du gsol/ rjes su bskyang du gsol/ gshegs su gsol/ myur du gshegs su gsol/
111a2(rgyud): bdag gi las rnams myur ba myur bar bsgrub tu gsol/ skrag par byed pa rdo rje 'dzin pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// hu ru hu ru/ grub pa drag po lag rdo rje bka' stsol cig swA hA/ shin tu
111a3(rgyud): grub par byed pa la swA hA/ rdo rje chen po la swA hA/ rdo rje phur pa la swA hA/ rdo rje 'joms pa la swA hA/ rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ rdo rje ki li ki lo la swA hA/ drag po ki lo ki lo la swA hA/
111a4(rgyud): dmar po ki li ki li la swA hA/ byis pa ki lo ko li la swA hA/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ bdag gi gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / rims thams
111a5(rgyud): cad med par mdzad cig swAhA/ des nas rdo rje khro bo chen pos 'di skad ces smras pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ phyogs dang
111a6(rgyud): phyogs mtshams thams cad dang / de bzhin du bar snang la rdo rje'i skar mda' chen po'i be con 'bab par snang ngo // gnam grum pa'i sgra chen po'ang grag go// kun nas sa chen po 'di grum par kun
111a7(rgyud): tu snang ngo // sa chen po'i ser ga de dag nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun gyen du byung ngo // chu'i rgyun de dag gis rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi chu bzhin du sa chen po thams cad kun tu gang ba
111b1(rgyud): snang ngo // gang dag sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i klu chen po dang / lha chen po dang / lha ma yin chen po dang / de dag thams cad kyang sa'i 'og nas 'thon cing / ri rab kyi drung du 'thon te gyen du zung nas bcom ldan
111b2(rgyud): 'das la skyabs su dong ngo // de nas drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i 'byung po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang
111b3(rgyud): kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar zhing / kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag gis rang rang gi lus kun tu rnam par 'joms par shes te/ de dag sdug bsngal mi bzad cing drag la rtsub pos
111b4(rgyud): nyen nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i ji skad 'thon te tshig 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po bdag cag skad cig gis srog kyang ma mchis par 'gyur du bgyid na/ 'jigs pa chen por lhung ba
111b5(rgyud): 'di las yongs su bsgrub tu gsol/ bgegs dang log 'dren rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad na gnas pa dang / ri dang / chu bo dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing
111b6(rgyud): dang dur khrod dang / shing dang / thibs po dang / khron pa ring pa dang / btung ba dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / gtsug lag khang zhigs pa dang / gnas dang / lha khang na
111b7(rgyud): gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa chen po ltung ba 'di las yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes ched du brjod pa
112a1(rgyud): ched du brjod do// de bzhin du lha'i khang pa thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos te/ mog mog por gyur cing 'od med par kun tu snang ngo // bdud rtsi/
112a2(rgyud): khyim thams cad kyang kun tu 'bar zhing / kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par sdang ngo // gang dag bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje khro bo chen pos sngangs skrag
112a3(rgyud): ste rang rang gi mgo rdo rje rnams kyis rnam par 'joms pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i//
112a4(rgyud): bdag po lag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo // bdud sdig can yang shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor rabs nyam zag cing skrag la zhum ste/ gnod pas spangs nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ngo // chos la/
112a5(rgyud): skyabs su song ngo // dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo // gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag yongs su
112a6(rgyud): skyobs shig/ yongs su skyobs shig/ bdag nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro'o// chos la skyabs su 'gro'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro'o// sems/
112a7(rgyud): can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir ba lta bu dang / ma lta bu dang / spun lta bu dang / gnyen lta bu dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams lta bur 'gyur bar byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bdag deng phyin chad sems
112b1(rgyud): can thams cad kyi ba dang / ma dang / spun dang / gnyen dang / sdug gi gnyen mtshams su 'gyur bar bya'o// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las cung zad gang ci byed de sems can thams cad bla na meng /
112b2(rgyud): pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bdag dbugs phyung nas gzhan yang dbugs dbyung ngo // bdag grol nas gzhan yang dgrol lo// bdagu ngan las 'das nas gzhan yang mya ngan las baH/
112b3(rgyud): lo rus pa dang / rkang dang / khrag dang / sha dang / nyams mthu dang / srog gis kyang sems can thams cad la rim gror bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sem
112b4(rgyud): dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas thams cad la'ang bsnyen bkur bya'o// bsti stang bya'o// rim gror bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de nas bdud
112b5(rgyud): sdig can gyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bzung ste/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dga' ba thob nas sgra skad kyi nga rog
112b6(rgyud): tu 'di skad ces smras so// gang gi phyir na bdud khyod kyis// sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir// tha med byang chub sems bskyed pa// bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo // rin chen sems 'dis mi ring bar//
112b7(rgyud): rnam 'dren sangs rgyas gyur nas ni// sems can shin tu sdug bsngal kun// mya ngan las ni bzla bar gyis// rgyal ba'i mchog 'di ji bzhin du// skye dgu thams cad gdul bar byos// stobs po che dang
113a1(rgyud): ldan pa yis// bdud bzhi po dag gdul bar gyis// de skad ces smras pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de sangs rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi lig gi snyom pa
113a2(rgyud): name tog gi phur ma thogs par shes/ me tog gi phur ma de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i
113a3(rgyud): bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje'i khro bo de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
113a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de dag la gtor ba dang / de'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog gi gzhal med khang chen por gyur to// bdud sdig can ni mchog tu bde bas tshim par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas
113a5(rgyud): rjes su dran pa sgom zhing rang gi gsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su sems pas mdun du rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag bas
113a6(rgyud): gyi shing du mas mig mangs ris brgyad du bres pa/ rin po che dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / mar gad dang / bai TuR+Ya dang / an da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen
113a7(rgyud): po dang / ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje chen po dang / dun las dang / dun las chen po dang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi dra bas rnam par spras pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
113b1(rgyud): dang ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i bdan bsgrengs pas legs par 'chan pa/ me tog gi 'phreng bas klubs pa/ pog snod du ma nas 'dug patshugam pa'i dad kyis drinam par byas pa/ bye radz+ra/
113b2(rgyud): zhim pa'i bsgo bas bsgos pa/ lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma sil snyan dang / phag rdob pa dang / klu len cing gar byed pa/ rdzing bu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu can 'bum phrag su ma'i dbus nas
113b3(rgyud): rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pal dang / dri mchog byung bas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs dang ldan pa byung nas/ de mchog tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid
113b4(rgyud): bde ba skyes pa des gus pa thams cad kyis de blangs nas bdud kyi mthu chen po dang / bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos lag pa gnyis kas spyi bo la blangs te/ dge ba'i
113b5(rgyud): bshes gnyen gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la dga' ba dang mchod pa'i phyir phul te/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'jig rten dag la dbang byed
113b6(rgyud): dbang gis 'byor gyur pa// stobs bcu'i sras rab mchog ldan khyod la brten nas su// byang chub phyir ni chags bral dri med byang chub sems// sems can bde sgrub gter dang 'dra ba bdag gis
113b7(rgyud): thob bdag mig gti mug mun pas dri chen dri med gyur// srid pa'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi zhing spros dang bral/ mya ngan 'das pa'i drang po'i lam ni bdag la bstan// sems dmyal mi bzad
114a1(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// sdig bral 'jig rten mgon la skyabs sum song ba// kye ma dman pa yun ring ji lta slus shig su// de ring thub dbang sras po rnams la bson/
114a2(rgyud): nams dang // dad dang snying rje ting 'dzin thob nas ngo mtshar gyur// sa mdog gcig pur sangs rgyas myur du grub par shog/ gcig pus 'gro ba ma lus mya ngan bzla bar bya// srid pa gzhan na ku/
114a3(rgyud): tu rgyu tshe bdag gi yid// rang phan 'jug dang dge ba shes bral bar ma gyur cig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag
114a4(rgyud): na rdo rje la mngon par bstod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces sbas so// rigs kyi bu dag sdang ba dang / gdon dang /
114a5(rgyud): bgegs dang / log 'dren de dag thams cad gang gis sems can thams cad la rnam par rtsom pa las rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / bgegs mi byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar
114a6(rgyud): 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig 'dzin du chu gcig/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag la mi 'jigs pa'ang byin cig/ de sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mya ngan las
114a7(rgyud): 'das pa bla na med pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag gis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes te tshig la mngon par dga' nas/
