114b1(rgyud): yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag thams cad dang / sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren da/
114b2(rgyud): ma mo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la
114b3(rgyud): sogs pa de dag thams cad dang / gdon gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po 'bab pas dkrugs pa'i mtsho chen po zab mo glong 'khyil ba/ thur 'ur sgra 'byung ba lta bur drag cing rgyun
114b4(rgyud): ring ba'i skad gsang mthon pos 'di skad ces smras so// sdang ba 'byung po dang / gdon dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa ca
114b5(rgyud): sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa khyed tha ma cang nyon cig/ khyed kyis deng phan chad sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa dag dang /
114b6(rgyud): de la sogs pa gang dag gsang sngags sgrub bam/ klog pa de dag la bgegs 'byung bar mi bya zhing 'tshe bar mi bya ste/ sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun par stobs sbyin par bya'o// sems can gang /
114b7(rgyud): dag dam tshig la ma zhugs pa de dag la bsrung bar bya/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / rig sngags 'grub par byin par bya'o//
115a1(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / tshigs ma dang / sgeg pa dang / ke'u dang / gtor ma dang / 'byung po dang / mi 'grangs pa rnams kyis sha dang zas zos kyang skyon du mi gzung zhing nyes par mi 'gyir/
115a2(rgyud): de nas sdang ba 'byung po dang / 'gegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad ces bya ba nas/ sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro// rigs kyi bu dag bka' lung /
115a3(rgyud): ci stsal ba de bzhin du sbyor bar bgyi'o// deng srad chad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
115a4(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo chen po de dag dang / sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / gdon gyi tshogs
115a5(rgyud): de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rig sngags kyi las dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'dzin du bcug go// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'ang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i
115a6(rgyud): sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu gang la gnas nas khyod kyis rdza
115a7(rgyud): 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa dang / bdud sdig can yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gzhan yang sdang ba gdon dang / 'byung po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad
115b1(rgyud): dam tshig la bkod cing byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du bcug pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tim/
115b2(rgyud): bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni ming dang / yi ge dang / sgra skad kyis rtogs par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ming ngam/ gzugs
115b3(rgyud): sam/ dbyibs sam/ gnas sam/ mnyam par bzhag pa 'am/ g.yengs pa'ang rung ste/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i chos de gang yang med do// gang la ming med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang /
115b4(rgyud): dbyings med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa dang / g.yeng ba med pa 'di btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya zhes de la ji snyam du sems/ yang
115b5(rgyud): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gsal bar byed pa 'di ni bdag la gsal bar byed pa ma yin/ gzhan la gsal bar byed pa ma yin/ gnyis ka la gsal bar byed pa ma yin no// 'on kyang gsal bar byed/
115b6(rgyud): par brtags pa yod do// de la gsal bar byed pa ni gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid kyis stong / bdag ni bdag gis stong / gzhan yang gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis stong / gnyis ka'ang gnyis ka'i
115b7(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis stong ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu brtags pa'i phyir ro// 'di ci zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi chog de'ang tshig gi bdag nyid kyis stong ste/ yi ge'ang yi ge ma yin no// de ltar na rten cing
116a1(rgyud): 'brel par 'byung ba'i don rtogs par byed pa yin no// don de brjod pa na'ang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro mod kyi/ gzhan gyi dbang la brten pa'i phyir yi ger brtags pa'ang /
116a2(rgyud): yod do// yongs su btags pa yin pa'i phyir btags pa'ang stong pa'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang nyid stong pa'o// rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung
116a3(rgyud): ba'ang stong pa'o// glo bur du rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis stong ngo // de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa gang yin//
116a4(rgyud): pa de mtshan nyid med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do//
116a5(rgyud): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de rtogs pa'o// rtogs pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de lhag mthong ngo // lhag mthong
116a6(rgyud): gang yin pa de zhiganas so// zhi gnas gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'o// rnam par thar pa gang yin pa de dbu ma'i lam yin no// dbu ma'i lam gang yin pa de la mtha' gcig med/ mtha' gnyis med/ 6
116a7(rgyud): ba med/ 'dzin pa po med/ 'dzin pa med/ chad pa med/ rtag pa med/ skye ba med/ 'gags pa med/ rtog pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med/ rang dbang med/ gzhan gyi dbang med/ 'gro ba med/ 'ong ba med/ kun
116b1(rgyud): nas nyon mongs pa med/ rnam par byang ba med/ 'du ba med/ 'bral ba med do// don lhag mthong yin no// lhag mthong gang yin pa de la phung po rnams med/ khams rnams med / dbang po rnams med/ skyem
116b2(rgyud): rnams med/ yul rnams med/ yul du gdags pa med/ las med/ las kyi 'bras bu med do// gang la las med cing las kyi 'bras bu med pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// tha na/
116b3(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa de chos so// chos
116b4(rgyud): gang yin pa de mi skye mi 'chi'o// mi skye mi 'chi ba gang yin pa de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin bstan pa
116b5(rgyud): 'di ni shin tu zab ste/ 'di la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba'ang med na/ 'jig rten pa'i mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad lta smos kyang ci dgos/ chos kyi rnam grangs
116b6(rgyud): 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / mos pa chung ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba ste/ gzhan du na 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi yul du gyur pa ni ma gtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs
116b7(rgyud): pa'i spyan ni dmigs pa med pa gnas pa med pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i dun
117a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
117a2(rgyud): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid med pa yin na/ de la ji ltar skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bstan cing dpe byad bzang //
117a3(rgyud): po brgyad cus sku legs par brgyan/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnam par gzhag par lta/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
117a4(rgyud): rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi brda'i tshig go// rgyan ces bya ba de/
117a5(rgyud): ni spros pa'i yi ge dang sgra'o// dpe byad bzang po zhes bya ba de ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba de ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do//
117a6(rgyud): gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba de ni tshogs gnyis kyis sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i yul te/ de la sku'i gsang ba zhes bya ba
117a7(rgyud): de ni bsod nams chen po'i rgyu mthun pa'i mtshan nyid do// bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku ste/ 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i
117b1(rgyud): 'phrin las dang sku'i gsang ba'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gsung zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do// kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin/
117b2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chad pa med pa dang rtag pa med par 'jug pa thugs su chud pa/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i lam gyis 'jug pa bsam gtan goms
117b3(rgyud): par byas pas shes par bya ba ste/ dmigs pa med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bas stong pa/ lus kyi yul ma yin pa/ ngag gi spyod yul ma yin pa/ yid kyi rang gi ngo bo'i yul ma yin/
117b4(rgyud): ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyis sku nam mkha'i khams su yang dag par 'du ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa de ltar blta bar bya'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa
117b5(rgyud): ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam du blta'o// dbu ma'i lam gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'chi
117b6(rgyud): ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos kyi sku 'di ni gnas pa nyid do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba de ni pha rol tu phyin pa dag gi rnam
117b7(rgyud): grangs su gtogs pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de'ang bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa nyid du blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni phyi nang gi
118a1(rgyud): dngos po rnam pa gnyis yongs su gtang bar bya'o// de la phyi zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi tshig go// nang zhes bya ba de ni don dam pa'i tshig go// de la phyi zhes bya ba de ni gang zas 'dod pa rnams/
118a2(rgyud): la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams dang / de bzhin du bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / go shas 'tsho ba dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / sa dang / mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang /
118a3(rgyud): mig dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / rus pa'i bar du sbyin pa ste/ de'ang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pas yongs su bsngos pa rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang / gya nom pa dang /
118a4(rgyud): rgya che ba dang / rang gi sa bsti stang du byas te rnam pa thams cad sems can thams cad la sbyin pa 'di ni phyi'i 'o// nang gi ni chos sbyin pa'o// de'ang rnam pa gnyis te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la
118a5(rgyud): 'jug par yang dag par gzhol ba dang / sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / bzod pa'i gtam dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang //
118a6(rgyud): smon lam dang / ye shes kyi gtam dang / snying rjes yongs su zin pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba'o// gzhan yang nang gi sbyin pa ni gang 'di mthar 'dzin pa dang / skye ba dang 'gag par
118a7(rgyud): yongs su rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / shes pa dang / shes bya rnam par spangs pa dga' bas yongs su zin pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyi sbyin pa'o// /
118b1(rgyud): gang 'di nyid la lus dang / ngag dang / yid rgod pa med pa dang / khengs pa med pa dang / lus rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / ngag rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / yid rnam par g.yeng ba med par shes/
118b2(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa/ gcig tu nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa/ btang snyoms kyis yongs su zin pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni tshul khrims
118b3(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang 'di nyid la rang gi lus dang srog la mi lta bar bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / chos dang / chos ma yin pa dang / bden pa dang / bden pa ma yin pa dang /
118b4(rgyud): g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba'i dngos po rnam par spong zhing byams pas yongs su zin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni 'dir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang sbyin pa dang / tshul
118b5(rgyud): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir sems spro zhing rtsom pa dang / yongs su mi skyo bar rtag tu gnas pa med pa dang / de dmigs pa med pa dang / byams pas yongs su zin
118b6(rgyud): pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni 'dir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni bsod nams kyi tshogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par
118b7(rgyud): longs spyod pa'i sku'i gsang ba grub par byed pa'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po 'di dag nyid rdzogs pa ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 'byed/
119a1(rgyud): pa dang / 'grel pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / de la gzhol zhing mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / gsob dang / gsog dang / dngos po med pa dang / dngos po
119a2(rgyud): thams cad dngos po med par yang dag par ston to// mdor bsru ba na 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa sel cing chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'
119a3(rgyud): mtha' yas skye mched dang mnyam par yang dag par ston te/ dmigs pa dang bral ba 'di ni 'dir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
119a4(rgyud): pa nyid dang / phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa 'di ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs so//
119a5(rgyud): bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / tshogs 'di gnyis ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / shes pa dang / shes bya mtha' dag dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
119a6(rgyud): chub yang dag par rtogs par byed pa ste/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba dag gis mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o// rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni gal te de bzhin ga
119a7(rgyud): papa nyid kyi sku tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs te bstan cing bshad kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// sku'i gsang ba ji lta ba bzhin du gsung gi gsang ba'ang de bzhin no// thugs kyi gsang ba ni de bzhin/
119b1(rgyud): gshegs pas rnam pa dang / so sa'i rnam pa dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang / bya ba tha dad pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis kyang bstan par mi spyod mod/
119b2(rgyud): kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so rang gi rig pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba yin par shes par bya'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis kyang de ltar rig par bya ste/
119b3(rgyud): bdag cag lta bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa rnams kyis bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can gyi khams mtha'
119b4(rgyud): yas mu med pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa dang / blo gros dang / blo dang / rtogs pa dang / mngon par 'dod pa mtha' yas mu med pa dang / sems kyi rgyun rnam pa tha dad pa sna
119b5(rgyud): tshogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spyod yul dang / skye gnas sna tshogs dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i las sna tshogs dang / mi shes pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / mi snang ba dang / mu na nag dang / 'gro ba lnga
119b6(rgyud): dang / 'gro ba drug dang / khams gsum pa thog ma dang / dbus dang / 'jig par gnas pa sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su ma chad par gnas par dus gsum dang / phyogs la mgo rmongs pa skye
119b7(rgyud): ba dang rga ba la sogs pa na ba dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa la sogs pas nyin gcig bzhin du bcom pa'i sems can
120a1(rgyud): rnams kyi sems can gyi khams ma brgal ba bskal ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su/
120a2(rgyud): mya ngan las bzla ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzud pa dang / gnas pa thams cad gyur pa'i lam la dgod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa shin tu bde ba/ don dam pa/ zhi ba/ 'khrug pa/
120a3(rgyud): med pa/ dge ba/ nad med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi so so rang gi rig pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
120a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / dga' ba dang / rangs
120a5(rgyud): pa dang / mgu bar sa la yang dag par gzung ba dang / chos rtogs pa'i khyad par brjod pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po ltar 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus dang tshod las mi 'da' bar bya
120a6(rgyud): ba dang / de dag la rgyu de'i dbang du byas te skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i chos kyi tshul gcig nas gcig tu
120a7(rgyud): brgyud de gnas par bya ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu lung byin pas thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / skom pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang / ye shes goms pa rnal 'byor du gyur pa'i rgyud kyi rgyun ma
120b1(rgyud): gcad pa dang / skal ba yod la yongs su ma smin pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa'i don gyi phyir/ phyogs tsam gyi sgo gcig mdun du byas te 'jug par byed pa cung zad cig bshad pa/
120b2(rgyud): bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du byung bar gyur te dga' ba thob nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// /
120b3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// gang gi phyir kho bo cag lta bu'i nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyis sgra bsgrags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i nyan thos rnams la chos zab mo'i tshig gi don 'di lta bu gsal/
120b4(rgyud): par byas pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod yang legs so// lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya ba zhes
120b5(rgyud): de skad zer ba ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing mnyen
120b6(rgyud): la shin tu gzhon sha chags pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag ste/ ched du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal te// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis gang mdo
120b7(rgyud): sde ba mo 'di lta bu 'di gsang ba pa'i tshig gi don bzhin du sems can thams cad la lung bstan cing bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ba legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
121a1(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas lag na rdo rje la ji ltar legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs
121a2(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la phyag bzhag ste/ ched du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal cing lags so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi
121a3(rgyud): bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na ming 'dzin pa'ang dkon na rab tu gsal bar byed pa lta ci smos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu
121a4(rgyud): gang+gA'i klung tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul las shin tu 'das pa snyed chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
121a5(rgyud): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag ni mi
121a6(rgyud): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de bas kyang ches mang ba'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// stong gsum
121a7(rgyud): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dpag tu med cing grangs med la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// gsang
121b1(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjela'ang chos kyi dgab pa dang mchod pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na rnga rnams ma brdungs par kun nas spa byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis gzha' med khang gi lang sa 'asags/
121b2(rgyud): pa rnams su kun nas sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs blangs pas lha'i bu mo rnams gar byed do// spos dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
121b3(rgyud): ba dan dang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng dang / me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / ut+pal dang / dri mchog dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / pa ri sha ka dang / pa ri sha ka
121b4(rgyud): chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / man do ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / kun nas skyes dang / kun nas skyes chen po'i me tog gi char/
121b5(rgyud): gyi sprin kun nas mngon par bab bo// spos chu'i char gyi sprin yang mngon par bab pa'o// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / gnod
121b6(rgyud): sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / skem byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po dang /
121b7(rgyud): ma mo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / mkhar dang / ri dang / sa'i lha la sogs pa snang ba gdon 'gegs dang / log
122a1(rgyud): 'dren thams cad dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag bla gos rnams phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom//
122a2(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag gzir cing nye bar gzir bas rig sngags 'chang thams
122a3(rgyud): cad la dngos grub stsol ba dang / dam tshig thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa la yang dag par gnang bar bgyid par 'gyur ba rang gi snying po 'di bdag cag la bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
122a4(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag gang gi phyir khyed cag 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ni legs so legs so// de'i
122a5(rgyud): phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyed rang rang gi snying po bstan par bya'o// de dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'bras kyis/
122a6(rgyud): lha'i rnga bo che dang / rgya mtsho dang / sprin chen po'i sgra lta bu'i gsung tshangs pa chen po'i sgra bas lhag pa sna tshogs pa snyan cing rgya che la zab pa/ thog ma dang / bar dang / tha mar dge ba/ sems can thams
122a7(rgyud): cad kyi snying du 'thad pa/ gsal ba/ 'jebs pa/ dag pa/ mnyen pa/ snyan pa/ brjod pa'i tshig khams gsum pa thams cad la go bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i sgra bla na med pa des grub
122b1(rgyud): pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// taH thA/ dzas dza ya/ dza swA ban+d+ha/ bya
122b2(rgyud): ma/ ma ma ma yi/ wang zas bya/ dza ma po dza ye/ dzas n+ti/ bai ShA yarti/ a dza~M te/ a pa rA dzi te/ tad+yate/ sarba sula? s+ya maH ni/ dza ma d+ha ni// 9 te kA na sa/ ke m+ba re/ sarba pra b+h+yas kyi N+DiH/ khaN+Da
122b3(rgyud): bas ni/ bar+Na sha pa ri/ shr-i ye ma hA shri ye sarba ad b+hu tA ya shri ye/ pad+ma ba hUM/ pad+ma mA li ni badz+ra ang ku shi/ badz+ra ma to/ badz+ra pa tA li/ shU li ni badz+ra d+ha re/ hi hi hi hi/ badz+ra pA Ni/ he he he he/ badz+ra pA NI/
122b4(rgyud): badz+ra shu li ni/ tsakra d+ha re/ hi hi/ badz+ra pA Ni/ he he badz+ra pA Ni/ hI hi hi hi/ he he he he/ badz+ra pA Ni/ ka la ka la/ ba la ba la/ ra la ra la/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ra sa ra/ hA hA hA hA hA/ tsa li mi li/ tshi le di la/ daM la
122b5(rgyud): di mi le/ dz+wa la/ ma hA dz+wa la/ dz+wa li ti/ pra dz+wa li ti/ Na ra thag ge tha re/ mu ku ti/ k+Sha me/ k+Sha ma me/ grub pa'i tshogs kyis phyag byas ma/ lha thams cad kyi snying kun tu 'jug par byed ma/ sems can
122b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying 'bigs ma/ sdang ba rab tu snang ba thams cad kyi snying 'joms ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rjes su sbyong ma/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po la
122b7(rgyud): 'jug ma tshur shog/ dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig/ sems can thams cad kyi snying rnams khug la dam tshig la khon cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa thams/
123a1(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/ tra Ta thaT/ kro Ta ya swA hA/ gyen du wA la swA tra/ rnam par lta la swA tra/ mu srin la swA hA/ me la swA hA/ tshangs pa la swA hA/ khyab 'jug la swAH
123a2(rgyud): drag po rnams la swA hA/ brgya byin la swA hA/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la swA hA/ thams cad la swA hA/ lha rnams la swA hA/ nor rnams la swA hA/ ma mo rnams la swA hA/ mtshan rnams la swA hA/
123a3(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad la swA hA/ sa la swA hA/ dbyangs can la swA hA/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho
123a4(rgyud): chen po thams cad dang / srin po la sogs pa khams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la swA hA/ tshur shog tshur shog/ dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig/ ku ru ku ru / sa ra
123a5(rgyud): sa ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da hA/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hUM yU b+h+rUM/ tsaN+Da li/ ma tang gi/ Do m+ba ni/ puk+ka si/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams
123a6(rgyud): grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po dang / lha thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs pa na/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'jigs sngangs skrag par gyur nas/ chu shing
123a7(rgyud): go tshal rlung drag po chen pos bskyod de rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du g.yo zhing 'gul la snying tshig ste/ rdo rje'i phur bus btab pa bzhin du thugs shing zhigs la 'gre zhing skyabs btsal ba'i phyir 'du
123b1(rgyud): shes tsam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'bod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khar 'di srung /
123b2(rgyud): zhig/ ngas dam tshig 'di yongs su 'dzin du gzhug go// rig sngags grub pa 'byor par byed pa'i snying po la gnos pa bsgrags so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan
123b3(rgyud): rjes gsang ba pa'i snying po 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad bslang ngo // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM kI li ki
123b4(rgyud): larnga badz+ra kI li kI la ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba lags te/ rig sngags thams cad 'grub par bgyid pa lags so// des ni bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis ma
123b5(rgyud): btang bar mchi'o// dbang du mchi'o// dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o// lung bzhin bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyi'o// dpal bskyed par bgyi'o// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par bshig go
123b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o// 'byung po thams cad rnam par bshig par bgyi'o// nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// bcom
123b7(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa chen po bgyid pa na/ gnod pa bgyid pa 'gegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis rnam par
124a1(rgyud): gtses pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin me ltar thos rnam par bsgyings gang rnam par
124a2(rgyud): rol pa mngon shes dri zhim snang dpal gyis bdag la bsrung ba'i slad du stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu 'khor de thams cad bsam gtan
124a3(rgyud): gyi dga' ba dang bde bas tshim par gyur te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstan pa la gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
124a4(rgyud): kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ 'dzin du chu gcig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang /
124a5(rgyud): des sems can mang po la yun ring por phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bla na med pa/ chags pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa thob cing rtogs par 'gyur ro// su chos kyi
124a6(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ker
124a7(rgyud): 'drir 'jug pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa de ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas
124b1(rgyud): nam byang chub kyi mang po la 'dug gi par du ngan 'grolog par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs dma' ba rnamasas skye bar mi 'gyur/ dbul pa la rigs rnams su lte bar mi 'gyur te/ shes
124b2(rgyud): rab med par yang ma yin/ ma dul bar ma yin/ tshe thung bar ma yin zhing / tshe rabs tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par
124b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rab tu dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'khor ngan pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro// tshig gzung bar 'os shing snyan par 'gyur ro// skal ba bzang zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur
124b4(rgyud): ro shes rab chen po dang / spobs pa chen po dang / dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
124b5(rgyud): zin par 'gyur ro// sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la
124b6(rgyud): mkhas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing che zhing mtha' yas pa la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du de byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro// tshe 'ang
124b7(rgyud): nyid la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa dang / 'byung po dag dang / gdon gyi tshogs dang / ma mo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
125a1(rgyud): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// nad thams/
125a2(rgyud): cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de la rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad kyang srung
125a3(rgyud): zhing sbed pa dang yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro// de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang sla bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig la zhugs par
125a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi// bcom
125a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ de bzhin gshe/
125a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo slob pa med paskor ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dbyings la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams
125a7(rgyud): cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bdud kyi phyogs 'dul ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/
125b1(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces par yang zung zhig/ rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig thams cad la rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ lag na rdza
125b2(rgyud): rje'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
125b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la legs so zhes gsol te mngon par dga' nas cang mi smra bar gyur te/ de nas byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
125b4(rgyud): chen po thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
125b5(rgyud): dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das lag na
125b6(rgyud): rjes gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang /
125b7(rgyud): dz+nyAn ma d+h-i dang / bu chen gyi ma tshal phan skye ye shes rjes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// ga
126a1(rgyud): skad du/ ar+ya badz+ra a dzi ta a na la pra mo ha ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
126a2(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa can gyi ri'i gangs ri sul gyi mchog/ ri rab kyi smad dang /
126a3(rgyud): rked ltar gser gyi rdo sna tshogs kyis gang zhing ri 'ur bres pa 'bar ba/ rin po che'i rdo du ma'i 'od sna tshogs 'dza' lta bu byung ba'i rdo leb yangs pa/ me tog dri zhim po bkram zhing phyi ma dang bdug pa
126a4(rgyud): dri zhim pa mang pos phug gi nang dang nags bsgos pa/ gdugs dang / a ka ru dang / phye ma dang / dril bu dang / bla res mdzes par byas pa'i ri bo mchog la bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan 'das lha rnams
126a5(rgyud): dang lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang //
126a6(rgyud): srin po rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'o tshogs khyab
126a7(rgyud): par byed pa rgya chen po dag gis dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gyur par 'dus te/ de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong dang / dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang
126b1(rgyud): thabs cig go// bcom ldan 'das ni chos ston te gnas par bde ba/ mnyan na bde ba/ 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba'i chos ston to// de na lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams
126b2(rgyud): dang lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams
126b3(rgyud): dang srin po'i bu rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i
126b4(rgyud): tshogs rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rnam par rgyu zhing / ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa'i sgra 'byin to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/
126b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sgra de dag gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye bzhin bzangs dag ci'i phyir ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / 'khrug pa'i sgra
126b6(rgyud): 'byin/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dbang du bgyis te/ gnod pa dang brang bas bkug cing drangs te mtho ba tsams na/ bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ de skad
126b7(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad kyi steng gi dkyil 'khor yangs pa ston pa'i mchog gi blo gros dang / blo dang / las dang / las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa sa chen
127a1(rgyud): po las sa gzhan thob pa rgyal tshab tu nye ste/ chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dgongs par mdzad pa tsam
127a2(rgyud): gyis 'ongs te/ rdo rje'i phom ltar dpung mgo yangs pa/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i cod pan 'od zer 'tsher ba can/ rdo rje'i dpung rgyan dang ldan pa/ lus mkhregs shing sra ba/ lag na rdo rje dang /
127a3(rgyud): zhags pa dang / lag cha brtan po 'bar bathogs pa/ rdo rje phur bu srabs rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ mthu chen po g.yog bzhi 'bum lnga khri dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu sdud/
127a4(rgyud): bar byed cing / rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzhon nu dang / rdo rje'i be con dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i tog dang / rdo rje'i snang ba dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / rin po che'i rdo rje dang / gsang ba'i rdo rje dang / 'khor
127a5(rgyud): rdo rje la sogs pa dang / rdo rje'i dmag dpon chen po rnams dang / dmag skyong rnams dang / sa skyong rnams dang / rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa yang dag par rtogs pa
127a6(rgyud): rnams dang / rdo rje'i yum rnams dang / rdo rje rnam par 'dren pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rdo rje gzhon nu'i gdon rnams dang / rdo rje gnon po rnams dang / rdo rje rmi lam ngan byed rnams yang dag par bsku
127a7(rgyud): rnam par bskul zhing 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'dus pa kun snang bar byed/ rnam par snang bar byed/ gsal bar byed/ rnam par gsal bar byed/ rab tu dga' bar byed/ yang dag par bskul/
127b1(rgyud): so sor bskul zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bla gos phud nas zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom/
127b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis rjes su 'i rang ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'chang khyod song la lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang /
127b3(rgyud): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu rnams dang / 'dus pa chen po'i bar dag sgra 'byin cing nyam thag pa myong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas rdo rje 'chang stan las langs te/
127b4(rgyud): lha dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'byung po'i tshogs kyi nang du song nas rjes su ston cing / rdo rje mtshon cha'i me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul
127b5(rgyud): gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba dang / me stag rnam par 'phro ba dang / lce 'bebs pa'i grog rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnams gzir to// de nas
127b6(rgyud): bskal pa chen por sngar rmi lam dang / chu dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i grangs kyi tshad tsam dag gis mdangs dang / gzi brjid dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ma dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims
127b7(rgyud): dang brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / rang gi longs spyod thams cad las byung ba las grub pa'i rdo rje de byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i lag tu phyin no// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
128a1(rgyud): rnams kyi gsung rab kyi chos ston par gyur pa/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu
128a2(rgyud): phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / snying rje byed pa/ rang gi rdo rje dang / rigs kyi rig pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / bklags pa'i tshul du gyur pa/ drag po dang / dbang po dang / gshin rje dang /
128a3(rgyud): chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ de ltar de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das khro ba drag po rnams rmongs par byed pa/ sgyu dang ldan pa rnams rmug
128a4(rgyud): par byed pa/ sdang ba rnams spyod pa/ rmongs pa rnams 'jig pa/ dam po rnams rtsad nas 'don pa/ rgyas pa rnams sgur mar rlog g.yon po rnams spong ba/ gcod pa rnams snying rjes byed pa/ 'byung ba
128a5(rgyud): rnams skrag par byed pa/ srin po rnams spangs par byed pa/ rang gi gsang sngags rnams rdzogs par byed pa/ gzhan gyi gsang sngags rnams phur bus 'debs pa/ nus pa rnams ston par byed
128a6(rgyud): gsod par byed pa gsod pa/ gnod par byed pa phung bar byed pa de der song nas/ lha rnams dang lha'i bu rnams dbang du byed de/ de ltar drag po pa drag po grub pa dang / khyab 'jug pa khyab 'jug grub pa dang /
128a7(rgyud): lha ma yin pa lha ma yin grub dang / de dag spyir bskul ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug/ skyong bar byed/ mthu ston par byed/ brjed par byed/ rnam par skrag par byed do// stobs bcus dgongs pa bka' stsal
128b1(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje 'chang gis mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / gzungs 'da'i stobs dang / bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'od kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po las byung ba'i 'od
128b2(rgyud): zer rnams kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag na rdo rje bskul nas/ 'od des de rab tu dga' ste rdo rje las snang ba bkye ba rnams kyis sa gsum gyi ston gyi skar ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil du brlag par byas nas
128b3(rgyud): snang ba gcig pur byed cing rgya mtsho chen po ni skams/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni g.yo bar byed/ glog gi 'khor lo dang lce 'bebs pa'i 'brug ni bsgrags/ sgra drag po ni phyung / bsgyings pa'i sgra ni bsgrags
128b4(rgyud): skrag par ni byas so// de na rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs me lce 'od 'phro chen po khong na 'dug pa/ sgra tshogs gser dang rin po che 'dra ba/ rdo rje 'chang ba/ rdo rje'i bu mo
128b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma des lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ yid ches mgyogs pa'i shugs 'od 'phro zhing 'bar ba lta bur drag pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu
128b6(rgyud): 'phrul chen po la skyabs su song ngo // de 'ongs pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang gis smras pa/ skal ba chen po dge ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dang ldan ma/ 'di dag la
128b7(rgyud): lag cha dang mthun par bya ba'i stobs byin cig/ de nas gzungs kyis smras pa/ 'di dag bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes lan gsum tshig tu smras so// thor tsugs gsum ma/ sa gsum
129a1(rgyud): dang dus gsum dang / drag po'i rtse gsum dang / khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / lus ngan gyi dbyug to dang / dbang po'i rdo rje dang / chu lha'i zhags/
129a2(rgyud): pa dang / log 'dren rnams kyi bgegs dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang / rlung lha rnams kyi gzi dang / shugs dang / grub pa rnams kyi rmongs byed dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyi gcod pa
129a3(rgyud): dang klu rnams kyi dam tshig dang / dug dang / khro bo dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / grul bum dang / bden bral dang / gnon
129a4(rgyud): po dang / ro langs kyi skabs su rgol ba rnams dang / de bzhin du thams cad kyang sbyong zhig/ mig gis mdzum pa tsam gyis yud tsam la thams cad mchod nas/ lag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul te
129a5(rgyud): spras pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ta thA ga ta sa mA d+hi d+hA ra NI/ ma hA A brta yiSh+Tha mi/ a ts+tsha
129a6(rgyud): badz+re ku Ti le/ ko dza pA ba kA ku la shi li/ ka pi la ke shi/ ta nr-i tsi rtsi tsi bri mi thi mi/ kaka rba mu thib za thi 'adz+re/ ma hA bi d+ha la lo le/ su gu bu lu/ su mu su mu ne sa ra sa ra/ phaT marba/ su b+h+yo te/
129a7(rgyud): pi ge le tsi te/ dz+wa la ping+ka la sarba de ba ga Na/ pra ha ra Na mA yA/ sid+d+ha dA yi ke/ su ru ke/ ku ru ka/ badz+ra g+ho Ne/ badz+ra dr-i D+ha/ sA ra pra ha ra NaM/ rat+na tra ya/ di kra la bud+d+he te/ badz+ra d+ha ra bi shwa sa ni ka
129b1(rgyud): a rba ti ha ta pra ma na ni swAhA/ gang gsang sngags 'di rjes su dran nas grog gas/ skos mam/ 'dzin pa de zos na ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig/
129b2(rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// dam tshig dang phyag rgyal zhugs par 'gyur ro// bsam pa dang rjes su yi rang bas 'gugs par byed do//
129b3(rgyud): dang ngag sang sngags dang / mdud pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnam par skrag par byed do// de nas lha dang lha'i bu de dag gis de'i mthus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
129b4(rgyud): de'i rnam par rol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rnam pa mang po du ma'ang myong nas/ steng gi gnas gtsang ma dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas padag
129b5(rgyud): gis 'od dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / 'dug pa'i sprin dang / rin po che mang po'i char rgya chen pos mchod nas bstod pa snyan pas bstod de/ snyan cing za ba la rnga sgra lta bu dang / bsil ba dang
129b6(rgyud): bsod nams kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang // thams cad dang
129b7(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs
130a1(rgyud): so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang /
130a2(rgyud): bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra suk+Sha a pra ti ha ta na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa zhes bya
130a3(rgyud): ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs khro bo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig nA/ bcom
130a4(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje rags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas bzhin rab tu 'bar ba bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zad du
130a5(rgyud): 'dug go// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las bram ze'i khye'u zhig byung ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba'i bdag po/ rig pa'i bdag po/ gzungs
130a6(rgyud): kyi bdag go// lha gnas gsum po dag na lha nyam chung ba dang / klu nyam chung ba la zil gyis gnon pos rab tu gzhom pa'i gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / gzungs sngags dam pa rab tu
130a7(rgyud): brjod du gsol/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas bde gshegs khro ba thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang snying 'di rab tu smras so// na moraN+Da
130b1(rgyud): tra lA ya/ nam g+ha d+ha badz+ra pA Na le/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta la/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha ra ha ra badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra/ d+hun d+hA nA badz+ra/ da had ha badz+ra/ btsa pa tsa badz+ra/ d+hA ra d+ha ra badz+ra/ d+hA rA yad+hAr ma/
130b2(rgyud): badz+radza dA ru Na da ruN badz+ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da badz+ra/ b+hin+da b+hin+d+ra badz+ra/ hUM phaT thA/ na ma k+Sha d+hu badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ sh+tsa lu hu lu/ tISh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hU~M phaT thA/ bram ze'i khye'u gang
130b3(rgyud): la la zhig gis bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i cha bzung ste/ khro bo thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu smra zhing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rdo rje phra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyog
130b4(rgyud): bcur spros na/ sems cad thams cad kyi bag chags ngan pa byang / tshe dang bsod nams rab tu rgyas te/ dgra dang / dug dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par thar nas/
130b5(rgyud): gang zhig gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa la tsa ma ga d+ha sprin gyis bshig pa'am/ kyu ru ra rlon pa gser gyis bzhibs pa bzhin du dmigs te/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di smra zhing / rdo rje
130b6(rgyud): phra mo spros pas de dag gis phung po lnga dbang po lnga myur du chag par 'gyur ro// lhas smras na/ lha'i thangab gcig gam lo ldan lha ma yin mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro// dge slong gis
130b7(rgyud): smras na/ bdud kyi mtshon ma rnams myur du brtul bar 'gyur ro// mis brjod na/ gang la dmigs pa de mi'i phra ba gcig gam ma lo ldan nges par chag par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
131a1(rgyud): 'das kyis/ lag na rdo rje dang bram ze'i khye'u la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i skad byung ste/ rdo rje'i cho ga 'di lta/
131a2(rgyud): gnas gsum por bsgrags so// rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya da sha badz+ra pA Ni na thang
131a3(rgyud): yang bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das/
131a4(rgyud): mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi
131a5(rgyud): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu'i ming shes sam/ rus shes sam/ gsang sngags shes pa de la byad kyis mi tshugs so// gnod sbyin dag rnam par 'tsha
131a6(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ro// srin po rnams dang / lpags pa 'a rnams dang / bdug papa rnams 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro// phyis 'jog pa rnams kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// taHthA/ u kau rom go / ma ca
131a7(rgyud): ri/ u sa ma/ mi la me/ oM i ma/ oM la me/ i li ma la me/ he ke d+hiH/ 6/ mu h+ya re/ pra d+ha re/ a la~M la le/ pA la~M pa 9/ khu khu me ti ku me tu ma/ khaM ra khi ri/ sA d+ha sA d+ha/ sarba ba ka ka ya/
131b1(rgyud): bsnam bka kra len kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'ang dag rtag tu bdag ga phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur nas/ bdag gnyid lag pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa'ang /
131b2(rgyud): bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol ba thob cig/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal
131b3(rgyud): bakhyu mchog dang / 'brog ga nas dang / gangs gnas dang / lngas rtsen dang / nor bu bzang po dang / grags pa bzang dang / lus ngan gyi bus mdzes byed dang / 'phreng ba mdzes dang / rgyal po chen po chos skyong
131b4(rgyud): rnam thos kyi bu ste/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur nas/ bdag gnyid kyis log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa na'ang bsrung
131b5(rgyud): ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol ba thob cig/ gsang sngags
131b6(rgyud): kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra Ne swA hA/ de la lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams ni 'di dag yin te/ tad+ya thA/ u ke te/ ke te/ sang ka te/ ud/
131b7(rgyud): dri sa rba d+he ta te/ ta ba ta te swA hA/ kyai rtse tse te/ rtsol ma rjod na/ byed ni/ mtha' tu myur ni/ sarba kr-i ta/ ka khod/ par kra ta nA ga ni/ de la rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje bcub de dag gi/
132a1(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi gzhi dam pa ni 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/ a me la k+She/ pa ke le lak+She/ a ke/ ba ke lak+She swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ hu tu hu tu/ shu tu tu/ bi tu bi tu/ bi tu tu/
132a2(rgyud): ga ga ts+tsha/ sa pa te/ pa ta ha ta ye swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga bA to bud+d+ha s+ya sid+d+han+t+ra man+ta ba da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang /
132a3(rgyud): ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po rdzogs so// /
132a4(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar ska/
132a5(rgyud): duHar+ya kud+d+ha l+ya mr-i ta hri da la tsa tu ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi za'i sbyor gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sna dben/
132a6(rgyud): chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas khro bo chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la glang po che'i lha stangs kyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
132a7(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'da' sems can rnams ni bsod nams dman pa dang / tshul la mi gnas pa dang / pham la mgus pa dang / bsod nams chung ba dang / ded pa ma mchis pa dang
132b1(rgyud): grags tshol ba dang / rtag tu zang zing la brkam pa dang / rtag tu log 'dren dang / 'tshe ba dang / sha ba rnams kyis zin pa lags te/ bgegs dang log 'dren de dag gzhog pa dang / mthar
132b2(rgyud): gtugs pa'i slad du gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rdo rje khro bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bdud rtsi thab sbyor gang khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa
132b3(rgyud): phyir zhus pa ni legs so lags so// khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gi/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sngags shod cig/ de nas khro bo bdud rtsi zab sbyor gyis bcom ldan 'das dang lag
132b4(rgyud): na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsar+N+Na badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ pra dz+wa la ti diSh+Tha/ daMSh+Tota ka Ta/ b+ha ya b+hai ra ba ya
132b5(rgyud): a si mu sa la/ badz+ra pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu lu hu lu/ a mr-i ta kuN+Du la ni/ kha kha kha kha/ kha na kha na/ khA da khA da/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ha na ha ni/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/
132b6(rgyud): gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ gardza gardza/ tardza tardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ b+ha ga ban/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da lI/ mUr+d+han ta TA ya badz+re Na/ sarba big+h+nAn bi nA ya kan/ nai bA ra ya/ ma hA ga Na pa ti dza~M bi tA na ta/
132b7(rgyud): ka rA ya hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM kro d+ha ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ bdud rtsi zab sbyor gyi gsang sngags dang po'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsar+b+ha badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha ya
133a1(rgyud): daN+DotakaH/ b+hai ra bA ya/ a si ban+dan ha stA ya/ hehe/ pa ta pa ta/ d+ha baN+Dab/ khaSh+Ta/ Sha2/ arba ta k+shat+ka ma/ taSh+Tha tiH/ ban+d+han+tu/ han tan/ gangag rdza/ ka[]
133a2(rgyud): ti dzI bi ta dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya swA hA/ gsang sngags gnyis pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsan+t+ra badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ bi ma la ka na ka/ dz+wa la b+hu Shi NA ya/ ga ga na
133a3(rgyud): a mr-i ta sa~M b+hA bA ya/ rak+Sha mA l+yA/ a nu la pa na pri yA ya/ badz+ra pA Ni pri yA ya/ badz+ra pa ni tu l+ya/ b+he ga ya/ de gan ga la k+Sha rak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa pra mArba nA ya/ trai mo kya go tsa rA ya/ sha ta sa N+ya/ pa~M dra pa kar ya/
133a4(rgyud): dr-iraSh+Ta gar b+ho ta ta mA ya/ a mr-i ta kun+na mI/ e h+ye he daSh+Ta ta ka rba b+he ra bA gag na bi d+yAd dz+wal spu ling ga sha ni/ tu l+ye ru ro d+hi ti/ saMb+hUta oM/ kha kha kha la gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na han/ kardza gardza
133a5(rgyud): bi s+pho Ta ya/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ gr-i sa gra sa/ sarba big+h+nAn pa~M nA ya kAnA/ hr-i da ya~M phaT/ gan h+yarma hr-i da ya~M badz+ra/ rak+Sha hr-i da yaM phaT/ prasmai rak+Sha sa rba da~M ya~M phiT/ sarba dz+war hr-id ya~M
133a6(rgyud): sarba tsa tu ra tha ka hr-i da yaM phaT/ sarba nA gA nA na hr-i da yaM phaT/ hUM hUM phaT/ da hi da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ a bi sha a bi sha/ i dany+tsa me kAr+yaM ku ru badz+ra d+ha ra a dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ gsang sngags gsum pa'o//
133a7(rgyud): na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ daMSh+Tota ka Ta/ b+hai ra bA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/ khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o// de nas 'di dag gistong
133b1(rgyud): pa don yod pa gang bton pa dang bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrubs na/ bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad gton cing legs par bzlas brjod bgyis pa dang bsgrubs par 'gyur ba de bshad par 'tshal/
133b2(rgyud): lo// de la 'di ni bdag gi snying po lags so// oM a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po'o// rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis gsang sngags rnams bshad ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ni rnam pa
133b3(rgyud): drug tu g.yos so// log 'dren rnams kyang skrag ste/ skyabs med cing rten med par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/
133b4(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/ zhes de skad du smra zhing mgo thur du gtugs so// kye kye log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i ngag nyon cig/ rdo rje kun tu 'bar
133b5(rgyud): zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar bas khyed kyi mgo gshegs sa re/ ngas ral pa ser po can rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis lha'i lo stong gi bar du log 'dren rnams bcom pa dang / gtubs pa
133b6(rgyud): dang / brdungs pa dang / gzir ba dang / bskams pa gang yin pa de dran par gyis shig/ nga'i mthu dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po dran par gyis shig/ gang 'di gsang sngags
133b7(rgyud): 'dzin cing 'don pa dang / sgrub pa dang / de srung ba byed pa de la grags ma tshol cig/ til sbrus pa 'am zas ngan pa pa'ang rung / grong gi chos spyod kyang rung ste/ rig pa thams cad sgrub pa la glags
134a1(rgyud): ma tshol cig/ ban za ba'i tshe'ang khams dang po sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o// nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe lan bdun brjod na de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang ngo // log
134a2(rgyud): 'dren rnams kyang grags ma tshal lo// til dang / skran chung dang / 'bras dang / dren ce'ang rung / su ma 'khur bar pa ta dang la sug kyang rung ste/ thams cad kyang bar yin kyang nga'i gsang
134a3(rgyud): sngags 'dzin na de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med par shes par bya'o// 'phags pa bdud rtsi zad sbyor gyi snying po rdzogs so// /
134a4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha b+hu ra kuM kU rba rA dza sto tra man+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po sde brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
134a5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// oM b+hu ra kuM ma hA pra NA pa/ d+hu ra tsi b+hur ki ma nA sa~M/ u tsusma krod+hahU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshul phyag 'tshal bstod// khrol khros pas khro bo che// sangs rgyas
134a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas sngar sangs rgyas// chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i sku// sme brtsegs zhes bya ba dag phyag 'tshal// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar dbus na// pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs// ldang nag
134a7(rgyud): chen po sme ba can// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ldang ba// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i mche ba 'byin// mi gtsang bdud rtsi sman bzhin gsol// g.yas pa
134b1(rgyud): rdo rje ral gri bsnams// g.yon pa zhags pa lcags kyu'o// tha ma sdigs mdzub thugs kar bsnol// sde gtsang med pa'i las dag brtson// gdug pa sbrul gyis dbu lus brgyan// 'jigs spangs/
134b2(rgyud): med par brtul zhugs spyod// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jigs pa kun las skyob par mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la
134b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal bstod// nad dang rims las bsrung bar mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi gtsang zas dang mi gtsang gos// thams cad sel bar byed pa'i mchog/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin
134b4(rgyud): gdon// thams cad ma lus dga' bar mdzad// nad dang rims dang dal ka ya mas// bsrung ba'i las mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag la bsrung ba mdzad du gsol// mi gtsang ba rnams gtsang bar mdzad//
134b5(rgyud): sme ba rnams ni mi smar mdzad// lci ba rnams ni yang bar mdzad// dog pa yangs par mdzad la bstod// khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs khyod// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// gang dag khyed la mos
134b6(rgyud): rten rnams// lus bde sems bde dbang po bde// bde ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus dag sems dag dbang po dag/ dag pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus gtsang sems gtsang dbang po gtsang // gtsang
134b7(rgyud): ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus dang sems dang dbang po dang // dang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus gsal sems gsal dbang po gsal// gsal ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lha klu yi dgas 'dre srin
135a1(rgyud): / sogs// gnod sbyin 'byung pos 'di thos na// sdug bsngal zhi nas bde bar 'gyur// gangs rgyud bzhin du dkar bar 'gyur// dashel dkar bzhin du gtsang bar 'gyur// 9
135a2(rgyud): long bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur// nam mkha' bzhin du dang bar 'gyur// sa dang mkha' la 'khod pa yid// lha klu la sogs sde brgyad kun// dge ba'i bsam pas 'khod 'gyur te// gzhan la ma gnod zhibar
135a3(rgyud): mdzod// khro bo'i rgyal po sde brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ba ya na ma ma hA rA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags/
135a4(rgyud): pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo tang bzung
135a5(rgyud): chen po na chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ bkur nas mngon par dga' bar byas
135a6(rgyud): ba'ang de nyid du 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gis sems can rnams dbugs 'byin cing / shar phyogs na me sde kun tu 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i bad+ma'i gdan la
135a7(rgyud): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs na stobs po che lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa gcig na ni rnga yab thogs/ lag pa gcig gis ni phyag 'tshal/ g.yas pa na ni be con thogs/ g.yon pa na ni zhags
135b1(rgyud): bathogs pa/ ska kham pa chen du 'ardzes pa/ mig dmar pa'o// der 'an na bcom ldan 'das do 'dzin 'a'ar dang bcas pa'o// sayonan na rag sngags kyi rnam pa gnod mangs so// gamadun
135b2(rgyud): bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro// de nas snying po rnams ni zla ba kham pa lta bur gzhag go// snying po ni ko le ki le dang / 'gro lding ba'i gzungs dang / lus dmar po dang / rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa dang / rdo rje'i rgyan chen te/
135b3(rgyud): snying po'i mchog go// rig sngags kyi rgyal po drag po chen po dang nye ba na ni 'phags pa mA ma kI'o// 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi 'og na ni rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud do// sgo'i nang logs su ni khro ba
135b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i tho ba dang rdo rje'i be con gnyis mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ g.yon logs su ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa'o// bcos ldan 'das kyi g.yas
135b5(rgyud): logs su ni gos dkar mo'o// de'i 'og tu ni sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can no// g.yon du rig sngags kyi rgyal po rta mgrin dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong dang ngo //
135b6(rgyud): de bzhin du shar phyogs su ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / yul 'khor srung dang / dbang po'o// me'i phyogs na ni me'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis bskor ba'o// lho phyogs su ni gshin rje dang khyab 'jug go// bden bral
135b7(rgyud): phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po ma mos bskor ba'o// nub phyogs su ni klu'i bdag po kA la sogs pas bskor ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su ni rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byang phyogs su ni lus ngan po 'khor dang /
136a1(rgyud): bcas pa'o// dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni dbang bdag tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / khyab 'jug dang / tshangs pa chen po// de la sogs pa
136a2(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag dang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te snga ma bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
136a3(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mdo sde 'di sgrub pa po 'di la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na
136a4(rgyud): rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ki li ki li badz+ra/ kI li kI la ya swA hA/ spyi gtsug la swA hA/ dpral ba la swA hA/ mig la swA hA/ drag shul can la swA hA/ shin tu drag shul can la swA hA/ rdo rje'i zhags
136a5(rgyud): pa la swA hA/ lus dmar po la swA hA/ lag na rdo rje la swA hA/ lag na zhags pa la swA hA/ lag na ral gri la swA hA/ lag na dgra sta la swA hA/ gzhu 'dzin la swA hA/ gtun shing 'dzin la swA hA/ lag na 'khor lo
136a6(rgyud): la swA hA/ lag na mdung rtse gsum la swA hA/ snying po laM swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po la swA hA/ drag po la swA hA/ ki lI ki lA ya swA hA/ byis pa ka lo ki la yA swA hA/ dmar po kA li kI la la swA hA/ stobs po che la swAH/
136a7(rgyud): ras me can la naH/ gsus 'byung po yi swA / grob 'tsham pa sa sA r+tha/ gshin rje bAdz+ra/ srin pa la~M swAhA/ srin pa la sun la hAH/ drag pa chen pa la swA hA/ sprin leswA hA/ de 'dzin la hAH/
136b1(rgyud): rib tang bzung 'dzin la swA hA/ rdo rje'i mtshan la swA hA/ 'jigs byed chen po la swA hA/ lus 'jigs byed la sAH/ sdigs byed ma swA hA/ na rje'i sug chud la swA hA/ na rje'i gtan pa la sAn/ rdo rje sus
136b2(rgyud): la swA hA/ 'gro lding ba la swA hA/ bdud rtsi la swA hA/ dka' thub 'dzin la swA hA/ lcags kyu la swA hA/ don yod la swA hA/ gtsug tor rgyal po la swA hA/ mdog dkar po la swA hA/ sngo bsangs mdog la swA hA/
136b3(rgyud): 'byung po la swAhA/ glang po'i swA hA/ bgrang 'phel gyi lag pa la swAhA/ bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la swA hA/ sbrul gyi ska rags can la swAH/ rdo rje'i bur pa la b+hU hA/ ga pa gnyis kA la swA hA/
136b4(rgyud): a rdo rje la swA hA/ 'bar ba'i 'od byed pa la swA hA/ blo gros brtan pa'i rdo rje la swA hA/ myu gu la swA hA/ 'od byed la swA hA/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa la swA hA/ rdo rje'i dra ba la swA hA/ rdo rje 'jigs byed/
136b5(rgyud): swAhA/ ru me chur ma swAhA/ smin rnam par 'thor ba la swA hA/ char pa rnam par ldan pa la swAhA/ da dza~M lhag sak+Sha la swA / rdo rje'i gang po la swA hA/ rtse pa'i ming po la swAng+ge/ mthar ram
136b6(rgyud): ma hAhA/ btson gyi rgyal po me swA hA/ ga cha'i rgyam po la swAH/ oM b+hi sa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gan du sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po las na rdo rje drug pa la phyag 'tshal lo// oM
136b7(rgyud): tha/ (Sh+Tha Sh+T+r-i/ ba/ rkyen tan/ oM tra m+bu AH/ oM ma las 3/ yul 'khor srungs AN+DaH/ mig mi bang la snam/ 'phags skyem pas mawaM/ pas na pal /
137a1(rgyud): dbang po la sa/ mam+b+has AH/ drang srong chen du thams cad lan hA/ sa la swAhA/ rdu sa smras/ na rjes r+b+ba / 'dag sa sa na/ dran pa'i bdag pa sa /
137a2(rgyud): klu'i bdag po la swA hA/ rlung lha la swA hA/ dbang bdag la swA hA/ dbang ba dag gi chung ma la swA hA/ brgya byin la swA hUM/ nor lha'i bu la swA hA/ rdo rje chen po la swA hA/ tshangs pa chen po la swA hA/ sa la swA hA/
137a3(rgyud): dbyangs can la swA hA/ lha mo dpal la swA hA/ lha mo dka' thub pa zlog la swA hA/ rig sngags chen po stobs po che'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su 'chang zhing yid la byed na srung
137a4(rgyud): ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro// las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge
137a5(rgyud): 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas brtan blo gros chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang
137a6(rgyud): dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ su na su ni/ ma hA ru ni/ ki ma~M ka~M li/
137a7(rgyud): ma hA ki li ki la/ d+hi ke/ ka Ta ka Ta ka Ta/ ma hA ka Ta/ sha ma sha ma sha ma/ ma hA sha ma/ shA tri shA tri shA tri/ shAn+ta shAn+ta shAn+ta/ dAn+ta dAn+ta dAn+ta/ d+hi ra d+hI ra d+hi ra/ ma hA ma g+ha du d+ha ra/ ha ri ha ri ha ri/ gu N+Di kuts+tsha
137b1(rgyud): / / sa/ sa sa sna/ par shAr ra/ sram san na/ sa krAk+ka ts+tshan+dar+m+ma/ mA s+yA s+phA
137b2(rgyud): hUM d+hA hUM/ tsi ho ha~M/ phaTab Ta baT/ sha pa ris pa rig pa ri/ ma tAM ga~M/ tsaN+Da li/ mA huh+ya/ dzaHdza hra dz+ra hwA/ hatapra t+yats+tshin/ mi gyi mgyil/ phaTab Ta phaT/ hrIn+da tISh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tiSh+Tha.a ta~MSh+Tha \u0f7f TI/
137b3(rgyud): mA ti pra ma tha/ ma tAM gi/ hUM hUM hUM/ he he he/ gal te mi 'dug na lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / kha dang / med pa dang / mig dang / snying dang / ngag thams cad btsong ngo // dbrog go// dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/
137b4(rgyud): duMdu d+hu du d+hu duM d+hu/ baM d+hu baM d+hu bi d+hu/ nI la nI la nI lAM ga badz+ra d+ha ra/ stobs po che zhes bya ba'i snying po dran par gyis shig/ ko Ti ko Ti ko Ti ni/ sar+b+ba b+hU tA ni/ badz+ra nA ni/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ badz+ra aT+Ta hA sa
137b5(rgyud): tsar+d+ha nan+ta marbu/ ku ru ku ru ku ru/ hu ru hu ru hu ru/ sems can chen po dran par gyis shig/ hUM hUM hUM/ he he he/ paT phaT phaT/ tsaN+DA tsaN+Du tsar+t+ti/ ma hA tsar+N+Na/ hu Nu hu Nu hu Nu/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/
137b6(rgyud): gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ badz+ra pA Ni/ ha na ha na ha na/ na ma sarba sha tA NA na/ mUrti tA Ta ya phaT/ ku ru ku ru ku ru/ lag na rdo rje'i las dnga'agal bar ma byed cig/ dam tshig las 'gal bar byas na dam tshig
137b7(rgyud): bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bslus par 'gyur ro/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no// tsu tsu tsu/ ha ra ha ra/ pud+d+ha pud+d+ha pun+tu/ ta pa ni ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pa tsan btsa ni pa tsa ni/ lag/
138a1(rgyud): na rdo rje'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis shig/ tsi li tsi li tsi li/ phu lu phu lu phu lu/ phu phu phu/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi snying /
138a2(rgyud): po 'di dang 'gal bar bgyis na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa'i mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan par gyur cig/ dar phu/ tsa ra phuH nar phu/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
138a3(rgyud): bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin gzi brjid chen po la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT pa
138a4(rgyud): phaT swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'bar ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
138a5(rgyud): khams las 'das nas bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur par kun tu snang ngo // de ltar gyur pa dang / bdud sdig can ral
138a6(rgyud): gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang / mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rnams lag na thogs te bgegs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa du ma byed do// de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu
138a7(rgyud): thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das ka la bzhugs pa der dong ngo // de nas de ltar gyur pa dang / khro bo 'chol ba mdog dmar po/ sbrang rtsi ltar mig dmar ser po/
138b1(rgyud): mche ba gtsigs pa/ mi bzad pa/ skra kha ma pa gyen du brdzes pa ka lag pa g.yas pa na be con thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/ shar/
138b2(rgyud): phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ka'i klung nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das shing / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su'ang kun tu snang ngo // de nas bdud sdig can dang / bgegs bye ba khrag khrig
138b3(rgyud): brgya stong phrag brgya khro bo 'chol pas 'dar bar gyur to// bdud sdig can myos shing gzir te 'phongs nas srog la mi lta ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings so// de ltar
138b4(rgyud): gyur pa dang / de'i tshe 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs la sogs pas/ bcom ldan
138b5(rgyud): 'das la ci nus kyis mchod nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te mngon
138b6(rgyud): par dga' bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rang ba mdzad pas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rig sngags mchog gi rgyud chen
138b7(rgyud): po'i nang nas don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ stobs po che stobs chen po'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so//
139a1(rgyud): gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ bsti stang du byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod/
139a2(rgyud): par byed na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyis byas pa'i gsang sngags thams cad bshig pa dang / bcom pa dang / bsgyel bar yang 'gyur ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo
139a3(rgyud): rje 'dzin gyis rig sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas 'byung ba smras so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad pas/ don 'dod pa thams
139a4(rgyud): cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bi dz+nyA sa ya/ dza bi lo bo d+hA ra/ oM tsu tha kro d+harmA/
139a5(rgyud): phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs la
139a6(rgyud): thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ rim gror bgyid dam/ mchod par bgyid na dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro//
139a7(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ stobs po che'i snying po 'dzin pa la ni gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am/ srin po 'am/ srin po'i bu 'am/ grul bum mamagrul bum gyi bu
139b1(rgyud): 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ nam mkha' lding gi bu 'am/ klu 'am/ klu'i bu 'am/ dri za 'am/ dri za'i bu 'am/ sha za 'am/ sha za'i bu 'am/ smyo byed dam/ smyo byed kyi bu 'am/ mkha' 'gro 'am/ mkha'
139b2(rgyud): 'gro'i bu 'am/ sgrub pa 'am/ sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa dang / brjed byed dam/ lus srul po dang / ro langs la sogs pa dang / gnon po'i gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed la sogs pa'i gdon
139b3(rgyud): thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje legs so legs so//
139b4(rgyud): stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid do// phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid do// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i
139b5(rgyud): bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// gang mdo sde 'di rab tu ston pa de mchod par bgyi ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / rim gror bgyi ba dang / bskor ba bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur pa lags so//
139b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa
139b7(rgyud): drag shul can/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ti ni nA da/ hUM hUM hUM/ oM oM oM/ phaT phaT phaT/ stobs po che la swA hA/ oM rdo rje khro bo stobs po che/ ha na da ha pa tsa/ ma tha bi ki ra/ bi d+h+wa na sa
140a1(rgyud): ya dza zil po da ra/ u tsutra k+Sho d+hahU~M phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sar+b+ba duSh+pA/ staM d+ha ya/ staM b+hA ya/ dA rA rA duShAn ni bA ra ya/ bdag la srungs shig sungs shig swA hA/ oM a nan+ta/
140a2(rgyud): bi dza ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da/ hUM phaT swA hA/ oM d+h+rig hUM phaT/ oM shr-i re le/ shi ro mA li ni/ si ni si ni/ shi shi ni shi shi ni/ oM sar+b+ba At+ma dza/ ma hA te dza badz+ra / a sha ni badz+ra/ pA sha a nu pra bi sh+tsa/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta/
140a3(rgyud): staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ hUM phaT/ oM hUM ban+d+ha ban+de hUM/ oM a nan+ta/ bi dza la/ ma hA tsaN+De/ hUM phaT/ oM phaT phaT phaT/ badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ka d+ha ka ri ka ra ka ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+haH
140a4(rgyud): ma hA ba la d+ha ka d+ha ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM bi pu ra/ rak+Sha badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM phaT/ oM ki li ki li/ badz+ra badz+ri b+hu ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ A ka R+Sha ya/ hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba
140a5(rgyud): ya da ra da ra/ dA ra ya dA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na ha na/ da ra da ra/ dA ra ya dA ra ya/ pa Ta ya pa Ta ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ta Ta ta Ta/ tA Ta ya tA Ta/
140a6(rgyud): ya/ hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ di pya di pya/ dI pa ya dI pa ya/ hUM phaT/ oM tsu ru tsu ru/ u tsuSh+pa kro d+ha/ shi kha ra ha ra ha ra/ hUM phaT/ dkon mchog ga sum la
140a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA tsaN+DA/ ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bi ki ra/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ bcom ldan 'das tshu ra gshegs tshur
140b1(rgyud): gshegs/ ha na ha na/ ha ra ha mad ha da ha/ patsa pa tsa/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi bdag pos mchod pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa/ gzi brjid chen po/ su ru su ru/ mu ru su ru
140b2(rgyud): ku ru ku ru / g+hu ru g+hu ru/ kur+b+ba kur+d+ha/ ma hA kurba/ bi kurba/ ku naT+Ti ku nan+di/ na Tin Ti/ shi ni shi ni/ khi ni khi ni/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ku ru ku ru/ tu Ta tu Ta/ tu Tu tur+tha/ trar+tha tra T+Ta/ tu ru tu ru/ 'byung /
140b3(rgyud): po'i bdag po/ klu'i bdag po/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer rnam par 'joms par byed pa khro bo 'chol pa stobs po che/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ su ru su ru/ hUM phaT/ ha na ha nA/ hUM phaT/
140b4(rgyud): da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ ri hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ oM tsu lu tsu lu swA hA/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ sar+b+ba duSh+TAM/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ hU~M phaT/ oM ha ha/ sar
140b5(rgyud): sa ra khaM sa ra bi sa ra/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ oM ba~M sa ra/ san+d+ha sa ya hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha ra ha ra/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ nA sha ya nA sha ya hUM phaT/ hUM hUM/ mA mA/ mA ma phaT/ oM d+h+r-ika kro d+han
140b6(rgyud): bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ oM ma hA pa la/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hUM phaT/ swA hA/ oM dz+wa la gra sa/ u tsuSh+pa sA ga ra hUM/ rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang bsrung
140b7(rgyud): ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro// lag ni rdo rjes smras pa/ gang gzungs 'di 'chang ba ni dge bar 'gyur/ dug mi gnod par 'gyur/ shi bsos par
141a1(rgyud): byed par 'gyur/ dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bu mang bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs kyang 'gas par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'grub
141a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa rnams la ni sbyor chus 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dug thams cad kyang dug ma yin par byed par 'gyur ro// mngal
141a3(rgyud): na gnas pa'i khye'u dang bu mo'ang bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro// mdo sde 'di zhag gsum bcangs na rgyas par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun bcangs na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po'i
141a4(rgyud): bdag po dbang bdag rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rkang
