141a5(rgyud): pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// stobs po che'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ stobs dpag tu med pas pa
141a6(rgyud): rol gnon pa/ lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / tshangs pa'i dbang pos phyag byas pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / ro langs dang / lus srul po 'jigs par byed/
141a7(rgyud): pa smyo byed dang / skrod pa dang / gsod pa dang / skem byed dang / sgo glegs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ dkyil 'khor
141b1(rgyud): gsang ba dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshad du gsol/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis/ 'byung po'i bdag po dbang bdag la 'byung po'i
141b2(rgyud): bdag po legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje sbar te/ rdo rje la bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas
141b3(rgyud): rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo chen po bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
141b4(rgyud): dang / 'od zer 'bar zhing snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi dga' ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud thams cad kyi yul 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i
141b5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sku/
141b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes rngom pag can du rdo rje sbar ste/ de na
141b7(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma la gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas/ rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo 'chol ba lus sbrul gyi ska rags kyis brgyan
142a1(rgyud): pa dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu khro bo 'chol pas bgegs bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma 'dar te gzir ba
142a2(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo // de dag tsho ga nas sme zhing srog btang ste/ sreg pa'i bskal pa snyam du sems shing nyam thag pa'i skad kyis ngus te/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i gan du song nas
142a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo 'chol bas gzir cing myos te
142a4(rgyud): 'phongs nas srog la'ang mi blta'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la smras pa/ kye ma'o khro bo chen
142a5(rgyud): po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// mthu che ba'o// de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ kye ma'o khro bo chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// mthu che ba'o// de nas bcom ldan
142a6(rgyud): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lha stangs kyis bltas nas/ 'byung po'i bdag po khro bo 'chol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa smras pa/ oM badz+ra kroH/
142a7(rgyud): ma hA ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ dza Ti laM bo d+ha ra/ u tsuSh+pa kro d+ha hUM phaT/ a aM mA hA swAhA/ grogs po dag gang la la zhig khro za stobs po che 'di'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na de'i don thams cad
142b1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'chi bas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la drag po'i las dang nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de la bgegs dang / mi dang / rnam par log 'dren gyis/
142b2(rgyud): grags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro// 'dir zhugs na gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// khro bo thams cad kyi cho ga'ang
142b3(rgyud): lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dir dbang bskur na bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo chen po lan
142b4(rgyud): khris sngar spyad pa byas te/ khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor byed pa/ byas pa gzo ba/ rgyud shes pa/ gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ gsum la skyabs su dong ba/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa/ byams
142b5(rgyud): pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje can du gyur pa/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ dbang bskur ba/ tha ma rnams kyis lung byin pa/ gang bdud thams cad dang sdang ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ rig sngags
142b6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa de bdud dang dgra thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dag sa dang / sha za dang / lus srul po dang / mkha'
142b7(rgyud): 'gro dang / brjed byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro//
143a1(rgyud): gsad pa dang bcing ba thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// gcad pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / rmongs byed la sogs pa'i 'jigs
143a2(rgyud): pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// klu'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// sems can dbul po gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam
143a3(rgyud): grangs 'di dus gsum du 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ rjes su dran par byed na dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// monyes pa byung ba'i tshe stobs po che lan bdun
143a4(rgyud): bklags na sprin chen po las char 'bab bo// gal te char mi 'baban sbyin gyi lha rnams kyi srog bskams par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po 'khor lo dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas
143a5(rgyud): la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis sprin chen po las char 'bebs so// gal te char mi 'bebs na srog bskams par 'gyur ro// gong du smos pa'i cho ga bzhin du phyogs kyi cha'am/ klung gi ngogs sam/
143a6(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i 'gram mam/ mchod rten gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa chen po byas te/ tsan dan dmar po dang / ka ra wI ra'i me tog dang / pad+ma dmar
143a7(rgyud): po dang / a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po la sogs pas sam/ bum pa spos chus bkang ba la sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang klog de g.yul ngo
143b1(rgyud): thams cad du zhugs kyang pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// stobs po che rgyal
143b2(rgyud): mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul ngor song na pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags gro ga la bris te spyi bor btags na g.yul ngor mtshon cha rnams me tog bzhin du lhung bar 'gyur
143b3(rgyud): ro// de nas bdud des bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ stobs po che zhes bgyi ba ci lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
143b4(rgyud): sprul pa/ stobs po che zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos so// stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phung po'o// stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi tshul lo//
143b5(rgyud): stobs po che zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'o// stobs po che zhes bya ba ni lag na rdo rje'o// de nas bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// skyabs
143b6(rgyud): su mchi'o// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// dge bsnyen gyi yan lag gzung bar bgyi'o// bde dang thar dang mtho
143b7(rgyud): ris dang // mkhas pa dag dang sems can ni// dam pa kun la phan pa'i phyir/ stobs po che ni gzung bar bgyi// de nas bdud sdig can chos la dga' zhing yid bde ba dang rangs par gzigs//
144a1(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i mdo sde 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas
144a2(rgyud): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal las thar par byed pa'o// de bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur lha'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro// bskal pa mtha' yas par gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur/
144a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog par byed do// rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i snying po 'di ni gtsang sbra can nam/ gtsang sbra med pa 'am/ smyung bar byas
144a4(rgyud): pa'am/ smyung bar ma byas pa 'am/ 'khrig pa'i chos la brten pa la'ang 'grub par byed do// de la bar chad du mi 'gyur ro// de nas rab 'byor 'khor de nyid na 'dug par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das/
144a5(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi// dam pa ni ci zhig stsol ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje la dri ba dris shig/ rab 'byor gyis
144a6(rgyud): smras pa/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ni ci zhig sbyin par byed/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'bru sbyin par byed do// gos sbyin par byed do// dngul
144a7(rgyud): sbyin par byed do// gser sbyin par byed do// ba glang sbyin par byed do// dam pa gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de sbyin par byed do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ spyi'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lag na rdo rjes smras//
144b1(rgyud): pa rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ sems can nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa rnams ni 'bras bu'i dus su gnas so// 'azas bu'i dus kyis yon tan gyi don du gnas so// yon tan gyi don mos tha na med pa/
144b2(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la 'jog par byed do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ldan pa ste// stobs po che ni shes rab ldan/
144b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs// spyi nas dbang bskur yid kyang gzhungs// mtshan dang yang dag ldan pa ste/ sbyin dang tshul khrims shes rab che/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che//
144b4(rgyud): cher grags shing bsod nams che// yon tan rtse mo stobs po che// mdo sde 'di la dbang bskur phyir// sangs rgyas brgyad stong der gshegs so// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes mdo sde 'di
144b5(rgyud): nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa spyi bor bzhag ste dge ba byed par 'gyur ro// gang gis gzungs 'di sa 'am/ ri 'am/ klung gi ngogs sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bcangs na 'jigs pa thams
144b6(rgyud): cad kyi 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang/
144b7(rgyud): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bro nad ma mchis par lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/
145a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ chos kyi nyi ma zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ chos kyi zla ba
145a2(rgyud): zhes par yang zung zhig/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ sdig pa thams cad byung bar byed pa'i/
145a3(rgyud): gzungs sngags zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ chos kyi
145a4(rgyud): dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya bar yang phung zhig/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su
145a5(rgyud): mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / bsti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des 'das pa dang /
145a6(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi mchod rten
145a7(rgyud): sku gdung dang bcas pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// shin tu zab pa'i chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul gyi yon
145b1(rgyud): tan gyi rgyan gyi chos bstan pa gzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de la sdang ba'i sems can/
145b2(rgyud): rnams chu 'gran gyi shing ltar ma rungs par 'gyur ro// spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs la sogs pas mchod pa byas na bsod nams kyi phung po dpag
145b3(rgyud): tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de la bar chod mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mdo sde 'dig nas gang yang rung ba na 'chang na/ lha dang mir bcas pas mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// rig sngags
145b4(rgyud): kyi rgyal po stobs po che bgegs dang rnam par log 'dren thams cad 'ching ba yid la byed na/ sangs rgyas brgyad stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / drang srong chen po
145b5(rgyud): rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / dri zar bcas pa rnams dgyes dga' 'o// stobs po che'i gzungs sngags 'di la dgyes pa'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka
145b6(rgyud): stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di la gus par mi byed pa de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su
145b7(rgyud): sde 'di la gus par byed pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yi ger 'dri'am chog mnyan na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
146a1(rgyud): kyi lam 'thob par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ thub pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ shin tu dra ba/ shin tu zab pa khasam gyis mi khyab pa la sems can/
146a2(rgyud): rnams kyi nang nas gang log par sems pa de myos par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir mdo sde 'di
146a3(rgyud): bshad par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa bsal ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / rgyas par bya ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar par bya ba dang / dpal gyis
146a4(rgyud): byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya'o// de'i phyir de bzhin
146a5(rgyud): gshegs pa brgyad stong dang bar mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba mdzad de/ thal mo sbyar nas legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so zhes mngon par dgyes
146a6(rgyud): par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ sangs rgyas de dag la slar gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das dag legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/
146a7(rgyud): stsal pa/ stobs po che'i gsang ba'i chos bstan pa 'di'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes sdang ba'i bgegs dang rnam par log 'dren thams cad kyi snying 'dar zhing 'gul bar mthong /
146b1(rgyud): ngo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM ha na ha na badz+ra / da ha da ha badz+ra/ btsa pa tsa badz+ra nam tha mtha/
146b2(rgyud): dz+wa la dz+wa la/ su ru su ru ka mu ru mu ru ka TaM ka Te/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a dzi te/ a pa rA dzi te/ ma ra se n+ya pra marda ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rnam par
146b3(rgyud): log 'dren thams cad sdigs shig/ chings shig chings shig / rnam par choms shig/ ma grub pa rnams grub par gyis shig/ grub pa rnams dul bar gyis shig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
146b4(rgyud): dpa' thams cad 'bab par gyis shig/ lha dang klu thams cad tshur shog tshur shog/ ngas stobs po che khro bo'i mthus dge bar bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas/ bla
146b5(rgyud): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
146b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'du byed thams cad kyi mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig/
146b7(rgyud): 'du byed thams cad ni dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni glog dang sprin dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni khyim dang dbu ba dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni ma ra me dang 'dra'o//
147a1(rgyud): 'du byed thams cad ni chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni chu shing dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni ri mo'i rnam pa dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni me tog dang
147a2(rgyud): 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni rmi la ma dang 'dra'o// 'du byed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo dang 'dra'o// 'du byed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi klung dang 'dra'o// 'khrug par 'gyur bas
147a3(rgyud): rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o// skar ma dang 'dra'o// sems can rnams ni 'du byed 'di dag skye bar mi sems/ mi mthong / mi shes/ mi 'jal gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gzigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis
147a4(rgyud): 'jal lo// de bzhin gsheg pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// 'du byed thams cad ni stong pa nyid du mtshan nyid gcig par mkhyen to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
147a5(rgyud): kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
147a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid 'di nyid mthong zhing mtshan nyid 'di shes te// spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam/
147a7(rgyud): gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// mtshan nyid 'di nyid shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
147b1(rgyud): phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di mtshan nyid gang gis na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi/
147b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// mtshan nyid
147b3(rgyud): des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di yongs su nub pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su nub par 'gyur te/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// mdo sde
147b4(rgyud): 'di 'tsho zhing sdod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'ang 'tsho zhing sdod de/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mdo sde 'di nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan
147b5(rgyud): nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das la rjes su yi rang nas bka' lung bzhin bgyi zhing / su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i gan du mchis
147b6(rgyud): zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyang 'ong ngo // lha thams cad kyis 'di skad ces
147b7(rgyud): gsol to// legs so legs so// bdag cag kyang dam pa stsal bar mngon par dga' ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang dam pa 'di nyid stsol ba mdzad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
148a1(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stobs po che'i gsang ba'i snying po ni sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan
148a2(rgyud): 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis na mdo sde 'di chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan
148a3(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i nyin mo ri btang bzung chen por mdo sde 'di nyid kyi chos bstan te/ mtshan nyid de//
148a4(rgyud): na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas te/ mtshan nyid des na chos kyi dbyings
148a5(rgyud): sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rgyun du zhugs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang glog pa de la de zhin gshegs
148a6(rgyud): pa thams cad sras su 'du shes skyed do// 'khor de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par mdzad do// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba
148a7(rgyud): bgrod dkar sems can gyi// srid pa'i pu ra ba 'byin cing shes rab kyis/ srid phur sems krung 'joms shing thub pa yi// chos bstan pas ni sdig 'joms chos legs spyod// bcom ldan
148b1(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje lags par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang
148b2(rgyud): dag par rab tu ston pas bsod nams kyi phung po ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang
148b3(rgyud): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa ni ting nge 'dzin bye ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
148b4(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos bsti stang byed par 'gyur ro// bla mar byed par 'gyur ro// rim
148b5(rgyud): gror byed par 'gyur ro// mchod par byed par 'gyur ro// chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyang 'bul lo// byang chub sems dpa' la'ang bde bar
148b6(rgyud): sbyar ba sgrub bo// dge 'dun gyi tshogs la'ang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
148b7(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de dag gis chos bstan pa de la'ang bsti stang du byas te nyan to// 'dzin to// klog go// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ji
149a1(rgyud): lta ba dang mtshungs par stobs kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// stobs po chel rol gnon pa'i khro ba 'di'i mthus bdag dang sems can thams cags stes ste/ maN+Da sa d+d+hi swA tra/ bcom
149a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams
149a3(rgyud): cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po
149a4(rgyud): dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lag ni rdo rje 'ang bcom/
149a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/
149a6(rgyud): khrims su n+nak+ShaH/ zod ska dang / 'phags ma rnaM rjes su rgyu ma'i rgyun gyi rtog gdangs 'jig rten dbang thugs phyag 'tsham ma// de nas yang dag byag dpag dab nga bye thug
149a7(rgyud): byed cig// rang ba tshogs sa ma mi ga/ tshig mngasas sa sogs pa na// lus dang gtsang spa dang bral zhing // dka'agro btsud pa rnams spangs nas// dras du ma sems kyimi g.yeng rnams na
149b1(rgyud): brjod pa tsam gyis sbyar du 'gru // dad pa brtson 'grus kyis brgyan cing // khag yod snying rje cher ldan pa// des ni tham mi spong la// dpa' brtul shes rab des pa che/ 'grol byams sems che ba des// sngags/
149b2(rgyud): dang ting 'dzin phyag rgya tshegs// brtsams pa tsam la dngos grub 'byung // dad med la lo rnam 'tshe can// bla ma la ni mi gus shing // shes rab zhan cing stobs chung la// ngag med gzhan la gnod sems bcas
149b3(rgyud): dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob na// des ni bskal pa stong phrag ni// bye ba du mar bsgrubs byas kyang // 'bras bu yod par mi 'gyur te// dper na byis pa blun po 'gas// 'bras 'dod phub ma brdungs pa la/
149b4(rgyud): sha thang chad pa nyid las ni// nam yang 'bras yod mi 'gyur ro// gsang sngags rgyal po rgyal chen 'di/ byin rlabs rnam mang 'byung ba'o// de nas bcom ldan bde chen po// nges par 'grub pa zhes bya ba/
149b5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs// rdo rje bla na med pa las// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di byung ngo // na mo b+ha ga ba t+yaM/ badz+ra shriM kha le/ han ha na/ da ha da ha/ ts+tshin+dats+tshi m+bad+ha
149b6(rgyud): b+ham+ba mA ra ya mA ra ya/ khA sa ya hi to// rak+ta ak+Shi badz+ra g+ho N+De/ na mo b+hag wa t+yaM/ badz+ra shriM kha le/ bur+d+ha di shwa/ badz+ra drA ka re Na ba~Md+ha/ da/ ri gar+b+ha r+dz+dza prA kA ra Na bar+d+haH/ nga gyi ma di ga s+dza lA prA ka ra Na ba~M d+hi/ uSh+Tar/
149b7(rgyud): sa ra prA ka ra Na bas+t+ra/ ats+tshe sha ag+ni prA kA ri Ni ban+d+ha/ nair tu sha~M kha na prA kA re Na ban+d+ha/ bA ya byA di sha~M dA ta pA kA re Na ban+d+ha/ mA~M shAn di shau tri shU la drA kA ri Na ban+d+haH/ pA tA la~M daM sha~M nA ga dA shen ban+d+ha
150a1(rgyud): Ur d+h+wa di sho badz+ra shriM kha lA prA kA re Na ban+d+ha/ Uts+tsha ban+d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ id badz+ra kr-i khas/ man+te r+Na da sha sha ba d+haH/ yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa~M ban+d+haH/ brah+ma rAk+ShA sA dI nA~M bad+haH/ b+hU ta pra ta bi shA tsa~M bat+ta/
150a2(rgyud): gaM d+harba ban+d+haH/ gaM d+harma ku laM ban+d+ha/ sa na ta ku mA ra ban+d+ha/ sa nA taM ku mA ra d+hu ba naM ban+d+ha/ bid+d+ha d+ha raM ban+d+ha/ na gu shra ma Ni ban+d+ha/ na gu sh+yA ma Na daR+sha ni ban+ta/ sar+b+ba tir+thi kaM ban+d+ha/ sar+b+ba tIr+b+r-i ka daR+sha naM ban+d+haH/ siH
150a3(rgyud): byA g+haM ban+d+ha \u0f7f/ yak+Shi NAM ban+d+ha/ rAk+Sha si ban+d+haH/ b+hU ti nai ban+d+ha/ pi shA tsi nI mAm+nA/ gan+d+harba m+ban+naH/ kA mu nA ya nI bin+d+haH/ ka Ta TA ki nim+ban+d+haH/ krIn+da raM ban+d+ha/ khe tsa rI m+ban+taH/ sha ku nI ban+d+haH/ dai baM ban+d+ha/ de ba ku laM ban+d+hiH/ nAH/
150a4(rgyud): ban+d+ha/ nA ga ku laM ban+taH/ a su raM ban+d+haH/ a su ra ku laM ban+d+haH/ ga ru Tas+san+taH/ ga ru Ta ku la mAn+naH/ bik+ShaM ban+d+haH/ pak+Shi ga NaM ban+d+han+taH/ kin+da raM ban+d+hiH/ kin+da ra b+hu ba naM ban+d+haH/ mA nu ShaM ban+d+haH/ mA nu Sha b+hu ba naM ban+d+haH/ a mA/
150a5(rgyud): nu ShaM ban+d+haH/ a mA nu Shi d+hu banaM dan+taH/ tsan+d+ra di t+yaM ban+d+ha/ tsan+thi di t+ya b+hu ba naM bir+t+ta/ sar+b+ba ti ban+d+haH/ sar+b+ba ta ta laM ban+d+ha/ br-ik+Sha ma bim+b+ha/ br-ik+Sha ta li ban+d+ha/ swa ku le ban+ti/ pa ra gu l-i ban+d+haH/ mnas ka ta saM pa paH/
150a6(rgyud): sa ma pA dam+ma d+haH/ A ni mit+taM ban+d+haH/ ni mit+taM ban+d+haH/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta satwA nAMH/ badz+ra shr-i kha lA/ man+te Na ban+d+haH/ kum+b+hI raM ban+d+haH/ ma ka ra su su mA ra ban+d+haH/ dza laM ban+d+ha/ s+pha laM ban+d+haH/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti badz+ra shr-i kha 9
150a7(rgyud): hUM hUM hUM hUM hU~M hUM/ sar+b+ba duSh+TA na~M sad+g+ha ga pra t+yaM ga~M ba~M d+hiH/ dA da sha b+hu dzA yai/ dA da sha ne tra ye/ bi kAN+Di ke shA yai/ tsan+d+rA yaM/ a ne ka ra smi sha ta/ sa ha sra pra dz+wa li ta dI d+ha te dzA yai/ u gra bi bi d+ha bi Sha d+hA ri NI/ ud+d+hA ke hA
150b1(rgyud): gaM/ tsa pa la ye/ ta thA ga ta/ a pakA/ rI sa twA nA~M bas+thA/ a ma badz+ra rba~M kha lA/ san+te Na baN+Da ga ta/ yo dzan par bai tA badz+ra nr-i la wAn ban+d+ha/ pa ra su d+ha rbin+d+rA yen pA la~M ga lan bas+t+ra/ swa grA yA nI ban+d+ha/ tsaH
150b2(rgyud): ki nI m+b+han+naH/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ hu lu hu lu/ na mash+tsar+N+Na ma hA kro b+ha/ hUM hU~M a mA ta hUM hUM ban+d+haH/ aSh+mA shaM ti de ba ko n+do ni yu ti sha ta sa ha srA NI badz+ra shr-i kha le na ban+d+haH/ tri ko Na pri dzi bAM nA d+h+waM ba
150b3(rgyud): s+pho Ta ya ti swarga mA ta pA tA li bA su ki tA Ta ya ti/ bA taM baM d+haH/ me g+ha baM d+haH/ sar+b+ba traM ba d+haH/ ai dr-i bi d+haH/ i dra b+hA ba naM baM d+haH/ ba na spa ti ba b+haH/ ba naspa ti de baM baM d+haH/ e ka pA daM ban+d+haH/ dI pA daM baM d+haH/ tri bI daM bas+thA/
150b4(rgyud): tsa tuH/ pA daM ban+d+haH/ pany+tsa pA daM ban+d+ha/ Shan+ma daM ban+d+haH/ sha ta pA daM ban+d+haH/ sa ha sra pA daM ban+d+haH/ lak+Sha pA daM ban+d+haH/ sar+b+ba big+h+na na ban+d+haH/ sar+b+ba big+h+na ku laM ban+d+haH/ brah+ma ban+naH/ brah+ma b+hu ba naM ban+d+haH/ biSh+Nu ban+d+haH/ biSh+TaH/
150b5(rgyud): ba naM ban+d+haH/ ma he shwa raM ban+d+haH/ ma he shwa ra b+hu ba ni ban+d+haH/ ma hA de baM ban+d+haH/ ma hA de ba dza ta bA ma pA de nA bi kra mI ban+d+haH/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai badz+ra shr-i kha le di sha di shaM badz+ra prA kA re Na ban+d+haH/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hU~M hUM/ phaT piT
150b6(rgyud): phaT paTi phaT phaT swA hA/ rig sngags 'di nyid gsungs tsam gyis// rgya chen 'jig rten khams 'di rnams// rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur nas// lha dang lha mon srin bcis dang // gnod sbyin dri bgrul
150b7(rgyud): bu ma dang // mkha' lding lto 'phye lus srul po// klu dang mi 'am ci la sogs// tshogs rnams thams cad myos brgyal te// sa steng kha bub tu 'gyel nas// dbang po shin tu stor ba la// bde ba chen po
151a1(rgyud): 'od zer gyis// phog pa'i skad cig de ma thag/ dran pa sar rnyed ga zi mdangs skyes// de nas bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod// e ma'i bde ba che mchog dpal nyid las// rgyas pa/
151a2(rgyud): stobs skyes bkra shis kyi// lha mos hUM brjod tsam nyid las// nam mkha'i khams su grags par 'gyur// bde chen ye shes mnga' bdag nyid// rdo rje zhes pa'i mtshan ldan pa'i// lha mo lu gu rgyud ma
151a3(rgyud): la// bdag cag rnams kyis gus par 'dud// sku yi 'od zer sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa'i// 'od kyis bdag la bde ba skyes// lha mo bde ba khyod phyag 'tshal// stong nyid smon med//
151a4(rgyud): mtshan ma bral// rgyal ba kun gyi rig pa las// ya mtshan lha mo'i rang bzhin thugs// mi rtog rang bzhin phyag 'tshal lo// de rjes rgyal ba kun 'dus pa'i// gzugs sogs rig pa'i lha mo yis//
151a5(rgyud): 'khor lo 'di la legs mchod nas// mgrin gcig tu ni 'dus nas su// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi// rdo rje tshig gis bstod par byed// rdo rje nam mkha' las byung ba'i// sangs rgyas/
151a6(rgyud): thams cad skyes pa'i yum// spos bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin gsal// rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gzugs kyi sgra yis ni// lha tshogs ma lus rnam 'ching mdzad// bdud rnams tshar gcod/
151a7(rgyud): derje / ga nam ma la'i gsung sa phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gra drug bdud 'jam sa zhal drug ma// byinang rtan 'brel ngag phyir byag / zhag cing chung ba 'dzags par byed/ dza yul phyaga' tshal so//
151b1(rgyud): sa/ rnas sal / nas smra
151b2(rgyud): a A hU~M pha Ta swAT+Ta/ rig pa gzungs kyi 'byung ba'am// gsang sngags 'di kyang bshad tsam gyis// rims dang shupa gzhan pa dang // ldog pa ga bkram tshan 'bras// srad nad miganang rnand dang /
151b3(rgyud): nad glo mchin nad rnams dang // rgyu gzer snying nad mkhal nad dang // rkang lag nad dang khyab par na// chu ser nad dang khrag nad dang // bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa dang // shin tu 'khrugs pa'i nad la sakra/
151b4(rgyud): yams nad thams cad zhi bar byed// gzhan yang 'byung po brjed byed dang // sha za mkha' 'gro ma mo dang // gza' dang rgyu skar log 'dren dang // byad snyems drag po phyi rol gyi// rig sngags gtum
151b5(rgyud): po la sogs pa// 'jigs pa'i gnod pa thams cad kun// rlung gis sprin bzhin gtor bar byed// gzhan yang stag gzog dom dred dang // 'phar ba spyang ki gung po che// sre mong byi ba sbrul byi la// sbrang /
151b6(rgyud): bu mchu rings pa tre ka/ khwa dang se'u bru'u rta la sogs// 'jigs pa rnam mang ji snyed pa// gsang sngags 'di brjod thos tsam gyis// thag rings su ni skrod par byed// gnod pa rnam mang thams cad kya
151b7(rgyud): sngags kyi sbyor bas sel bar byed// gnod byas rnams ni gnod med byed// gnod med gnod dang ldan byed cing // sbyor ba yang ni sbyor ba 'gas// gzhan gyi sbyor ba 'ching bar byed// rdo rje lu gu chud/
152a1(rgyud): kyi rtog pa las/ gsang sngags bsten pa'i la'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'dir ni ba shad bya ba// mdzes ma rdo rdza rnam sa// ma ting 'dzin gyur nam/
152a2(rgyud): thig le chen mos mnyan par gyis// oM badz+ra shri khA le/ At+ma rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni bsrung ba dang // tha ma la rtog pa'i lus sbyong byed// snying khar zla steng hUM yig gi/ 'od kyis rigs
152a3(rgyud): kyi gtso mo dang // bla ma sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas// mdun du legs par de mig nas ni// snying kha sa bon 'od rtse las// me tog sogs 'dzin lha mos mchod// gzugs sogs rdo rje ma rnams kyis// 'dud
152a4(rgyud): cing so sor legs par mchod// thog ma med pa'i srid brgyud nas// lus ngag yid kyis spyad pa yi// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun// bgyis dang bgyid du stsal ba dang // bgyid la rjes su yi rang ba/
152a5(rgyud): sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun// thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi// slan chad mi bgyid sdom pa yang // rgya chen bdag gis gzung bar bya// rgyal ba sras bcas mdzad pa dang // 'gro ba'i
152a6(rgyud): dges rjes yi rang // rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // rigs ldan rdo rje lha mo dang // sngags chud rgya chen 'khor lal// gan nas dang bas sbubs su mchi// me rtag zla gros bskyed pa'i phyir/
152a7(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // gdul bya ji srid tshim pa ru// mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba 'debs// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya// gdod nas ji srid da ltar
152b1(rgyud): bar du lus 'dis cim byas// da ni srid pa'i rlung rtogs nas// rang gi lus 'di dbul bar bgyi// theg chen than med pa yi// lam chen rgya mtsho gang yin pa// theg chen 'bras bu thob bar du// rgyun mi 'am/
152b2(rgyud): par bsten par bya// de ltar dang sems 'dun byas te// bsod nams rgya chen rnams bsags pa'i// dge ba bla na med pa des// thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o// dang po byams pa'i 'od zer gyis// 'gro
152b3(rgyud): rnams bde la dgod par bya// gnyis pa snying rje'i 'od zer gyis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal 'bral sems bskyed// gsum pa dga' bas bde ba thob// bzhi pa chags bral btang snyoms so// de rjes rags pa'i sngob
152b4(rgyud): spong zhing // bag chags dri ma bsal nas kyang // nam mkha' lta bur sgrub byed pa'i// de nas dag pa rjes dran bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&ha~M/ de yis dag par byas nas ni// stong nyid/
152b5(rgyud): rjes su bsgom par bya// oM shUn tA dz+nyA nA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka&haM/ dngos pa thams cad ma lus par// nam mkha' lta bur bsgru par bya// de ri nir skyes nyid kyil 'khor// dmar po 'od zer 'khrigs
152b6(rgyud): pa sgom// de dbus hUM yig sngon pa yi// 'od kyis 'gro ba'i bdud bsas te// slar yang li ge la gzug par// rdo rje khrom yongs su rdzogs// zhas gsum phyag drug me dpung bzhugs// thugs kar/
152b7(rgyud): nyi mar ldan pasam// 'od kyis srung ba'i 'khoras bya// shar du ri rje lhor dbyug pa// nub tu mum byang du ma ngag/ bya bar tshe gsum shar snyam// lhor bar sa mi nu byang drung // 'og tu sna tshogs rdorje
153a1(rgyud): brag/ steng phyogs rdo rje rtse lnga'i gur// gsang sngags brjod pas bsgom par bya// hUM las 'od zer rab spros pas// 'khor lo bkod pa'i phyi rol tu// rdo rje rtse gsum ra ba dang //
153a2(rgyud): gur ni rab tu bsgom par bya// de rjes rdo rje khro mo ni// zhu nas rang bzhin med par gyur// de las nyi ma'i steng gnas pa'i// bdud bzhi mnan cing nyi zla ni// A li kA li las byung ba'o// bar du hUM las rdo rje
153a3(rgyud): ni/ khro mo'i rang bzhin 'od kyis bskor// khro mo dang bcas 'od zer rnams// rdo rje la bzhugs sku bzhengs te// zhal drug phyag drug zhabs drug gam// yang na zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi mnan// zhal kun
153a4(rgyud): sngo zhing khro gnyer can// dmar ser gyen skra thod 'phreng can// rdo rjes lus brgyan nam mkha'i mdog/ bcu gnyis phyag ste g.yas pa na// rdo rje zhags pa mda' gsor zhing // sbrul dang dgra sta gri gug
153a5(rgyud): 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu sdigs mdzub gzhu// dbyig pa rtse gsum tho ba'o// yang na phyag drug g.yas dang pos// rdo rje gnyis pas lcags sgrog ste// gsum pas mda' ni gsor bar byed// g.yon
153a6(rgyud): gyi dang pos sdigs mdzub ste// gnyis pa sbrul zhags 'dzin pa'o// gsum pas gzhu ste 'gengs pa'i tshul// rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma yi// bsam gtan ting 'dzin la gnas na// yon tan kun gyi bdag
153a7(rgyud): nyid kyi// sngags kyi rtsa bar 'gyur ba'o// sngags kyi bdag nyid yongs su bskyed// lha yi rang bzhin bsgrub pa yi// rin chen gzungs kyi 'phreng bas ni// chos rnams mtha' dag thob 'gyur te// ral
153b1(rgyud): gri mig sman ril bu dang // rkang pa byug dang gter chen dang // sa 'og 'gro dang bcud len dang // nam mkhar 'gro dang gser bsgyur dang // de bzhin sa gzhan 'gro ba dang // zhi dang rgyas dang dbang mngon/
153b2(rgyud): spyod// rmongs dang rengs dang bskrad pa dang // dbye dang dgug dang rig sngags 'ching // srung dang phyir thog chen po dang // zha dang lkugs dang sems brgyal dang // long dang sna tshogs nad bskyed pa'i// sbyor
153b3(rgyud): ba rgya chen 'grub pa dang // mngon shes drug po yongs skye zhing // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// phyag rgya chen po thob 'gyur na/ ltas mthong tsam la sogs pa yi// dngos grub phra mo spos ci dgos/
153b4(rgyud): sngags kyi sbyor ba bskyed pa'i lha// dmigs pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa yi// hUM las skyes pa'i lha mo ni// sngon mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma// g.yas pa ser zhing g.yon pa dmar// spyan gsum sdang mig
153b5(rgyud): khro gnyer can// dmar ser gyen sgra thod pas brgyan// rus pa'i rgyan gyis spras shing 'gying // thod pa'i 'phreng can klu yis brgyan// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum rol brdzis// phyag drug g.yas
153b6(rgyud): kyi dang po na// rdo rje gnyis pas gri gug ste// gsum pas sbrul gyi zhags pa 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po sdigs mdzub ste// gnyis pas thod pa gsum pa na// sbrul gyi zhags pa dkar po'o// yang na
153b7(rgyud): zhal kun sngob sangs nyid// 'dis ni 'ching dang dbang gi las// mtha' dag rdzogs par byed pa'o// srid par bram ze las skyes lha mo ni// sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yo//
154a1(rgyud): lcags sgrog/ gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan ldan pa// gsad pa'i las rnams thams cad ni// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma 'dis bsgrub// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// chos rnams thamra/
154a2(rgyud): cad 'byung byed cing // dngos grub myur du bskyed pa yi// phyag rgya 'byung zhes bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// yan lag phyag rgya bka' stsal pa// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas shing // slar la/
154a3(rgyud): khu tshur bcang byas te// rgyab gnyis sprad nas mdzub mo dang // mthe'u chung lcags sgrog bcing byas te// kha yi thad kar bzhag nas ni// rig pa 'phreng ba brjod pa yis// 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par
154a4(rgyud): byed phyag rgya bcings nas gsang sngags ni// rjes su dran par byas tsam gyis// lam du 'gro yang bde bar thar// gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed// 'phags ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i rgyud kyi rig
154a5(rgyud): sngags las// lha dang phyag rgya gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdzas kyi sbyor ba bla na med// mtshungs pa'i tsho gas kun 'grub byed pa/
154a6(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis con// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi'i ny+tsa tu maM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ dbang bskur ba ni bla na med// dri ma'i tshogs rnams dag byed cing // ji srid ye shes tshogs
154a7(rgyud): rgyas nas// rig pa'i rgyal po thob par byed// ma hUM Sha ho/ oM badz+ra puShe AHhU~M swA hA/ thAb/ dI pa/ gar+b+he/ ne li t+yai AHhUM swAH/ oM k+Sha hriHsa ka la/ g+han bi na wa re/ sh+ya byas pa ri wa ra/ a a a/ a d+hi Sha/
154b1(rgyud): a b+hi ta ran+tu/ sar+b+ba da sha da ka/ lo ka pA la/ lo ka pA la/ i maM ba mi grah+Na tra/ khadan+tu pi ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sr-i waM badz+ra DAk+ka A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rnam par rtog/
154b2(rgyud): pa spong bar byed// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma yis// bar gcod thams cad sel bar byed/ oM kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ gang zhig dbang pos yul mtshon pa'i// mtshon cha mtshan nyid rnam shes dang /
154b3(rgyud): ye shes nyid ni mngon sum du// skye ba nyid la the tsom med// de nas rgya chen sbyor ba'i gtso// 'khor lo'i cho ga bshad par bya// gro ga ras sam shing shun la// gur kum ge'u wang tsan dan bcas// pu ka
154b4(rgyud): ser pos 'khor lo bri// rtsibs bcu pad+ma'i steng du bri// mtha' nas ma yi 'phreng bas bskor// pad+ma'i 'dab ma bcul ni// phyogs bcu kun tu bcing ba yi// rdo rje la sogs bcu po bri// de yi rgyab tu phyogs
154b5(rgyud): bcu rnams// bcings pa'i sngags ni rim bzhin bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams bcu po la// hUM gnyis bar du bsgrub bya'i ming // srung ba bcas pa bri bar bya// phyogs bzhir sngags dang phyag rgya dang //
154b6(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor gcod dang 'ching ba dang // 'gugs pa'i sngags su bcas pa bri// gzhan yang mtshams rnams drug por ni// lha dang klu dang lha min gyi// gnod sbyin grul bum la sogs pa// bcing ba drug po
154b7(rgyud): bri bar bya// lte bar bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan ni// skyil krung thugs kar thal mo sbyar// mdzes pa'i gos ldan bri bar bya// de rjes gsang sngags 'phreng ba cid// stong phrag gcig tu brjod byas nas/ de rje/
155a1(rgyud): bstod pas bstod byas te// gser sogs gril nas lus snyam mgul// gang bde'i gnas su gdags par bya// des ni rnal 'byor srung don du// ji ltar bsams pa kun 'grub
155a2(rgyud): ste/ 'jigs pa brgyad po med par byed// de nas gzhan yang rgyal po'i ras// gsar la tsan dan ga pur dang // dri zhim rnams kyis byas nas ni// rgyu skar rgyal gyi nyi ma la// gur gum gyis ni 'khor lo waM
155a3(rgyud): dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa'i// phyi rol mu khrud gsum ldan pa'i// pad+ma'i lte bar bsgrub bya'i gzugs// yan lag rdo rjes mtshan pa bri// de la snying po'i sngags kyis bskor// de rjes lte ba'i mu khyud la/
155a4(rgyud): steng 'og bcing ba'i sngags kyis bri// phyogs mtshams sngags rnams 'dab ma la'o// phyi rol mu khyud dang por ni// rtsa ba'i sngags ring dgod par bya// gnyis par 'od kyi ra ba bri// dri zhim dkyil
155a5(rgyud): 'khor steng bzhag ste// rang nyid lha yi sbyor rdzogs bya// thugs ka'i sa bon 'od kyis ni// nam mkhar 'khor lo sbyangs byas te// yi ge hUM gi rnam par bsam// de yongs gyur las sku tshogs bsgom/
155a6(rgyud): de dbus shes rab rnam par bsam// bla dbus stang du hUM las ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ldan bsgom par bya// der ni yi ge'i rnam pa ni// mar ma lta bu gsal dmigs la// mkha' 'gro ma dang dbyer med
155a7(rgyud): bya// rang snying sa bon las byung ba'i// gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas byas nas// gser sogs gril nas lus sam mgul// btags na 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob// thams cad du ni srung bar de/
155b1(rgyud): yungs kar ba yi rnam lnga dang // dur ba'i snye mar bcas pa la// gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas nas ni// rgan mo ming med sbyor ba yi// gnas gsum thig le byas srung na// tshe ni stong phrag du mar 'phel// kun
155b2(rgyud): ba mar yungs kar til// gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas byas te// shis par gyur pa'i nyi ma la// mchod rten spyi bor gdags byas na// 'go ba'i nad rnams 'chad par 'gyur// khrag dang khro chur
155b3(rgyud): bcas pa la// gsang sngags stong phrag gsum bzlas te// zla ba gzas bzung dus su ni// nye bsnyen rdzogs par byas nas ni// rdzas ni shin tu sba byas te// lha tshogs gnod pa gang dmigs pa'i//
155b4(rgyud): snying khar sngags ni bsnun byas nas// gang dmigs bgegs ni rnam par 'jigs// ras bal gsal bar gyur pa la// shes rab mtshan ldan khrus byas te// shes pa'i nyi ma la bkal nas/
155b5(rgyud): bcings pa'i drangs kyis mdud byas te// stong phrag gcig gi sngags bzlas nas// lus sam mgul lam spyi bor gdags// des ni tshe lo stong phrag thub// yang na rang lus rnam pa sgrims nas// chu yi
155b6(rgyud): tshogs kyis dag byas te// nyi shu rtsa gcig grangs ldan par// gzungs kyi 'phreng ba brjod byas na// gser phyag lag tu ma blangs shing // bden bral phyi rol ma song bar// gzhan gyi 'jigs pa ma gsal
155b7(rgyud): zhing // tsholo brgya ni rtsa brgyad par// rims nad tsam yang mi gnod do// gos dang zas dang snod spyad dang // sman la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni// mi 'khrugs rgyal po'i phyag rgya yis// bsrungs na cis
156a1(rgyud): kyang mi shod de// seng chen rngam pa'i stabs kyis ni// thub pa'i sgra gsum brjod byas na// phyi rol rig sngags stong phrag ni// du mas ces kyang mi tshugs so// klu yi dbang po gnas/
156a2(rgyud): lugs kyis// rtse gcig rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcas// de nas gsang sngags gsum brjod na// nad dang gdon la sogs pa sel// ri bong nu ma'i mtshams byas nas// hUM gis mnan pa'i sngags kyis ni/
156a3(rgyud): dmigs med ting 'dzin yid bstan zhing // 'dis kyang gnod pa las bsrung 'gyur// phyi rol sogs pa kun spangs nas// snang ba yid kyis bslab byas te// mi snang ba la mngon dmigs nas// srung ba
156a4(rgyud): rnams kyi dam pa bshad// de nas gzhan yang sbyor ba bshad// dur khrod la sogs 'jigs gnas sam// mtsho dang mtshe'u dang dgon gnas dang // gnas dang skyed mos tshal chen dang // me tog
156a5(rgyud): tshal lam yul 'khor ljongs// chu yi 'gram mam shing gcig gam// yang na rang gi khyim nyid du// maN+Dal legs par byugs pa la// brten nas lha yi sbyor ba sgrub// ras ris la sogs mdun
156a6(rgyud): byas te// bde ba'i stan la skyil krung gis// sdad nas mnyam gzhag brtsam par bya// tha mal sbyangs pa'i lus kyis ni// thar pa chen po thob 'gyur te// gzhan du de ltar ma yin no// sa gzhi shin tu
156a7(rgyud): nyams dga' zhing // legs par bkod pa'i ri bo la// nags tshal shin tu sdug pa la// bsil ba'i chu rgyan 'bab pa'i phyogs// rnam bkod me tog tshal gseb tu// shar du sgo bstan khang pa la/
156b1(rgyud): sngags bzhis mtshams bcings cho ga yis// gsal khung dang bcas brtsigs pa'i phyogs// snyan pa'i bya yis sgra sgrog cing // dri zhingam spos dang ldan pa la// dril bu sil sil sba snyan sgrog ka lnga ldigs/
156b2(rgyud): kyi 'phreng bas dkris// lhag pa'i 'du 'dzi rnam spangs nas// spyod pa mthun pa'i grogs dang ni// bde bar byang chub bsgrub par bya// 'on kyang gnas dang grogs la sogs// rnal 'byor yid 'jug
156b3(rgyud): phyir brtsam ste// mtha' dag spangs pa'i pha rol na// lhag pa'i byang chub ma mchis so// bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnams// rang gi sems las 'byung mod kyi// sems rtog ma lus
156b4(rgyud): spang ba las// ngas ni chos gzhan 'ga' ma bshad// de nas sems rtog sna tshogs rnams// spang bar bya phyir sna tshogs thabs// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang // sbyor ba rgya chen rnams
156b5(rgyud): bshad do// drag po sgrub pa'i thabs 'ga' ni// rig pa'i khro mos mnyan par gyis// sa gzhi bdud rtsi lnga yis byug/ me yi dkyil 'khor sa bon bcas// dur khrod pha gus bri bar bya// der ni ngom
156b6(rgyud): thod pa la// phyi rol dmar nag tshon gyis byug/ nang du sna tshogs rdo rje ni// mu khyud gsum ldan bri bar bya// dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i// snying po sngags bcas bri bar bya// rdo rje rwa ni thams
156b7(rgyud): cad la// hUM bri mu khyud gnyis 'phreng sngags// gsum par khro bo'i sngags bri'o// thod pa kha sbyor nang du ni// ske tshe yungs kar btsan dug dang // lan tshwa khrag dang sha chen dang // rkang rjes sa la sogs
157a1(rgyud): pa thugs// gcer bu rnal 'byor ska bshig nas// lha yi sbyor ldan lhor bltas nas// zhabs kyis thod pa'i 'khor lo ni// mnan te sngags 'phreng brjod par bya// khro bo
157a2(rgyud): chen po'i sbyor ba yis// mnyam bzhag nas ni stong phrag tu// bzlas pa mtshan byed par byas na// gsad pa nyid la the tsom med// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo ni// dbus su me yi dkyil 'khor can/
157a3(rgyud): rtsibs brgyad mu khyud gsum ldan pa// dbus su snying po sngags rnams la// hUM gnyis bar du bsgrub bya'i ming // gsad pa nyid dang ldan par bya// mu khyad gnyis pa 'phreng sngags kyang // ming dang
157a4(rgyud): gsad par ldan pa'o// gsum pa khro bo'i sngags bris te// 'khor lo mchod cing byin brlabs nas// dgra gzugs sor brgyad snying khar gzhug/ de nyid til mar gyis byugs te// thod pa gnyis kyi
157a5(rgyud): 'khor lo yi// bar du bcug nas me steng gzhag/ seng ljang phur pa sor brgyad pa// mnyam gzhag sbyor bas sngags de gdab// gsad pa'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// shi bar 'gyur la gzhan du min// yang
157a6(rgyud): na byang chub yan lag las// dur khrod khrag gis 'khor lo bri// gru gsum brtsegs pa'i gzugs bris te// dbus su dgra ming gsang sngags bcas// rtsibs la bcu gnyis bar du ni// ming dang gsad
157a7(rgyud): pa bcas pa bri// su khyud dang po'i sngags 'phreng yang // rgyas pa'i yan lag ldan par bri// spra tshol gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa'i// snying khar bcu gnas sgra yis dkri// rnal 'byor pa yis nyal ba
157b1(rgyud): zhabs// mgo bo lhor bstan gzhag par bya// chu shel ma mthong bar du ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags brjod nas// mi yi rdo rje'i ngar gyis brgyan// sdang byed sa steng 'dir mi gnas// klu yi gnas su grags pa/
157b2(rgyud): 'am/ chu yi rdzing la sogs 'gram du// dkyil 'khor ba yi rnam lngas byug/ pad+ma dmar po'i ri mo la// lte ba rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gser gyi mdog can thal mo sbyar// klu yi gdengs ka bdun ldan pa/
157b3(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng gnas pa// shin tu bltas pas gnas par bya// dga' bo nye dga' 'jog po dang // mtha' yas dung skyong rigs ldan gzugs// pad+ma pad chen rnams byas te// dkar po ser dang /
157b4(rgyud): ldang ba dang / dmar dang ldang skya sngo skya dang // dmar ser ljang ser 'dzum pa'i gzugs// gcol thal mo sbyar btud nas// rgyu skar 'phreng ba dang ldan gzugs// 'o ma 'bras chan mkhal zho sha// pus
157b5(rgyud): ka tsa ti la sogs sman// 'khur ba tshegs bu dang bcas pa// rin chen snod du dgram par bya// gza' dang rgyu skar rnams dga' zhing // klu rnams bde ba'i sems thob shog/ lha rnams yid ni mnyam bzhag
157b6(rgyud): nas// snying rje'i blo chen skye bar shog/ lha klu gnod sbyin dri za sogs// byang chub sems chen dang ldan nas// thugs rje nye bar dgongs nas kyang // dus su char chen 'bebs par shog/ smon lam de yi rjes su ni//
157b7(rgyud): gzungs kyi 'phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad// brjod pa'i de ma thag tu ni// char gyi rgyun yang 'bab par 'gyur// gal te cung zad mi 'bebs na// me la bsdigs pa tsam gyis ni// glog gi 'phreng ba gtor byed na/
158a1(rgyud): char chen 'bebs la the tsom med// wa yi khrag gis 'gro ba la// gong gi 'khor lo bskrad pa yi// thabs dang ldan par dri byas nas// dur khrod sa las byas pa yi// rnga mo'i snying khar bcug/
158a2(rgyud): nas kyang // rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni// lhor bltas bka' yi sbyor ba yi// gsang sngags khri phrag gcig brjod na// bskrad pa nyid la the tshom med// sbrul dang sre mo'i khrag gis ni// rta dang ma he'i pags pa
158a3(rgyud): la/ mnyam du gnyis kyi gzugs bris te// dbye ba'i sngags dang bcas pa yi// 'khor lo thod pa'i gzugs bris la// pags pa gnyis kyis dkris byas pa// sngags bye brag dkyil 'khor la// brten pas
158a4(rgyud): dbye ba'i sbyor ba rdzogs// mtshal dang tsan dan ga pur bsres// zla gam dbyibs kyi dkyil 'khor la// snying po dbang gi sbyor bar bcas// nub tu bltas nas bsgrubs pa yis// lha yi dbang po dbang du 'gyur//
158a5(rgyud): rgyud kyi khyad par sbyor ba'o// dri yi rgyal po sna tshogs kyis// shing gi lo ma dkar po la// rdo rje rgya gram nyis brtsegs kyis// phyogs kyi rnga rnams hUMgs spras// mtshams kyi rnga rnams dbu ma la// hU~M driram
158a6(rgyud): yan lag la// phaT ni phyir la bltas pa dri// rgya chen gsol ba gdab par bya// gos bzang ma ni skags shing du// bcug nas rgyal mtshan rtser btags na// rlung dang thog dang ser ba gcod// dman pa
158a7(rgyud): rnams dang 'brel ba spang // thal ba chu dang yungs kar la// sngags kyi 'phreng ba bzlas byas te// sprin la sogs pa 'khrugs pa'i tshe// gtor ba tsam gyis 'chad par 'gyur// 'bru mar yungs kar ser
158b1(rgyud): po la/ bsngags nas lus la byugs tsam gyis// phran tshegs nad rnams thams cad las// ma he shin tu brtan par byed// 'phags ma rdo rje lu gu chud kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//
158b2(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sbyin sreg thab kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad myur byed de// sna tshogs lha mos mnyan par byos// ser sna spangs shing g.yo sgyu med// dul la dpa'
158b3(rgyud): brtul bzod pa che// mkhas shing rig la brtson 'grus bzang // sngags la mkhas pas sbyin sreg brtsam// thab ni nyi shu sor tshad la// phyed brkos kha phyir rdo rje ni// rtse gsum dur khrod chen gyis bri// phyi rol
158b4(rgyud): phyag rgya rnams bkod nas// dri zhim me tog gcal du bkram// der ni mchod cing sreg pa'i rdzas// tshogs nas rdzas rnams bsang gtor bya// bong bu rnga mo'i ril ma dang // gsal shing cher bcas shing
158b5(rgyud): la me// sa bon las skyes sba ra bar bya// der ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud// bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs byas nas// mchod cing bstod nas der rjes su// ske tshe yungs kar btsan dug dang // rus phye sha chen til nag/
158b6(rgyud): po// dang bcas sbyin sreg stong phrag gcig/ 'phreng ba'i sngags kyis sbyor bar bya// thog ma tha mar mar chen dang // til mar brgya phrag re re sbyin// sbyor bcas sbyin sreg rdzogs pa dang // zhag bdun gyis
158b7(rgyud): ni bsgrub bya ste// shi bar 'gyur la the tsom med// glang sha sbal sha pri yang ku// sbyin sreg stong gis bsgrub bya zhing // bzang ldong ros ru r+Na dang // ling ga glang po bse shar bcas// ser por byas la stong
159a1(rgyud): phrag ni// gcig gis 'phrul du rengs par byed// sbrul ta ne lu la ma he'ig/ bya roga'u ga sha stong phrag gcig/ sreg pas bsgrub bya 'bye bar nges// phra bo 'bras bu rasha khrag
159a2(rgyud): stong phrag gcig gis lpags par 'gyur// rnga mo bya rog rgan mo'i sha/ sA lu dmar til dkar po dang // yungs kar ser po la sogs pa// stong du bsregs pas skrod par byed// 'bru lnga spad 'tshong /
159a3(rgyud): rang byung gis// nam byed nub tu kha bltas dbyug/ me tog pad+ma dang bcas pa'i// kha dog dmar dang ldan pa yis// 'od zer dmar ldan stong phrag gis// nges par dgug dang dbang du 'gyur// til
159a4(rgyud): bcas mar gyi sbyin sreg ni// stong phrag byas na sdig pa 'byang // mar dang dur ba tsan dan bcas// sbyin sreg stong gis tshe 'phel 'gyur// ku sha byang chub shing 'bras bu// yungs kar dkar po lan
159a5(rgyud): tshwa yi// stong pasregs 'go ba'i nad rnams 'chad// yungs kar sha chen phye ma dang // dur khrod thal ba dug sna tshogs// khro chu phye ma'i sbyin sreg stong // khros pas byas na lha tshogs 'jig/ ut+pa
159a6(rgyud): dmar dang yang na dkar// gur kum bzang po'i sbyin sreg ni// stong rtsa brgyad tsam bsregs byas pas// rigs ldan bu mo dbang du 'gyur// a ru ra dang yungs kar dang // ba yi 'o ma stong bsregs na/
159a7(rgyud): rnam thos rgyal po'i gter tsam gyi// longs spyod chen po 'thob byed cing // oM rak+Sha rak+ShaM ku ru haM/ srung ba'i sngags so// oM shAn+ti ku ru oM/ thams cad du zhi ba'i sngags so// ha wa sha ku ru hA/
159b1(rgyud): mtha' dag dbang du bya'o// swa puSh+TikA ru swA hA/ thams cad du rgyas par byed pa'i sngags so// phaT hU~M mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ gsod pa'i sngags so// tho ba disha yag dbye bar byed pa'i sngags/
159b2(rgyud): so// U uts+tsha Ta ya dz+ra/ smod pa'i byed pa'i sngags so// laM staM d+ha ya staM d+ha ya la/ rengs par byed pa'i sngags so// raM dz+wa ra dz+wa ra ro/ rims skyed pa'i sngags so// dza A kaR+Sha ya hrI / 'gugs pa'i
159b3(rgyud): so/ oM ba ri shap+ta ya pa ta ya au/ char pa'i dbab pa'i sngags so// laM shaM laM b+hi staM b+ha ya laM/ sar ba gcad pa'i sngags so// dzo dze te dzo dze te ya ya dza/ zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so// hUM yar yany+tsa ma tra/
159b4(rgyud): taM tra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da d+hin+da/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ zhes pa ni thams cad du rig sngags gcod par byed pa'i sngags so// rig pa'i rgyal po bla med ni// gsang chen 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur// gas
159b5(rgyud): chen rgyud 'di ngo mtshar te// rmad byung bas ches rmad byung du// bstan pa snying pos gsang chen 'di// gsungs pa'i de ma thag tu ni// phyogs bcu'i rig sngags 'chang ba rnams// ngo mtshar bskyed nas/
159b6(rgyud): thal mi sbyar// bde ba'i snying po shin tu legs// legs so la gra so rdo rje 'dzin// gang la bde bskyed dpal thob byed// bdag cag rnams la thugs rje yis// rgyud kyi snying po 'di bshad pa// rje chen
159b7(rgyud): legs so ngo mtshar che// 'phags ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa las sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / 'phags ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa o D+yan nas byung ba rdzogs
160a1(rgyud): so// / paN+Di ta a tu la dasha badz+ras zhus nas/ zod kyi lo rgyab mar ba chos kyi dbang phyug gragapas sbyar ba'o//
160a2(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra du sngan ma nA ga sa ma ya/ bod skad du/ rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba kru'i dam tshig/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyaga'i tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po
160a3(rgyud): g.yog 'khor na bzhugs te/ 'khor 'dus pa chen po 'jog po la sogs pa kru'i 'khor dang / lha dang mi'i tshogs kyi 'khor chen po la sems can rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir te bsam pa dang re ba
160a4(rgyud): thams cad yongs su stong ba bde bar byed pa'i chos ston to// de nas grong khyer de nas bram ze'i khye'u khyab ma spyan zhes bya ba byug pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ rdzas dang yo byad mang po phun sum tshogs pa
160a5(rgyud): rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ sngags la 'jug pa/ sngags grub pa zhig 'dug ste/ de yang dang yang du klu 'gugs shing me'i sbyin sreg byed do// bram ze de'i lo tog sprin khar char chad
160a6(rgyud): bar gyur nas/ des nga rgyal gyi sbas sngags brjod pa dang mthun pas 'di skad ces/ bdag gis char pa'i rgyan dbab cing klu dgug par bya'o zhes smras te/ des mo'i sbyin sreg bya bar bshams nas til dang /
160a7(rgyud): 'bras dang / yungs kar rnams 'bru mar tsha ba dang bsres te sbyin sreg byed do// de nas klu mi bsrun pa zhig gi gzugs byas te/ des ljags kyi phur bu la bsngags nas klu'i spyi bor btab pa dang / klung
160b1(rgyud): bogs nas sdug bsngal kyi tshor ba chen por gyur to// klu de'ang cher 'khrugs te khros nas skad cig zang cig yud tsam de la klus khyab par byed pa'i shugs kyis cher gnod cing rngur 'byung ba'i 'od zer
160b2(rgyud): tsha ba rang gi lus las bkye ste/ gnod pa chen pos khebs par byas nas bram ze de'i zhing tshig par byas so// de yang lce 'bab pa'i char gyi rgyan chen po bram ze'i lus la phab nas bram zede mgon med/ sbyab
160b3(rgyud): med/ dpung gnyen med de/ me'i sbyin sreg byed pa btang nas/ de bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen btsal te 'bros par bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du brgyags te/
160b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu khro bos bdag gi srog ma rungs par 'tshal te skyabs su'ang ma
160b5(rgyud): mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa pa skyab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram ze chen po de dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze chen po
160b6(rgyud): ma 'jigs shig / ngas khyod kyi mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes
160b7(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol/ mngon sum du gyur bzhin du'ang klu mi bsrun pas lo tog ma rungs par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi
161a1(rgyud): slad na srad ma'i tshe srad ma'i dus na sems can thams cad kyi rten ni su lags/ ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das me tog thams cad kyi don du me tog rnams tshig
161a2(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ba dang / kun tu srung ba dang / rab tu 'phel bar bgyid par 'gyur ba lo tog yongs su skyong zhing klu zlog pa de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
161a3(rgyud): po lagan rdo rje la bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje klu rab tu 'gro bar byed pa'i snying po sbas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya ston gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
161a4(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yod de ngas bshad par bya'o// des myur du gnod pa bkag pa'i phyir lo tog thams cad myur du bskyang bar 'gyur ro// legs par
161a5(rgyud): bsrungs par 'gyur ro// me'i ri sul chen po so so phyogs bcu kun nas klu thams cad kyi mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// me lce 'bar ba'i rim pa'i sprin chen po nam mkha' lding 'dab ma gdengs pa'i shugs
161a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i sprin gyi rim pas nam mkha' khebs par byed do// me tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad kun tu srung ste gnas par 'gyur ro// des klu la sogs pa thams cad kun tu rab tu 'bar bar
161a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// klu mi bgrangs pa rnams phung bar 'gyur ro// 'dum par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis seMmra/
161b1(rgyud): can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du gzungs chen po 'di'i sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di dka' stsal to// na mo b+ha ga wa te/ sar+b+ba bud+d+hA nan/ na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya rA dzA ya/
161b2(rgyud): oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ gi rI ba b+ha ni/ dI b+ha be ga ma hA bde b+ha ga wa te ma thA tsaN+DA hrid ya sa la ni/ hu ru phu ru/ ha ra ha ra/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba sa s+ya nA sha ya/ nA ku le ba shan+d+ha ra d+ha ra pra sa ra tsaN+Da be ga ma hA ba la pa rAkra
161b3(rgyud): ma sU ri ta ro dra dAk+Sha/ ma tha ma tha/ pra dz+wa la mA la d+hA ra Ni/ tsaN+Da be ga ba ti/ pra ba ra di man+ta ra Ni/ hUM hUM ba la ba ti/ be ga ba ti/ sar sa ra/ bi sar bi sa ra sa ran+ti/ sarba sa dr-i s+yan nAm dri ba na ya dri/ pu ya pa la baT/ hra
161b4(rgyud): san+d+hu ra Ni/ a ba sarbA n+tu sarba nA gtog sarba ba b+ha ba b+ha ni/ be ga ta re ga pa ti swAhA/ hUM hU~M phaT/ nA ga bi sa ra Ni phaT/ dz+wa la sA li ni phaT/ dz+wa la mA li ni phaT/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis su sa?/
161b5(rgyud): cad dang / klu mi 'grungs pa thams cad ma rungs par byed pa'i rig pa 'di bshad ma thag tu/ klu dang klu chen po thams cad klad pa na bar gyur/ lus rul te lus rnags shing dri mi zhim par gyur nas/ bcom
161b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis nongs pa bgyis pa
161b7(rgyud): dran du lags kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das rig 'dzin gnod pa bgyid pas bdag cag la brnyas pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'ching ba dang / smod pa dang / gnod pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das klu mi bgrungs pa rnams
162a1(rgyud): 'khrugs te/ de'i tshe lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ma rungs par bgyid/ ser ba 'bab par bgyid/ sad dang rlung gis 'khrug par bgyid/ ha cang char che ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang /
162a2(rgyud): dus ma lags par char 'bab par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'dzin pa sngags smrabs byams pa la gnas par bgyi/ byams pa'i go bgo bar bgyi/ byams pa'i ral gri lag na thogs par bgyi ste khyams
162a3(rgyud): pas gnod pa bgyid pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bdag cag dam bca' bar 'tshal te/ gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di rab tu spyod pa der bcom ldan
162a4(rgyud): 'das klu gtse bar mi bgyid do// gang na snying po'i gzungs 'dis bsrung bar bgyis pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyis pa dang / sred bu ze ba dang / mtshams
162a5(rgyud): dgum pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyis ris bcad par bgyis pa der/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par rgyun du gnod pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi 'tshal lo// lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu
162a6(rgyud): thams cad kun tu bsrung bar 'tshal lo// yongs su bskyang bar 'tshal lo// tha na rkun po dang / g.yo can dang / ri dgas dang / bya rnams kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'tshal te/ slad kyis kyang ma rungs par mi bgyid do//
162a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i bdag po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ klu'i bdag po legs so legs so// khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/ khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling legs par srung bas srung bar
162b1(rgyud): gyis shig/ de nas de'i 'og tu cho gar bya ba las thams cad byed pa dge bar byang brjod par bya'o// lo tog la gnod par byed na de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas zhing gi dbus sam/ khang steng ngam/ gnas mthon por dkyig
162b2(rgyud): 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ phyogs bzhir bum pa bkang ba bzhi gzhag go// me tog sil mas gcal bkram ste gzhag go// gzugs 'khyil pa bdun bya'o// 'bras las byas pa'i 'khyil ba bdun byas te/ gzugs re re
162b3(rgyud): zhing yang gzugs nyi shu rtsa re bya'o// 'bras dang 'o thug bsres pa dang zho dang 'o ma gzhag par bgyi'o// phyogs bzhir dril bu gzhag par bya'o// pad+ma lta bur zan gyi gtor ma snga ma bzhin gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor
162b4(rgyud): gyi dbus su bum pa chen po bzhag ste ba las byung ba lnga dang 'o ma dang chus dgang ngo // yungs kar dang 'bras yos thugs par bya'o// sngags lan drug cur yongs su bzlas par bya'o/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi dang
162b5(rgyud): lcags kyi phur bu gcig bya ste/ thams cad sor brgyad kyi tshad du bya'o// bser skya'i lci ba 'am bag phye las byas pa'i klu'i gzugs bzhi bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzhag par bya'o// seng ldang gi phur bu de dag
162b6(rgyud): kyang snying khar nub par gzugs so// sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o// shar phyogs su klu mgo bdun pa gzhag par bya'o// nub phyogs su mgo brgyad pa'o// lho phyogs su mgo lnga pa'o// khyang phyog
162b7(rgyud): su mgo gsum pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mgo dgu pa gzhag par bya'o// pog por re re ste lnga gzhag par bya'o// yungs kar dang pra yos su bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te phyogs bzhir gtor
163a1(rgyud): ro// gzungs 'di bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzugs so// zhing gi dbus su'ang gzugs so// skyed mos tshal gyi dbus su'ang gzugs so// de ba#
163a2(rgyud): ma thag tu phyogs bzhi kun nas ri sul chen pos mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtshams bcad pa chen por 'gyur ro// lo tog thams cad dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu tham/
163a3(rgyud): cad legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// za na 'dab ma gcig kyang bskams par mi 'gyur na/ yal ga dang sdong du bskams par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ srog chags kyi rigs ri dgas dang bya thams cad
163a4(rgyud): kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro// ma rungs par byed kyang mi nus so// gnas der rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / sad dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so// klu'i gnod pa byas
163a5(rgyud): kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so// ma rungs pa zhig tu gyur na de'ang slar rtas par 'gyur ro// yang stobs dang / rtas pa dang / 'ongs yod par 'gyur ro// bum pa chen po'i nang na yod pa de'ang zhing dang / kun
163a6(rgyud): dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs pa ni kun tu gtor bar byas na srog chags thams cad med par 'gyur ro// sbrul dang / byi ba dang / ne'u la dang / byi dur dang / dom dang / sbal pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang /

163b2(rgyud): myang shing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// pa dang / ma lags pa dag / btog dang / ma tog dang / 'bras tha mams cad yongs su 'thu par 'gyur ro// ma pa dang 'angs par gyu / thathas
163b3(rgyud): par rgyun du spang ba dang / sdub pa dang / sred pa byed par 'gyur ro// khyim la lan gisas gcig bzlas par byas mam tan dang / matog dang / khadang dang / gang sngon pa dmas la gtor na thog gas thams
163b4(rgyud): lgang zhing med par 'gyur ro// srin bu tre ma du ka dang / trai la ta dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / rkang brgyad pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag kyang phur bum byung gi bar du med par 'gyur ro//
163b5(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhing gi phyogs bzhir zhi ba'i las bya ste/ nas dang / gro dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras dang / mar bsres te sbyin sreg byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/
163b6(rgyud): than dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba dag gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so// gzungs 'di dang cho gar bya ba 'byung ba mtha' dag bri bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / drang srong
163b7(rgyud): chen po nyes 'dor dang / rdo rje 'dzin bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te gnas mthon por gzugs so// gtor ma dang / me tog dang / bdug pa'ang dbul lo// sang
164a1(rgyud): ldeng gi phur du sor brgyad pa la lan stong yongs su bzlas pa byas te'ang ldeng du btsugs na rlung dang / sa dang ldan dang sar bathams cad thub par 'gyur ro/
164a2(rgyud): lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma ma rungs par byed pa'i srog chags rnams med par 'gyur te/ sha sbrang dang / snang bu dang / pi tsi li ka dang / byi ba dang / sbrang ma dang
164a3(rgyud): t+yaM ma du ka dang / trai la ta dang / bi sha ki ta ka dang / nya phyis can dang / nya dang / lo mi ka dang / sbal pa dang / ne'u la dang / phag dang / ka na ti ka dang / seng ge dang / rkang mangs dang /

164a5(rgyud): dang 'ug pa dang / byi ba dang / mchu rings la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro// mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad phung bar 'gyur ro// bya rog/
164a6(rgyud): dang / bye'u dang / khug rta dang / phug ron dang / mu du ri ka dang / 'ug pa dang / kha na dza na ka dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs la sogs pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// sngags 'dis phur dul/
164a7(rgyud): yongs su bzlas par bya ste phyogs bcing ngo // na mo bud+d+hA ya/ oM ki li mi ma tsaN+De/ me re li/ tsaN+De tsaN+De/ bstA ya swA hA/ de nas drang srong chen po nyes 'dor bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi
164b1(rgyud): rang bzhigan 'dag pas gsungs 'du mas nas/ de stan pas sangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyigapas gnas la gtugs nas/ btsam ldan 'das la 'ji gad kyis gso to//
164b2(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gis srog chags kyi rigs gnod par sems pa/ rab tu gnod par sems pa/ drug 'chang ba dang / me tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang /
164b3(rgyud): dang / rtsa ba ma rungs par bgyid pa thams cad kyi kha bcing bar bgyi'o// bzlog par bgyi'o// bsdigs par bgyi'o// phyogs bzhi kun nas dang ga tshad du mtshams gcad pa chen po

164b6(rgyud): po ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ldu mar yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig smros shig/
164b7(rgyud): de nas drang srong chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so// na mo b+ha ga wa te shAkya rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo a ka tA ya/ ma hA ri Shi ya
165a1(rgyud): tad+yathA/ kA ma tsul/ tsal tsa ra tsa ra/ tsam la/ bar+d+ha ni/ nA sha na~M/ da had ha/ su su li tsa ri sarba du ldan ban+d+ha ban+d+han/ dun+da brtan/ sar sa ra Ni/ dar+pak+ShAk+Sha/ ma Ni9/
165a2(rgyud): bi sa ra sa ra/ ha li phu li/ hu ti hA ti/ sa ra ma Ni/ sa ra n+tu/ sarba pA pa pA na kak+Sha d+hi li swA hA/ drang srong chen po nyes 'dor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig pa 'di smra sa mo thag tu klu dang /
165a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po gnod par sems pa de dag thams cad khas bub tu 'gyel nas bcom ldan 'das la skad kyis gsang mthon pos smre sngags 'don te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ma
165a4(rgyud): rungs lags so// drang srong gi dmod pa bab par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag drang srong gi dmod pa'i mas tshig go/ kun tu tshig go/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bdag cag slan chad
165a5(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag slan chad lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma ma rungs par mi bgyid do// srog/
165a6(rgyud): chags kyi rigs thams cad klog par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po dag khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i sems can thams cad lo
165a7(rgyud): tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang 'dab ma dang / yal ga bde bar kun tu 'phel bar gyur pa rjes su srungs shig/ de nas drang srong chen po des cho gar bya ba smras pa/ bcom
165b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kha shar phyogs su bltas te mchis la/ rig pa drang srong chen po'i snying po 'di ril babring gar cha ba bcus la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyi ste/ drang srong gi mi smra bas phyogs/
165b2(rgyud): bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o// a pa sa ri sa ra/ sha pa ta ba dA ma hr-id la kro d+ha/ a mu ka ban+d+ha ya/ pra Na tsa ra/ su mu ru tsa la swA hA/ sngags 'di lan bdun stong bzlas pa bgyi ste/ bzlas pa tsam gyis klu
165b3(rgyud): gnod par sems pa thams cad tshabs gdungs par 'gyur ro// rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa'i bar gyi srog chags kyi rigs thams cad dmod pas gdungs par gyur te thams cad 'byer ro//
165b4(rgyud): slar yang phyogs der lo tog la gnod pa mi bgyid do// srog chags kyi rigs thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro// srog chags kyi rigs thams cad phyis kyang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// yang
165b5(rgyud): lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma ma rungs par mi bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ drang srong chen po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ drang srong chen po legs/
165b6(rgyud): so legs so// khyod kyis ci nas kyang sems can thams cad la legs par srung bar 'gyur ba dang / lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad legs par srung bar gyur pa de ltar
165b7(rgyud): gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na rjes su srung bar bgyid/ yongs su srung ba
166a1(rgyud): bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// sems can thams cad yongs su srungs shig/ lo tog la gnod par/
166a2(rgyud): byed pa kru'i cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das zham ring chen po dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po dang / bkod pa chen po dang / yon yod pa'i mthu chen po dang /
166a3(rgyud): cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas su gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byon pa dang sa phyogs de na
166a4(rgyud): 'brog gi nags nyi shu pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ nags de'i mthongs na rdzing bu zhig yod la/ rdzing bu de'i mthus lcang mo can gyi pho brang 'khor gyi zhing dang / kun dga' dang / nags dang 'dabs
166a5(rgyud): dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams kun tu tshom par gyur to// skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ba lang dang / rta dang / rta rgod ma dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang /
166a6(rgyud): bong bu dang / skye ba'i tshogs thams cad bde bas tshim par gyur to// rdzing bu de'ang phyogs pa ni kun tu rgyar dpag tshad gnyis kyi tshad do// rdzing bude'ang me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang /
166a7(rgyud): praN+Da ri ka sna tshogs kyis kun tu khebs shing / 1sna tshogs dang / chu bran dang / med dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang bung ba gzugs sna tshogs can no// de nas de'i 'og tu ban pa/
166b1(rgyud): byung ba de'i tshe nags tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / yal ga thams cad bskams te me tog de dag brnyings so// chu srin dang / nya ming dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang //
166b2(rgyud): bung ba gzugs sna tshogs pa de dag kyang chu bri ste chu cung zad cig lus pas phyogs bcur rgyu ga/ kun tu rgyu ga rab tu rgyu ga ste/ srog 'gags la thug/ srog chad la thug pas snying
166b3(rgyud): 'phar zhing rgyug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das zham ring ba chen po dang rdzing bu der byon pa dang / de na nya dang / chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / bung ba brgya stong du ma srog 'gags la thug srog
166b4(rgyud): chad la thug ste phyogs bcur brgyug cing snying rje rje ltar gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i dmigs pa snying rjes dbugs phyung ste se gol gyi slas klu rnams 'bod cing / lan gnyis
166b5(rgyud): lan gsum du se gol rdeb cing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra grags par mdzad do// sngon gyi las kyi rkyen 'ga' zhig gis srog chags de dag kyang srog ma chad do//
166b6(rgyud): klu chen po de dag gis sgra de'ang ma zos/ bcom ldan 'das kyang rjes su ma dran no// de nas bdud kyi ris kyi gnod sbyin rnam par 'thor rlung zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
166b7(rgyud): gyi khams su sgra bsgrags pa/ zhag bdun gyi nyin par sreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ste/ de ni srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar dag las gang
167a1(rgyud): tshig par mi 'gyur ba cung zad kyang mi srid do// 'jig rten du 'jigs pa chen po 'byung zhes sgra grag go// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin/
167a2(rgyud): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis skra de thos nas/ kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten ma runges par gyur to zhes ngu'o//
167a3(rgyud): denas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi rkyen gyis 'di myong bar mkhyen mod kyi/ 'on kyang dgongs par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sprin mtshams kyi mdzod spunas 'od zer byung nas 'od zer
167a4(rgyud): des klu'i khyim thams cad snang bar byas nas kyang slar log ste sgyu bo'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba zhes bya bas klu thams cad bsdus
167a5(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces smras so// kye klu dang klu chen po dag ci'i phyir 'od zer byung zhing rkyen gang gis 'jig rten du byung / de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtshos bsams na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
167a6(rgyud): mthus 'od zer byang bar mthong ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs
167a7(rgyud): te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od zer rab tu bkye ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ 'od zer rab tu bkye ste khang pa thams cad snang bar bgyis te slar log par byed
167b1(rgyud): pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye klu'i bdag po dag srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po 'gags pas 'gag par 'gyur ba'o// de nas klu'i/
167b2(rgyud): rgyal po rgya mtshos skad cig zang cig yud tsam de la rdzing bu char gyi rgyan gyi chus bkang nas bde bas tshim par byas so// de nas phyogs der go skabs chen po byung bar gyur nas sa phyogs der
167b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen pos kun nas bskor te mdun du bdar ba'i dbus na bzhugs so// klu'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag brgyad
167b4(rgyud): cu ste/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom
167b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / rgyan dang
167b6(rgyud): lhab lhu ba dang / na bza' sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su
167b7(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'di ltar zan pa byung zhing mu ge'i
168a1(rgyud): dgon par gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'dis sems can thams cad mgon ma mchis skyabs ma mchis dpung gnyen ma mchis par gyur/
168a2(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu dang mthun pa'i sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/ gang gis skad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sdug bsngal sna tshogs su ltung ba'i 'jig rten kun tu sgrol ba dang / ha cang/
168a3(rgyud): char che ba dang / char ma mchis pa dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / ser ba dang / sad dang / tsha ba ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / bzlog
168a4(rgyud): pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam zos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /
168a5(rgyud): rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag klu'i snying po'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig bskul ma 'debs pa kun nas 'bar
168a6(rgyud): ba'i glog ces bya ba yod de/ de dran pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi khyim dang / klu thams cad kyi lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// klu mi 'grungs pa thams cad kyi snying 'bar bar 'gyur ro// klu thams cad
168a7(rgyud): kyi mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro// mig dang mgo rnams gas nas dum bu dum bur chad cing 'drul bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag klu gnod par sems pa dang rab tu gnod par
168b1(rgyud): sems pa rnams kyi don dang / sems can thams cad kyi phyir zung zhig/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan/
168b2(rgyud): 'das klu'i snying po'i sngags kyi tshig bskul ma 'debs pa kun nas 'bar ba'i glog ces bgyi ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i lta stangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzigs
168b3(rgyud): stangs kyis rnam par gzigs nas/ klu'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po dgang las gzungs kyi tshig gi sngags kyi tshig nyon cig/ tad+ya thA/ oM \u0f7f
