168b4(rgyud): pu le/ pra ba re/ nA ga ma hA nA ga hr-i da ya/ A brte/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba nA ga hra dA ya ni/ ki mi ki mi/ nA ga ku la bi d+h+wan sa ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba nA ga duSh+Tan hr-i da pA ni ha na ha nasarba duSh+Tan nA/
168b5(rgyud): ga ba ba nA ni/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa ya/ sarba duSh+Ta na nA gA nA na/ a kr-i ma a kra ma/ sa mu dra sA ga ra/ bi ma le/ bi kra mam hA nA ga ga te dza ba re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i snying po'i gzungs
168b6(rgyud): kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis klu de dag thams cad 'dar zhing lus rul te dri mi zhim par gyur te/ me 'bar ba bzhin du lus la du bar 'thul zhing 'gre ldog go// thams cad skad cher
168b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la ngu zhing thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
169a1(rgyud): cag thams cad kyi snying la g.yo ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad tshig ste ma rungs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dang sngan chad mthun pa/
169a2(rgyud): bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yi dam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas na gnas kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das yang bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling du 'tshe bar mi bgyid
169a3(rgyud): do/ ma rungs par mi bgyid do// me tog dang / yal ga dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog thams cad yongs su rgyas par bgyid do// dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bab par bgyid do// bde ba dang yid bde
169a4(rgyud): bar bgyid do// lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad 'grub par bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rjes su sbyong bar bgyid do// bden pa'i dam tshig la gnas par bgyid do// bu gcig
169a5(rgyud): pa la bgyi ba bzhin du sems can thams cad rjes su sbyong bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang dang gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mthun par bgyid do//
169a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag cag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun 'bab par bgyid do// dran pa tsam gyis kyang ha cang char che ba zlog par bgyid do// bcom ldan
169a7(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa las log par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das la'ang mnas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshig stsal to// de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
169b1(rgyud): zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces smras so// tad+ya thA/ oM tsata tsata/ btsata// ta sha ta/ pa tsar ti swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gal te rig pa 'dzin pas gdugs zhag gcig chog
169b2(rgyud): bgyis la/ bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i don du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du char gyi rgyun ma phab na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
169b3(rgyud): rgyas la 'khus par 'gyur ro// bdag cag klu'i skye gnas nas 'chi 'pho bar gyur tu'ang mchi ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas mnas bsgag pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di thog
169b4(rgyud): ma nyid du lan bdun du brjod par bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu ske tshe'i sa bon brgya rtsa brgyad klu'i sa bon du mtshe'ur dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad kyi khang khyim mtha' dag zhugs 'bar
169b5(rgyud): bar gyur/ bdag shi keng rus kyi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas yongs su thar par ma gyur kyi bar du dum bu dum bur 'chad par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad kyis myur bar char gyi rgyun 'bab
169b6(rgyud): par bgyid do// gal te myur du char gyi rgun ma phab na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad 'gum pa'i dus kyi dbang du mchi'o// bu dang tsha bor bcas te 'gum par mchi'o// de nas rnam
169b7(rgyud): kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu mnas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bshad do// snying rje ma mchis pa'i
170a1(rgyud): mnas/ bskrag pa'i tshig dag bshad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na klu mi bgrangs pa/ ma rungs pa/ gtum pa/ gnod
170a2(rgyud): par byed pa dag 'byung ste/ de'i tshe mna' 'dis 'jigs par 'gyur/ skrag par 'gyur/ dus dus su char gyi rgyun ni legs par 'bebs so// dus dus su lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams sgrub
170a3(rgyud): gode nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cho ga rgya cher bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga bka'
170a4(rgyud): sprul pa/ char mi 'bab pa'i dus na des ri 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ chu mig gam/ mtshe'u 'am/ mtsho'am/ lteng ka'am/ khron pa 'am/ klu'i gnas kyi
170a5(rgyud): mtshe'u 'am/ 'jim pa dang lci bar bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum du bya ste/ dkyil 'khor dbus zabs khru gang brkos la/ kha khyer yang khru gang bar bya'o// shin tu 'jam pa dang
170a6(rgyud): shin tu phyi bar bya'o// spos chus khor yug tu gtor ro// de'i dbus su klu'i rgyal po chen po bzhi bya ste/ ba ser skya'i lci ba dang 'jim par bsres pas klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu gdengs ka can
170a7(rgyud): lus dbyibs dgu par byas te/ thams cad kyi mgo la'ang yid bzhin gyi nor bu bya'o// shar phyogs su klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bya'o// lho phyogs su klu'i rgyal po gdugs bya'o// nub phyogs su klu'i
170b1(rgyud): rgyal po chu lta bya'o// byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po lam bu kar bya'o// de'i g.yog 'khor bdun bdun mgo gsum pa/ mgo gnyis pa/ mgo lnga par bya'o// lus dag spos sna tshogs kyis byug
170b2(rgyud): par bya'o// tsan dan dkar dmar dang / su ra bin tsan dan dang / shug pa dang / gur kum rnams phye mar byas te gtor bar bya'o// me tog dang me tog 'phreng ba gdags so// gnas de'i dbus su
170b3(rgyud): 'bras yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor bar bya'o// grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi gzhag par bya'o// phyogs chen po bzhir sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs ring bsrel dang bcas pa dang / mchod rte//
170b4(rgyud): ring bsrel dang bcas pa dag gzhag go// dar dang ba dan gyis brgyan par bya'o// mchod pa lngas mchod do// a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru kas bdug go// rgya spos dang / na la dang / kun du ru dang / yungs
170b5(rgyud): kar dang / gan+d+ha ra sa dang / sra rtsi'i pog dang / pog dkar po rnams dang / sbrang rtsi dang bsres te sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te klu rnams la bdug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' kun tu nas
170b6(rgyud): phyes pad+ma bri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi btod la ngos bzhi re rer yang gtor mas gzhong pa bkang ba bdun bdun gzhag par bya'o// gtor ma dkar po dang ci 'byor pa'i ro rnam pa mang po gzhag go// me tog
170b7(rgyud): sil ma gtor bar bya'o// bum pa bkang ba bzhi gzhag go/ bum pa gtor mas bkang ba bzhi gzhag go/ pog por bzhi na sa gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug go// me mar kha brgyad du bud do// rig pa 'dzin
171a1(rgyud): pas shar gyi sgor sbyin sreg shing ka ra l+lI ra dang / yungs kar dang / ce tsa dmar po bsres te lan brgya rtsa brgyad der gtor to// dor ba brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang klu thams/
171a2(rgyud): cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du phyogs bzhi kun nas char gyi rgyan 'bebs so// klu de dag thams cad 'dir char 'bebs so// 'don cho ga dang po'o//
171a3(rgyud): yungs kar gyi sar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / shing ka ra wI ra'i me tog dang / nA ga ge sar dang btags pa'i ril bu byas la/ de nas ril bu la sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas
171a4(rgyud): te/ klu'i mtshor bor na bor ma thag tu klu thams cad dga' bar 'gyur te char gyi rgyan chen po 'bebs so// gal te de ma thag ma phab na klu de dag thams cad lus zhig par 'gyur ro// klad pa na
171a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni cho gnyis pa'o// // sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang rtsab mo dkrugs la sngags lan drug cu bzlas pa bya ste/ khyim
171a6(rgyud): gyi nang du pon po ma thag tu klu thams cad 'khrugs par gyur te/ de'i phyir char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// gal te de ma thag tu ma phab na klu thams cad kyi lus la sha bkra 'byung zhing mdzes btab par
171a7(rgyud): long bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni cho ga gsum pa'o// / shug pa dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / ba pra dang / zangs phye dang / yungs kar dang / in+da hasta dang / pa la sha bsres te bu ram khu bas sbrus la
171b1(rgyud): shes rab can gyis sngags lan brgyad cu bzlas te/ ril bu rgya shug gi 'bru tsam du byas la char mi 'bab pa'i dus na ril bu bdun klu'i khyim du bor na nyin mtshan bdun char 'bebs so// gal te 'phram/
171b2(rgyud): du ma phab na de'i phyir klu'i khyim gyi chu thams cad bskams par 'gyur ro// klu'i khyim na gnas pa thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro// ril bu gcig rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te klu'i mtshor gzugs
171b3(rgyud): so// ba dan sngon po gdags so// sngags 'di bris te der gdags par byas na dza srid du rgyal mtshan ma bsdus pa de srid du klu thams cad char 'bebs so// yang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te khang rngog
171b4(rgyud): mthon por gzugs so// ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na'ang klu rnams ser ba 'bebs kyang mi nus so// klu rnams kyis gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba de 'dra bar mthong ste/ klu thams cad sngangs skrag cing gnas
171b5(rgyud): der 'dod pa bzhin char 'bebs so// oM su pra te badz+ra dun te mi li mi li swA hA/ 'di ni sngags so// bag phye las klu mgo dgu pa'i gzugs byas la lus mtshal gyis bslu bar bya'o// mgul du ba
171b6(rgyud): ngan gdags so// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi byas te dbus su klu'i gzugs bzhag la me tog sil mas gtor ro// gtor ma dkar po ci 'byor tshad sbyin no// me tog dang bdug spos kyang sbyin no// bal
171b7(rgyud): po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pa byas te/ sngags dang bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma la klu'i gzugs byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byab pa byas na klu gang gi ming
172a1(rgyud): bris pa'i klu de bkug par 'gyur te/ klu de'ang rang gi khyim la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// gal te char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab na 'phral du srog ma rungs par 'gyur//
172a2(rgyud): ro// yungs kar la lan stong rtsa brgyad re re la yungs su bzlas pa bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad du tshang na klu'i gzugs thams cad 'gro zhing mgo gdengs ka byed do// de'i 'og tu bal
172a3(rgyud): se'u'i lcug mas bsdigs na ldang zhing lce ston par 'gyur ro// lus kyi bar du ston par 'gyur/ klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ gang bsgo ba de bzhin byed do// 'o ma dang yungs kar la
172a4(rgyud): sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas te gnas thams cad du gtor na/ thams cad la phyir legs par byas par 'gyur ro// 'di ni cho ga bzhi pa'o// // de nas klu'i
172a5(rgyud): rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba klu'i rgyal po brgya stong stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
172a6(rgyud): ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// las sgrub pa shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang de dang 'dra bar bshad par
172a7(rgyud): bgyi'o// dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// slan chad sems can dag la rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis klu'i mi bgrungs pa rnam par 'tshe bar
172b1(rgyud): bgyid pa rnams kyi don du dam tshig ma 'tshal ba rnams bzlog pa'i sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ klu'i bdag po dag ngas dam tshig gi/
172b2(rgyud): sngags byin gyis brlabs kyi sa de shod cig/ na mo b+ha ga wa te shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ b+hu dze b+hu dze/ sa ma ya b+hu dze/ tadz+dza b+hU dze/ pra bar b+hu dze/ sa man+ta A kA ra b+hu dze/ du ru durma
172b3(rgyud): sAhA/ sa ma ya ba la ne swA hA/ nA ga mar sa ts+tshed ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na klu mi bgrangs pa thams cad sbar bzlog pa'i slad du bdag cag gis klu'i dam tshig gi
172b4(rgyud): sngags 'di bshad do// ha cang char che ba'i tshe dang / char dkon pa'i tshe dang / sad dang / ser ba dang / sar pa 'bab pa'i tshe sngags 'di dran par bya'o// brjod par bgyi'o// de nas klu thams cad
172b5(rgyud): bskul bar bgyi'o// rig pa 'dzin pa des shin tu khrus bgyis te gtsang mar bgyis la/ gos gsar pa bgos te klu'i gnas su mchi bar bgyi'o// klu'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i spos kyi dkyil
172b6(rgyud): 'khor bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs sam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bzhag ste spos chab kyis bkru bar bgyi/ me tog dang bdug
172b7(rgyud): pas mchod par bgyi/ klu kun yang bkru bar bgyi'o// sku bsil ba'i cha ba de la lan brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis te/ de'i nang du yungs kar stsal nas mtshe'u de'i nang du dbo zhing phyogs bzhi
173a1(rgyud): nas bdug pas bdugs na/ de phom thag tu skad cig de la klu'i gnas 'gul zhing du ba lta bu byung nas sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur te/ nam mkha'i dkyil de khebs par/
173a2(rgyud): char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su yungs kar dang til bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bgyis te phyogs bzhir bcing bar bya'o// klu'i phyogs su gtor bar bgyi'o//
173a3(rgyud): ser ba mi 'bab pa dang klu thams cad kyang gcod par 'gyur ro// sad dang / ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// klu'i mtsho 'gram mam/ khron pa 'am/ steng ka'am
173a4(rgyud): rdzing bu'i 'gra ba ma ma/ ri'i rtse mor shing arga dang / zhun mar dang / yungs kar dang / shing ka ra wI ra'i me tog gis stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg byas
173a5(rgyud): ma thag tu char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang yang char che ba'i dus na 'bras yos dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te nam mkha' la gtor na char chen po bzlog
173a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis dgung gsum gyis char gyi rgyun ma phab na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sha bkra' byung bar 'gyur lags so// long ba dang lus dri mi zhim
173a7(rgyud): par 'gyur lags so// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun slu bar bgyid pa lags so// 'jig rten gsum slu bar bgyid pa lags so// bdag cag klu'i skye gnas nas 'pho bar gyur cig/
173b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gzhan thams cad larang sbyor bar bgyir na thams cad rung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po de dag dbugs byung / dam tshig la bkod nas/ rgyal po chen po rnam/
173b2(rgyud): thos kyi bu la yongs su gtad de rjes su gtad nas sa phyogs de nas gshegs so// rnam thos kyi bu ni gzhi la bzhugs so// klu'i dam tshig ces bya ba char 'bebs pa'i skabs rdzogs so//
173b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs pa dang / lha'i tshogs du ma lhags/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po'ang lhags/ lha rnams kyi dbang po
173b4(rgyud): brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / klu'i dbang po mthu che ba thams cad kyang lhags/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po
173b5(rgyud): gser mig gi 'dab ma can/ rdo rje'i mchu can/ bdag nyid chen po lus 'bar zhing khro ba/ 'jigs su rung ba'i rtsal can/ rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang / mu tig dang / gser gyis
173b6(rgyud): spras pa'i con pan mgo la thogs pa/ gser gyis klubs pa/ drag po'i gzugs can/ 'gying bar lta ba/ klu'i dbang po gdan du bting ba/ g.yog 'khor mang po thams cad dang lhags so//
173b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bye ba dang / rdo rje 'dzin g.yog 'khor rig 'dzin stong lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das ni nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ mu tig dmar po tha dad pa
174a1(rgyud): mang pos brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa na zham ring chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pas
174a2(rgyud): bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'od zer sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis spuni shin tu brgyan/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar ni 'bar/ nyi ma sngar ni sdang / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad
174a3(rgyud): bzang po brgyad cu mnga' ba/ 'od 'dom gang bas ni sku lags par brgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra ni shin tu rnam par dag cing shin tu dri ma dang skyon med pa'i 'od ni gsal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das/
174a4(rgyud): kyis 'khor chen po 'dus par gyur pa mkhyen nas sku las 'od zer sna tshogs phyung ste/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par mdzad do// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang /
174a5(rgyud): phyag chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer la bltas nas 'dzam bu'i gling na klu mi 'grungs pas sad dang / ser ba dang / rlung dang / ser sprin pha ba ste/ me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad/
174a6(rgyud): dang me tog thams cad dang / shing dang / rtsa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / sman gyi bar bsregs te ma rungs par byas nas/ yal ga'ang 'dzam
174a7(rgyud): bu'i gling na med par byas na/ de na sems can de dag sdug bsngal chen pos gzir zhing nyam thag pa'i skad drung ba zos so// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pos
174b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu gnod par sems pa gtum po rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling rnam par bshig ste/ thams ca/
174b2(rgyud): ma rungs par bgyis nas sems can rnams sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye lha'i dbang po dag 'di ni mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ de bzhin
174b3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i byin rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zab mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyi byin gyi rlabs la ltos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' lding
174b4(rgyud): bsgyings pas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba kun nas me lce 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku phrag pa
174b5(rgyud): gnyis rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ma thag tu klu thams cad kyi lus rab tu 'bar bar gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor bas/ bcom ldan 'das
174b6(rgyud): kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshig lags so// bde bar gshegs pa tshig lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung
174b7(rgyud): bar gnang nas steng du rnam par gzigs te phyogs bcu kun tu'ang gzigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhes te nam mkha' lding gi shugs chen pos kun tu 'bar ba
175a1(rgyud): nam mkha' lding gi gzi brjid kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rjes su dgongs so// oM badz+ra ba tig ru Da be ge hUM hUM/ ra tsa~M sri dza hUM phaT/ de nas klu mi bsrun pa de dag
175a2(rgyud): yur yur por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'dar yod yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam mkha' lding me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po
175a3(rgyud): chen po bka' sprul pa/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la/ ha na ha na/ sarba nA ga hr-id ya d+hA ra NI/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba ka na nan ba la bIr+ya pa ra kra man/ da ha da hA/ sarba/
175a4(rgyud): nA ga ha/ shA ra Ni/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba nA ga mar+m+ma NAM/ ga ru Da be ga ba shi ni pa te/ nad pa ta ya ba ta ya/ sarba nA ga ba ba na ni/ oM ma ta ma ta/ ma hA bi tsi tra ma ni mo hu li da ra hA ma hA ru tra be ga da ra bi tsi tra/
175a5(rgyud): A ba ra Na pra hu shI ta kA ya/ sarba nA gA nan/ ka ra ka ra/ s+phar sma ra/ b+ho ga ru De na panA ga na ban+d+han shAkya mu ne pra tsan ma nu pA la ya/ tardza ya/ nA gA nAn/ pa kli ya/ duSh+TAn pra ma ta ya dar+pa
175a6(rgyud): be dza ga ngan/ s+pho Ta ya/ mUr+tha nAn shai Sha ya/ ti du dz+wa la na/ hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ pra ma ta sarba ba ta a shin ne me kan/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba nA ga ba lan pa ha ra/ pa tsa dur te na/ A ga ra ba ya/
175a7(rgyud): su shA nA gA nA na/ gardza gardza ma hA ga ru Sha be ga na/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ stam+b+ha ya ni shI ta pa la ha kan/ saM b+hak+Sha ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ stam+b+ha ya/ shI ta bA yu/ ru g+ha na/ sarba nA gA b+hi ha ri/
175b1(rgyud): hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ b+ho nA ga a d+hU pa ti/ suwa wi b+hak+Sha bu yun ga ru Da kro b+ham sna be ga ban+d+ha ya bA lu ba la ha kan ti ti kr-i Ti tsi/ hUM dz+dza/ phaT phaT/ b+hA sha ya/ bta shA ti A sha ni na/ nA sha
175b2(rgyud): tsi ti tsi ti/ pha Ta phaT swA hA/ A shA ya/ nA gA nA na/ ban+d+ha ya/ badz+ra ban+d+he na ta thA ga ta sa man+te na/ sa t+yan/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ ti ti ti ti/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT swA hA/ dza laM ba
175b3(rgyud): duH/ sarba a shan+ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA ne na hUM phaT/ a mr-i te ma b+ha ba tu/ sarba shI ta bA yu be ga A shA ni hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ mA ti kra ma s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga mA ti kra ma mU te mU dzAn+na/ ya ti shri ti/
175b4(rgyud): hu ru hu ru/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT swA hA/ brta ya swA hA/ nA ga s+pho Ta ya swA hA/ nA ga bi da rA ya swA hA/ oM swA hA/ swa swA hA/ b+hu ba swA hA/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya swA hA/ tai lokya pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ oM hUM/
175b5(rgyud): hUM/ NAM d+h+r-i d+h+waM/ phaT phaT phaT/ klu'i bdag po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi 'bar ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di ku sa bsrun pa thams cad theg par bye/
175b6(rgyud): pa'o// sprin dang / lhags pa dang / rlung dang / ser pa thams cad 'jig pa'o// zlog pa'o// lo tog yongs su skyong ba'o// me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / nags tshal yongs su skyong ba'o//
175b7(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu yongs su 'grub par byed pa'o// de bas bstabs pa 'phel bar byed pa'o// kye klu'i bdag po dag 'di dran ma thag pa tsam gyis klu'i dkyil 'khor byed pa/ du dang chu mar bcas pa dang /
176a1(rgyud): blon por bcas pa dang / mngag gzhug par bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa lhags pa'i stobs byed pa/ rlung gi stobs byed pa/ sdud pa dang stobs byed pa/ kun thams
176a2(rgyud): cad mthun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' gnang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir lo tog thams cad dang / me tog dang /
176a3(rgyud): 'bras bu thams cad dang / rdzas dang / shing dang / sngan thams cad kun tu srung bgyis shig/ dus dus su char gyi rgyun phob cig/ bdag gi srog ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams
176a4(rgyud): cad rtas par byed pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams yongs su sbyongs shig/ gal te gzhan du 'gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung dge ba ltar ma byas na/ de'i tshe klu thams cad
176a5(rgyud): kyi khyim kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te ma lce gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cig/ klu la mu ge chen po 'byung bar gyur cig/ stobs bri zhing brtson 'grus ma rungs par gyur cig/
176a6(rgyud): chu bskams par gyur cig/ khyim bskams par gyur cig/ lus rtsub par gyur cig/ 'dab bzangs kyis 'jigs pa dang / me dang bye ma'i 'jigs pa dang / rtag tu bkres pa dang skom pas 'jigs/
176a7(rgyud): pa can du gyur cig/ phar chu ga tshur rgyug cing lus kun tu tshig pa dang / nyi ma'i dugs kyis yongs su gdungs pas lus tshig par gyur cig/ nad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba sna tshogs pa/
176b1(rgyud): 'dus par gyur cig/ de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na klu mi bsrun pa/ klu gtum pa/ rab tu gtum pa rnams gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam mkha' lding 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po'i
176b2(rgyud): gzungs 'di las 'gal bar byed na sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po dag de'i phyir bden pa'i yi dam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi rjes su bsrung bar bya'o//
176b3(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// bsrung bar bya'o// bsgrub par bya'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen
176b4(rgyud): po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po nyul ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po
176b5(rgyud): chen po 'bar ba kun tu 'dzin pa kha bye rab tu dga' ba'i gtsug ces bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po tshangs pa'i mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
176b6(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po chen po dbang phyug 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po 'od rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas rgyal mtshan gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po
176b7(rgyud): nor bu mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rab tu gnas pa tshangs pa'i gtsug dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po gtsug gi nor bu 'bar dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po mtsho chen po gnon dang / klu'i
177a1(rgyud): rgyal po chen po kun tu lta ba'i mig dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po khyab 'jug khor yug dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas rnam par bral dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rab tu dga'/
177a2(rgyud): bas char 'bebs dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rnam dag rab dga' dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rab tu gtor ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po glog 'bar dang / klu'i rgyal po chen pos srungs kyi bu dang
177a3(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po chen po chu 'bebs sna tshogs dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po btang bzung stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gsum du rab tu char 'bebs dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rnam
177a4(rgyud): zos bu sna tshogs dang / de la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong klu'i rgyal po chen po re re'ang g.yog 'khor klu'i rigs stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun yod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga ba la
177a5(rgyud): der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te mchod pa chen pos mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
177a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa drag po chen po lta dka' 'ab chen po dag bka' stsal pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni phung ngo // tshig go// sus rab tu 'dar ro
177a7(rgyud): spu zing zhes bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdage cag bas par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan mngon sum du gyur par gnas pa lags te/ 'di ltar 'jigs skrag/ ba spu'i bu gnas kyi phung
177b1(rgyud): zhes bgyid cing / 'jigs pa mi babad pa chen po skyes te/ bas par yang snying sug cing mchis so// bcom ldan 'das skad ma'i tshe srad ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan mas
177b2(rgyud): 'das pa'i slad na dge slong drag shul bgyid pa nor la brkam pa dag mchis pa la/ sad dang / rlung dang / ser ba bzlog pa'i slad du gsol ba btab par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de la klu mi dgrus
177b3(rgyud): pa de dag gis ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ de dag gi srog sbar zhing ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi bu dang tsha bo ji lta bu mang bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i bdag po
177b4(rgyud): chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byams pa la gnas par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dang mthun par bya'o// dus dus su char gyi
177b5(rgyud): rgyun phob cig/ dus dus su me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog sbubs shig/ rlung dang / sprin dang / se ra ba thams cad zlog cig/ chud za bar ma byed cig/ klu'i bdag po dag de'i phyir
177b6(rgyud): khyed phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na gnod pa med par gnas par gyis shig/ klu'i bdag po dag gal te yang dag par dam tshig ma bsrungs na de'i phyir klu'i bdag po dag khyed la nyes pa chen por 'gyur
177b7(rgyud): ro zhe smra'o// thog mar klu bskul ba'i rig pa rdzogs so// / de nas de'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i rig pa'i cho ga klu rnams kyi khros pa zhi bar byed pa nam mkha' lding 'bar ba'i gzi
178a1(rgyud): brjid kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di brjod par bya'o// thog ma kho nar gnam du bltas te yungs kar dang chu bsres pa phyogs bzhir gtor na/ sad dang / rlung dang / sprin dang /
178a2(rgyud): ser ba thams cad thub par 'gyur ro// bcings par 'gyur ro// klu thams cad 'dar yed med cing 'khod par 'gyur ro// thal ba dang chur bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te dbang
178a3(rgyud): bskur na bdag bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// 'brug zer ba'i tshe yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa bdun yongs su bzlas pa byas la/ tshul lan bdun du yongs su bzlas pa byas te gnam la sbyin bcing bar/
178a4(rgyud): bya'o// de nas sprin la bltas te yungs kar gnam du gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad bsdus nas sa'i steng du lhung ngo // sngags kyang brjod cing khros pas phaT ces bya ba brjod par byaste/
178a5(rgyud): phaT ces bya ba lan gsum gyis klu phrug gu rnams kyang lhung bar 'gyur/ klu rnams kyi lus kyang zhig ste thang la lhung bar 'gyur ro// bal po se'u'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas
178a6(rgyud): pa byas te 'khor lo'i tshul du lan bdun bskor na/ klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad sad dang / sprin dang / rlung dang / sar ba thams cad sa la mi 'bebs so// mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so//
178a7(rgyud): mi 'byung ngo // khros pas brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas na klu rnams rigs dang / sprin dang / g.yog 'khor kun dang bcas te sa'i steng du ltung ngo // klu'i khyim dang / gzhan
178b1(rgyud): yas khang mtha' dag dang / chu dang / shing dang / nags tshal du bcas pa me lce 'bar ba gcig tu 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po chen po gzi brjid che ba mthu che ba thams cad kyang klad nad drag pos/
178b2(rgyud): btab par 'gyur ro// gal te rig pa 'dzin pas myur du ma bskyabs na rigs thams cad phung bar 'gyur ro// bu dang / tsha bo dang / 'khor du bcas pa dang / bzhon par bcas te rnam
178b3(rgyud): bar med par 'gyur ro// mig med par 'gyur ro// char med pa'i dus na yungs kar la lan stong pazlas te khyim la gtor na/ klu thams cad 'dar yed yod cing khyim dang mtsho me lce
178b4(rgyud): 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te/ 'dod pa bzhin du myur du char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// yang dang yang char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// gang gi tshe char dgos pa de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas chu dang
178b5(rgyud): yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas te gnas mthon por song la/ shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas chu snyim pa bdun la sngags lan bdun bdun du yongs su bzlas
178b6(rgyud): te shar phyogs su gtor na/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad 'phral du gcig tu 'dus te char gyi rgyun 'be bas so// skya rengs shar ba'i dus na yungs ka ra dang / gur ku ma dang / chu ra bsres la la/
178b7(rgyud): bdun bzlas pa byas te phyogs bzhir gtor zhing / steng dang 'og tu'ang gtor na sad dang / rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad la kun nas dpag tshad tshun chad du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro//
179a1(rgyud): klu mi bsrun pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// klu thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// bser skya'i lcibs la ma ltung bar blangs pa dang / de nyid kyi mar dang / 'o ma dang/
179a2(rgyud): gcin blangs la sab ta byis ka dang / bag phye dang / thams cad bsres la lan dgu bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas pa byas te/ de nas klu mgo lnga pa bya'o// mgo gdengs ka can gyi skyil mo krung bcas pa lus bcus/
179a3(rgyud): pa byas te/ tsan dran dkar po dang gur kum gyis lus bkru bar bya'o// stan gtsang ma'i steng du gzhag go/ dar gyi cod pan gyis dbang bskur ro// me tog gi 'phreng ba gdags so// dkyil 'khor/
179a4(rgyud): gru bzhi pa byas te me tog sil ma gtor/ bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag go/ mda' bzhi btsugs te dar gyi ba dan dkar po bzhi gdags so// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gtor ma gzhag go// dkyil 'khor
179a5(rgyud): gra bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi gzugs so// tshon sna lnga'i skud pas lan lnga bskor ro// kun la'ang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te las bya'o// bum pa'i mgul dar gyis bcing ngo // nal da dang /
179a6(rgyud): sra rtsi pog dang / rgya spos dang / kun dur dang / sen mo dang / nA ga pus pa dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / sha kar dang bsres la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bdug par bya'o// bdug pa 'di
179a7(rgyud): sbyar la/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas shin tu khrus byas te gos gtsang mgyon la/ sngags 'di nyid kyis nye reg dang / brag bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing
179b1(rgyud): ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / gos gdeg pa dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / khrus bya ba rnams bya'o// kru kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ rig pa 'dzin pa klu la bltas te
179b2(rgyud): skyil mo krung du 'dug la/ sngags 'di nyid kyis dgug pa dang / gtor ma dang / bdug pas slar btang bar bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas stong rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar re re
179b3(rgyud): la bzlas la klu'i gzugs la bsnun par bya'o// mar ma kha bzhi bud do// klu'i ming bri'o// gang bos pa de 'greng bar 'gyur ro// bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas na klu'i rgyal po chen po thams
179b4(rgyud): cad dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad stong par 'gyur ro// ci bsam pa de thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// dbang thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro// dbang gi skye bo dang 'khor du bcas pa dang /
179b5(rgyud): bu dang / tsha bor bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// rang gi khyim bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i gzugs de gnas dben par bzhag
179b6(rgyud): la/ me tog dang bdug pa sbyin no// lang long med par bzhag cing mi mthong bar bya ste/ su la'ang mi bstan no// gos gtsang mas dgab bo// na ma dgos pa yod pa de'i tshe yungs kar la lan
179b7(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te bsnun na dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gar btab pa der 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong ngo // rmi lam du dgos pa thams cad ston cig las
180a1(rgyud): thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// kwa'i mngag gzhug pa zhes bya'o// gang gi mdus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / sad byung bde'i tshe na tsho'i 'bru nga /
180a2(rgyud): yungs kar du bsres la lan brgya rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te/ khros pas klu'i gzugs la bsnun na skad cig de la rlung dang / ser ba dang / sprin med par 'gyur te/ thams cad bcing bar 'gyur/
180a3(rgyud): ro/ zan pa byung ba de'i tshe yi ger bris la skud pa dmar pos dkris la skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te/ klu'i mgul du btags la klu'i spyi bor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas na skad
180a4(rgyud): cig de la char gyi rgyun 'bebs te/ sgrub pa pos ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin char 'bebs so// ha cang char chen skud pa sngon po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te mdud pa bdun pon char chen po mi 'bab par/
180a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// cho ga dang rig pa sgrung pa gzhan thams cad la'ang sngags 'di thog ma kho nar lan bdun brjod do// 'di kun tu sbyor ba ste/ brjod pa sgrub pa 'grub bo// nam mkha' lding chen po
180a6(rgyud): rdo rje shugs 'bar ba nam mkha' lding gi snying po dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / de nas de'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i snying po'i cho ga bstan to// gzungs bton ma
180a7(rgyud): thag pa tsam gyis klu thams cad 'dar yed yod do// bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma dang / shing ka ral+li ra'i lcug mas rlung dang sprin 'thog par bya'o// ba'i sdigs la ma lhung bas khang stang du
180b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi pa shin tu rnam par phye ba re'u cha legs par byas te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa brgyad phyogs mtshams su gzugs so// mda' lnga gzugs so// rtse gsum/
180b2(rgyud): pa gzugs so// mda' bzhi la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa bzhis 'khor bar bskor ro// bum pa gang ba bzhi dang / pog por dang / gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag go/ gtor ma dkar pos bkang /
180b3(rgyud): ba bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag/ me tog sil mas gang bar gtor/ pra yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor ro// thams cad la lan bdun bdun gyi bzlas pa byas te gzugs so//
180b4(rgyud): yungs kar dang chu bsres la bzlas pa byas pas phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad do// de nas dpag tshad tshun chad kun tu mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// der klu mi bsrun pa rnams
180b5(rgyud): 'phrog mi nus so// klu chen po rnams kyang rtag tu dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba 'bebs mi nus so// me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad la 'tshe'ang mi nus/ lan 'ga' yang
180b6(rgyud): rtswa'i lo ma la'ang 'tshe mi nus/ bcing ba lngas bsdams te thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// 'di zla brgyad du mtshams bcings par 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / srin po dang
180b7(rgyud): yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / gsang ba pa de rnams gnas 'di las mi 'da' 'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma la lan
181a1(rgyud): bdun bzlas pas klu bzlog par bya'o// shin tu khros pas bzlog par bya ba ni ma yin no// klu'i skyil mo krung gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ mdzub mo gnyis mgo bo gdengs
181a2(rgyud): ka ltar byas la mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ngo // 'di ni klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// brjod ma thag tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi snying dag la gnod par 'gyur ro// gal te klu dag phyogs de ma
181a3(rgyud): rungs par bya bar 'dod na de'i tshe bye tshan mgo la 'bab bo// mgo dang / mjug ma dang / khog pa ji tsam pa de tsam du lus la ral gri'i char gyi rgyan 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas klu thams
181a4(rgyud): cad sngangs skrag par gnas par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// khang steng du dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi pa
181a5(rgyud): byas te/ me tog sil mas gang bar gtor la 'dug pas bdugs te/ bum pa chus gang ba thams cad la lan bdun du bzlas par bya'o// gtor ma gzhag go// seng ldeng gi phur bu la
181a6(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btsugs na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / sad kyi nyes pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur te/ phur bu ma
181a7(rgyud): phyung gi bar du thub par 'gyur ro// yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas la sprin la bltas te gtor na ser ba thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro// shing ka ra wI ra'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
181b1(rgyud): bzlas te gdu bur byas na thams cad du ser ba chod par 'gyur ro// shing ka ra wI ra dmar po'i me tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ glog 'byung ba'i tshe na nam mkha' la 'phangs na nam ma
181b2(rgyud): nyid du 'dug ste bcings par 'gyur ro// tshu la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na grol bar 'gyur ro// 'brug zer ba'i tshe rtse gsum pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btsugs na
181b3(rgyud): rtse gsum pa ma phyung gi bar du 'brug zer te sprin bcings par 'gyur ro// phyung nas grol bar 'gyur ro// ral gri la lan bdun bzlas te/ klu'i phyag rgya skyil mo krung gis bzung la sprin la bltas te 'dug
181b4(rgyud): na bzung ma thag tu klu mtha' dga' bar bar 'gyur te/ klu thams cad lkugs par 'gyur ro// ral gri thogs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gur kum gyis de'i steng du nam mkha' lding bris nas ji lta ji
181b5(rgyud): lta bur bskor ba de lta de lta bur nam mkha' lding gi 'dab gshog klu'i lus la 'bab par 'gyur te/ klu thams cad skrag cing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur te/ phyis rlung dang ser ba 'bebs mi nus
181b6(rgyud): so// shing ka ra wA ra'i me tog dang yungs kar bsres te/ dkyil 'khor du lan drug tu sbyin sreg byas na klu thams cad grang ba'i stobs byed pa dang / ser pa dang kha ba'i bar la sogs pa thub par
181b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe char dgos par 'gyur ba de'i tshe char 'bebs so// spra tshil las klu'i gzugs tshad sor bzhi pa mgo lnga pa byas te/ gser gyis g.yogs la steng gos dkar pos
182a1(rgyud): g.yogs te/ rtsa ba'i sngags lan stong bzlas pa byas la/ bum pa gsar pa ma spyad pa'i nang du bcug ste lus gos kyis dkri'o// rgyas gdab bo// ba'i lci bas dkyil
182a2(rgyud): 'khor grwa bzhi pa byas la pra ltos dang yungs kar gyis gtor la bdug pas bdug ste/ sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas te bum pa la dal du dal
182a3(rgyud): dus gzhus na ser ba thams cad bum pa'i nang du 'pho'o// klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs spra tshol la byas pa la klu thams cad kyi ming bris na gang gi ming gis rigs
182a4(rgyud): brjod pas klu de dbang du 'gyur te/ 'khor dang bcas pa bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing ci bsgo ba de thams cad byed do// klu'i rgyal po chos can ma yin pa yul yongs su mi
182a5(rgyud): skyong ba/ me tog dang 'bras bu chud gzon pa'i klu'i khyim du song ste/ shin tu khrus byas la gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te rig pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na klu'i khyim de nas bud
182a6(rgyud): med rgan mo dag 'byung zhing / rig pa 'dzin pa ci tshol zhes zer ba dang / lan ma gdab par rdo rje sa la brdab par bya'o// phaT ces bya ba brjod par bya'o// klu rgan mo de dus nas shi 'o shi'i
182a7(rgyud): zhes zer zhing khyim du 'jug go/ de nas klu rnams 'dus te dngangs skrag ste/ khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/ kye rig pa 'dzin pa ci zhig tshol
182b1(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pas sngar sngags brjod la/ khros pas bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma sa la brdabs pa dang / khye'u'i gzugs can de sa la 'gre ldog cing kye rig pa 'dzin pa ci zhig tshol zhe/
182b2(rgyud): smra'o// rig pa 'dzin pas snying rje med par bya ste/ bsgyel ba'i tshul bsgyel ba dang / 'di skad ces kyi rig pa 'dzin pa bsgo ba thams cad bgyid do// sba'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas
182b3(rgyud): 'di skad ces brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig srungs shig/ srung ngo // rig pa 'dzin pas yang 'di skad ces brjod do// dge ba bcu zung zhig/ 'dzin to// rig pa 'dzin pas
182b4(rgyud): yang gsum la skyabs su gsol/ btang ngo // rjes su 'dzin to// rig pa 'dzin pa phur bu dbyung du gsol/ mi dbyung ngo // 'di skad ces brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam
182b5(rgyud): tshig bzlas pa rjes su zung zhig/ gdod phur bur dbyung ngo zhes bya'o// 'on kyang klu de 'khor dang bcas te gnyis la gtug go// gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi
182b6(rgyud): lam rjes su sbyin par bya'o// dam tshig rjes su 'dzin du gzhug go/ de nas gdod phur bu phyung la de nyid du kha zas kyang byin dang klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rang gi khyim du 'jug pa bzhin
182b7(rgyud): du zhugs shing las su bya ba rnams ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro// gang du btang ba der 'gro'o// bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i khyi
183a1(rgyud): der phyis klu mi bsrun pa mi 'byung ngo // dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// dus dus su lo tog sgrub bo// der me tog dang 'bras bu dang / lo ma rnams sgrub bo//
183a2(rgyud): phyis gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ro// bklags pas 'grub pa'i gzungs chen po las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// las thams cad 'grub mchog 'grub pa bla na med pa'o// rtsa ba
183a3(rgyud): sngags kyi bya ba'i cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su thal mo sbar ba btud de/ bcom ldan/
183a4(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis klu thams cad kyi snying 'bar bar bgyid pa/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / sprin dang ser ba thams cad zlog pa
183a5(rgyud): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog thams cad sgrub pa/ sa'i rdul dang / snying po dang / byin 'phel bar bgyid pa/ rdo rje'i mchu glog 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bgyi na
183a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad re ba thams cad yongs su bsnang ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnam mkha' lding gi dbang po la
183a7(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha' lding gi bdag po rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
183b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis kyang byin gyis brlabs kyis nam mkha' lding gi bdag po klu mi bsrun pa rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir smros shig/ de nas
183b2(rgyud): nam mkha' lding gi bdag pos rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsar+N+Na badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mas+t+rai lo kya a d+hi pa ta ye/ na maHtsa tu ran
183b3(rgyud): mo ma hA ra dzA nAn/ oM badz+ra dun+te dun+te/ ma hA dun+ta/ du ti d+ya ti/ badz+ra shi khan+da d+he/ ma Ni ka na ka bi tsi tra/ A ba ra Na bi b+hu Shi ta ga rI ra/ hUM hUM hU hUM hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT badz+ra phaT/ nA ka rA dza bi d+hA
183b4(rgyud): ba Ni hr-i da ya~M/ s+pho Ta ya badz+ra dun+d+ha na/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ dz+wa li ta badz+ra dun+te na/ han ha na/ ga ru Ta bak+Sha ni pa ten b+ha smi ku ru ku ru ku ru ku ru ku ru/ duShAn nA gA nAn/ hUM hUM hUM hUM b+h+rUMphaT phaT pa
183b5(rgyud): phaT phaT/ b+ho b+ho ban+d+ha gen+d+ha sU ta sU ta sU ta dan du nA ga sma kA ni kro d+ha ra dza ma pA ba la pa rA kra ma dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ b+haM ga ru Ta rA dza ba badz+ra duH
183b6(rgyud): su bar+Na pak+Sha ma hA ba la/ ma hA ka na ka bi tsi tri ma pUd ra/ ba kA ya duSh+pa nA gan bi ba du b+ho bA yu ba la kan hUM hUM/ phaT laT/ sho Sha ya shI te ba la ha ga ga ru Ta uSh+peSh+ma Na/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/
183b7(rgyud): b+ho b+ho badz+ra dun+ta bi tsu hUn/ bi du dz+wa la na/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ b+hany+dza ya/ sarba sha ri ni mA ti kra ma sau man/ b+ho ban nA gen dra mA te/ badz+ra dun+ta na sU ra nAn/ swa ta lA me/ ha ra ha ra/ khraH/
184a1(rgyud): ra hUM phaT/ ma ta ma ta/ sarba nA gA nAn/ hUM hUM phaT/ ta thA ga ta ba tsa na ma nu sma ra hUM hU~M phaT/ badz+ra pA Ni sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ trai lokya a d+hi pa te ra ba tsan
184a2(rgyud): mnu pA la ya hUM hUM phaT/ sa ra sa ra/ s+pha ra s+pha ra/ sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ tre rat+na sa t+ye na/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ hriHbadz+ra dun+ta sarba nA ga bi dran kar hUM hU~M hU~M/ phaT sAhA/ tri rat+na ma nu pA la
184a3(rgyud): ya hUM hUM hUM phaT/ pra ma dan ta ha da sa hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ bi ni tsakra ha ta/ hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ ma he shwa ra tri shU la hastA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ ga ru Ta te dza ha sA ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ ga ru Ta bi kra mA ya
184a4(rgyud): hUM hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ nA ga ku la nA sha nA ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ ga ru Ta sarba A shA na~M ba pa nA ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ sarba pA pa bA yu saM b+hak+Sha NA ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ sarba a kA la bA ta me g+ha A shwa ni ba ra NA ya hUM
184a5(rgyud): hUM phaT phaT swA hU~M/ ma hA badz+ra dz+wa la swAhA/ sarba duSh+TAn nA ga bi nA sha kA ya swA hA/ ga ru Ta hrid ya swAhA/ ga ru Ta dun+ta ya swA hA/ sarba nA shA nA ya swA hA/ oM du nu du ru swA hA/ mU ru mu ru swA hA/ tu ru tu ru
184a6(rgyud): swA hA/ do ra di ri/ du ru ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT baT phaT phaT swAhA/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos rdo rje mchu'i gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig
184a7(rgyud): brgya stong phrag brgyad cu khas bub tu 'gyel nas lus rdul byung zhing lus rab tu 'dar te brgyal nas sa la 'gre ldog go// kye ma'o gzungs chen po sngags kyi tshig mi bzad pa dag smras so zhes/
184b1(rgyud): 'dzer zhing / thams cad lus 'dar yid yod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsog// bde bar gshegs/
184b2(rgyud): pa bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling du ma rungs par mi bgyid do// me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo rtog ma rungs par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das
184b3(rgyud): sa phyogs 'di mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'dzin te/ gang na cho ga'i rgyal po chen po 'di spyod pa dang / gang na gnas pas spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rgyun du de bzhin gshegs
184b4(rgyud): pa'i mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'dzin to// yul lam/ grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam/ ri brag gam/ grong ngam/ gtsug lag khang de rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / sba bar
184b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// sad dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i sprin thams cad sdum pa dang / mngar ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / ro zhim pa dang / snyi ba dang / ro bro ba'i me tog dang
184b6(rgyud): 'bras bu dang / lo tog thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// 'thab pa dang / sdig pa thams cad byang ba dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// dus dus su char gyi rgyun dbab par
184b7(rgyud): bgyi'o// me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams yang dag par 'grub par bgyi/ sha spang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / byi ba dang / sbrul dang / sbal ba dang / tre ma bu ga dang
185a1(rgyud): ma kI ka dang / trai la ta dang sha ta pa dang / bung ba dang ka ne tse dang / ri skegs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad med par bgyi rnam par 'jig par bgyi/ yams kyi nad dang
185a2(rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// bzlog par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sran chad sdig pa'i las kun tu spyod pa'i tshul mi spyod par bgyi/ char gnod par 'bab pa dang / dus ma lags
185a3(rgyud): pa'i char thams cad ma mchis par 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mna'i yidas gyis gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog gsum gyi dgongs pa bslab pa'i sdom pa yongs su
185a4(rgyud): bslang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi bgyid/ bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
185a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bka' lung bzhin du slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// kun tu 'dzin par bgyi'o// dge ba dang bde ba dang lo legs par kun tu
185a6(rgyud): bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po la dbugs byung nas 'di skad ces dka' stsal to// klu'i rgyal po dag de ltar gyis shig/ yal bar ma gtang zhig/ de nas
185a7(rgyud): de'i 'og tu cho ga bya ba brjod par bya ste/ sngags 'di dpa' ba gcig pu ni// las kun byed pa dge ba ste// shes rab can gyis lan cig dran// dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur//
185b1(rgyud): mthon po'i gnas su mkhas pa yis// sgra skad chen po brjod par bya// gnas gang dang gang du smra ba spags pa de dang der dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / sad dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang
185b2(rgyud): glog thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// sus kyang byin 'phrog par mi nus so// gtse bar mi nus so// gnas mthon po'i ri 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/
185b3(rgyud): gnas khang shin tu mtho ba der rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang mar byas te/ gos gtsang ma dkar po bgos la kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ ba'i lci ba dang 'jim pa bsres pas dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi
185b4(rgyud): pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mda' gang tsam pa zhig btsugs te sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa btsugs te
185b5(rgyud): sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pas lan gsum 'khris par bskor ro// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pog por bzhag la la na bdun bzlas pa'i bdug pas
185b6(rgyud): bdug go// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas la yungs kar gyis gtor ro// me tog sil mas gang bar gtor ro// phyogs bzhir gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag go/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
185b7(rgyud): su gtor ma gzhag par bya ste/ zho dang / 'o ma dang / 'bras btsos pa dang / bu ram dang / sha ka ras gdab bo// chu dang yungs kar la sngags lan lnga brjod de/ phyogs bzhir mtshams
186a1(rgyud): gcad par bgyi/ zla ba nyal sbyor ba bya'o// skad cher bklags la phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og tu yungs kar gtor zhing klu thams cad kyi sa ma'i ming nas brjod na
186a2(rgyud): cho ga 'di byas ma thag tu dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / klu mi bsrun pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur/ thub par 'gyur ro// lhas ngan pa dang / sems kyi nad dang /
186a3(rgyud): gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / gdon dang / 'byung po dang / sha ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad rgyang ring du spangs par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor
186a4(rgyud): yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang / na ba thams cad dang / gnod par sems pa dang / rab tu gnod par sems pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phyir gnod
186a5(rgyud): par byed pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog thams cad legs par yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/ legs par yongs su smin pa dang ro/
186a6(rgyud): zhim par 'gyur ro// sa bon legs par btab pa thams cad lags par 'khrungs par 'gyur ro// gshed byed dang / las dang / byad stems thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/
186a7(rgyud): mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// de srid du klu thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// me tog dang / 'bras bu dang /
186b1(rgyud): lo tog thams cad legs par yongs su rgyas par 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du dgos par 'gyur ba thams cad lan cig dran par byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// spra tshol las nam//
186b2(rgyud): mkha' lding gi gzugs sor brgyad pa skyil mo krung bcas pa/ 'dab ma brkyang ba/ klu rgyal gdan du bting ba/ mgo dgu pa/ mgo rgyan du thogs pa/ klu mgo gsum pa lag pa g.yas na
186b3(rgyud): thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba lag pa g.yon na thogs pa/ gser gyis g.yogs pa byas te cho ga bzhin du tshon gyis ri mo bris la/ stan sna tshogs kyi steng du bzhag la/ nyin zhag gcig
186b4(rgyud): la sngags stong brjod do// nam lus kyis mi thub pa'i tshe kha zas dkar po bza' bar bya ste/ yang khrus byas la bsgrub par bya'o// gu gul gyis bdug go// me tog dang / bdug pa dang
186b5(rgyud): gtor ma ci 'byor pa sbyar ro// mar me btang la de'i mdun du nyal na ston par 'gyur zhing las thams cad rjod par 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// las thams cad byed
186b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// tsi bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro// lang long med pa'i gnas su bzhag la/ nam zan pa byung ba'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas blangs te klu'i gnas su bkur bar bya/ klu'i gnas mtshor
186b7(rgyud): bzhag la me tog dang bdug pa byin la/ yungs kar la sngags lan gsum bzlas te gnas su gtor na 'phral du klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// gal te 'bral du char gyi rgyun mi 'bengs
187a1(rgyud): na/ de'i phyir klu'i gnas kun tu nam mkha' lding gis gang bar mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas me lce gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur/ bye tshan mgo la 'bab par 'gyur/
187a2(rgyud): chu ba skams par 'gyur ro// zan pa byung ba'i tshe sprin la bstan na char 'bebs par 'gyur ro// rlung dang / sprin dang / se ra ba dang / sad dang / char sprin la bstan na skad cig tu med par 'gyur ro//
187a3(rgyud): dpag tshad bdun gyi nang du phyogs bzhi kun tu ser ba mi 'bab cing / sad dang dus ma yin pa'i rlung gis mi tshugs par 'gyur te/ thams cad thub par 'gyur/ rlung 'khrugs pa'i tshe lam gyi bzhi mdor
187a4(rgyud): gzhag go// yang na grong khyer gyi skor ro// yang na rgyal po'i sgor gzhag go// des rlung thams cad chod par 'gyur ro// rlung chen po rnam par 'thor rlung yang chod par 'gyur ro// phyis ldang mi nus so//
187a5(rgyud): bstan ma thag tu klu thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro// rdo rje mchu'i gzungs las thams cad byed pa/ nam mkha' lding bklags pas 'grub pa mchog tu 'grub bo// de nas tshangs pa dang
187a6(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
187a7(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad tshogs pas kyang rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ klu thams cad kyi snying 'phrog pa
187b1(rgyud): snying 'gems pa/ klu mi bsrun pa'i rigs phung bar bgyid pa/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad sel ba/ lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad sgrub pa 'dul na/ sems
187b2(rgyud): can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
187b3(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir ngas byin gyis brlab kyis rjod cig/ de nas tshangs pa dang /
187b4(rgyud): khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis gzungs 'di smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+tha te samyaka saM bu d+hA ya/
187b5(rgyud): na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra d+ha ra ya/ ma hA ba la pa rA kra mA ya/ na ma s+t+rai lo kya murta ye/ na ma sh+tsa tu ra NAM/ na mo badz+ra sha ni dz+wa li ta r-i trAT+Ta ha sA ya/ dza ya ma hA ba la dIr+yA pa ra kra ma kro d+ha rA dza pra h+ma brah+mas/
187b6(rgyud): b+ho d+ho nA ga a d+hi pa ti bi sa ra ta bi sa ra ta/ ma re brah+ma dAn+te nA ma mUr+N+Na nAn/ pra ta ya hUM hUM phaT/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ dik+ShA tsakra hasta na pro shA nA gen du ma ti biSh+pa tsakre shr-its+tshi rA mi/ tu tI tu ti/ li li li li/
187b7(rgyud): hUM hUM dzakra mu hu mu hu mu h+yan+tu sarba duSh+Ta nA gA nAM/ s+pho Ta ya hr-i da yaM ma he shwa ra dz+wa li ta tr-i shU la d+ha ra/ ha na ha na hrIM hUM phaT/ mu tsi mu tsi/ tu ti t+ya ti/ b+ha ba b+ha ba/ k+Shi Na k+Shi ni k+Shi ni/ tsa tur+N+Na ma ri tsin+dan/
188a1(rgyud): dz+wa li tA shak+ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hUM hUM phaT/ spur s+pha ra/ bi s+phu ra bi s+phur/ tsa ra tsa ra/ nA sha ya/ duSh+Tan nA ga hr-i da yaM/ s+pho Ta ya hUM hUM phaT saM ha ra sa ha ra/ duShAn ya sha na
188a2(rgyud): ba ti nA ga na shI ti ba d+hu dz+wa la d+ha smi ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sa ma ya ma nu stA ra b+ho nA ga a d+hi pa te badz+ra ba ya b+h+yo b+h+yo tu ti tu ti hU~M hU~M phaT baT swAhA/ badz+ra a shA na ni nA sha ya hUM phaT swA hA/ sarba nA gar+tha
188a3(rgyud): da yA ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT swA hA/ bud+d+ha bai lo ki tA ya swA hA/ brah+ma ya swA hA/ biSh+Nu murti swAhA/ ma he shwa ra dz+wa li ta tri shU lA ya swAhA/ tsa tu ra ma hA ra dza sa ma ma d+ha rA ya swA hA / b+hu dza gA ya swA hA / nA ga ar+d+he/
188a4(rgyud): pa ta ye swA hA oM d+hi ri d+hi ri swA hA/ dz+wa l-i ta bAk+ShA ya swAhA/ ro ma hA ra nA sha ya swA hA/ dz+ra d+hi dzu ti dzu ti swA hA/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu zhes bya ba'i gzung /
188a5(rgyud): 'di brjod ma thag tu kru mi bsrun pa thams cad lus rul te dri mi zhim par gyur to// lus shig shig por gyur cing sha bkras btab par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te
188a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis smad par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni brlag go/ bcom ldan
188a7(rgyud): 'das slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi bgyid do// gnod par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu'i gzungs 'di brjod pa der
188b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das klu thams cad gnod par sems shing mi mchi ste/ za na lta bar yang mi bgyid na/ 'jug pa lta smos kyang bci 'tshal/ de nas 'di'i cho ga brjod de// gzungs 'di dran pa tsam
188b2(rgyud): gyis klu thams cad kyi lus dum bu dum bur 'drul lo// lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro// yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor na klu thams cad bcings par 'gyur
188b3(rgyud): ro// dpag tshad bdun kho ra khor yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// rdo rje la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te klu bzlog par bya'o// lan cig brjod na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser
188b4(rgyud): ba thams cad zlog go// thams cad med par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis ser ba thams cad skad cig tu med par 'gyur ro// gal te 'bab na'ang yud tsam gyis chur 'gyur ro// ser ba
188b5(rgyud): 'bab pa'i dus na rdo rje bskor na phyogs gang du bskor ba der ser ba 'grims par 'gyur te/ phyogs der ser ba mi 'bab par 'gyur ro// nang par dben par song ste nang du yang dag 'jog
188b6(rgyud): tu zhugs la/ skyil mo krung gi phyag rgya bcings te/ sngags 'di lan sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod de/ brjod ma thag tu rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad med par 'gyur ro// rlung thams cad
188b7(rgyud): rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yungs kar phyogs bzhir gtor na lo gcig khyud kor du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// rlung dang / sprin dang / ser pa thams cad
189a1(rgyud): bcings par 'gyur ro// klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bu dang tsha bo 'khor dang bcas pa rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// las thams
189a2(rgyud): cad byed par 'gyur ro// dril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na dkrol na klu mi bsrun pa thams cad kyi klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' las sa la lhung
189a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di ni thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po dang
189a4(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ tshangs pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / klu mi bsrun pa dang //
189a5(rgyud): snying rje med pa/ 'tshe ba rnams gdul ba dang / tshar gcad pa dang / chad pas gcad pa'i phyir khyod kyis rig pa chen po'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di brjod nas 'dzam bu'i gling du/
189a6(rgyud): bzhag pa legs so legs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rnam par kun nas bskor ba dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po gzi brjid che zhing rdzu
189a7(rgyud): 'phrul che ba dang / gzhan yang klu mi bsrun pa bye ba phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
189b1(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pas srad ma'i tshe skad ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang /
189b2(rgyud): lo ma dang / yal ga rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyid do// rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / sad dang / tshad pa thams cad zlog par bgyid do// dus dus su char gyi
189b3(rgyud): rgyun 'bebs par 'tshal lo// rang gi mna'i yi dam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig bskyang bar 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs shing bsam pa grub par
189b4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// mi 'tshe bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gal te cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las gong du sngags dang gzungs ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams dang 'gal bar bgyid na
189b5(rgyud): bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ 'di ni bro bor ba ste/ tad+ya thA/ pa ki tsa ti/ shu li shu mu li/ sha sha shu shu/ ti ti bi ri ti/ hu yu hu yu/ hu ri ti swA hA kabacom ldan
189b6(rgyud): 'das 'di ni klu'i mna' lags te/ srad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na klu mi bsrun pa rnams 'jig par bgyid do// than pa dang / zan pa che ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / rlung dang / sprin dang /
189b7(rgyud): ser ba dang / sad dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / glog byung na/ ri 'am khang pa mthon po'i steng du rig pa 'dzin pa kha shar phyogs su bltas te mna' 'di dag gis bstod de lan bdun brjod la/
190a1(rgyud): chu dang yungs kar bsres pa phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o// gtor cing dran ma thag tu klu thams cad kyi lus rnams dum du brgyar 'chad par 'gyur ro// gyes par 'gyur
190a2(rgyud): rog 'gugs par 'gyur te/ de'i slad du char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po khyed kyis de ltar byos shig/ rdo rje mchu'i cho ga rdzogs so//
190a3(rgyud): bod skad du/ rdo rje mnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /
190a4(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
190a5(rgyud): bdag cag thams cad 'dus nas klu thams cad kyi snying 'phrog par bgyid pa/ snying 'gems par bgyid pa/ klu ma rungs pa rnams kyi rigs phung bar 'gyur ba/ rlung dang ser ba'i sprin thams
190a6(rgyud): cad zlog par bgyid pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog thams cad 'byor par bgyid pa/ rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
190a7(rgyud): kyis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i slad du byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal po chen po
190b1(rgyud): bzhi la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rnams ngas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ khyed kyis spros shig ces bka'
190b2(rgyud): sbal pa dang / de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis gzungs sngags 'di smras te/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
190b3(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dzin drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// pha
190b4(rgyud): rol zil gyis gnon pa'i mthu bo che rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gnam ljags 'bar ba ma rungs
190b5(rgyud): pa drag tu rgod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ dz+wa lo ta/ bi krI Ta/ badz+ra dza ya dza ya/ ma hA ba la b+h+yo ra bI ra pa ra kra ma kro d+hA rA dza/ pra ma b+ha pu pu ma/ pra ma swa re/ b+ho b+ho nA ga de bi de
190b6(rgyud): byi sa ra ma d+hA/ pra ma d+ha na d+he na/ mUr+d+ha nAn/ s+pho Ta yA ma/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bar+N+Na tsakra/ ha d+ha ni b+ho pan nA gaun+na/ mA tI kra ma tha bar+N+Na tsakra Na/ shi ra tsaun+ta ma Ni hU ti hUM ti li hUM hUM phaT phaT mra
190b7(rgyud): du mu du mu h+yen+tu/ sarba duSh+TAn s+pho Ta ye/ hr-i da ya/ ma he shwa ra dz+wa li ta/ tri shU la d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha na ha na/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ mu tsi mu tsi/ du di ba b+ha ba d+ha/ k+Sha Ne kA Ne tsa tu ra NA na ma hA rA dzA nAn/
191a1(rgyud): dz+wa li ta shak+ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hUM phaT/ s+phu ra s+phu ra/ bi s+phu ra bi s+phu ra bi s+phu ra/ tsa rarba tsa ra rba tsa rarba/ nA sha ya duSh+TAn nA ga hr-id ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ duSh+Ta A shA ni/
191a2(rgyud): b+hud+d+ha ma ga shi bIr+ya dz+wa la/ b+hasmi ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ b+ho nA gA d+hi pa ti bi tsin+tu/ bi bo yA/ b+h+yo b+ho tu/ tu ti tu ti/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ badz+ra A shA ni nA sha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/
191a3(rgyud): sAhA / badz+ra A shA ni nA sha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sarba nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ bi s+pho Ta kA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ bud+d+ha bi lo ki ta ya swA hA/ brah+ma ya swA hA/ biny+tsa mu rA ya swA hA/ ma he shwa ra dz+wa li ta tri thA/
191a4(rgyud): lA ya sA hA/ tsa tu ra ma hA rA dza sa ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ bi tsa ga ti ya phaT swA hA/ oM di ri di ri swA hA/ dzA li ta bA ka tA ya swA hA/ dzu ti dzu ti swA hA/ phaT phaT/ rdo rje 'ab ra ba ga na ma
191a5(rgyud): lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di thos ma thag tu klu ma rungs pa thams cad lus rul nas dri mi zhim pa mnam par 'gyur ro// lus so sor zhig cing 'pho bar gyur nas
191a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyab tu gsol/ lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis smad par gyur
191a7(rgyud): bdag cag ni ma rungs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can rnams la gnod par mi bgyid/ 'gum par mi bgyid/ chung ngu na mig kyang lta bar mi/
191b1(rgyud): bgyid na skabs lta bar lta rtsa smos/ rgya mtsho klu'i rgyal po dang / klu'i rgyal po gdugs lta bu dang / klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba dang / mdangs che ba dang / ma rungs pa la sogs te/ klu bye ba 3
191b2(rgyud): khrig brgya stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ klu thams cad kyis dus phyi ma'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la gnod par mi
191b3(rgyud): bgyid/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang me tog dang / lo ma dang / yal ga thams cad srung bar bgyid/ rlung dang ser ba thams cad dgag par bgyid/ dus dus
191b4(rgyud): su char dbab par bgyid par rang gi bro'i tshig gi yi dam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o// sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong ba dang / yid
191b5(rgyud): la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/ gnod par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag las 'gal bar bgyid na/ bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
191b6(rgyud): bar 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bro'i tshig kyang 'di lags te tad+ya thA/ oM ta gi tsa gi/ g+hu li g+hu li/ mu li sha sha/ gu gushI ti/ bI ra ma ti/ hu yu hu yu swA hA/ char che ba'am
191b7(rgyud): char mi 'bab pa'am/ dus ma yin par char 'bab pa 'am/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / grang ba'i rlung dang / gnam lpags lhung ba'i rig 'dzin gyi sa bro tshig 'di khang to//
192a1(rgyud): gam/ sa mthon po'am/ ri'i steng du'ang rung / kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ lan bdun skad chen por bzlas/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te gyen du gtor na/ gtor ma
192a2(rgyud): thag tu klu thams cad du ma bur 'gyur zhing / nan tan byas pas myur du char 'bebs so// gzungs 'di nyid kyis dril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na sa
192a3(rgyud): nan tur drag por byas te phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// rdo rje gnam lcags mchu lan brgyad du bzlas pas klu dgag par bya/ lan cig dran pas rlung dang ser ba war
192a4(rgyud): bzlog par bya'o// gnam lcags lhung na'ang chur 'gyur ro// rdo rje bskor na phyogs gang du bskor ba der ser ba 'byol lo// nang par sngar sa dben par 'dug ste/ sngags 'di la na sum cu
192a5(rgyud): rtsa gnyis bzlas na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba'ang 'gag par 'gyur ro// klus gnod pa mi byed cing phyis kyang mi tshugs so// yungs kar la bsngags te phyogs bzhir gtor na lo gcig
192a6(rgyud): gi bar du mtshams bcad par 'gyur te/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba'ang mi g.yo'o// ngag nyan cing kun tu srung ba dang / las byed par 'gyur ro// sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te dril bu/
192a7(rgyud): dkrol na klad pa 'gas shing sa la lhung bar 'gyur te/ gnod pa byed pa sel lo// mchod pa tshul bzhin bsngags par byas te/ skad gsal bar bklags te phyogs bzhi steng 'og tu yungs
192b1(rgyud): kar gtor na ser ba dang / rlung dang / klus gnod par byed pa bcings par 'gyur/ ltas ngan pa dang / mi dge ba dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / gza' dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang
192b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po'ang phyir bskrad par 'gyur/ dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur/ nad dang / gnod par sems pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra
192b3(rgyud): bgegs thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro// lo tog dang / 'bras bu dang / khu ba rgyas pa dang / smin pa dang / che bar 'gyur/ 'byung po dang gnod pa thams cad kyis mi
192b4(rgyud): tshugs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya lo ha dur+d+ha nA ma d+hA ra Ni/
192b5(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa lcags ma chu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na
192b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na sa rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas/ a mra'i tshal du lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang po
192b7(rgyud): brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
193a1(rgyud): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams dang mi rnams ni bstan pa la gnod pa bgyid pa ste/ bcom
193a2(rgyud): ldan 'das lha ma yin dang / 'khor du mi gtogs pa'i bstan pa la yun ring bar gnod pa'i phyir rgol ba'i dgra lags na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi bas mi 'dul na bdag la drag pos
193a3(rgyud): 'dul ba'i chos bstan du gsol/ theg pa'i chos dgra srung du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka'
193a4(rgyud): stsal to// lha'i dbang po khyod kyis thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i lcags mchu'i gzungs ma rungs pa 'joms pa/ don thams cad byed pa/ dam pa'i chos srung ba/
193a5(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dug thams cad 'jil ba/ mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/ theg pa'i chos dgra srung
193a6(rgyud): pa rkang med dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang gnyis thams cad skrag tu 'jug pa/ dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa/ lha ma yin dang / nam
193a7(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / bya'i gdon dang / srul po dang / nam/
193b1(rgyud): gru dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / gnon po dang / brjed byed kyi don dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / log
193b2(rgyud): 'dren gyi gdon dang / ma mo'i gdon phung bar byed pa/ zas kyi rigs mi mthun pa za ba phung bar byed pa/ rims nad thams cad dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa
193b3(rgyud): dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / 'gro ba drug shul du spyod pa phung bar byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar
193b4(rgyud): byed pa'i lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs nam mkha' lding drag po'i gzungs 'di zung zhig/ bstan pa la gnod pa skrag par byed pa/ char drag po dang ser ba drag po 'bebs par byed pa'i
193b5(rgyud): gzungs rjod par byed pa/ tad+ya thA/ e te me te/ pra me ti tra/ go la bo le la bos sa/ mod+b+ha pa da te/ khA rat+ta/ khA ra Ne/ gA nA gA ne/ nA ga pu ga Ne/ mo ne pra tI mo ne/ kA li pra kA li tsaN+De/ ma hA
193b6(rgyud): tsaN+De/ pra ti tsaN+De/ be ge so na/ go nA mo hA/ pra mo hA/ ma hA mo nA/ pra mo hA/ nA shA ni/ pra nA sha nA d+hI pa ti/ ba la gA ni/ pra ba la gA Ni/ nid d+ya Ni/ pA ni dzA ni/ kro d+ha ni pra ti kro d+ha ni/
193b7(rgyud): ha na ha na/ bi ha na bi ha na/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TAn/ nA sha ya sarba a b+ha ya pra de hU~M phaT/ sngags 'di brjod pa tsam gyis phyogs bcu kun tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul lo//
194a1(rgyud): gnod pa thams cad khas bub tu brgyal lo// ske tshe dang nyungs nag tu bsres la/ chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / ri bo la gtor ro// de phyin chad char 'bebs par byed do//
194a2(rgyud): yang chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu mig/ rdzing bu/ lu ma 'bab chu/ gnyen dgur bu ram/ sbrang / shing mngar/ sha ka ra/ klu sman sna tshogs 'o ma la bsngags la gtor ro//
194a3(rgyud): de'i phyir ser ba chen po 'bebs so// yid zlos bgyis te sprin la bltas la lha phyag bya zhing bzlas na ji ltar 'dod pa'i ser ba chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// shes rab can gyis 'phags
194a4(rgyud): pa lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ rjod cig/ gzhan la ma sbal cig/ spos shig/ thun mong du min no// rgya mtsho'i chu rdo bzhin mi mngon par spros shig/
194a5(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub pa drag po'i gzungs 'dis 'thab pa 'am/ rtsod pa'am/ 'gyed pa 'am/ gang du 'gro'ang rung ste/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la
194a6(rgyud): byang bu gzugs so// sngags pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dang gang gis yid rtse gcig tu bya'o// dge slong ba dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul pa dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge/
194a7(rgyud): bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma gang yang rung bstan pa la gnod pa bzlog pa'i phyir yid la zung zhig/ chongs shig/ de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i/
194b1(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya
194b2(rgyud): ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya lo ta duN+De nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lcags kyi mchu zhes bya ba'i/
194b3(rgyud): gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha nas rgyu zhing a mra'i
194b4(rgyud): tshal du gshegs te byo na na sa/ a mra'i tshal du lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
194b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin
194b6(rgyud): rnams ni rab tu lha rnams kyi yun ring po'i dgra lags na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dran pa'i chos bstan du gsol/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i 'jig rten shAkya thub pa'i zhing khams na mir/
194b7(rgyud): gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'khor na dge slong ba dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul pa dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dam pa'i chos 'jig pa la
195a1(rgyud): srung ba'i thabs bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po khyod
195a2(rgyud): kyis lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs/ thams cad skrag par byed pa/ lha ma yin la thog smad lnga 'bebs pa/ 'jig rten gyi rims nad zhi bar byed pa/ 'jig rten thams cad du zhi bar byed pa/
195a3(rgyud): dug thams cad 'jil ba/ mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang med dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi thams cad rengs par byed pa/ dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa/ lha ma yin
195a4(rgyud): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha ba dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / 'gro ba drag shul du spyod pa rab tu 'jigs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyel pa dang /
195a5(rgyud): 'tshang 'bru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'phags pa lcags kyi mchu 'od zung zhig/ thams cad mi 'jigs pa'i lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs kyi rig sngags brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/
195a6(rgyud): ba ga tsa ni/ mu ti shu ma li/ ga sha sha sha ta ta bI ra ti/ hu yu hu lu ri ti swA hA/ rgya mtsho la bar li ti gtor ro// ji ltar 'dod pa 'bab bo// klu'i gnas su phur bu la sa la bye ba grangs med pa bzlas la
195a7(rgyud): klu'i gnas su btab na/ ser ba dang thog ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'bab bo// sarba nA gA nAM a ba bIr+ya phob/ nA ga shar shar ngo ba kanA ga rak+Sha phob ra tsaM sri badz+ra hUM phaT/ drag po yul khrims
195b1(rgyud): kyi dgrar gyur pa zlog pa/ mes gtor ba'i thog sma lnga 'bebs pa/ lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis mnan pa'i lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs 'dis lha ma yin rmongs su 'jug pa ka 'khor/
195b2(rgyud): rnam bzhi srung ba theg pa chen po'i chos dgra srung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
195b3(rgyud): pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lcags mchu'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sadz+dza sha a ya oSh+Ta/
195b4(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa lcags mchu nag po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
195b5(rgyud): 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings ma'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gnas der
195b6(rgyud): 'dong ngo // btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams
195b7(rgyud): la thugs brtse ba'i phyir klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / 'jog po dang / mtha' yas dang dung skyong dang / gzi can dang / e la'i 'dab ma dang / mdongs bu dang /
196a1(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po glog 'byin dang / klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin bskul dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu pa dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo
196a2(rgyud): lnga pa dang / mgo drug pa dang / mgo gsum pa dang / mgo gnyis pa dang / mgo stong pa rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis ma nas bor zhig/ a nan ste/ bi nan ste/ bi shi ki shi a gu bi gu re re/
196a3(rgyud): hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ stam+b+ha ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ pa sa sha rI rA Ni/ mi tra mi tra/ ma tra ma Ni swA hA/ sngags tshan dang po des klu rnams 'khrugs nas brgyal lo// bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /
196a4(rgyud): 'bras bu dang / sman rnams dang / rtsi shing dang / myu gu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams bskams par rngo mi thogs lags so// char chu dus su 'bebs so// rtsi shing dang
196a5(rgyud): nags tshal skyed par bgyid lags so// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi longs spyod la 'tshe bar rngo mi thogs lags so// sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi bgyid lags so//
196a6(rgyud): gal te bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' las 'das na/ bdag cag klu rnams kyi lus 'khums par gyur cig/ gnas med par gyur cig/ lus rtsub par gyur cig/ mdze dang
196a7(rgyud): shu ba dang / sha bkra 'byung bar gyur cig/ mgo 'gas pa dang snying 'drul bar gyur cig ces bro bor ro// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong dag kyang sems can
196b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ ni rag ts+tsha ta/ ni ra gats+tsha ta/ niragatsu gyur du byer cig/ khyed cag la gang dag sdang ba'i
196b2(rgyud): sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'dod pa de dag ni khyed cag gi lus la 'jug par gyis shig
196b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtsa ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su su ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru su su mu ru
196b4(rgyud): mu ru mu ru mu ru / mu ru mu ru / mi ri mi ri swA hA/ lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / gnod sbyin po mo rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i char gyi rgyun myur
196b5(rgyud): du 'bebs so// klu'i gnas kun nas chab phul dgu blangs la/ chab so sor bzhag la yungs kar gyis bsngags shing chu ru stsa la/ sngags rdzogs pa dang klu'i gnas su bskyal lo//
196b6(rgyud): char ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis sems can rnams la phan par lhag par dgongs pa mnga' ba/ byams pa la gnas
196b7(rgyud): pa thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs shig/ k+Shi pran ni ra gats+tsha ta swA hA/ na ga yu yu swA hA/ sprin la blta zhing phyogs
197a1(rgyud): bzhir kha bltas la phyag bya zhing / lan lnga bcur bzlas na char nges par myur du 'bab bo// char 'bebs pa'i tshe klu mi bsrun pa'i gnas su song la lus spos chus
197a2(rgyud): bkrus la/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal la/ sha chang sgog btsong spang bar bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bsams la/ kha shar phyogs su bltas nas 'phags pa rnams la
