252b3(rgyud): swAhA/ bden bral gyi snying po'o// ma du na ya dza la a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ chu bdag gi snying po'o// bA ya be an+ta rak+Sha a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ rlung lha'i snying po'o// ku be rA ya d+ha na a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ lus
252b4(rgyud): ngan gyi snying po'o// i shA nA ya b+hU ta a d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ dbang ldan gyi snying po'o// Ur d+haM prah+ma Ne swA hA/ tshangs pa'i snying po'o// a d+hu da~MSh+Ta be swA hA/ khyab 'jug gi snying po'o// a bi brta ye swAhA/ rdo rje/
252b5(rgyud): snying po'o// hu ta sa nA ya swA hA/ sha ka ti'i snying po'o// ma hA s+ya ma ya swAhA/ dbyug pa'i snying po'o// khaD+ga bi ma la b+ha ri Ni swA hA/ ral gri'i snying po'o// ba ru Na ta ma a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ zhags pa'i snying
252b6(rgyud): bo'o// pra b+hany+dza na ye swA hA/ rgyal mtshan gyi snying po'o// ma hA su mya rasma ye swA hA/ 'khor lo'i snying po'o// b+ha la se b+ha swA hA/ rtse gsum pa'i snying po'o// b+hi la sha b+hi hUM le swA hA/ phyogs kyi sngags so//
252b7(rgyud): sha re dz+wa la swA hA/ mda'i dra ba'i sngags so// oM Ur d+haM dz+wa la badz+ra bany+dza ra ya swA hA/ rdo rje dra ba'i sngags so// 'di rnams dang rang rang gi sngags mkhas pas bum pa la bzla bar bya/ slob ma dkyil
253a1(rgyud): 'khor du yang gzhug/ dbang bskur bar ni rab tu brtag/ rgyal po dbang bskur bar ni mdzod// skye bo gang rnams dngos grub 'dod// de rnams dbang bskur don du bya// rgyan pa'i
253a2(rgyud): don du rab tu 'bad// de ltar dkyil 'khor chen por bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin dbang bskur ba dang / dam tshig bstan pa dang / rjes su gnang ba las phyag rgya chen po'i skal ba can du shes par bya'o// rang rang
253a3(rgyud): gis dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba la'ang mchod pa rgya chen po dang sbyin sreg byas pa bsdu ba dang gshegs su gsol ba bya'o// de ltar gnod gnas kyi bdag po'i dam chog bstan pa dang / rang gi sngags
253a4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i skal pa can du bskur ro// de nas nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du sngags dang phyag rgyas bdag bsrung ba byas la/ 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te zhabs bsil dang mchod yon la sogs
253a5(rgyud): pa phul nas/ nye bar spyod pa'i mchod pa nyi shu sngags dang phyag rgyas phul la/ cho ga ji ltar tshogs pa'i mchod pa byas nas sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o// de nas phyag rgya dang sngags kyi tshog sangs rgyas par
253a6(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos gus pa nye bar skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la gzigs nas/ seng
253a7(rgyud): go'i sgra bsgrags pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed rnams nyon cig/ 'da' bar dka' ba 'di bstan pa snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba dang ldan pagaganod/
253b1(rgyud): gnas kyi dbang po'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid sngags dang ldan pa/ de nas gnod gnas kyi dbang pos thal mo sbyar te pus mo sa la bzhag ste phyag byas nas ci'ang mi smra bar bsdad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
253b2(rgyud): seng ge bzhin 'jigs pa med pas sngags dang phyag rgya 'di gsungs pa/ lag pa gnyis thal mo mnyam par sbyar nas gung mo gnyis phyir bzlog ming med kyi rtse mo gnyis sbyar la/ mdzub mo gnyis tshigs
253b3(rgyud): gsum pa bcag nas der gzhag ste mthe bong phyogs su gzhag/ mtheb mdzub gnyis khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o// 'di bcings pa tsam gyis gnod
253b4(rgyud): gnas kyi dbang po nye bar gnas par gyur nas sgrub pa po la lta zhing mchog ster bar byed do// 'di'i sngags ni// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya swA hA/
253b5(rgyud): sngags 'di dang ldan pa'i phyag rgyas gnas rnam pa lngar sbyar bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gnod gnas dang so sor mnyam par 'gyur ro// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas mthe'u chung gnyis
253b6(rgyud): khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas pa ni spyod pa'i dbang po'i phyag rgya ste/ bdag bsrung ba la nges par bya bar ro// 'di'i sngags ni/ oM dzaM len+d+ra ya swA hA/ de ltar khu rur byas te mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug
253b7(rgyud): srin lag gnyis khab kyi rnam po ltar byas pa ni dbang po gdong gi phyag rgya ste/ bdag bsrung ba la nges pa ste/ 'di'i sngags ni/ oM mu lan+ta ya swA hA/ dbang po gdong gi phyag rgya las ming mid kyi tshigs/
254a1(rgyud): gsum pa bcag pa ni gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags ni/ oM a ni/ 'dis kyang bdag bsrung ba bya'o// spyan 'dren pa'i dus su'ang gnod sbyin mo rnam/
254a2(rgyud): spyan drang bar bya'o// steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu ra ra ba dang / dra ba dang / phur du ti dang / lag pa gnyis khu tshur byas nas mdzub mo gnyis po so ser khab kyi rtse mo ltar byas pa 'di ni drang
254a3(rgyud): phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags ni/ oM tsa ren+d+ra ban+d+ha di sha paT/ ra ba dang nges par sbyar bar bya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis khab kyi rnam pa ltar gcig tu byas pa ni dranga'i phyag rgya ste/ oM ru khen+d+rA ya swAH/
254a4(rgyud): dra ba'i don du nges par sbyar ro// lag pa gnyis khu tshur byas nas 'og tu gzhag pa ni phur bu'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags ni/ oM hri ta ta/ spyan drang bar bya ba ni rtsa ba'i phyag rgya mthe bong cung dgug pa ni sbyi
254a5(rgyud): drang ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags ni/ e ho tsu lu tsu lu/ tA ra tra ra/ dza la sa ya naM pri yA ya swA hA/ rim pa 'dis 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang bar bya'o// de nas ar+g+ha sbyin par bya'o// lag pa
254a6(rgyud): brten pa'i thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i ngos la sbyar te/ 'di'i sngags ni/ oM yak+ShanA d+ha ya ken+d+han pri ya pA ga pA sha swA hA/ de nas gdan dbul bar bya ste/ phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar te
254a7(rgyud): mdzub mo gsum pa mnyam par byas nas tshogs gsum pa bkug ste dbus mar sbyar nas/ gzhan so sor byis pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i gdan gyi phyag rgya'o// 'di bstan pa tsam gyis
254b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pas seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs par 'gyur ro// seng ge'i gdan gyi phyag rgya ste/ 'da'i sngags ni/ oM dza sbrul dza len+d+ra in+d+ra ya sa ma ka~M swA t+ma/ de nas khrus kyi phyag tu
254b2(rgyud): bcings nas gnod gnas 'khor dang bcas pa khrus gsol bar bya/ lag pa gnyis yang rten gyi thal mo byas/ mthe'u chung gnyis phyin ci log tu byas la ming med gnyis dkyil du byas pa gung mo gnyis
254b3(rgyud): khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas/ de'i phyi rol tu gung mo'i tshigs gsum sbyar/ mthe bong gnyis phyogs su gzhag pa ni lha thams cad kyi khrus kyi phyag rgya'o// 'di'i sngags ni/ oM nAn+ta pri la g+hA ta g+hA ta/
254b4(rgyud): kuM pa d+ha tsa la swA hA/ gos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas gos dbul bar bya ste/ yang lag pa gnyis mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis lu gu rgyud kyi rnam pa ltar byas te/ sor mo phyi ma rnams brkyang ba 'di ni gos
254b5(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags ni/ oM d+hi ri d+hi ri ma hA sa mu dra aM/ nar d+ha ka swA hA/ rgyan gyi phyag rgya nye bar byas te/ lag pa gnyis sor mo gsum gyi mthe bong bkab nas sdigs mdzub 'khyil ba'i tshul
254b6(rgyud): du byas nas/ phan tshun steng du bskor nas gcig tu byas pa 'di ni rgyan gyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags ni/ oM me g+ha b+ha ra Na dza la bu ga na swA hA/ yang dag par skyang nul bya ba'i phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas pa
254b7(rgyud): khu tshur bcangs nas/ lag pa g.yon pa nor bu 'ching ba'i mtshams su lag pa'i gdub kor ltar gzung ba ni skyang nul bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'i sngags ni/ oM s+pha ra hAr dzo g+ha NA ya swA hA/ de nas
255a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya nges par bstan par bya ste/ de nyid las sor mo rnams so sor brkyang nas kha 'og tu dbub pa ni dkyil 'khor nye bar byug pa'i phyag rgya'o//
255a2(rgyud): 'di'i sngags ni/ oM ku ti dzu ga b+hA ra ta pri yA ya swAhA/ rdul chen gyi 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya la sor mo rnams kha 'og tu byas nas gzhag pa ni rdul tshon
255a3(rgyud): gyi 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'i sngags ni/ he he pi na b+ha li pri la so b+hA nA ya swA hA/ dra'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni/ lag pa gnyis brten pa'i thal mo sbyar la/ mthe'u chung khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas
255a4(rgyud): nas/ ming med dang / gung mo dang / mdzub mo rnams nang du bcug pa ni de'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'i sngags ni/ oM la lA gA lA ga la su gan+d+hi gan+d+ha ya swA hA/ de nas me tog gi phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni/ dri'i
255a5(rgyud): phyag rgya las mtheb mo drang por gyen du bsgreng ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// 'di'i sngags ni/ oM puSh+pa pra b+ha ra du khA me g+ha swA hA/ bdug spos kyi phyag rgya ni/ me tog gi phyag rgya las tshigs gsum pa cung zad
255a6(rgyud): bkug par bya ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o// 'di'i sngags ni/ oM ru ru ma hA d+hU pa pri lA yA swA hA/ gtor ma'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni/ bdug spos kyi phyag rgya las sor mo thams cad longs spyod
255a7(rgyud): pa'i rnam par bkod nas mthe'u chung gnyis nang du byas pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'i sngags ni/ oM sa ka sa ka b+ha ri la dza na ga na ka ba la~M ta yak+Sha de hi de hi swA hA/ me mar gyi phyag rgya nye bar
255b1(rgyud): gnas pa ni/ gtor ma'i phyag rgyalas sor mo thams cad su tshur byas la the'u chung gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis khab kyi rnam pa sbyar byas pa ni ma mar gyi drug rgya'o// 'di'i sngags ni/ oM phun phu ru phrag sa
255b2(rgyud): ya swA hA/ dri'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni/ lag pa g.yas pa khong stong la thur du byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags ni/ oM ki na~M ki ni gan+d+ha kaD+ga/ g+ha shaM me dri mu swA hA/ gdugs kyi phyag rgya nye bar gnas
255b3(rgyud): pa ni/ yang lag pa gnyis phan tshun du mngon par phyogs nas gcig tu sbyar zhing nang du zhum nas mthe bong phyogs su gzhag pa ni gdugs kyi phyag rgya'o// 'di'i sngags ni/ oM gr-ih+Na tsha pra ti yats+tsha traM karak+Sha/
255b4(rgyud): ka swA hA/ rnga yab kyi phyag rgyanye bar bstan pa ni/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas sor mo lhag ma rdo rje ltar mtshon pas phyogs gnyis ka bskor ba ni rnga yab kyi phyag rgya'o//
255b5(rgyud): 'di'i sngags ni/ oM ma ra tsa tsa ma ka ra pri ya ke Tu Tu swA hA/ rlung yab kyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni// lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo bkab nas sor mo lhag ma rnams brkyang ste/
255b6(rgyud): rdo rje ltar mtshon nas yongs su bskor ba ni rlung lab kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags ni/ oM d+ha raM b+ha d+ha su ta gA ya swAhA/ rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya nye bar bsnun pa ni/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong gis ming med/
255b7(rgyud): dang mthe chung gi sen mo mnan nas/ mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis gcig gi rnam pa ltar byas nas 'og tu bskyed pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags ni/ oM tu sha tu sha ka la swA hA/ dza pri yA ya
256a1(rgyud): swA hA/ gdan gyi phyag rgyan par bstan pa ni/ yang lag pa gnyis kyi ming med dang mthe'u chung rim gyis mnan nas gung mo dang sdigs mdzub gnyis khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas
256a2(rgyud): la steng du bskor ba ni gdan gyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags ni/ dza la dzA ma du du kha lAn tri pri ya swA hA/ gdan gyi sngags so// 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i nye bar mchod pa nyi shu'o// sngar g+hi
256a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnam dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yid las byung ba'i mchod pa mthong ba dang thos pas/ rang bzhin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod pa 'di thams cad dbul bar bya'o// de nas
256a4(rgyud): bdag nyid 'bul ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa gdab pa dang / bstod pas mnyes par bya ba dang / gleng gzhi dang / tshig tu
256a5(rgyud): brjod pa'i mdo la sogs pa nod pa dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gdon pa dang / mchog sbyin gyis tshogs su bcad pas bskul ba dang / rtag tu chu sbyin pa dang / lha thams cad la gtor ma sbyin pa dang /
256a6(rgyud): 'di rnams thams cad byas la/ bod+hi tse sngags kyi skud pa yongs su bzung la gnod gnas dang 'dra bar rang bsgoms pa li/ oM yig spyi bor dgod par bya// dza ma yig kha ru nges par dgod// b+hU yig la
256a7(rgyud): pa g.yas par dgod// lA yig g.yon par dgod par bya// dza yig snying khar dgod pa'o// brla ni g.yas dang g.yon pa la/ len+d+ra nges par dgod par bya// ye yig mtshan mar dgod par bya// de nas blo
256b1(rgyud): dang ldan pa yis// rkang pa'i mthil du swA hA dgod// 'di rnams gnod sbyin dbang po rgyal// gsang ba'i snying por rab tu grags// 'di rnams gang shes blo ldan yin// de yis dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/
256b2(rgyud): ji ltar nus pa bzlas par bya// bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas ni// sems can rnams la bsod nams gang // mnyam par gzhag pas dbul bar bya// ji ltar 'dod pas blangs nas ni// de nas gshes/
256b3(rgyud): su gsol bar bya// sngar gyi spyan dang phyag rgya las// mthe bong brkyang bas bskyod pa'o// sngags dang bcas pas gshegs su gsol// sngags ni/ oM Di Do tra ta b+ha ga ta adz+ra g+ha tsa g+ha swA hA/ rim pa 'dis
256b4(rgyud): sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas la/ phyi nas ji ltar 'dod par sgrub par bya'o// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ji srid rim pa 'dis sems can
256b5(rgyud): thams cad dbugs dbyung chen por 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar to// sems can thams cad khyad par spro ba dang / don thams cad bsgru/
256b6(rgyud): pa dang / snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can/ sems rtogs pa gang gis gnod gnas kyi dbang po'i rtog pa mnyan par 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma lus par sgrub pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/
256b7(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas gnod gnas kyi rtog pa 'di gsungs pa/ sngar brjod pa'i cho gas sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/ de nas yang
257a1(rgyud): gnod gnas kyi dbang po la dri dang me tog gi mchod pa byas nas/ rgya mtsho'i chur zhugs pa la stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na sngon du bsnyen par 'gyur ro// de nas yarang ngo'i chos
257a2(rgyud): gcig sa rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu'i 'gram du phyin nas rked pa nub tsam du chur zhugs te/ nyin mtshan gcig tu smyung bar gnas nas khyor ba 'bum gyi chu sbyin sreg byas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro//
257a3(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis pus mo nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs nas stong phrag bcu'i sbyin sreg byas na/ grong bcu'am go ser srang stong rab tu ster bar 'gyur ro// chu bo de nyid la rked pa nub tsam du chur zhugs
257a4(rgyud): nas pad+ma la zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsir spags nas stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na gter gyi bum pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// yang sbyor ba de nyid kyis zar ma'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na rgyal ba'i
257a5(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// mya ngan med pa'i yam shing la me sbar te/ a pa marga'i snye ma la mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbags nas sbyin sreg stong byas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// a pa marga'i
257a6(rgyud): yam shing gis me rab tu sbar la/ a pa marga'i sa bon zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsis byugs la ming med dang mtheb mos gzung nas rang gi khyim du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas nyin re bzhin
257a7(rgyud): til gyi me tog zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsis spags nas dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na don du gnyer ba de 'thob par 'gyur ro// nyi ma gcig gis 'khor nyis brgya dang bcas
257b1(rgyud): pas ma bsrungs par bza' bya dang bca' ba'ang rnyed par 'gyur ro// mya ngan med pa'i me tog la zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsis byugs te/ dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na gang gan/
257b2(rgyud): ba btab pa de thob par 'gyur ro// mya ngan med kyi me tog dang a pa marga'i sa bon bsres la// zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsis byug la/ stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'i bu mi dbang du 'gyur ro//
257b3(rgyud): ming gzung nas sbyin sreg de nyid stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'i bu de nyid thob par 'gyur ro// me tog dmar po ma nyams pa yongs su gzung nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bor phyin la rked pa
257b4(rgyud): nub tsam du chur zhugs nas stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na/ gang me tog de'i dri tsher ba dang reg pa de rnam pa thams cad du dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga de nyid kyis gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs par 'gyur ro//
257b5(rgyud): yang chu de nyid la a pa marga'i shing gis sbyin sreg stong byas na nyi mas mchog ster bar 'gyur ro// de ltar man da ra ba'i me tog gi sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin gyis mchog ster bar 'gyur ro// til gyi me tog
257b6(rgyud): gis ni tshangs pas mchog ster bar 'gyur ro// be ta'i me tog gis ni nor lhas mchog ster bar 'gyur ro// sngags de nyid zlos bzhin pas mthe'u chung dang mthe bong gnyis kyi gzugs brnyan bcings nas/
257b7(rgyud): jisrid sngags stong phrag bcu bzlas pa de srid gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas dngos grub thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bzlas pas rgyal po 'gugs par 'gyur ro// 'bumatsho gnyis
258a1(rgyud): bzlas na gnod sbyin ma rang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'bum tsho gsum bzlas pas sems can thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro// yang na rkang pas zla ba drug tu mi smra bar bzlas na yid la
258a2(rgyud): gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i arga'i rang bzhin gyi shing la gzugs brnyan byas lam bcos pa'i kha dog gi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de nyid kyang mdun du zla ba drug tu mi smra bar bzlas
258a3(rgyud): na lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du sngags khri mngon par bzlas nas gter gang na yod pa'i sar phyin te/ steng du lag pa gzhag ste sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na gter thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro// dka
258a4(rgyud): po'i phyogs kyi chos lnga la mya ngan med kyi rtsa ba na gnas pas nyin mtshan du gso sbyong gis gnas shing / nyin mtshan sbar tshod kyis zas thabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyin sreg byas na dgos pa thams cad sgrub par
258a5(rgyud): nus so// rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang zho bsres nas sreg thugs stong byas na gser srang stong ster bar 'gyur ro// a pa marga'i lam shing zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsis mngon par sbags nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar
258a6(rgyud): gnas pas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas pas shin tu shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / tshigs bcad stong yang 'dzin par 'gyur ro// arga'i rtsa ba la cho ga 'dis sor mo drug pa'i gzugs brnyan
258a7(rgyud): cod pan dang thor tshugs ldan par byas la/ de'i mdun du a pa marga'i lam shing la/ na mo rat+na tra lA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ som ma so pa ta tri Ni la mi ri ti ma Ni rI ti swAhA/ sngags 'dis sbyin
258b1(rgyud): sreg stong byas na dong tshe brgyad rnyed par 'gyur ro// gnod gnas kyi snying po'i mchog rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'di nyid kyi gnas pas pus mo nub tsam du chur zhugs nas 'bum phrag drug pazlas na nor rnyed/
258b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// nim pa'i shing gi rang bzhin la chu zheng du sor bzhi mnyam pa'i nor bu bzang po byas la/ gso sbyong dang ldan pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis bris la rtse bar mchod pa dang gtor ma byin nas/ du ba med pa'i me
258b3(rgyud): la dus gsum du de'i mdun du rgya skyegs kyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na phyug po rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// legs par yan lag ster ba dang // rmad 'gyur chen po'i brtson 'grus dang //
258b4(rgyud): pa med pa'i snying rje dang / yang dang ji bzhin ston pa dang // rdzu 'phrul gyis ni 'gro ba dang // thams cad du ni skyon med pa// sdug bsngal ba ni nyon mongs nyams// dzam+b+ha la yi sgom pa po// de nas yang gnod sbyin
258b5(rgyud): dbang po'i snying po rgyas par bshad pa ni/ mchog gi dngos grub dang bskul ba'i yi ge dang yang dag par ldan pa 'di/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ya/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra ma NiH
258b6(rgyud): drA ya/ b+ha ga ban te dza tsit+tata tI/ d+hA ma d+ha ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma ri tsi ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tu lu tu lu ma Ni d+ha drA/ tu ru tu ru ma Ni b+ha drA/ tu Ti tu Ti ma Ni b+ha drA/ ti Di ti Ti ma Ni b+ha drA sA hA/ tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar/
258b7(rgyud): med/ smyung ba'i cho ga yod ma yin// arga'am ni nim pa'i shing // gzhan pa rnams la nor bu bzang po'i gzugs byas te/ de'i mdun du 'dug la nyi ma phyed kyi dus su dri dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod
259a1(rgyud): pa byas nas/ sungs kar gyi tsha ba'i mar nag dang btags pa'i rim du byas te/ nor bu bzang por lto bar bcug nas rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas na dong tshe brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro//
259a2(rgyud): de nyid du zad par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rtog pa gsungs pa/ gang gi lo ma bcos pa zab dang bsod snyoms kyis 'tsho zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o//
259a3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgyad du bzlas pa byas na nor mang po rnyed par 'gyur ro// zla ba drug tu chu nang du chu'i sbyin sreg byas na stong phrag brgya red/
259a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang mchod pa phul la/ a shwat+tha'i yam shing gi zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi sbags nas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na bar snang las
259a5(rgyud): sgra thos pa yid la 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa dang / sems kyis byas pas tshogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du las sna tshogs gzhan 'grub ste/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod
259a6(rgyud): rten la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas/ dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs la bsod snyoms za zhing re mos kyi spyang bar gnas nas gtor ma dang / mchod pa cho ga bzhin byin nas/ til nag po la zho dang / mar
259a7(rgyud): dang / sbrang rtsi sngags la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na grong mchog bcu gnyis rnyed par 'gyur ro// bag med pa las ma grub na stong phrag bcu'i nang nas grong gcig rnyed par 'gyur ro// chu bo'i 'gra
259b1(rgyud): du nor bu bzang po bzhag nas mar dang 'o thug za zhing mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas/ gnam stong la mtshan mo smyung bar gnas pas dzA ti'i me tog la stong phrag brgyad du re re/
259b2(rgyud): la mngon par bsngags nas mchod rten la phul na nang par phyugs stong phrag sbar bar 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms za zhing rigs gtsang ma la dus gsum du khrus byed cing 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas nas nag/
259b3(rgyud): po'i phyogs kyi brgyad la mtshan mo smyung bar gnas la/ 'dzam+bu'i yam shing lam sngar la nA ga pus pa zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsis sbags nas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas pa dang / mngar gsum gyi/
259b4(rgyud): bshos gtsang ma dang / gtor ma byin nis sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'ongs nas ngas ci byed ces smra bar byed do// de la smra ba dong tshe lnga byin cig ces smras pa dang / de ltar
259b5(rgyud): bya'o zhes zer nas mi snang bar gyur te/ nyin re bzhin du ster bar 'gyur ro// lhag ma med par zad par bya'o// pad+ma skyes pa'i mtsho'i 'gram du phyin te chu dang bcas pa'i phye za ba'am/ yang na ji ltar rnyed
259b6(rgyud): pa'i zas za zhing nor bu bzang po'i kha phyir bstan par bzhag la gsol ba btab na/ ji srid du stong phrag brgya rdzogs par pad+mo'i sbyin sreg byas na de'i rjes la dpal pad+mo 'ongs te/ 'ongs pa la de la
259b7(rgyud): pad+mo nye bar phul nas dri dang bcas pa'i chu'i arga byin na/ des smras pa/ bu ci zhig bya zhes smras na/ sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ste/ gter mang po bdag la rab tu stsol cig/ de ltar bya'o zhes zer nas mi
260a1(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas gang du 'gro ba der khyer nas phyin pa de zad pa med par 'gyur ro// nor bu bzang po'i mdun du zla ba phyed du bzlas nas ji srid zla ba nya'i nub mo sbyang bar gnas
260a2(rgyud): pas sha med pa'i gtor ma byin nas/ de nas nor bu bzang po'i snying khar ming med bzhag nas ji srid du bzlas pa de srid du g.yo bar 'gyur ro// de nas nyin re bzhin du stong rtsa lnga lnga re ster bar 'gyur ro//
260a3(rgyud): smyug ma med par zad par bya'o// dur khrod chen por phyin nas dur khrod kyi thal ba la mchod rten byas te/ bsod snyoms pa zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas nas nag pa'i phyir/
260a4(rgyud): kyi bcu bzhi la mtshan mo sbyang bar gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas nas lhag ma med par rab tu zad par bya'o// dur khrod chen por nor bu bzang po la sha ta pus pa phul la/
260a5(rgyud): a ka ru dang du ru ka bsres pa'i bdug pa phul te/ gdong phyin ci log tu bzhag nas ji srid mtshan phyed pa de srid du bzlas so// de nas sha za'i bdag po rang 'ongs pa dang / sngar bzhag pa'i gtor ma phul
260a6(rgyud): la 'khor rnams la chang yang dbul/ des nas sgrub pa pos gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas de mgu'o zhes smra'o// sgrub pa pos smras pa/ nyi ma re re g.yog re re byin cig/ de ltar bya'o zhes zer nas
260a7(rgyud): mi snang bar gyur to// de nas mngag gzhug pa la sogs pa rab tu sbyin no// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi tshogs bya ba gsungs pa/ ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te khru gang tsam gyi nor bu bzang
260b1(rgyud): bzhag nas 'o ma dang 'o thug za zhing / dus gsum du khrus byed cing 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas nas/ de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi nyal thug pa'i mtshan mo gsum du spyang bar gnas nas/ nor bu bzang po la rgya
260b2(rgyud): che ba'i mchod pa byas pa dang / gtor ma'i cho ga rgya che ba byas nas ku sha'i shun bu dag byin nas ji srid sgra grags pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas de ma thag tu gnod sbyin thams cad nye bar 'ongs nas de
260b3(rgyud): rnams la me tog dmar po dang / dri dmar po dang / arga sbyin par bya'o// du ru ka'i bdug pa'ang bdug par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin des legs so zhes bya ba byin nas smras pa/ ngas khyod la ci byed ces zer ba
260b4(rgyud): dang / de nas de la smras pa dang / nyin re bzhin mngag gzhug rab tu byin cig/ de ltar bya'o zhes zer nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa bsam gtan tsam gyis gnas pa la ma mthong bar 'khor gyis
260b5(rgyud): bskor nas gnas so// gang dang gang 'dod pa der khang pa brtsegs pa dang lha'i bzhon pa sprul te/ stong phrag gcig dang bcas pa la rab tu 'dod pa'i zas rnams ster bar 'gyur ro// nyin re bzhin du gnod sbyin
260b6(rgyud): mar sprul zhing 'ongs nas tho rangs kyi dus su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi tshe lo stong du 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho'i 'gram du nor bu bzang po'i gzugs brnyan gzhag ste/ bsod snyoms za zhing 'bum phrag bzlas
260b7(rgyud): nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos lnga la thug par nub gsum du smyung bar gnas pas rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar phyin nas/ ji srid rgya mtsho chen po rang 'ong ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// mdun du rgya mtsho chen
261a1(rgyud): po rang 'ong ba de la dri dang me tog gi mchod pa phul la a ka ru'i bdug pas gdugs la/ kye rig pa 'dzin pa mchog gang 'dod pa rab tu sbyin par smra'o// des smras pa/ rgya mtsho chen
261a2(rgyud): por nga thogs pa med par 'gro bar gyis/ de ltar bya zer nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgya mtsho la zhugs na rgya mtsho na yod pa'i nor bu rin po che blangs nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtshon yod pa'i sra/
261a3(rgyud): rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dbyangs snyan gyi sngags
261a4(rgyud): gsungs pa/ nA mo rat+na tA l+yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ta ye/ ma Ni ni swA hA/ rtsu ba'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi brgyad dam/ yang na dkar po'i bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig tu smyung bar gnas/
261a5(rgyud): pas/ ro hi ti'i nyal ba'i lci ba dang mar gyis byugs nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dong tsha brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang nye bar mchod pa dang / sngon du 'bum tsho gsum bzlas nas nyam god pa
261a6(rgyud): la zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsis mngon par byugs nas stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na dong tshe stong phrag rnyed par 'gyur ro// ma grub na'ang kar sha pa Na stong phrag gcig rnyed par 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra dzam+b+ha la
261a7(rgyud): dza len+d+rA ya swA hA/ de nas yang nor bu bzang po bsgrub par 'dod na mchod sbyin gyi shing dkar po la nor bu bzang po'i gzugs brnyan byas la/ mchod pa chen pos rab tu gnas par byas/ de'i mdun du a pa maH/
261b1(rgyud): yam shing la mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs la 'bum phrag tu sbyin sreg byas na 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// pe ta la'i me tog rnams kyi sbyin sreg byas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// til dang
261b2(rgyud): 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// de ltar sha ta pus pa dang / gu gul dang / kun da dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / du ru ka la sogs pa de rnams re re 'bum du sbyi
261b3(rgyud): sreg byas na dong tshe stong phrag rnyed par 'gyur ro// til dang 'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// nye'u ji ltar 'tshong ba nyos la chu bo'i gzhung la lte ba nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs nas kha sha
261b4(rgyud): du bltas te sbyin sreg brgya byas na sum 'gyur gyis dong tshe rnyed par 'gyur ro// ras bal gyi sa bon la mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs nas stong phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun gyi bar la ras gcig
261b5(rgyud): rnyed par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas na gos dang bza' ba rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'bum bzlas na dong tshe lnga stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'bum tsho gnyis bzlas na grong rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'bum tshe gsum bzlas na/
261b6(rgyud): longs spyod chen po rnyed par 'gyur zhing grong brgyad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// be'u'i lci ba la sbyin sreg stong byas na ba glang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dud 'gro rnams kyi lus la zho dang sbrang rtsis
261b7(rgyud): sbags la nyin re bzhin sbyin sreg byas na ra lug la sogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// ba glang gi lhas kyi nang du ku sha'i me tog mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs pa 'bum tshe gcig sbyin sreg byas na 'byung po dang sha \u0f7f
262a1(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// yang ba glang gi lhas kyi nang du 'o ma dang 'o thug bzhing shri ba la'i lam shing la
262a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gang 'dod pa'i gsol ba btab pa de nyid yod par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas la/ zla ba'am nim gzas bzung ba la sdong ros sam/ gi ru wang srang lngas a shwat+tha'i dang/
262a3(rgyud): ma bzhi la g.yas bskor g.yon bskor du bzhag nas/ yang 'das ma bzhi g.yogs la ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// du ba dang 'bar bas 'di ltar sa bslangs nas gsum 'grub par 'gyur ro//
262a4(rgyud): bgrang gi lhas kyi nang ngam chu bo 'dus par bsod snyoms za ba 'am/ 'o thug za bas arga'i 'o thug mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs nas lo stong tshe lnga sbyin sreg byas na/ rang nyid kyis nor gyi bdag po nor bu bzang po
262a5(rgyud): nor gyi bdag po nor dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// nga mgu'o zhes de sman mchog brgyad gang 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / gter dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'chag pa dang // rig pa 'dzin
262a6(rgyud): pa dang / thams cad du byed pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lus srul po rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mdun du 'dug par
262a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i sems can shi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og gi 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'jig pa dang
262b1(rgyud): chu rengs pa dang / bcud len dang / tshar gcad pa dang / rjes su gzung ba brgyad po 'di rnams la/ de'i mdun du gang na gang gcig blang bar bya'o// des gang ci 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur ro// badz+ra
262b2(rgyud): mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs nas 'bum du sbyin sreg byas na pad+ma rA ga'i nor bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// de ltar ut+pal sngon po dang ku mu da dri zhim po dang ldan pas kha dog sna tshogs pa'i rin po che rnyed par
262b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yungs kar dkar po mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs la gang gi ming nas bzung nas sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// til nag po la mar dang sbrang rtsis sbags la 'bum
262b4(rgyud): du sbyin sreg byas na nor nye bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// arga'i shing la me gtang la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun gyis nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams
262b5(rgyud): nus sha ta bus pa dang / kun da dang / ta kAr dang / ba sha ka dang / du ru ka dang / gu gul rnams ji ltar 'tshong ba nos la mchod pa byas nas/ mar dang sbrang rtsir sngags la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin/
262b6(rgyud): sreg byas na nyi ma bdun na bdun 'gyur gyi nor rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas na bdag dang gzhan nye bar 'gyur bar byed do// yul srung bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni/
262b7(rgyud): b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ ki Ni ki Ni g+ha Ta kar+Na swa ba ni me d+ha ra sa ma ye swA hA/ arga'i mar khus ku mu da'i me tog sbyin sreg byas na rmi lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro// kiH
263a1(rgyud): ki Ni g+ha Ta kan tsa~M t+ta me/ d+ha ra yA ya swA hA/ don nges par ster na cho ga ji ltar brjod pa bzhin no// 'phags pa gnod gnas kyi dbang po ji ltar 'byung ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba rdzogs
263a2(rgyud): so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
263a3(rgyud): gar skad du/ Ar+yA dzan+d+ha lA nA ma aH sha ta ka/ bod skad du// 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// 'phags pa gnod 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas
263a4(rgyud): po// gser dag gis ni legs par brgyan// rin chen gyis ni rab mdzes shing // me nI rab tu 'bar 'dra ba// lcang lo can du zhugs nas kyang // gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang ba yi// zhabs
263a5(rgyud): gnyis la ni rab 'jus nas// shin tu mnyam bzhag dris pa ni// bcom ldan gnod 'dzin rgyal dbang po// gsang sngags tshogs ni kun gyi bdag/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kun gyis/
263a6(rgyud): mchod// lha dang lha min phyag byas pa// ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// mgon po sems can kun don mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang ba/
263a7(rgyud): 'dzin// sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pas// snying rjes non pa'i yid kyis su// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir// bdag gis kyang ni sems bskyed de// mi rnams nor ni chung ba dang /
263b1(rgyud): bsod nams chung zhing dbang chung ba// mthong nas sdug bsngal chen po yis// rab tu gzer te gsang ba'i bdag/ de nas gnod 'dzin gyis smras nas// bcom ldan gsang ba gsang ba'i bdag
263b2(rgyud): snying rjes non te smras pa ni// legs par nyon cig gsang ba pa// mgon po gnod 'dzin dpal dang ldan// sems can kun gyi don byed pa// dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel ba po// nor ro cog gi dbang phyug
263b3(rgyud): gi/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bsod nams ldan// dbul po'i nyes sdig sel byed pa// gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi// rgyal mchog rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa// 'od zer brgya pa zhes pa yi// zhing na sangs
263b4(rgyud): rgyas nyi ma'i zhal// chos ston pa na bdag gis kyang // de ni rang gis sngon thos te// dbul ba sel cing bsod nams ldan// de ni bdag gis shes rab kyis// sems can kun don brtson pa po// khyod la la/
263b5(rgyud): par bstan par bya// khyod ni mnyam bzhag rab tu nyon// 'phags pa lha dang lha min bla// shes rab ldan zhing chos la gus// snying brtse'i bdag nyid bzod pa brtan// dbang po zhi ba dbang po thul// dge ba sdig
263b6(rgyud): 'joms shes nyen can// des shing don kun sgrub pa po// mi gnod mi slu dpal dang ldan// mdzod bdag gzhan gyis mi thub pa// dkon mchog gsum gyis skyabs gcig pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs
263b7(rgyud): papo// gter rnams skyong ba gzi brjid can// rtag sbyin nor ni 'phel byed pa// rin chen 'byung gnas skye bo 'dul// chu yi bdag po chu 'bebs pa// gnod sbyin chu spyod bdag nyid can// gter don nye bar
264a1(rgyud): ston pa po// gser gyi ri bo lhun po ste// dbul ba'i gdon las thar byed pa// dbang po nye dbang 'gro ba'i mgon// chu yi dbang po sprin mdog can// 'jig rten mig dang 'jig rten grwa
264a2(rgyud): nyi ma zla ba ther zug pa// nor chen rgyal po chen po ste// lag na ne'u le rab gnas pa// gzhon nu seng ge rtog can te// gnod sbyin chen po rdzu 'phrul che// tshig gi bdag po bzhin 'dzum pa// gsong por/
264a3(rgyud): snyan par sgrub po// bram ze 'dod pa'i sngags kyu ste// che ba don gru grub las mchod// rig sngags 'chang ba 'khor los sbyar// gu ber dang mi la zhon// sum pa'i lto can mig yangs pa/
264a4(rgyud): lha yi dri ldan yid ltar mgyogs// khyab bdag bde 'byung nor bzang sras// sems can rnams ni skyong la dga'// 'dod dgur bsgyur gzugs yid kyi lha// cod pan de yi rigs dga' ba/
264a5(rgyud): g.yon phyogs cod pan lag na dbyug/ lag pa brgya pa stobs po che// sa brgyad dbang phyug lha yul pa// zla banya ba'i zhal mdog can// ded dpon tshogs kyi bdag po ste// gnas brtan tshong bskal
264a6(rgyud): bzang ba// yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzang // dpag bsam ljon shing mi yi bdag/ mchog don 'os pa gtso bo ste// mchog sbyin mi'u thung khyab 'jug pa// skyabs 'os bkra shis srung ba po//
264a7(rgyud): rin chen 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// lha yi seng ge'i khril bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi bdag/ rab tu dar ba nor mi zad// seng ge'i rtsal gyis mthu rtsal can// ston pa 'jig rten
264b1(rgyud): gsum las rgyal// gtso bo 'tshong ba rigs kyi mchog/ pad+ma'i lte ba thub med rgyal// tshangs par spyod pa rgya mtsho che// gnod 'dzin bdag nyid che ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad ngas bshad 'di// sdig pa
264b2(rgyud): thams cad 'joms byed cing // dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa// 'byor dang skal bzang skyed pa po// glang po rta nor 'phel byed pa// gza' dang rgyu skar rmi lam ngan// ltas ngan sel bar byed pa ste//
264b3(rgyud): nags sel gal te grong dang ni// dur khrod yang na ri yang rung // mkhas pa gang na klog pa der// g.yul dang dgra ni nyam nga ba// sbrul dang me chu chom rkun sogs// stag dang dom dang 'jigs pa che// rgya mtsho
264b4(rgyud): bgrod dka' mi bzad las// mi ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dbang po me dang chu lha dang // gshin rje srin bdag rlung lha dang // nor sbyin dpal ldan ku ba ra// nor bu bzang sras lnga rtsen dang // rtsed mo can dang /
264b5(rgyud): 'brog gnas dang // lha dang gnod sbyin gzhan dag kyang // g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du// rab tu dga' zhing srung bar byed// gang na ming 'di klog pa der// glang chen rta dang ba glang dang // lo tog rnam pa
264b6(rgyud): sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu me tog rnams kyang 'phel// mi nad dang ni 'go ba'i nad// gnod pa kun las byung ba rnams// thams cad du ni bde legs 'gyur// lhag par byis pa rnams la shis// de la
264b7(rgyud): yi rigs klu rnams dang // ma mo dang ni gdon drag dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang mi 'am ci// srin bu rnams kyang 'tshe mi byed// nad do cog las rnam par grol// de bzhin ba zhing nor dang ldan// bu dag dang ni tsha bo
265a1(rgyud): dang // dpal dang gtong ba rnams kyis rgyas// rigs mchog rgyal ba 'byung ba dang // longs spyod chen po'i nang du skye// tshe dang dpal dang ldan pa dang // nad med rims dang bral bar 'gyur//
265a2(rgyud): tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran// ldo bskyen thos pa 'dzin pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// skal ba bzang po nyid du 'gyur// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal gnod sbyin rje// gsang ba dag khyod la
265a3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te// ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po// lag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud// sems can dad la mnyes gshin pa// nor bzang sras kyi grags pa 'di// dbul ba'i nad ni zhi byed pa// rab tu
265a4(rgyud): bshad par legs par gsungs// don kun grub pa gsang ba'i sngags// bdag gis kyang ni 'dir dbul te// de ni legs par dran tsam gyis// mi ni dbul las grol 'gyur zhing // gzhan
265a5(rgyud): gyis mi tshugs srung bar 'gyur// dgra rnams kyis kyang mi choms shing // skal ba bzang dang skal dang ldan// lo brgya yang ni 'tshe bar 'gyur// lha yi glang po rin chen dang // rgyal dang rgyal srid
265a6(rgyud): 'os rnams kyang // nges par myur du thob 'gyur te// rgyal srid kyang ni the tshom med// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo maNi b+hA drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye oM hrIM hA~M/ k+Sha dz+r-i/ hri hri/ dbi bya rang
265a7(rgyud): nog pa ri/ shan a ta thAka de ba yak+Sha sa ma la ma nu s+phar triHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//
265b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya me kha la nA mahA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa me kha la zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
265b2(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' rab na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe gzhon nu sgra gcan zin mal na nyal ba las srin po zhig
265b3(rgyud): gis sngangs par byas par gyur to// de nas gzhon nu sgra gcan zin de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas gzhon nu mang po rnams kyis mdun du bdar cing yongs su bskor te ser skya'i gnas nas byung nas/
265b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug nas ngus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
265b5(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bsrung ba'i phyir me kha la zhes bya ba'i rig sngags bshad kyis/ khyod kyis zung zhig/ lha'i tshogs dang / klu'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang /
265b6(rgyud): srin po'i tshogs dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang / nam mkha' lding gi tshogs dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs dang / sha za'i tshogs dang / yi dgas kyi tshogs dang / grul bum
265b7(rgyud): gyi tshogs dang / srul po'i tshogs dang / gza'i tshogs dang / rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / drang srong 'dod chags dang bral ba
266a1(rgyud): rnams dang / gangs la gnas pa dang / phyogs bcu na 'byung po gang dag 'khod pa dang / srin mo'i tshogs dang / bA li dang / kA Da li di dang / bo da ri dang / grong rna dang / yid bzang dang /
266a2(rgyud): 'phrog ma chen mo dang / ma mo'i tshegs rnams ngal nyon cig/ rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi srung ma shar phyogs kyi phyogs chan srin mo 'phrog ma zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs kyi phyogs chan srin mo glang snam zhes bya
266a3(rgyud): pab dang / nub phyogs kyi phyogs chan srin mo ral pa can zhes bya ba dang / byang phyogs kyi phyogs chan srin mo sa'i gtsug ces bya ba dang / srin mo drag mo de dag re re'ang 'khor bye ba drug bcus bskor ba
266a4(rgyud): me kha la'i rig sngags las brjod pa de dag thams cad kyis srung bar gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/ g+hane g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne/ ba ti/ g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me/ g+hu ne g+hu ne g+hu ne g+hu ne/ ba ti/ g+ha re g+ha re g+ha re/
266a5(rgyud): g+ha re g+ha re/ g+ha ri ri Ni/ g+ha ra ba ti/ swa ra ba ti/ d+ha na pa ti/ su ra ba ti/ a hrI ma/ ba ti ma ti/ a pa ti/ su pa ti/ ba hu ba ti/ ha la ha la ha la ha la ha la ha la ha la ha la/ skyem ma nyi ma ci li hi ma him
266a6(rgyud): hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu/ ti li ti li ti li ti li ti li ti li ti li/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ pe ta ya ba a ma ne/ ma bi sa re/ ha ha hi hi/ sa man+ta sa re/ a sa man+ta se re/ pa ri kha sa me/ a pa
266a7(rgyud): d+he sa mdu brde/ g+han/ me kha le/ kun dga' bo ma kha la zhes bya ba stobs mo che ste/ rdzu 'phrul ldan ma/ brtson 'grus che ba/ 'di ni rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / ro langs rnams
266b1(rgyud): las gang du'ang bkag pa med de kun tu thogs pa med par 'gro'o// kun dga' bo ma kha la zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di ni sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang / bde ba'i phyir dang / bsrung zhing tha
266b2(rgyud): ba'i bar du bya ba'i phyir/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// drang srong chen po gzhan dag gis kyang smras te/ kun dga' bo me kha la'i rig sngags ni sems can rnams
266b3(rgyud): la phan par byed do// gang su dag sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa/ sa la gnas pa de dag thams cad me kha la'i rig sngags thos nas shin tu skrag ste/ phyogs dang phyogs
266b4(rgyud): mtshams rnams su 'gro'o// kun dga' bo me kha la'i rig sngags legs par bzung ba byas pa la kun nas dpag tshad bcu gnyis su srung ba gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs
266b5(rgyud): su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis shig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chad pa spang bar gyis shig/ mtshon cha spang ba dang dug gzhil bar
266b6(rgyud): gyis shig/ mi mdza' ba zlog par gyis shig/ mtshams gcad par gyis shig/ skud pas bcing bar gyis shig/ sdang ba thams cad zlog par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin pa sdig par byed/
266b7(rgyud): pa rnams 'tsher ma gzhug cig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de la cho ga ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te/ me tog dang
267a1(rgyud): bdug pa dag gsol nas skud pa bcing bar bya'o// khyab pa dang / mnye ba dang / legs par khrus bya'o// cho ga 'dis gdon thams cad bzlog pa dang nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar/
267a2(rgyud): bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ti le ba le/ bi ma le/ ta ma le/ hi li/ ni ri/ si rim sa ra/ rig sngags 'di ni thos nas su/ sa rnams thams cad g.yos par gyur// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rab tu g.yos// lha
267a3(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyang lhags par gyur// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyang lhags// 'byung po'i rgyal po rnams kyang lhags// bcom ldan byams pa'ang der phyin to// tshangs pa dang ni dbang po'ang lhags/
267a4(rgyud): dbang phyug che dang gzhon nu dang // gnyis ka der ni lhags par gyur// me kha la las gang su dag/ brjod pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang lhags// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa'
267a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'di la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su
267a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang / mtshams dgum pa dang / me kha las yongs su bzlog pa sul bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ a bat+ta ni/
267a7(rgyud): badz+ra ni/ a bi ba Ta ni/ tsu lu tsu li/ u d+hA dan+te/ sa man+te/ dAn+te/ nir muN+Tha/ ni mi mu ni/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o swA hA/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// bde legs su gyur cig/
267b1(rgyud): swAhA/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas me kha la'i rig sngags kun nas 'dzin pa 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig 'di phul lo// s+yAd ya the dan/ ang gu la/ a du re/ du du re/ shi khi shi khi shi khi shi khi gas/
267b2(rgyud): ba ra da ra da ra kha ti/ mu tsa su tsa bi ru tsa/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor dul ba/ sAd ya the dan/ pra
267b3(rgyud): duSh+TaM/ ru d+hi ra kar+Ne/ gam b+hI re/ dur da she na mu tse/ mu tse/ shAkya rA dze/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor dul
267b4(rgyud): be s+yAd ya the dan/ sod De/ d+he de De/ b+he da Da me/ dan tI li/ ti li mi li/ srung ba gyis shig/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bya'o sa/ de nas de'i tshe rgyal po lus ngan
267b5(rgyud): gyis mkha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya the dan/ g+hu me g+hum g+hum g+hu ma g+hu me/ u ke/ pu ke/ dz+wa le/ da lem ti pa le/ sA re/ sar/ a d+hi pa ti/ zhi ba dang bde legs su
267b6(rgyud): 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya the dan d+ha d+ha ra d+ha d+ha ra
267b7(rgyud): d+hA ra Ni/ d+hA ra Ni/ d+ha re/ a tsu te/ mu tse/ mu ru/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o swA hA/ mtshams dgum pa'i bar du rgya cher bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe rgyal po chen po
268a1(rgyud): 'phags skyes pos me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor bul ba/ s+yAd la the dan/ ad+ha re/ bar+d+ha re/ kar re/ pa ra ba tre/ kar ru he/ ka ri d+ha re/ ka na ka ba tre/ ru ru me/ k+Sharma a k+Shim/
268a2(rgyud): bak+Shi/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o swA hA/ mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas rgyal po mig mi dazang gis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya the dan/ dza ma la
268a3(rgyud): dza ma la/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ b+hi ri d+hi ri/ sa man+ta d+hi ri/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu tha bas me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul
268a4(rgyud): gsA ya tre dan/ a la he/ ta la b+he/ ma De/ bi ma Ni/ d+ha ke d+ha ra ke/ sa ki ni/ bkri ni/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du brgya swAhA/ de nas de'i
268a5(rgyud): lha'i bu nyi mas mekha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya the dan/ oM bA de/ bi ma le/ pra b+hA swa re/ sha ha ra sme/ ha sa ha swa rasmai/ a ta swa ra si/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o//

268b1(rgyud): da he A kA sha bi ma le/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe klu'i tshogs rnams kyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/

268b4(rgyud): de nas de'i tshe gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ smad ya the dan/ tsha tsha pa ti/ tsha tsha ba ti/ ru ru drA rA/ u bI ra bA rA/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur

268b7(rgyud): ba/ s+yAd ya the dan/ pha du me/ kA rA De/ a d+hi ta/ tsu ta/ sa mi ra Ni/ tshwa tshu ba ti/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe ma mo tshogs tham/
269a1(rgyud): cad kyis me kha la'i rlig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya the dan/ ke le ma ke le/ Da ma/ ke le par Da re/ Da ma re gar re/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams/
269a2(rgyud): dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i srin mo bzhi po de dag gis ma kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya the dan/ An/ pa ne/ kha dza/ kha ba dze/ khu khu ri ri/ mi ri hi ri/ zhi ba
269a3(rgyud): dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe sring mo chen mo 'gro lding bas mkha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd la the dan/ da ra da re/ dA ra da ra/
269a4(rgyud): hi gI hu hU hu hu/ shI ki kli da kli ga ma khu ma khu/ dzu kha khi/ Ta ba Ta gi ed rbu/ rad n+yA/ n+ya ra/ kra ma/ ku dzu ku dzu/ dri dri dri/ du du du/ tshi mi li mi li/ a Da kA kA/ kAg si/ du du/ to thi ti thi/ ti mi li ma ti/
269a5(rgyud): shi ti/ mai ti li/ ba ti pre tri pre tri Ne/ du hi ni/ a hA ni/ la he/ ba he/ tha TA pa tha pe/ btsun pa 'di ni 'gro lding ba'i rigs te/ me kha la'i gzungs sngags kyi 'khor du phul ba lags so// bsrung ba dang / yongs
269a6(rgyud): su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang /
269a7(rgyud): dpag tshad bcu gnyis su mtshams dgum pa dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ grul bum mam/ sha za 'am/ dri za 'am/ yi dgas sam/ srul po la

269b2(rgyud): nyin gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa'am/ nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa gang gis gnod par bgyid par ma gyur cig/ co 'dri ba'am/ rnam par 'tshe ba 'am/ glags
269b3(rgyud): lta ba 'am/ glags tshol bas glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma mchis te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// 'jigs pa thams cad dang mi ma yin pa thams cad las/
269b4(rgyud): rtag tu bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis me kha la'i rig sngags 'khor dang bcas pazung
269b5(rgyud): zhig/ kun dga' bo me kha la'i rig sngags 'di ni sprin 'ching ba/ rlung gnon pa/ tshar gcod pa/ bdag srung ba/ gzhan srung ba/ grong dang grong khyer srung ba/ mtshams gcod pa ste/ lha 'am/
269b6(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ grul dum mam/ sha za 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ dge sbyong 'am/ bram ze 'am/ spyod pa pa 'am/ kun tu rgyu 'am/ gcer bu pa 'am/ 'tsha
269b7(rgyud): ba pa 'am/ mi thod can nam/ lus skya'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// kun dga' bo me kha la'i rig sngags 'dis ni gshed byed dang / byad stems dang / ro langs thams
270a1(rgyud): cad 'jig par byed pa'o// gdon thams cad klog pa'o// bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o// kun dga' bo me kha la'i rig sngags 'di ni dge sbyong gis byas pa/
270a2(rgyud): gcod par byed pa'o// bram zes byas pa dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / 'tsheb pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// tsha
270a3(rgyud): pas byas pa dang / brgya byin gyis byas pa dang / lha'i dbang pos byas pa dang / rgyal po chen pos byas pa dang / khyab 'jug gis byas pa dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed/
270a4(rgyud): pa'o// rgyal po chen pos byas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rgyu skar dang / gzas byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po
270a5(rgyud): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o//
270a6(rgyud): lha gang bas kyang byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// dur khrod pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// shing drung pas byas pa dang / ri drung pas byas pa dang / ri rtsibs byas pa dang gas
270a7(rgyud): pas byas pa dang / nam mkha' pas byas pa dang / gnas thams cad pas byas pa dang / mis byas pa dang / mi ma yin pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// me kha la'i rig sngags 'dis
270b1(rgyud): ni gcod pa'o// phyir gcod pa'o// phyis gcod pa'o// kun dga' bo gang gis me kha la'i rig sngags 'dis bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang
270b2(rgyud): zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang / dpag tshad dam/ dpag tshad gnyis sam/ dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi bar du
270b3(rgyud): mtshams bcad par byas na/ gang me kha la'i rig sngags 'di las 'da' bar byed pa ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i
270b4(rgyud): skye dgu'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nangs ma mthong ste de ni gnas med do// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge
270b5(rgyud): 'dun gyi bden pa dang / bden par smra ba thams cad kyi bden pa dang / drang srong thams cad kyi bden pa 'di la sems can gyi tshogs 'gal bar ma byed cig/ kun dga' bo dus las 'da' bar mi bya ba lnga ni
270b6(rgyud): 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang / chos kyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang / bden par smra ba rnams kyi bden pa las
270b7(rgyud): 'da' bar mi bya ba dang / drang srong gi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba ste/ 'byung po thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / mi thams cad dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no// nad thams
271a1(rgyud): cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig/ gang yang rnam par mtho 'tsham par ma byed cig/ 'tshe bar ma byed
271a2(rgyud): cig/ gang yang rdeg par ma byed cig swA hA/ me kha la'i rig sngags kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas la me tog gi mchod pa dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / lha bshos dag phul nas phyir bsrung
271a3(rgyud): bar bya'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs nas me tog bkram ste/ ci 'byor pa'i gtor ma 'am/ phye 'am/ pad+ma dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / me tog
271a4(rgyud): bsregs pas bum pa bkang ba 'am/ snod bkang ba'i dbus su 'dug nas spos kyi rgyun mi 'chad par 'dug par bya'o// rtswa ku shas thams cad la byab par bya'o// bdag bsrung ba dang gzhan bsrung /
271a5(rgyud): pabar bya ba ni skud pas so// sprin bcing ba ni me tog snu ma'i shing dang snang ba'i mar gyis sbyin sreg bya'o// rlung dang char bzlog pa ni rtswa mun dza'i lhas ma la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te rtsa ba'i rig
271a6(rgyud): sngags kyis lan bdudan btab nas mdud pa bdun dor bar bya'o// lam grub pa dang bde bar bya na chos gos kyi grwar lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa gsum dor bar bya'o// zas dkar gsus
271a7(rgyud): zos la nyin zhag gsum smyung ba byas nas/ pad+ma dang / yungs kar dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ grong dang grong khyer mtshams gcad par bya'o// rig sngags thams cad gcod par
271b1(rgyud): 'dod pas sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te tshu la gcad par bya'o// snod gsar par chu blugs nas lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te khrus byas na/ log 'dren thams cad bcing /
271b2(rgyud): babyas par 'gyur ro// me tog dkar po dag la bzlas brjod byas te bsnun na dug med par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la shing ka ra wI ra'i lkug sams byab par bya ste/ bdag bsrung ba byas na gang
271b3(rgyud): du gdon gyi phyir yang las thams cad bya'o// thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du sna ma'i me tog gi 'bru mar gyi nang du a ti mu ta ka bsnyugs pa'i yam sreg gi shing la
271b4(rgyud): 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyis btab ste lan bcu bzhir sbyin sreg bya'o// 'byung po dbab par 'dod pas ra'i 'o ma dang shing a pa marga'i yam sreg shing dag la 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyis btab ste/
271b5(rgyud): lan lngar sbyin sreg bya'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ched du sbyin sreg bya bar 'dod pas 'bras thug po che dang / ba'i 'o ma dang / ru rta dang / rgya ma tshwa dang / shing ka ra wI ra dkar po'i yam sreg shing la lan
271b6(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te sbyin sreg byas na/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du sbyin sreg byas par 'gyur ro// rnyed par bya ba'i don du ru rta dang 'bru mar las 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyis
271b7(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te gdong bskus nas smras pas gang ba slangs pa de thob par 'gyur ro// thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la spos dang //
272a1(rgyud): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / khyi ma dang / byug pa rnams kyis byug cing / ci nus kyi lha bshos kyang dbul bar bya ste 'di dngos grub po// bcom ldan 'das/
272a2(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gzhon nu sgra gcan zin dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
272a3(rgyud): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa me kha la zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / srung ba dang bcas/ cho ga dang bcas pas mi mje/
272a4(rgyud): kyi sems can thams cad srung bar gyur cig swA hA/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
272a5(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi d+yA rA dzA shA sa ma hA nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbugs chen po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
272a6(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'byung po'i bdag po chen po mche ba gtsigs pa ser skya zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
272a7(rgyud): 'das bdag ni 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po legs te/ bdag ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni mchis pa'i 'byung po thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid/ rdeg par bgyid/ 'ching bar bgyid/
272b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'phen par bgyid pa/ yan lag dang nying lag rnams rnam par gcod par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag bkres
272b2(rgyud): par gyur pa na dbugs gtong ste/ dbugs des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gengs par bgyid cing bcom ldan 'das bdag mi dang mi ma lags pa thams cad kyi gzi byin 'phrog
272b3(rgyud): par bgyid lags te/ dbugs chen pos sems can rnams la reg ma thag tu bro nad sna tshogs dag 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang na rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbugs chen po zhes bgyi ba
272b4(rgyud): 'di spyod pa der bdag gi dbugs kyis mi tshugs pa dang / 'byung po rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rnams
272b5(rgyud): la phyag bgyis nas/ mgo 'am mgul du btags te 'chang ba der rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa'i dro nad rnams 'byung bar mi
272b6(rgyud): 'gyur bar bdag deng slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yi dma' tshal lags so// tad+ya thA/ Da ra Da ra/ ka Da ra ka Da ra/ tha ra tha ra/ za tha ra/ za tha ra/ mar ma ra/ ma ma ra/ ma ma ra/ hu d+hu hu/ ha ha ha/ sa
272b7(rgyud): ra sa ra sa ra/ tsu tsu tsu khu bu ru/ ki li ki li ki li/ sarba b+hu ta/ oM ti pa ti/ rba rba dra pra bra bra khu khu khu/ kra kra kra/ ya sa ya sa ya sa/ pAN+Da re/ pAN+Da re/ khA NA re/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ hu hu hu/ bdag la srungs shig srungs
273a1(rgyud): g+ha/ kya kya rdza gatha gar+b+ha r+m+mA / dag na ma shA lpag+sa sar+dz+dza thA smras sa m+b+has
273a2(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA badz+ra dang / zhu chen gyi mche ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bskur cing zhus te gtan la pab pa'o// dkon
273a3(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// oM s+phAr smA ra/ di sma nA ska ra ma hAng badz+ra/ zhes brjod cing rin po che brdar bas rin po che'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i char dpag tu med pa nam ma
273a4(rgyud): khams gang bar bsams pa dbul lo// rin po che brdar ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
273a5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM b+ha Sha dz+yo b+hai Sha dz+ye/ ma hA b+hai Shadz+ye/ b+he'i dz+ye sa nu dag
273a6(rgyud): te swA hA/ sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gdab pa rdzogs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/
273b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo \u0f7fga la te rat+na ke tA rA dzA la/ aHte/ sa rgyags badz+ra la/ ThaHhA/ oM ra t+ne ra ma thar ter k+She r+ye swAH/ 'di brjod cing bskor pa
273b2(rgyud): gcig byas pa'ang dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur ro// bskor ba'i gzungs rdzogs saM/ rgya gar 'ad du/ Ar+yA prad k+Sha rat+na tA la nA ma d+hA ra Ni/
273b3(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gi rten la bskor ba bya ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la
273b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// oM na mo da sha di tri kA sarba rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHpra dak+Sha su pra dak+Sha/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi dkon mchog gsum la phyag
273b5(rgyud): 'tshal zhing bskor ba byas par 'gyur ro// thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur ro// dgra dang bgegs kyis glags rnyed/
273b6(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// nad dang gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// bskor ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ dak+Shi NI d+hA ri shod+d+hA na nA
273b7(rgyud): mkhod skad du/ yon yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
274a1(rgyud): kun nas 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa blo gros dang ldan pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/
274a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// na maHsa man+ta pra b+hA rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyA ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na mo many+dzu shri ye/ ku mA rA b+hU tA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ni rA lar+the nI/
274a3(rgyud): rA b+ha se/ dza ye dzA ya lab d+he/ ma hA te dak+Shi dak+Shi Ni pa ri sho d+hA ya swA hA/ 'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad bying bar 'gyur ro// yon mang po la spyad pa'ang byang bar 'gyur ro// yon bdag na
274a4(rgyud): yon yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur zhing tshogs thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang mi 'byung ngo // 'dul ba lung las rnam par nges pa'i mdo las
274a5(rgyud): byung ba yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / gyaM/ de nas yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ su ma ru kalpa/ rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga
274a6(rgyud): tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM kalpe kalpe/ ma hA kalpe/ kalpa pa ri sho d+ha ni swA hA/ gzungs 'di lan cig bzlas pas ri ra ba tsam gyi yon yongs su sbyong bar byed par gsungs pas/ lan/
274a7(rgyud): lde'am lan drug tsam bzlas so// yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum
274b1(rgyud): gyi rten la sngags 'di lan re brjod cing brkyang phyag re byas te phyag gsum byas na/ sde snod gsum thos pa dang / bsams pa dang / bsgoms pa'i bsod nams dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// ki ma re re phyag gsum
274b2(rgyud): gsum byas na tshe 'di nyid la mthong ba'i lam gyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thob kyi bar du mi dang ka mi ma yin pa dang / 'byung po dang / nad rims kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur
274b3(rgyud): ro// oM na mo many+dzu shri ye/ na maHsu shri ye/ na ma ut+ta ma shri ye swA hA/ phyag bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag /
274b4(rgyud): lo/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// i ri mi ri/ d+ha da me/ ba hu pa/ laM b+ha ba tu swA hA/ gos phrugs gcig la lan stong bzlas brjod byas te/ mi ya rabs sa/
274b5(rgyud): slob dpon nam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig la byin na zla ba phyed phan chad kyis gos phrugs brgya thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nor zas sam/ rkang 'gros gang yang rung ba rnams kyang de dang 'dreg/
274b6(rgyud): gos brgya thob pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// oM mo kha mu khi/ tri mu la/ tri mu khi ma hA sra mu khi ta thA ga ta
274b7(rgyud): mu kha stau ha na/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ swas+thA naM gats+tsha swA he swA hA/ mad se dang / parta ka dang / ga gon ring po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te gshags na mcher pa'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro//
275a1(rgyud): the tshom med do// sran zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
275a2(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sreg gsal 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ hu Ta ga ta ne swA hA/ cho ga ni lag pa la bzlas brjod byas nas lto mnyes na ma zhu ba'i
275a3(rgyud): nad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// ma zhu ba'i nad 'byung ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg/
275a4(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ dI ri tiSh+Tha/ taskA ra bA to si/ ma tsa la ma tsa la swA hA/ lan bdun brjod de/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la
275a5(rgyud): gsol ba btab na mi thams cad byams par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa sdang ba thams cad rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // dkon
275a6(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ku mA ra ru pa d+hA ra Ni bi shwa sa b+hA ba A ga ts+tsha ats+tsha/ la gu la gu Sh+T+r-i b+h+rUM/
275a7(rgyud): hUM hUM/ dzi na dzi ka ma ny+dzu shri ye/ ta ra ya maM/ sarba duHkhe b+h+yaHphaT phaT sa ma ya sa ma ya/ a mi tod b+ha bod b+ha ga pA pe me nA sha ya swA hA/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
275b1(rgyud): so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ba ka ba tse/ dza d+ha ni/ staM b+hA ni/ mo ha ni/ sarba ro Shapra sha ma ni swAhA/ shar phyogs su bltas
275b2(rgyud): te 'dug la/ sngags 'di brjod cing rang gi lag pas sna bdun gdong la byugs nas tshogs kyi nang du song na khros pa dga' bar 'gyur ro// khro ba zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
275b3(rgyud): 'phags pa khros pa zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// ka taM bi ka te/ ro 'apra sha ma ni swA hA/ gang khros pa'i mdun du brjod
275b4(rgyud): na de khros bzhi nas nges par 'ong ngo // khros pa zhi pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo b+ha ga ba ta
275b5(rgyud): uSh+NI ShA ya d+ha re ran te swA hA/ ma bsgrubs kyang las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ gi'u wang la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpral bar thig le byas na bltas pa de dga' bar 'gyur// mig rtsil
275b6(rgyud): lanA brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te mig la bslus na gang dang phrad par bya ba de dga' bar 'gyur ro// chu khyor gang la lan bdun bzlas te 'thungs na ma bslangs par zas rnyed par 'gyur ro// tshogs
275b7(rgyud): pa'i nang du 'gro na bdag gis gos kyi mtha' ma nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas tshogs pa'i nang du song na tshig btsan par 'gyur ro// tshig saca/
276a1(rgyud): pa'i bzungs rdzogs so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM a le kA li a le kA li mud rtsi te
276a2(rgyud): swA hA/ kha nyi ma la bltas te tshul sngags 'di lan bdun btab ste/ phyogs bcur gtor na bdag bsrungs par 'gyur ro// bdag srung ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
276a3(rgyud): 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ uSh+NIShA ya/ d+ha re da ra ni ta ye swA hA/ ma bsgrubs kyang bklags pas 'grub ste/ gi hang la
276a4(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpral bar thig le byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// ti tsa la bsngags te mig la bskus na gang bltas pa mig sprang mthun no// chu la bsngags te 'thungs na gzhan rnams
276a5(rgyud): zas ster snying 'dod do// yid du 'ong ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal mo// oM b+ha ga pa ti shru ti smr-i ti/ ba lA ba bad+ma/
276a6(rgyud): sid+d+hi swA hA/ cho ga ni zhag bdun gyi bar du nang re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu khyor gang la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na/ nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka sum
276a7(rgyud): brgya lobs so// bla ba gcig gi bar du byas na mi 'am ci dang 'dra bar mgrin pa snyan par 'gyur te/ the tsom za bar mi bya'o// mgrin pa snyan pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
276b1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / yung tsam rgya/
276b2(rgyud): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ nak+Sha tra~M/ sarba ti shrI mAr+Ne/ na tra ni/ me sa mi ta d+ha ni/ kha b+han+d+ha swA hA/ de'i cho ga ni phyogs gang du 'gro 'dod kyang rung ste/ des lan bdun brjod nas song na don thams
276b3(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// don thams cad grub pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
276b4(rgyud): lo// cho sa la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo ha ri d+hi ye/ ha ri d+hi kum ri/ gau ri/ gan d+hA re/ tsan+na li/ ma taM gi/ ka li ka li/ che ge mo zhig gi mo he hi/ kha ra kha ra/ pa tsa pa tsa
276b5(rgyud): a ba d+ha ya/ mur tsA ya/ che ge mo zhig gi me sha ma nA ya swA hA/ oM b+hur b+hu bA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la ma nA ni/ di bi sarba saM ska ra ka ri Ni dze/ ta le ta le/ dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni bklags pa tsam gyis ma
276b6(rgyud): bsgrubs par las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ klad nad dang / rims ldang du ba can dang / ro langs dang / gdon rnams pham par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad kyis gtang bar
276b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bkres na grong du song ste lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ gdong la byugs na zas rnyed par 'gyur ro// lcel bzlas brjod byas na gshegs 'gyed pa'i tshe lan thebs par 'gyur ro//
277a1(rgyud): lo ma 'am/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu la bsngags nas sul byin pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro// las grub pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
277a2(rgyud): dug zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ bdud rtsi sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM su ru su ru ka/ bar ba ra ke/ bi ri hi ri/ shud b+he bi shud d+he swA hA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan/
277a3(rgyud): 'das kyi bden pa dang gzi brjid kyis klu'i dug dang / sbrul gyi dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / kha rlangs kyi dug dang / rtsa ba'i dug dang / gcan gzan mche ba'i dug bcom mo// dug nges par bcom mo//
