395b7(rgyud): pas kha zas dkar gsum dang // rtsa ba sdong bu 'bras bu tshong ma dang // zho dang nas dang 'o ma mar dag dang // 'bru mar tshigs ma dar ba'o kon dang // thug pa dag ni bza' btung yid par gsungs//
396a1(rgyud): za srin po dag dang gnon po dang // ro langs dang ni 'jig pas sgrub pa dang // lha min bu mo'i 'khrul 'khor 'joms pa'i tshe// 'bru mar tshigs ma'i bza' ba mchog tu bsngags/
396a2(rgyud): de ltar bzlas brjod byed pa'i sgrub pa pos// nyin gcig bzhin du byas des bzlas pa ni// phul nas cho ga bzhin du gshegs su gsol// nub mo ku sha bting nas zhal bar bya// byams pa snying rje dga' ba/
396a3(rgyud): btang snyoms ldan pa dang // bde gshegs chos dang dge 'dun bcas pa dran bya ste// shA ri'i bu dang nga la btud nas thal sbyar nyal// de ltar sngags pa'i sdig pa mtha' dag zad par bya// 'phadra/
396a4(rgyud): pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u gsum pa'o// / sgrub pa pos ni nges par bcang ba yi// rdo rje de dag gang yin bshad par bya// sor bcu bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad
396a5(rgyud): dang // mchog gi tshad ni sor yang nyi shu'o// gser gyi rdo rje rig 'dzin nyid dang ni// sa rnams thob par bya phyir rab tu shis// rgyal po'i don du dngul gyi mchog yin te// zangs kyi rin chen 'byung /
396a6(rgyud): pa'i klu sgrub par// lha min dbang po'i 'khrul 'khor gzhig pa dang // phug tu 'gro la rngo mi rdo rje'o// don kun sgrub pa la ni lcags gsum gyi// gsang ba'i sde gzhom pa la lcags kyi'o// gdon
396a7(rgyud): gzhan la de seng ldeng dpal dang tshe// nad med nor rdzas la ni bil ba'o// gnod sbyin ma mo sgrub la ma ru shing // chos kyi don la a shwad las byas shing // gsal shing rtse mo'i dgra rnams gzhig
396b1(rgyud): ba la mi rnams gsang pa la na ma nus kyis// shel las byas pa mig 'phrul chen po la/ 'byor phyir 'jim pa las byas rab tu shig// gas datsang bskam pa ba cur mi shing // shab sbru
396b2(rgyud): ba la yang rtag tu shis// lha dang gnod sbyin dri za sgrub pa la// sgron shing las ni byas pa'i rdo rje'o// ci ste klu ni dbang du byed 'dod na// de tshe klu shing rtsa ba las byas pa'o// gzugs 'gyur
396b3(rgyud): ba yis las byas pa ste// ro langs sgrub pa la ni ka dam pa'o// pu na ka dang rardza arga dang // a shwad shing gi rdo rje nor gyi phyir// glA ba a mra shri bar+Na ba yi// ardzu la sogs pa las byas
396b4(rgyud): pa dag/ mi rnams g.yul las rgyal bar bya phyir ro// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa thob bya'i phyir// tsan dan dkar po dang ni dmar po ste// dbyibs legs 'jam zhing mnyams tha med pa'i// rdo rje che
396b5(rgyud): sra ba bcang bar bya// dang po zlos tshe de ni thogs nas su// bzlas brjod zin nas myur ba kho nar yang // dad pa'i sems kyis phyag byas dri sogs kyis// mchod nas rdo rje rgyal ba zhabs drung
396b6(rgyud): gzhag/ nga yi rigs kyi gsang sngags sgrub pa pos// rdo rje med na 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de las gcig kyang rnyed par ma gyur na// khu tshur bcangs nas rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas//
396b7(rgyud): ros gi'u wang ral gri a dza na// spang ma ba bla zhags pa li khri btsag/ mar dang shu dag 'khor lo rdo rje mdung // pags pa go cha mdung ni rtse gsum pa// rdzas ni bcu bdun bsgrags pa de rnams
397a1(rgyud): #kyis/ 'grub pa rnam pa gsum rnams thob par byed// rang sngags cho ga lhag par bshad pa gang // der yang grub pa rnam pa gsum du mthong // bgegs dang log 'dren zung /
397a2(rgyud): par mi dga' ba// rig pa'i tshogs rnams kyi ni mdun na rgyu// rig 'dzin brtson pa'i bdag nyid can dag la// rnam pa sna tshogs glags skabs tshol zhing rgyu// bgegs kyi rigs ni rnam pa bzhi
397a3(rgyud): yod de// sa stengs dag na 'khod pa'i bgegs rnams ni// rnam par 'jig dang wa dang ne'u le dang // de bzhin so gcig pa dang rigs rnams bzhi// de dang de las 'phros pa mtha'
397a4(rgyud): yas so// sa sbrengs 'jig rten skyong ba bani gang yin// de dag g.yog 'khor mya ngan med pa yin// de yi g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag bdun rnams// de dag gsang sngags sgrub la bgegs byed do//
397a5(rgyud): wa yi rigs ni bye ba bco brgyad dag/ dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor te rnams kyi// sde dpon glang chen gdong ste stobs po che// sa sbrengs mtha' dag kun tu 'gegs kyang byed// so gcig rigs kyi/
397a6(rgyud): sde dpon gtsug 'chang ste// bye ba drug cu'i bgegs la dbang sgyur zhing // tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi ma zla ba rlung // de rnams kyis bshad sngags la bgegs byed do// ne'u le'i rigs gang
397a7(rgyud): mi pa rgya che ste// khrag khrig bye bather 'bum phrag stong dang // de dag rnams kyi sde dpor gtsug na 'byung // nga yi rigs dang sngags la bgegs byed do// dga' byed pad+ma 'dra bar dkyus ring mig/
397b1(rgyud): rtsen sngags rgyud la ni bgegs kyang byed// nor spyod du ni gang yi gang po pa// rang gi rigs kyi brgyud la bgegs kyang byed// sgrub pa po la 'byor par mi dga' ba// brtse med rang rang rigs la/
397b2(rgyud): bgegs byed do// rang gi gsang sngags gzugs su rnam sprul nas// 'phreng ba dang ni gtor ma mngon du len// lha yi lcog 'dren gyis byas de mthong nas// khros shing 'khrugs nas phyir
397b3(rgyud): yang phyogs par 'gyur// sngon chad sems ni 'jungs dang gnong pa'i phyir// lha yis log 'dren bgegs kyi lugs 'di stor// lugs 'di lha dang klu dang grub pa dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lhas
397b4(rgyud): kyang bzlog mi nus// bgegs kyis 'jigs su rung bar byas pa dag/ sngar bshad pas ni de dag zlog par byed// bzlas brjod zin nas legs par bsrung ba dang // dkyil 'khor mang byas
397b5(rgyud): bsgrub la 'jug par bya// gzhan du mchod pa cho ga med pa dang // bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga bral ba 'am// gang zhig rtag tu sems ni 'di ltar sems// rig pa gang zhig bdag gis bzlas pa
397b6(rgyud): byad yul dang rgyal tshogs gtam la chags pa de'i// lus la thogs pa med par rab tu 'jug/ 'di ltar phan tshun du ni 'bro ba na// rig pa 'dod pa'i sems dag g.yeng bar byed// dper
397b7(rgyud): nachu nang grib ma sdang ba ltar// de bzhin mi yi lus la 'jug par 'gyur// 'khru tshe gzhan la zlos pa na yang gzhan// rgal na gzhan gyi me tog bdug pa dang // mar me dbul ba'i tshe na'ang ga na/
398a1(rgyud): yin la// sbyin sreg byed pa na yang bgegs gzhan 'jug/ dper na nyi zer me shel 'bab pa yi// rkyen gyis ma bsgrims me ni 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin bgegs kyang lus//
398a2(rgyud): la zhugs gyur na// 'dod chags me tshon kun tu skyed par byed// g.yo zhing 'gul ba zhes ni bya ba'i bgegs// chu nang skyes bu 'khyud pa'i tshe na 'dzin// bkres shing lus la snyoms shing gnyid
398a3(rgyud): kyang che// de bzhin lus lci mchog tu khro bar 'gyur// de bzhin dri za zhes ni bya ba'i bgegs// de ni dri dbul ba na lus la 'jug/ yul dang rgyal po gnyen dang nor la sems// snyoms shing bud med
398a4(rgyud): dag la chags par 'gyur// nag po lus ches ni brtol nas su// bdug pa rab tu 'bul ba'i tshe na 'jug/ 'jungs dang g.yo sgyu byed cing mi bsrun la// 'dod chen che la rab gtum khu tshur 'dzag/
398a5(rgyud): mar me gtsug pud gcig pa bgegs byed do// snying khar cha zhing gzer thabs sems nyams byed// 'greng ba'i tshe na gtsug 'byang 'jug 'gyur te// rims dang 'khrugs skyugs drag pos 'debs/
398a6(rgyud): par byed// me tog 'bul tshe me tog tshor bkod pa// rang gi gnas skabs rnyed nas lus la 'jug/ rims dang cham pa lus tshigs na ba dang // grogs po dag dang rnam par 'bral bar byed//
398a7(rgyud): bgegs kyis brlabs pa phyogs na lam min lam du mthong // spyod pa sna tshogs byed cing 'dod chags rnams kyis gdungs// glo bur smra zhing klog la don med kun tu 'phyar// don du sgrub pa rnams la
398b1(rgyud): sems kyang yid gnyis byed// sems ni log par lta bas non pas na// gsang sngags med cing mtho ris lha yang med// bsod nams med cing sdig pa cung zad med// thar pa med cing 'chi ba'i//
398b2(rgyud): rgyu yang med// skye bo don med tshon mongs dka' thub ces// sna tshogs bkyil pa'i tshig 'di rtag tu smra// sen mos rtswa gcod bong rdo 'jig pa dang // mtshan mo so yang khrig khrig 'cha' ba dang // bu mo
398b3(rgyud): bdag 'dod khyo ni mi rnyed cing // skyes pa bdag 'dod chung ma gzhar mi rnyed// dgos pa'i don mi 'grub cing mi dgos 'grub// gar yang 'gro dgos gnyid med mi yang brlam// de bzhin stag gzig
398b4(rgyud): seng ge khyi dang phag/ bong bu rnga mo byi la sha za wa// bya rgod 'ug pa skyar mo mi'u thung sbrul// gcer bu thal ris can dang mi nag po// khron skamathod pa rus gong phung po dang // lcags dang rdo lung mi gtsang kha
398b5(rgyud): rul dang // kha bzhin bsgyur zhing ral gri mdung thogs pa// rmi lam 'di rnams rmis pa'i mi yang brlams// bgegs dang log 'dred rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// bdud rtsi thab sbyor drag shul las can
398b6(rgyud): sbyar// sngags pa de yis gsang sngags la ma zhugs pa// bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis yong mi tshugs// phyugs lhas shing gcig lha yi khang pa 'am// lam gyi bzhi mdo'am khang stso
398b7(rgyud): nags tshal du// dkyil 'khor gru ba ni lham pa khru ba zhi'i tshad// tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis bris// phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongs su gzung // sgo bzhi pa la ku sha'i rtswa yang dgras/
399a1(rgyud): bza' dang sha chang la phug la sogs bcas// 'bras chan 'bras bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyid// bum pa pad+ma dmar po'i mdog 'dra ba// dag por ri med cing rin chen
399a2(rgyud): bcas// sman dang 'bru dang spos chus bkang ba ba ni// ldum bus kha bkar ras kyis mgul pa dkri// lus dmar po dang ki li ki la dang // 'gro lding ba la sogs pas brgyar bzlas te// dkyi
399a3(rgyud): 'khor khor yug tu ni gzhag par bya// de nas byug spos bdug spos la sog dbul// bgegs kyis brlabs pa sang shar phyogs kha ba sman te// dkyil 'khor dbus su bde ba'i spyan la gzhag/ bzlas brjod/
399a4(rgyud): byas shing bum pa re res bkrus// 'on kyang log 'dren rnams las thar par 'gyur// sgrub pa po yi mi ni 'ba' zhig la// bgegs rnams gzhig phyir phan par ma zad kyi// rgyal po'i 'khor
399a5(rgyud): dang bud med bud med dang // bu mo dag dang rol mo mkhan rnams dang // bud med pa la dang tshong pa rnams kyang rung // zhing pa rnams dang dbul zhing 'phongs pa dang // gdon gyis zin cing rims kyis
399a6(rgyud): btab pa dang // bus pa'i gdon dang me tog 'bras bu 'phrog/ rmi lam smyo dang sems ni g.yeng ba dang // dug kyang sel te khrus 'dis dag par byed// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus
399a7(rgyud): le'u ba ni pa'o// / bgegs kyis bsod nams ma lus zad par byed// de bas mi la gsang sngags 'grub mi 'gyur// ji ltar zla ba sprin las rnam grol ltar// de bzhin
399b1(rgyud): bgegs las rgol ba rnam par gsal// dper nas mya ngus rnams bral ba ma// rjong gnas 'bras bu ma sog tu gu med// de dang ma bral myu gu mos dang // rdzo bu dag dang me tog 'bras bu ste/
399b2(rgyud): nyams shing yi ge gug byed med// mchod pa med cing mi gtsang bzlas brjod byas// gug kyeng yi ge lhag par gyur pa yis// gsang sngags dngos grub rgya cher mi ster to// dper da byar gyi dus
399b3(rgyud): na char sprin dag/ skye bo'i skal bzhin char pa legs par 'bebs// de bzhin mi yi skal ba gzigs nas ni// 'dod pa bzhin du gsang sngags dngos grub stsol// yul dang dus dang cho ga las
399b4(rgyud): rnams dang // sdig pa 'byang zhing bsod nams bsags pa dang // gus dang bzlas brjod kun la gzigs nas ni// de dag gsang sngags 'bras bu rnam par stsol// ji tsam sdig pa mang pos
399b5(rgyud): rab gang zhing // ji tsam las dkar bsod nams ma bsags dang // ji srid cho ga med par bzlas byas pas// de srid sngags pas dngos grub mi 'thob bo// cho ga nyams sam bar chad sngag
399b6(rgyud): gzhan bzlas// bzlas pa btang ngam gan la byin gyur na// dus gsum mchod pa la ni brtsod byas nas// slar yang 'bum bzlas bsgrub la 'jug par bya// stong phrag bcu 'am brgyad dam bdun
399b7(rgyud): nam pa ni// brdzas mthar de la mar gyi sbyin sreg bya// yang nam grugs nas sam til nag gam// yungs kar mar dang bsres pa'i sgyid sreg bya// 'dzam bum du prag sha pa la sha
400a1(rgyud): u dum seng ldeng a shwad a ba mar// arga a sho ka dang ra rdza ka n+ya gro bil ba a mra sha'i me yi// yam shing gzhon nu sor ni bcu gnyis pa// btsal nas no mar sbrang /
400a2(rgyud): rtsil btags nas// rtag tu me la sbyin sreg bya bar bya// de ltar byas na dngos grub myur du 'thob// gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyis kyang gsang sngags gang // bcad dam bcings sam
400a3(rgyud): mnan par gyur kyang rung // de yi gzugs brlan sa las byas nas su// nga yi zhabs drung mngon du phyogs bzhag ste// sngags pas ki li ki li sogs snying pos// mar dang 'o mas de yis
400a4(rgyud): gzugs brnyan bkru// de ltar nag bdun byas pas gsang sngags dag/ bcings pa dang ni ma dad las grol bar 'gyur// mchod pa la sogs cho gar ldan yang ni// ci ste gsang sngags 'bras bu mi
400a5(rgyud): ster na// de yi gzugs dug ske ches byugs nas su// ki li ki li 'gro lding la sogs pas// sngags kyis de la yungs mar rA sbyar bas// zhag bdun dus gsum sbyin sreg las byas na// gas
400a6(rgyud): sngags 'ongs nas rmil ma dag tu di// cho ga nyams pa'am yi ge lhag chang myod// sdod de gsang sngags lugs 'phang ba srur mod kyi// ji ltar rgya mtsho dus las mi 'da' ltar/ ka/ sngags kyis gnan
400a7(rgyud): gyis gsang sngags mi gnod cing // bcing dang gcad pa nam yang mi byed do// dper na byams pa'i mi yis mi gzhar la// che ge mo yi khyim 'dir byin chad khyod// blta ba'i phyir yang 'gro bar mi
400b1(rgyud): bya'o zhes// rigs pa'i tshig gis rnam par bstan pa dang // des kyang de mi tshig de mnyan nas su// khyim du smra dang blta phyir mi 'gro ba'i// de bzhin gsang sngags gang yang rung ba'i sngags/
400b2(rgyud): bzlas pas gzhan gyi gsang sngags mnad mi bya// gsang sngags gcad dang bcing ba mi bya zhing // yi ge lcug chad gsang sngags mi sbyin no// las rnams spyad pa gzhan du bsgyur mi bya// gnas
400b3(rgyud): rnams gzir ba nam yang mi bya'o// dbab dang bcing dang brdeg dang rmongs bya dang // yan lag mi gzhig rigs kyang mi brlag cing // sngags pas klu dang go don la sogs pa rnams// gzhan du
400b4(rgyud): bskrad pa nam yang mi bya'o// dgar dang bskrad pa dang ni gsad pa dang // byis pa gdon gyis zin pa mi gso zhing // rgya mo sa mda' snyi dang mdzel bu yis// sems can gnod pa nam yang mi bya'o// /
400b5(rgyud): dngos grub phyir ni rnam pa bcur gsungs te// sngags pa dang ni rang sngags g.yog dang rdzas// brtson 'grus phyogs dang sa gzhi dus dang ni// yan lag rdzogs pa'i lha dang sems stobs so//
400b6(rgyud): gzhan dag kha cig rig 'dzin grogs shes zer// gzhan dag phyogs dang brtson 'grus dus rnams nyid// gzhan ni rdzas dang sa gzhi sgra dang sngags// kha cig sems stobs yin zhes
400b7(rgyud): rnam par smra// bsgrub phyir de ltar bcu dang brgyad dang ldan// de bzhin pa ni dang gsum dang gcig nyid ces// sngags rig rang rang blo yis rnam par 'chad// sangs rgyas rgyud la cho ga gnyis
401a1(rgyud): #kyis 'grub// sgrub pa gang zhig rang gi yon tan rdzogs// brtson 'grus mchog dang yang dag ldan pa dang // gzhan gyis rnyed pa dag la phrag dog med// 'dod la ma chags
401a2(rgyud): lus kyi nyon mongs bzod// gug kyang krang kor tshang ba zur phyin la// gsang sngags dag cing shin tu cho gar bcas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' bsten pa yis// gnas su
401a3(rgyud): bzlas na yid 'ong dngos grub thob// ji ltar ri dgas dbang po bkres pa dag/ mthu stobs chen pos glang cher gsod pa dang // de bzhin spyang ki phag dang ri dgas dag wa rnams kyang ni myur du
401a4(rgyud): gsod pa ltar// de bzhin sngags pa seng ge'i tshul gyis su// rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i las rnams la// brtson 'grus chen po dang ni ldan pa dang // 'bad pa'i mchog rnams kyis kyang //
401a5(rgyud): bsten par bya// rdza rnga'i sgra dang dung rnga'i sgra dang ni// shin tu 'jigs byed skye bo'i sgra dag dang // gad rgyangs spyugs glu dag dang glu gar dang // gling bu pi wang rdza rnga chen po'i sgra/ khya bran sna tshogs sgra
401a6(rgyud): dang chu sgra dang // bud med rgyad kyi sil khrol sgra rnams dang // sha sbrang tsha grang rlung gis gdod pa yi// mi yi sems ni g.yeng zhing g.yo bar byed// bzlas brjod byed ro mi myur mi dal zhing // sgra cher mi 'gyu
401a7(rgyud): ha cang chung ba'ang med// smra bzhin ma yin gnad du g.yengs bzhin mir// gug kyang klad kor tshig rnams rnams par min// ji ltar chu klung nyid mtshan rtag tu ni// rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par 'gyur ba lha dade/
401b1(rgyud): bzhin phyag bcas bzlas dang brtul zhugs kyis// bsod nams lus cad la ni 'phel bar 'gyur// le lo 'dod chags mi dger ldan pa'i sems// gang nas gang du g.yeng ning rgyu ba dag
401b2(rgyud): dang de nas myur du bzlog nas ni// gsang sngags yi ge mchod la legs par sbyar// sna rtser lha zhing rnam par rtog pa spong // rang zhig bskyod kyang rnam par mi g.yo ba// de tshe dmigs la gnas
401b3(rgyud): pa thob pa ste// sems ni las su rung bar 'gyur ba nges// rtse gcig sems dang ldan pa'i mi la ni// yid las 'byung ba'i dga' ba rab tu skyo// dga' bas lus ni shin tu sbyangs pa 'thob/
401b4(rgyud): lus sbyangs pas ni bde ba'i skal ldan 'gyur// lus bde rtse gcig sems dang ting 'dzin gyis// de tshe bzlas brjod dogs pa med par 'gyur// tshe rabs gzhan du gang dang gang byas pa'i// sdig pa
401b5(rgyud): ma lus bzlas brjod byas pas 'byung // bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus byang gyur na// dang ba'i yid kyis dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de phyir bcom ldan rgyal ba'i dbang po yis// chos 'di kun gyi cha
401b6(rgyud): ba sems zhes gsungs// sems ni dang bas lha mi'i bde ba dang // mtho ris dang ni byang grol thob par 'gyur// sems kyi skyon gyis dud 'gror skye ba dang // sems dmyal bsad cing mi sdug dbul
401b7(rgyud): bor 'gyur// sems ni rab tu dang bar 'gyur ba'i mis// sa chu me rlung skye rgan 'chi sogs// bar dang tha mar gnod pa kun bral ba// rnam grol bde zhing zhi ba thob par 'gyur// gsang sngags dngos
402a1(rgyud): kun kun dang thun mong dang // bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal brgya dang 'brel// nyon mongs dug bcas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// dang ba'i sems kyis thob par 'gyur ba
402a2(rgyud): yin na 'dod rgyal las las ma byung dus las mid// rang bzhin dbang phyug las kyang 'byung ba mid// rgyu med can mid skyes bus ma byas kyang // las dang khrod mongs pa las sems can 'byung //
402a3(rgyud): gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan// de ni bdag min bdag kyang gzugs ma yin// gzugs la bdag med bdag la gzugs med de// gzugs ni stong pa'o phung bzhi'ang rig par gyis//
402a4(rgyud): gzugs ni dbu pa dag dang 'dra ba ste// tsher ba chu bur bzhin du rtag pa med// de ltar mthong ba lta ba bzang po yid// gang nig gnad gyur de ri lta ngan gsung // de ltar zlos pa'i gsang sngags nyer gyur
402a5(rgyud): nad/ mtshan mo nyal na rmi lam 'di dag mthong // khang bzang ljon shing rgyal mtshar seng ge rba// ri bo shing rta sgra ldan sprin dang thu// stag dang bse dang glang chen khyu mchog la// rmi lam na ni dga' bas
402a6(rgyud): zhon pa dang // me tog 'phreng ba spos dang dri rnams dang // sha chang zhwa dang 'bras bu glegs bam dang // lha yi gzugs dang ut+pal dmar po dang // shing rta gang ba 'am pa gnod beru phrug can/
402a7(rgyud): gdugs dkar rnga yab lham dang ral gri dang // bsil yab gser yu cad dang 'greng ba dang // nor bu mu tig Na phyis dung dang dngul// bud med gzugs bzang yid 'ong bu mo dang // rin chen
402b1(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyis sbas pa'i rgyad// mal snyan dkar po bting ba rnyed pa dang // tho rangs khar ni chu bo chu klung dang // 'bab chu'am rgya mtsho dang ni rdzing bu dang // lu ma la ni 'thung ngam rgyal rmi dang // de bzhin/
402b2(rgyud): khrag gis lus khrus byed pa'am// lha khang mchod rten 'dug nas rgyal ba'i gzugs// byang chub sems dpa' mchog dang rang sangs rgyas// zag med dge 'dud dge slong dge slong ba// dge
402b3(rgyud): bsnyen rnams dang sa bdag lha rnams dang // mchod gnas bram ze yid 'ong skyes bu dang // me dang mi mchog phyug cing 'byor dang bu// pha ma mdza' bshes gnyen dang gnod sbyid dang // grub pa'i lhang
402b4(rgyud): da chung tshogs rnams dang // ji snyed nyi ma zla ba za ba dang // sa yi rang 'gro sa bod 'thung ba dang // me la rdzi zhing sha di za ba dang // lus kyi rang nas bud med zhugs pa mthong // rmi lam bzang po 'di
402b5(rgyud): dag mthong ba gang // de dag ring por mi thogs grub par 'gyur// zla ba gcig dang zla phyed nyin zhag dang // skad cig gis ni phyi phyir nye bar 'gyur// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u lnga/
402b6(rgyud): pa'o// / dngos grub nyer zlos la dga' ba dang // sems ni nam yang sdig la dga' mi 'gyur// bkres skom tsha grang rlung dang ngal ba yi// sdug bsngal drag pos nyed kyang /
402b7(rgyud): g.yo mi 'gyur// sbrang bu sha snang srid bu grog srur dang // sdig sbrul rkang brgya pa dang sbrul dang dred// sha za srul po rnams kyang de dag gi/ lus dang grib pa la ni mi 'gang ngo // tshig ni gzung bar 'os
403a1(rgyud): shing yid gzhungs la// smad dngags dang ni dri ba rnams la mkhas// chos la mngon dga' rkyen rnams mthong ba dang // lus kyi nad dang dri mi med par 'gyur// skye bos
403a2(rgyud): mthong ngam thos par gyur kyang rung // myur du mngon dga' yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// bud med 'dod lha'i mdangs 'phrog pa rnams kyis// 'dod lha'i longs spyod phyir ni 'bod par 'gyur// gang ro/
403a3(rgyud): mkhas pas lha dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha yi bu mo'i gzugs dang sgra// mis ni dga' ba'i yid kyis mthong thos na// de tshe shin tu nye bar gyur pa yin// lus re dri med dag par rig pa dang // gso
403a4(rgyud): sbyong sdom pa dang ni ldan pa yis// nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum du ni// kha zas spang zhing spyang par gnas pa yis// nyin zhag de dag 'das par byas nas su// rang gi 'byor phyir bsgrub la 'jug
403a5(rgyud): par bya// gsung de dpung bzang gis thos slar gsol pa// zas kyis mi 'dag ces sngar gsungs pa dang // mchod 'os khyod kyis lus dag bgyi phyir yang // ci slad spyang ba mi bzad bgyi bar gsung // /
403a6(rgyud): srid pa'i mthar phyir bde bar gshegs pa yis// shing rta'i mig bsku'i bza' ba'ang ci phyir gsungs// rdo rje can gyis dpung bzang tshig gsan nas// 'brug sgra zab 'dra'i gsung gis bka'
403a7(rgyud): srul pa// bu gcig lus dag bya phyir spyang bya bar// bde gshegs 'dir ram yang mi gsung yang // lus 'di mi gtsang bags pa sha khrag rkang // klad rgyas rgyu ma mcher mchin mkhal ma zhag / mkhris pa
403b1(rgyud): bad kan khu chu byis dang // gcin sngabs pa spu skra dang rus pa dang // mig dang rnab sna dang kha dang ri// bshang sgo mtshan dang bug dgu po yi// rmanas dri ma sna tshogs mi gtsang ba// 'dzag pa'i rgyud ni nag tu/
403b2(rgyud): 'byung ba yin// de ltar yan lag thams cad 'dus pa dang // sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams dang ldan// ji bzhin las kyi rjes 'brang mi yi lus// thams cad ldan pa'i gzugs la gnas pa mi
403b3(rgyud): bshang gci snabs dang mchil ma bad kan dang // 'di dag zad par bya phyir smyung bar gsungs// dri ma zad nas mi yi lus dag tu// rang gi 'byor phyir bsgrub la bde bar 'jug/ 'dod chags kyis
403b4(rgyud): ni gdungs par gyur na yang // lus kyi yan lag 'di dag thams cad la// dran pa rtse gcig mngon du byas nas ni// ye shes mig gis so sor rnam par brtag/ de ltar gang gis nges par brtags pa na//
403b5(rgyud): lus dang srog la rjes su chags pa yi// 'dod chags rtsad nas yong ye ni 'gyur te// nyi mas mun nag gtan nas bsal ba bzhin// phan yod de yis gsang sngags nye bsnyen nas// rang gi
403b6(rgyud): lus la nye bar rig pa dang // yar gyi tshes brgyad dang ni bcu pa ni 'am// yang na bco lnga la ni bzlas brjod bya// lha yi gnas kyis dag bskur ba'i phyir// sa dang lci bsres pa la sogs pas byug
403b7(rgyud): dad pas bde gshegs kun la 'phreng ba dang // lha bshos me tog dri dang mar mes mchod// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nga la mchod// de nas rang sngags lha la dbul bar bya// bstod 'os sangs rgyas
404a1(rgyud): rnams la'ang bstod nas su// phyir zhing byang chub sems kyang dran byas te// sems can skye rgan 'chis gzir ba la// ji ltar rigs par snying rje'ang bsgom par bya// 'dus chen mde
404a2(rgyud): sde bklag pa 'am bkra shis kyi// tshigs su bcad pa'am chos kyi 'khor lo mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'am sgron ma che// gang yang rung ba gcig ni rim bzhin bklag/ de nas bla 'og
404a3(rgyud): phyogs rnams bcings nas su// lus la go cha bgo bar byas nas ni// gong du smos pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams las// gcig cig tshon rtsi rnams kyis bri bar bya// rdo rje me chu rlung dang mdung thung
404a4(rgyud): dag rim bzhin dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bri bar bya// ra bar bris la lha dang lha min dang // sdang ba'i bdag nyid sems ni myos par 'gyur// seng ge'i gdan gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i spyan//
404a5(rgyud): de ni dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya// bdag nyid bsrung ba byas te der 'dug nas// rdzas blangs nyung ngu bzlas brjod byas nas ni// bdug pa'i sbyin sreg sbyong yang sbyin sreg bya// de nas de ni dri chus
404a6(rgyud): bkrus nas su// bgegs mang rnams kyang rab tu bsal byas nas// byang chub shing lo gsum gyi steng du gzhag/ bzhi yis bkab nas ji srid grub pa ni// rnam gsum mthong gi bar du gsang
404a7(rgyud): sngags bzlas// drod dang dud 'phrul me bzhin 'bar ba 'am// rim bzhin blo gnas 'byung na'ang grub par gsungs// dro bas 'gro ba thams cad dbang gyur te// dud pa 'thul bas lus ni mi snang
404b1(rgyud): 'gyur// 'bar bas mkha' la shin tu 'gro 'gyur te// mi yi lus ri lha lhar gsal bar 'gyur// ji ltar lus la grang ba 'jug pa dang // ji ltar mngal du dri za 'jug pa dang // nyi zer me shel zhugs
404b2(rgyud): nas me 'byung ltar// de bzhin dngos grub lus la 'jug par 'gyur// mar me mched cing shin tu 'bar ba dag/ sum zhing dkyus ring gser gyi mdog ltar dang // 'bru mar zad kyang 'bar bar gyur dani/
404b3(rgyud): de tshe sngags pas dngos grub thob 'gyur te// de dag rdzas las byung ba'i dngos grub bo// mis ni ri mo'i sku gzugs 'gul ba 'am// 'phreng ba smin ma mig dang rnga yab bam// gal ta rgyan
404b4(rgyud): rnams g.yo bar gyur pa 'am// mkha' las me tog char ram rdzi char 'bag/ sa ni myur du g.yo bar gyur pa 'am// lus mi snang bar mkha' las tshig tu ni/ bu gcig dam pa ci 'dod
404b5(rgyud): slongs shig ce'am// lha yi rnga sgra'am lus kyi ba spu ldang // rgyan gyi char chen rab tu 'bab pa 'am// ci ste mkha' la lha dang lha min dang // gsang sngags gzugs ni mngon du mthong ra
404b6(rgyud): 'grub// ma nyams me tog dbyig dang chubasres shing // bstod dang bcas par mchod yon rgyud sbrengs nas// rtse gcig sems kyis mgo btud phyag byas te// dad dang 'bad pa'i rjes mthun mchog
404b7(rgyud): blang ngo // mchog thob nas ni dga' bas phyag byas te// dad pas bstod cing mchod yon phul nas su// gsang sngags brjod cing slar yang gshegs su gsol// gsang sngags kun la tshul ni 'di yid do//
405a1(rgyud): gang zhig sems stobs mchog tu ldan pa de// 'dir ni 'jigs dang bcas pa'i las bya'o// sems stobs chung ba'i mi la sha za yis// glags mthong nas ni phung bar 'gyur/
405a2(rgyud): dpa' bo go bgos mtshon cha'i thabs mkhas pa// chas pa'i glang chen mchog zhon gzhu thogs nas// mda' 'phen mthu dang ldan pa gcig pus kyang // dgra yi tshogs kun las ni rgyal bar
405a3(rgyud): nus// de bzhin sems stobs chen po'i tshul khrims kyis// go bgos legs bsrungs glang chen zhon nas su// gsang sngags gzhu thogs bzlas brjod mda' 'phen pas// 'byung po
405a4(rgyud): la sogs mtshan mo rgyu las rgyal// sgur po'am yan lag lhag chad thung ngu dang // de bzhin ring po'am yang na sbom po 'am// smad pa'i mngal las skyes pa'am ma ning ngam// rnam pa de
405a5(rgyud): 'dra'i ro dag spang bar bya'o// ma nu ba dang rims drag tshad ba dang // 'khru skyug bcings dang chu dang gsal shing dang // sbrul gyis bsad dam dug gi so shi ba 'am// bad kan rlung sogs mthong
405a6(rgyud): min bsad pa la// yan lag tshang zhing kha sna ma smad pa// lus la rma med skyes pa'i ro mthong nas// ral gri be con lag na thogs pa yis// nyid par thog thag tu ni bsrung bar bya// dur khrod khang
405a7(rgyud): stong dang ni shing gcig dang // bzhi mdo'am 'bab chu dag gi chu klung ngam// mtsho 'am rgya mtsho 'am ni ri bo la// skad cig gis kyang ro langs 'grub par 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i gnas
405b1(rgyud): gcig brtags nas ni// sa dang lci ba la sogs byug par bya// gtsang ma der ni dkar nag dmar po 'am// tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnams kyis dam tshig bri// gong du smos pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams/
405b2(rgyud): las/ sems nas 'dod par gang yang rung ba zhig/ dad pa chen pos rigs kyi yul gyi mchog/ zlos shing rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// 'jigs pa med pa'i g.yog gis de blangs
405b3(rgyud): nas/ khyer te 'ongs nas ku sha'i steng bzhag ste// skra dang kha spu rnams kyang bregs byas nas// de yi mod la 'bru mar dag gis bsku// de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnag pa bzhi//
405b4(rgyud): gtsang ma'i chus bkang khrus rtsis sbyar te bkru// de nas gos gsar phrugs gcig bskon nas su// de nas dkyil 'khor dbus su rtswa snyan dang // ma nyams me tog steng du ro gzhag cing /
405b5(rgyud): ro yi mgo bo shar ram byang du bstan// dri yis byug cing bdug pa sa bdug par bya'o// 'phreng ba gdags shing me tog sil mas gtor// sha dang nya sha mar khu til bsres pa'i// 'khur
405b6(rgyud): pa la sogs ji snyed bungs bskyed de// 'byung po klu dang sha za gnod sbyin dang // 'drel bla 'og phyogs su sbyin par bya// grogs po mchog ldan bdag nyid bsrung bya ste// rtse gcig sems kyis
405b7(rgyud): gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// ro ni ldang du nye ba'i tshe na ni// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can bgegs ni sna tshogs 'byung // gtsug tor rgyal po'i sngags kyis thal ba'am// ma grugs yungs kar
406a1(rgyud): #sogs la bsngags nas su// gtor na phyogs bzhi dag nas 'ongs pa'i bgegs// gsang sngags mthu yis de dag 'byer bar 'gyur// de dag zhi bar bya phyir khro bo ni/
406a2(rgyud): bdud rtsi thab sbyor drag shul las can sbyar// bgegs rnams bcom pas de nas ro de yang // gsang sngags mthu yis myur du ldang bar 'gyur// gang zhig gsang sngags cho ga zhib mo las//
406a3(rgyud): mthong ba de ni dogs med nges par 'grub// gal te ro de langs par gyur pa las// de yi gsang sngags cho ga mi shes na'ang // gsang sngags gzhan du bstan pa'i cho ga yis// langs pa de la
406a4(rgyud): rang gis dngos grub blang // gter gyi phyogs dang phug tu 'gro ba dang // ral bri any+dza bzhon pa mngag gzhug dang // 'byung khungs gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len// mkha' la 'gro ba'i
406a5(rgyud): dngos grub rab tu ster// srung ba'i stobs med sngags kyi stobs med dang // dka' thub stobs med sems stobs med pa yi// blo nan gang zhig ro la ngas dngos grub tshol// de ni mtshan mo rgyu badz+ra/
406a6(rgyud): kyis bsad// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u drug pa'o// / mi gang mi yi sha ni 'tshong 'dod des// mar gyi rol dur khrod song nas su// shing rdo mched dang
406a7(rgyud): dug dang dbyug to sman// bgegs la sogs pas shi bar gyur pa yi// byin pa'am brla dang mgo dang ske dag dang // 'jigs pa med pas mtshan mo blangs nas su// gtubs te skon bu'am gyo dum
406b1(rgyud): gsar pa 'am// gtsang ma der ni mi nyung gzhan par bya// lus la khrag gis lag rjes bris nas su// rgyu mas mgo dang mgrin pa dkri bar bya// lus la mi lpags gsar pa bgos nas kyang // lag
406b2(rgyud): g.yon shas bkang gyo mo de thogs nas// khrag gis bskus pa'i ral gri lag g.yas kyis// rab tu bsgrims nas de ni thogs nas kyang // sgra cher 'bod cing tshig tu sha 'di dag/ khyed cag su
406b3(rgyud): zhig nyo bar byed 'dod ces// shar dang byang dang lho dang nub phyogs su// myur du bskor zhing shin tu brjod par bya// ci ste lus ni snang ngam mi snang bar// tshig gis khyod ni nor ram rig pa'am//
406b4(rgyud): bcud kyis len pa'am grong ngam rgyal srid dam// phug tu 'gro'am ci 'dod ces zer na// sngar ni gang zhig sems kyis bsams pa'i don// de nyid smra zhing gzhan du smra mi bya// rig pa
406b5(rgyud): mang pos bsnyen pa'i dur khrod 'dir// don 'di yi phyir sdug bsngal drag po yis// bdag kyang gdungs bzhin 'ongs kyi 'di nyid na// yod na sha 'dir khyer la bdag la byin// ci ste srang
406b6(rgyud): la btsal te ma gang na// rang gi sha yis de ni dgang bar bya// gal te dur khrod 'di ni stong pa ste// nor med bu khyod gzhan du song zhig ces// mtshan mo rgyu bas de skad bsgo
406b7(rgyud): na ni de la bdag ni gang du 'gro zhes dri// lan thob de ni rang gis brtags nas su// sha de bor nas de nas 'gro bar bya// sha yi cho ga ngas gsungs de dag ni// gsang sngags
407a1(rgyud): ma bzlas pas ni bsnyen mi bya// rig mchog gtsug hor rdzobs chen la sogs pas// dur khrod du ni srung bar ngas gsungs so// gsang sngags drag pos gang zhig
407a2(rgyud): za ba// de la dur khrod mi sha'i sbyin sreg bya// ral gri sor gnyis sor gsum tshad tsam du// gtubs nas me la sbyin sreg stong bya'o// me tog ma nyams 'bras yos sha khrag nya// chang dang
407a3(rgyud): sbrang rtsi bu ram chan dang til// bdug pa 'phreng ba mar me byug pa can// lha ba shos gtor ma dur khrod gtor bar bya// dbab dang bskrang dang gnyid kyis skyes bya dang // dmag gnom grong khyer
407a4(rgyud): phung bar bya ba la// sha za ma mo drag mo'am srin mo'i tshogs// gnod sbyin rnams la sha yi sbyin sreg bya// mi yi sha ni rnyed par ma gyur na// ba lang sha yi sbyid sreg de bzhin shis// ma he'i sha
407a5(rgyud): 'am khyi sha mar bsres la// tshes grangs dag la smyung byas sbyin sreg bya// gnod sbyin mo yi cho ga zhib mor ni// gsang sngags mnyes byas grub pa 'di rnams ster// ma dang sgyug mo sru mo grogs
407a6(rgyud): mo dang // bu mo chung ma mna' mar grub par 'gyur// mi dang sgyug mo sru mau gang yin de// yid bzhin rin chen bzhin du grub pa mchog/ yid 'ong grogs mo bu mo grub pa 'bring // chung ma mna' ma grub
407a7(rgyud): pa tha mar bsgrags// dus gsum du ni me tog 'phreng ba dri// mar ram 'bru mar mar me tsan dar dang // a kar dro zhim bdug pas mchod pa dang // gtor ma sna tshogs rtag tu mtshan mo sbyin/
407b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo ni dga' nas mngon phyogs nas// rnyed pa rnyed cing sa bon 'byung bar byed// 'dod chags zil gyis non pa'i bud med kyang // gnod par byed pa nges par gnas par 'gyur// zung
407b2(rgyud): med gnod pa byed tshe 'gro mi bya// rnyed pa mang chung la yang 'dod mi skyed// sngags pa mtshan mo khu ba dgag byas la// brtsor 'grus rab tu bskyed de bsgrub par bya// sems rmongs gang
407b3(rgyud): zhig gzhan du brtsam byas na// gnod sbyin mos ni myur du phung bar byed// bsam na phung bar yang ni 'gyur ba nyid// sha za'i gnod sbyin mo la'ang de nyid de// de las cho ga lhag pa 'di rnams
407b4(rgyud): bya/ sha chang la phug tshod ma cung pong dang // nas chan ma sha chan dang 'bras chan nya// gtor ma de dag kun tu 'dug pa dbul// gnas ni khang stong dag gam dur khrod shis// me tog
407b5(rgyud): shir sha kun rur arga dang // bil ba bri ha ku sha ra dzarka// a kas ut+pal a Ta ru sha ka/ se'u can mya ngan tshang sogs me tog dbul// klu la bu ram 'o ma mar sbyar ba'i// bdug pa dri
407b6(rgyud): zhim a kar tsan dan dri// 'phreng ba me tog dri zhim sna tshogs dang // 'bras chan zho dang 'bras yos 'bras bu dbul// ba dan sngon po bum pa sngon po dang // gos kyang sngon po lha bshos gtor
407b7(rgyud): ma dri/ 'phreng ba byug pa me tog sngon po dag/ ji snyed brang gis 'gro ba rnams la dbul// mthe bong me long ral gri chu dang shel// mar me sa gzhi bcas dang nam mkha' dang // lhung bzed nor bu
408a1(rgyud): dag dang me 'bar ba// 'di la gsal bar smon pa rtag tu 'byung // 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar byung // mtho ris sa snyengs dus dang mi ldan yang // lha dang lha min
408a2(rgyud): dge dang mi dge ba'i// las rnams thams cad gsal bar ston par rtogs// tshi ga nyams pa 'am yang na phyed bzlas pa'am// yi ge chad dam yi ge lhag pa'am// bzlas brjod ma byas
408a3(rgyud): dad pa med pa dang // mchod pa med cing sa gni mi gtsang dang // sprin gyi tshogs kyis nyi zer bsgrims pa dang // byis pa yan lag nyams shing lhag pa dang // de lta bu la mi yi gsol stod pa//
408a4(rgyud): 'bab par mi 'gyur dgos pa yong mi stod// gsal ston dbab phyir sngon du cho ga bzhin// bzlas shing tshes grangs bzang la sngags pa yang // smyung byas dgongs kar sa dang lci ba yis//
408a5(rgyud): ba ko tsam gyi sa gzhi legs par byug/ byug spos dang ni me tog bdug spos dang // lha bshos mar me dag kyang phul nas su// byis pa gzhon nu ste gon gnas par bya// de nas nang par cho ga
408a6(rgyud): 'di kun bya// khrus byas lus la gos dkar gtsang bgos te// shar phyogs kha bltas ku sha'i gdan stengs su// 'dug nas gsang sngags rjes su dran par bya// me long thal ba gtsang //
408a7(rgyud): mas lan bdud nam// brgyad dam yang na bcur ni phyis nas su// rtse gcig sems kyis gsang sngags zlos bzhin du// byis pa gzhon nu nub tu kha bstan pas// lha yi mig gis bltas na
408b1(rgyud): 'das pa dang // da ltar dang ri ma 'ongs mthong bar 'gyur// me long zhes bya'o cho ga mtha' dag ni// ral gri gsal bar spyod pa sbyar bar bya// mthe bong rgyu skyegs khu bas bskus nas su// 'bru mar
408b2(rgyud): dri zhim dag gis gdab par bya// bum pa gtsang ma chus bkang mi yor gzhag/ sa btsags lhung bzed nor bu chu yis gdab// sku gzugs la ni bdug spos me tog dbul// de nas byis
408b3(rgyud): pa gnod rus blta bar bya// gsal bar ston dam rmi lam la sogs pas// dngos grub brtags te de nas bzlas brjod bya// gal te yid ni ches par ma gyur na// de nas rig sngags mi gdug
408b4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya// nga yi gsang sngags dag pa gang yang rung // gso sbyong byas nas nan tan bzung nas su// rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rted drung du bzlas// yang na sku gzugs ma nyams
408b5(rgyud): spyan sngar bzlas// lus dang ngag yid lag pa mig dang ni// smin mtshams yan lag rnam par g.yo ba dag/ rab tu bsdams ras de la yid gzhol zhing // byams la gnas shing ku sha'i
408b6(rgyud): khros la 'dug/ ji srid du ni rtse gcig gnas gyur pa// de srid du ni 'bum ma mnyis 'bum bzlas// nga yi gsang sngags hUM zhes bya ba 'dis// shing la'ang 'bab dmi la smos ci dgos// de
408b7(rgyud): nas dbab pa'i snod rnams brtags par bya// bu mo gzhon nu lo bcu'am bcu gnyis pa// bcu 'am brgyad dam bdud nam bani 'am gsum// yang dakhye'u'ang rung ste gnyis sam lnga// tshigs
409a1(rgyud): rus rtsa mi mngon cing gzugs bzang ba// yan lag rdzogs shing mig dkyus ring la dkar// kha bzhin zla 'dra mche ba mnyam la rdo// sor mo thags bzang mdzes la long
409a2(rgyud): bu nug// lte ba zab cing mdzes la ru 'jing legs// ba s+phu re re ska yang gnag la stug/ lto ba mi rlo gnyer ma gsum dang ldan// mdog kyang bzang zhing mnga' byad dang yang ldan// gang la yid dga'
409a3(rgyud): lta ba bstan par 'gyur// blta bas kyang ni ngoms par mi 'gyur dang // lha gzhan dag la mi phyogs dbab pa'i snod// tshes grangs bzang la nyid nag gcig tu ni// smyung ba byas pas
409a4(rgyud): bdug spos 'phreng ba dang // tsan dan mar me me tog rnams kyis mchod// bza' dang 'bras chad la sogs gtor ma mang // lha dang lha mid gnod sbyin rnams la skyid// dbab pa'i snod rnams khrus
409a5(rgyud): byas gos dkar bskor// shar phyogs kha bltas rgyad ni rnam par spang // byug spos me tog la sogs de la sbyin// bdug pas bdug cing gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// hUM gi gsang sngags
409a6(rgyud): thog mar bzlas nas su// gr-ih+Na a bi sha zhes brjod par bya// mig ni gdangs shing 'dzums par mi byed de// rdzogs par gyur par shes par byas nas su// 'jigs pa med de de tshe dri bar bya//
409a7(rgyud): mchod pa dang ni bdug pa phul nas su// rig pa mchog gi gsang sngags dran byas nas// phyag 'tshal nas ni lha tshogs gang yin dri// dus gsum dag gi bdag gi dgos pa gang //
409b1(rgyud): de ni legs par dgongs nas bka' stsol cig/ bde dang sdug bsngal ngos grub thob mi thob// shes nas de yang de bzhin bzung nas su// de ma thag tu slar yang gtang bar bya//
409b2(rgyud): mi gdug sngags bzlas cho ga 'di rnams kyis// dbab pa'i dod la sem+ba ni phebs 'gyur gyi// gang zhig blun pas gzhan du brtsams na ni// de ni mi kun rnams kyis dpyas par 'gyur//
409b3(rgyud): ni zhing gzhungs la rgya cher dkyus kyang ring // brtan zhing gzi che mdangs ldan dmar bar sdang // 'dzums shing 'byed med lha yi mig 'dra ba// dam pa'i snod la lba babs de ltar 'gyur//
409b4(rgyud): mig ni rab tu dmar ning zlum por 'dug/ bgrad cing mi sdug rab tu 'jigs 'jigs lha// 'dzums pa med cing 'jigs med lta ba ni// srin po lho 'phye gnod sbyin babs pa'i
409b5(rgyud): mig/ gal te babs pa snod ni mi gtong na// shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod pa'am// stobs po che 'am dgod pa'am lcags kyo bzlas// yang na rab tu 'dus pa'i mdo sde/
409b6(rgyud): bklag/ seng ge'i gdan gyi ar+tha ram pa la sha'i// yam shing mar gyis bskus pa brgya rtsa bsreg/ ma grugs til ni sbrang rtsi'am mar gyis bskus// gtum pos sgyid sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig/
409b7(rgyud): byad ba snga ma bzhin du gsang sngags cho ga dag/ dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin spyad nas ni// bdag gis yid dang mthun pa'i dngos grub thob// sngags pa yud ring nyon mongs mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa dpung
410a1(rgyud): bzang gis nus pa'i le'u bdun pa'o// / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs yang lag brgyad lam ni// yang dag 'tsho dang las mtha' ting 'dzin dag/
410a2(rgyud): rtsol dang rtog dang dran dang lta ba rnams// so so so sor yang dag bsnyen par bya// lam 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags dngos grub cing // de bzhin 'dis ni mtho ris thar pa thog/ rgyal sras sngon
410a3(rgyud): gyi rgyal ba 'das pa dag/ 'di nas gshegs shing de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// dogs med sems kyis lus dang ngag yid kyis// gus par bsod nams gang dag bsags pa yang // bde/
410a4(rgyud): gshegs gsungs pa'i bden pa'i lam dmigs na// dge ba'i lam de yang dag bskyed pa yin// yongs su 'dzin pa rnam par spangs nas su// chos gos dang ni bsod snyoms ngan ngon dang //
410a5(rgyud): sman dang mal spyan ngan ngon tsam gyis kyang // chog pa'i sems dang ldan pas bsod nams thob// bdag la bstod pa nam yang mi bya zhing // sems can gzhan la smad par mi bya'o// stug
410a6(rgyud): dang sbrul dang me 'drar 'jig rten dag/ bsams nas spangs te dben la dga' bar bya// bud med mtshan nyid skyes bu'i mtshan nyid dang // sman dang glang chen brtag pa 'am skar ma'i dpyad//
410a7(rgyud): mtshon cha brtag pa'am rta dpyad rang bzo 'am// bstan bcos ngan pa slob cing klog pa spang // glang chen rta dang ba lang bya gag khyi// gong mo sreg pa 'ug pa skyes pa dang // bud med bu mo byis pa
410b1(rgyud): ra lug sogs// 'thab mo 'gyed pa mi blta mi bya'o// yul sa'i gtam dang mi dbang bsten pa dang // dmag dang gyang dang na chung gtam dag dang // srung ldebs dang ni sngon gyi lo rgyus dang //
410b2(rgyud): 'dod chags dang ni smad 'tshong gtam mi bya// sngags pa gsang sngags bzlas pa mnos pa ni// grong dang grong khyer khyim dang gtsug lag khang // mchod rten bsti gnas ri dang dka' thub gnas//
410b3(rgyud): kun dga' lu ma'am rdzing bur 'gro mi bya// sngar bshad pa yi gnas rnams ma rnyed nas// lha khang stong pa dag gam shing drung ngam// ri dang chu bo chu klung 'bab chu dang // nag tshal stong pa dag dang
410b4(rgyud): yul stong dang // gnas gang rung bar bsngags par gnas shing bzlas// yang na gnas ni nges par ma byas na// phra ba brgyad po 'di yis dus dag tu// gnas 'di gang yang rung ba gcig tu
410b5(rgyud): brtson// mtsho dang shing dang ri bo dgon pa'i gnas// mtshe'u dang khang pa gnas sam chu ngogs su// dgun dpyid zla ba rnams la gnas byas nas// sngags pas dbyar ni gcig tu gnas bya ste/
410b6(rgyud): ji ltar rgyal bas dge slong dbyar zla gsum// tshul zhugs gnas gzhan mi 'gro gsungs pa bzhin// de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags pa yang // zla ba gsum du gcig tu gnas par
410b7(rgyud): gsungs// sngags pas dbyar ni sgrub la mi 'jug par// bzlas brjod kyis ni dus kyang 'das par bya// dbyar 'das nas ni gsang sngags gzi bskyed pas// bdag nyid bsrung byas sgrub la
411a1(rgyud): 'jug par bya// me thab zlum po gru gsum gru bzhi dang // pad+ma lta bur byas shing dbyibs legs shing // 'jam zhim shin tu mnyam par byas nas su// de dgas
411a2(rgyud): dang lci bas legs par byug/ zlum por dbang theng bskyed dang nor dgug dang // spyan drang zhi ba'i cho ga bya bar shis// gru gsum du ni dgar bskrad gsad pa dang // gshed byed la sogs
411a3(rgyud): drag po rnams kyang bya// grub ni par ni klu dang gsang ba pa'i// srog bskam pa 'am yan lag gzhig par bya// pad+ma'i dbyibs su bud med bu mo'i grong // yul kun thob pa'am dor kun sgrub
411a4(rgyud): pa shis// me thab lci ba gtsang ma sa byugs nas kyang // tha ma thog thag ku sha dgram par bya// dkon mchog gsum dang phyag na rdo rje dang // yum la dad pas 'phreng ba bdug pa dang /
411a5(rgyud): dri dang ma nyams me tog ji snyed pas// cho ga bzhin du legs par mchod par bya// yam shing mang po thab kyi drung ba nag ste// rlung yab kyis ni me ni sbar nas kyang // sangs rgyas rnams
411a6(rgyud): ma phyag byas khro bor// bdud rtsi 'dzus pas mnyams pa 'am// ma thugs tis nag las ni bdun nam brgyad// bcu 'am nyi shur srig zugs mos sgeg/ su sha ba ting ba'am zhes
411a7(rgyud): sam cu gyu sa// 'dug nas shar phyogs kha brgyas rdzas rnams ni// mar ram spang rtsi 'om las bsregs nas// rang gi gsang sngags pa sgrub phyir sbyin sreg bya// me mi mtshan chin
411b1(rgyud): nye bar brtag pa ni// me sdug du ba me lce sgra rnams las// de bzhin 'grub dang mi 'grub thams cad kyang // sngags kyis byin par byas mes ni spyod par byed// du ba med cing gser gyi mdog
411b2(rgyud): lhar dngas// me lce rab tu che la g.yas su 'khyil// kha dog gna' 'dra yang na dkar yang rung // yang na byu ru bcag pa'i kha dog 'dra// shin tu snum la me lce 'gab nas 'gro// ra
411b3(rgyud): 'bar ba nyi ma'i 'od zer 'dra// dbyibs ni bum pa rgyal mtshan gdugs dang 'dra// dpal be'u dang pad+ma drugs gzar 'dra// me lce tri shU la rdo rje ral gri 'dra// yang na shing rtsa mchog dang rdzam
411b4(rgyud): 'dra rdza rngarnga chen dang ni gling bu'i sgra// du ba me lce dri nim me lhag bzang // yang nam sbar bar yang 'bar gyur na// de tsho dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur// dra ba che zhing me sug rgod pa dang /
411b5(rgyud): 'bar bar dka' zhing cung zad cung zad 'bar// me lce rnam par chad cing gzi mdangs med// rtsub gnag sprin dang pa la sha yi mdog/ gsal shing 'dra zhing zhib mo'i gzugs dang 'dra//
411b6(rgyud): phyugs kyi mgo 'dra sgra yang rab tu rtsub// me lce 'phro bas sbyin sreg byed pa 'tshig/ mi re'i dring dngos grub med par gyon// me yi mtshan ma 'di rnams mthong nas ni// stobs po che yis
411b7(rgyud): mar gyi spyod sreg bya// byin pa dag dang mchan khung spu rnams ni// lag pas kyang ni btog par mi bya zhing // me yis me sreg spu gris dreg mi bya// spu med bya phyir sman gyis mi byug go
412a1(rgyud): ji ltar ral gri so ma 'dzin pa'i mis// legs par ma bzung lag pa chod pa ltar// de bzhin sngags kyang legs par ma bzlas na// 'bras bu med pa 'am yang na phu
412a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// mi ni tshul khrims gtsang sbra mi ldan yang // gsang sngags lha ni nam yang gnod mi mdzad// lha de'i 'khor du gyur pa gang yin rnams// mi yi grags mthong nas ni phung
412a3(rgyud): bar byed// sgrub pa kun la dang po kho nar ni// lha ba shos gtor ma phal cher dbul bar bya// sngags pa'i las grub nas kyang dus kun tu// rang gi nyams kyis ji snyed dbul bar bya//
412a4(rgyud): lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lho 'phye grul// nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po// dri za 'byung po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang // gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bu
412a5(rgyud): smad g.yog 'khor tshogs dang bcas rnams la// bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su// thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyis// gsan nas phan gdags phyir ni longs
412a6(rgyud): spyod cig/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang // ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang // chu bo
412a7(rgyud): kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang // rin chen gnas na lhag par gang gnas dang // mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu ngogs dang // g.ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang // grong dang byugs lhas
412b1(rgyud): grong khyer spong ba dang // khang stong dag dang lha mi khang pa dang // gtsug lag khang ngas mchod rten gnas dag byam// dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dag dang // rgyal po'i dkor yang dag/
412b2(rgyud): gang gnas dang // lam thang 'dum khang dang ni bani mdo dang // gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig dang // dur khrod chen po'am nags tshal chen po dang // seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag
412b3(rgyud): dang // 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang // gang dag gling mchog rnams na gnas pa dang // lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams// rab tu dgyes shing go bar gyur nas
412b4(rgyud): su// 'phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang / bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul ba// 'di bzhes nas ni btung zhing bsnams nas su// las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par
412b5(rgyud): mdzod// de ltar gdod la mchod pa byas nas su// de nas phyogs skyong rnams la mchod pa bya// dbang po 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas pa yis// gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su
412b6(rgyud): gsol// me dang gshin rje srin po chu bdag dang // rlung dang lus ngan 'byung po gdon dang bcas// gleng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang // lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang // ri ye
412b7(rgyud): dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams la// so so so sor gtor ma phul 'di rnams// rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang // rang rang phyogs su legs par 'azhugs nas su// rang gi bu smad mdzas
413a1(rgyud): ba shes gnyen 'dun dang // nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs gcig tu// me tog dri dang byug pa gtor mar bcas// 'di rnams brdung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang //
413a2(rgyud): bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de ltar gang zhig mtshan mo rgyu ba la// gtor ma gtong ba'i las rnams byed pa de'i// dngos grub myur zhing shin tu bgegs kyang med// yid du
413a3(rgyud): 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'ang thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis nus pa'i le'u brgyad pa'o// // gang zhig dgra bcom pa ma gsod pa dang // mthun pa'i dge 'dun
413a4(rgyud): dbyen ni byed pa dang // de bzhin gshegs la sdang ba'i sems kyis su// nam zhig mi dag sku 'tshal 'byin par byed// shin tu mi bzad pa yi las 'di rnams// rgyal bas mtshams med lnga
413a5(rgyud): po yin par bshad// gti mug can gyis sdig pa byas na yang // phung po 'di la grub pa thob mi 'gyur// mchod rten bshig cing byang chub sems dpa' gsod// nyon mongs zad pa'i
413a6(rgyud): ma ni sun 'byin dang // slob pa gsod cing dge 'dun mnga' ba la// gang zhig 'dod pas mang nyung ngu 'phrog pa// mtshams med nye ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// tshul
413a7(rgyud): nyams mi ni gang zhig 'di byed pa// bskal pa'i bar du mnar med sdug bsngal myong // gsang sngags dngos grub bsgrims kyang yong mi 'thob// gang zhig bde gshegs gsung gi gleg
413b1(rgyud): bam dag/ chud gson pa dang mes ni sreg pa dang // bsam pa ngad pas chur ni 'dor ba dang // yang na chos kyi sku ni spong ba 'am// bslab tshig ma lus pas ni brgyad pa yi// dge slong dgag sa/
413b2(rgyud): dge slong ma gsod dam// dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma gsod dam// ngan pa'i sems kyis lha khang sreg kyang rung // mi yi yul na sdig pa 'di byas pa// dka' bar spyod pa lngar yang grub
413b3(rgyud): mi 'thob// gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa yi// bsam pas gnod pa cung zad byas kyang rung // bdag nyid ngan pa dmyal bar btsos par 'gyur// de nas shi nas las kyi dab
413b4(rgyud): gis kyang // rigs ngan mi dang dud 'gror skye ba 'thob// 'di dag ngas ni khyod la mdor bshad pa'o// gang zhig byang chub sems ni blangs pa las// rmongs pas 'jig chen lha tshogs phyag byas
413b5(rgyud): / de dag de la mi dgar gyur nas su// de yi gsang sngags dngos grub nyams par byed// gang gi tshe na sems ni dang ba yis// mi yi yul na byang chub sems blangs pa// de ni phyin chad
413b6(rgyud): lnga dang lha ming dang // 'jig rten ma lus rnams kyis phyag byar 'os// me ni mngon par mtho ba ma lus pa'o// bslab pa mtha' dag blangs par gyur pa dang // sems can kun la mi 'jigs
413b7(rgyud): spyod pa dang // dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang bab las pa yis// gang nig mi ba 'ang las byang rngub pa gsong // rig sngags gcod ngam gdod par byed pa'am / khasam pangan pas gas rdzam
414a1(rgyud): tshogs mi mchod// don med bzhin du sen mos rtswa gcod dang // rkang pas rkang pa nyed par byed pa dang // phyugs la sogs pa sna tshogs snga 'bigs dang // 'phags pa
414a2(rgyud): dge 'dun la ni mi gus pa// 'byung por byin nam lha yi gtor ma 'am// sa la ltung ba sngags pas bza' mi bya// 'dod chags zil gyis non pas dud 'gro dang // bud med bgro bya min/
414a3(rgyud): par 'gro mi bya// glang chen mi gdul sbrul yang mi gzung zhing // rta rgyug glo rdebs lcug gis gzhu mi bya// las de rnams dang ldan par gyur pa de'i// dngos grub nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur
414a4(rgyud): ro/ sems can nad kyis gdungs dang sdug bsngal la// rtag tu byams pa'i sems ni yid la bya// dper na nam mkha' mthar thug med pa la// 'dom gyis gzhal bar mtha' rtogs mi nus
414a5(rgyud): lhar// de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la brten nas ni// phan gnod byas pa'i dge sdig mtha' mi rtogs// rgya dang snyi dang pong rgya 'dzel bu yis// khyi la sogs pa'i sems can gsod pa dang //
414a6(rgyud): bya rog la sogs gzeb kyis bcings byas na// 'di dang pha rol tu yang grub mi thob// bdud dgra'i me tog rnying pa bor ba rnams// rkang pas myi brdzi mgo la gdags mi bya// bkres pas gdungs
414a7(rgyud): kyang de dag rnams la ni// phul ba'i lha bo shos rnams kyang bza' mi bya// 'jigs kyang tshangs pa brgya byid khyab 'jug dang // drang po chung lha sogs la phyag mi bya// des bshad pa mi chos la mi
414b1(rgyud): brten zhing // de dag dga' thub mi spyad rtags mi mchod// de dag chos la'ang nga na sems mi bya ning // de mi spyod la rnam yang dga' mi bya// de dag bskyod pa mi gdon sngags mi bzlas// sbyid pa spyir/
414b2(rgyud): tshe snying rje bskyed nas sbyid// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan pa yi// gnas dang rgyal sras rnams la phyag bya'o// rang sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams// de dag rtag tu
414b3(rgyud): phyag bya'i gnas yin no// ji ltar zla ba tshes la mi rnams ni// phyag 'tshal nyal lus can phyag mi 'tshal// de bzhin dad pas rgyal ba'i thugs sras la// phyag bya de ltar bde bar gshegs la
414b4(rgyud): minada'ajig rten kun gyi mngon mtho bslab pa can// snying rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i dod du ni// skye ba len pa de la ci yi phyir// bu gcig bdag nyid kun gyis phyag mi bya// skyes bu bsam yas rmad//
414b5(rgyud): byung rdzu 'phrul can// de la mi ngan gang zhig mi 'dud pa// de la rgyal ba thams cad thugs nur nas// de yi gsang sngags dngos grub mi stsol to// dper na shing gi me tog dang por ni//
414b6(rgyud): yid 'ong byi nas 'bras bur 'gyur ba ltar// sems can mchog rnams me tog 'dra bar ltos// 'bras bu bzhin du rgyal ba rig par gyis// gang zhig rang bzhin chags sdang rnam bral
414b7(rgyud): yang // brtsel snying brtse khrol khro ba dang // 'dod chags can la chags can lhar stod pa// byang chub tshul gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig las dang rnam smin mkhyen pa yi// 'gro
415a1(rgyud): ba kun la ji ltar mthun pa yi// gsang sngags gzugs kyi rjes su 'jug mdzad pa// sngags kyi rnam 'dred de la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa dpung 'bang gis nus
415a2(rgyud): pa'i le'u dgu pa'o// / lha dang lha min mi la phar gdags phyir// gsang sngags rig sngags rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ bye ba phrag gsum dang ni 'bum phrag lnga// rig
415a3(rgyud): 'dzin sde snod bshad par rgyal bas gsungs// ngas ni gsung ba pa rnams gzhom pa dang // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar bya ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor bcas shing phyag rgyar ldan pa
415a4(rgyud): yi// gsang sngags bye ba phrag bdun rab tu bshad// mo nya bcu dang rig pa'i rgyal po bdud// de bani phyag brnyan drug cu rtsa bani dang // nga mi snying po dam pa brgyad rnams dang // khros
415a5(rgyud): drag po bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang // rig pa mchog la sogs pa mthu bo che// rig pa'i bdag po gsang sngags rjes 'brang bcas// de snyed rdo rje'i rigs ni gang yin pa// der ni 'di dag
415a6(rgyud): nga yis rgya cher bshad// spyan ras gzigs kyi gsang sngags bye ba phrag/ gsum dang de bzhin 'bum phrag lnga rnams bshad// de yi rig sngags bdag po rta mgrin dang // de yi ming
415a7(rgyud): can dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum// bcu gnyis phyag dang bcu drug pa dang ni// thor tsugs cod par 'dod pa 'byor byed dang // zhal bzhi dor yod nags par bdun bstan pa// sa stengs
415b1(rgyud): gsang sngags nyi ma bdud lhar 'bar// de rnams rta mgrin dkyil 'khor gsang sngags te// mi la mchog sbyin 'jig rten gsum gyis 'dud// sgrol ma dkar mo gos dkar can ma dang /
415b2(rgyud): rnam gzigs ral pa gcig ma dkar sha pa dang // grags ldan khro gnyer can dang 'di dag rnams// pad+ma'i rigs kyi rig sngags rgyal mo mchog/ de dag dkyil 'khor sna tshogs gzugs
415b3(rgyud): can dang // phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// rgyas pa'i gsang sngags rgyud du 'od dpag can// rig pa'i dbang phyug gsang sngags bdag por bsgom// de yis gsang sngags mi la
415b4(rgyud): grub mchog ster// de la lngas rtsen yang ni mngon par dga'// gnod sbyin dbang phyug de dang rtag mthun pas// de yi bka' yis gsang sngags mchog rnams bshad// lngas rtsen gyis ni stong
415b5(rgyud): phrag nyi shu ste// de yi chung mas de yi phyed bshad do// nor gyi bdag pos stong phrag sum cu ste// gang po'i pha yis kyang ni 'bum bshad do// lha dang lha min la sogs rgyal ba la// dad pa rnams
415b6(rgyud): kyis gsang sngags mtha' yas bshad// kha cig du yi rigs su gtogs pa ste// kha cig kyang ni pad+ma'i rigs su gtogs// kha cig nor gyi rigs su gtogs pa yin// gzhan yang kha cig
415b7(rgyud): gnas med rnam par 'khyam// nor spyod ces bya nor gyi rigs su gsungs// nga ni rdo rje'i rigs las rab tu bstan// spyan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma'i rigs yin te// rigs bzhi pa ni
416a1(rgyud): 'dir ni lngas rtsed yin// gsang sngags mdo sde ngas bshad gang yid des// bzhi po 'dir ni rnam par sbyar bar bya// gzhan yang 'di ni kha cig gnas med par
416a2(rgyud): bde bar gshegs la brted cing yongs 'khyam pa'i// mdo sde 'dir ni de dag thams cad kyang // 'byor pa 'dod pa'i mis ni rnam par sbyar// lam 'di nyid du zhugs pa'i sngags pas ni/
416a3(rgyud): yid dang mthun pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// srid gsum dang na rgyal ba dkon mchog ste// de yi 'og tu de las byung ba'i chos// de yi dge 'dun skyes chen brgyad po ste// srid pa gsum
416a4(rgyud): na dkon mchog gsum po gtso// srid gsum bsod nams rnam 'phel rgyu yin pas// dngos grub 'dod pas gsang sngags mgo la gdon// bsod nams che dang log 'dren rmongs bya'i phyir//
416a5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje gtum mchog phyag 'tshal zhes// gsang sngags rnams kyi mgo la sbyar bar bya// gnod sbyin mgon po ngas ni bshad pa yin// nor gyi rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs la yang // rang
416a6(rgyud): gi gsang sngags bdag por ldan par bya// bder gshegs pa min nyan thos lam zhugs dang // rang rgyal rnams kyi lam la gdas pa dang // dad pa med cing tshul khrims 'jungs pa yis/
416a7(rgyud): nga yi rdo rje rnams kyang bcang mi bya// gang zhig theg pa mchog la sdang ba dang // bdud kyis bshad pa yin zhes smra ba dang // rmongs nas nga la gnod sbyid zhes smra dang // byang chub sems dpa' la ni mi/
416b1(rgyud): 'drud pa'i// dge slong dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang // dge bsnyen ma dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyis// nga yi rigs kyi gsang sngags bzlas brjod na// de dag rnams kyi lus ni myur du 'jig
416b2(rgyud): gang zhig nga'i rigs rjes su 'brang ba'i gdon// 'byung po gdod sbyin bu dang sha za yis// nga yi sngags zlos rdo rje thogs pa dag/ mthong nas khros nas phung bar byed par 'gyur// gang zhig
416b3(rgyud): theg mchog rgya chen klog pa dang // de la dad cing de nyid 'chad par spro// brtson 'grus che zhing byang chub sems brtan pa// de la nga yi gsang sngags mchog sbyir mjed// ngas ni 'grol bar
416b4(rgyud): phyir sangs rgyas pa'i// gsang sngags yangs shing rgyas par bshad pa yin// de nas gzhan yang 'jig rten pa bsdus nas// zhar la bshad pa 'di dag khyod kyis nyom// drag po yis ni bye ba
416b5(rgyud): phrag bcu bshad// nor lha'i bus ni stong phrag sum cu ste// tshangs pa yis ni stong phrag drug cu nyid// nyi mas kyang ni 'bum phrag gsum bshad do// nam mkha' lding gis stong phrag bco brgyad de/
416b6(rgyud): gtum byed mas ni stong phrag brgyad bshad do// me yis kyang ni brgya phrag bdun nyid dang // phur bu gsum pa yis ni stong bshad do// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis lnga stong ste// mtshan mo rgyu bas stong
416b7(rgyud): phrag bcu gnyis bshad// 'gro la phan phyir 'jig rten bdag po bzhis// 'bum phrag bzhi ni rab su bshad pa yin// lha ma ni dbang pos 'bum phrag gnyis nyid de// lha yi bdag pos kyang ni 'bum phrag/
417a1(rgyud): gsum// gsang sngags phyag rgya sna tshogs cho gar ldan// so so'i gzhung gi dkyil 'khor rnams dang bcas// rang sngags rdo rje'i rjes 'brangs dang bskyed na// ma bsgrims/
417a2(rgyud): bzhin du the tshom med par 'grub// de las bzlog na dngos grub mi thob la// sdug bsngal mang po yang ni 'thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa dpung bzang gi zhus pa'i le'u bcu pa'o// /
417a3(rgyud): bcud kyis len dang gtor dang phug 'gro dang // nor bsgyur 'byung khungs sngags dang gser bsgyur rtsi// rin thang med pa'i rin chen nor sbyin te// brgyad po bstan pa yongs su bsgras
417a4(rgyud): pa yin// sngags dang phug tu 'gro dang bcud kyis len// sdig pa spong bar byed pa mchog tu bstan// rini chen dang ni gter dang 'byung khungs 'bring // gser bsgyur rtsi dang nor bsgyur tha ma
417a5(rgyud): 'o// mi ni sems stobs ldan zhing chos la brtson// dka' thub kyis phyug dang por bstan pa'i snod// rdul shas che ba la ni 'bring por gsungs// tha ma la ni mun pa can gyis bsten// gang zhig
417a6(rgyud): mchog tu bsten pa bstan 'dod pa// des ni tha mar bstan pa rnam par spang // gal te nor la sred cing sdug bsngal gyis// gdungs na 'bring po la ni ster bar bya// lha yi bden pa dang ni 'byor pa dang //
417a7(rgyud): tshe dang stobs gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang // thos mang mdangs bzang gcig tu yid gzhungs dang // dbang thang che kun dka' thub stobs kyis 'thob// chags dang rnam bral dge la dga'
417b1(rgyud): bdang // drug tu dkon mchog gsum la sems gnol dang // sdig pa spangs shing bzlas brjod ldan pa yi// mi la g+ha d+hA sa dngos grub ring ba med// rdo rje mtshon mye gnam lugs 'dra ba yi// gas
417b2(rgyud): sngags mi yi 'jig rten mchog sbyin mdzad// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol nyid na yang // sdug bsngal sel cing sdig 'jom gzhad med do// gang zhig dpag bsam ldon pa'i shing lta bu// la lar
417b3(rgyud): dngos grub la lar bsod nams dang // gzhan la gzugs spobs tshe dang bde ba dag/ yid mthun 'bras bu 'dod pa'i mi la stsol// gsang sngags sna tshogs gzugs su rnam sprul ras/
417b4(rgyud): gang zhig sdug bsngal gang zhig skrag pa'am// rgyal po chom rkun thog gis 'jigs skrag pa'i// 'gro ba'i tshogs cher mtha' dag skyob par mdzad// gang zhig yul dang khyim la brten kyang
417b5(rgyud): rung dka' thub ma nyams rtse gcig sems kyis ni// nyin zhag gcig tu cung zad sngags bzlas na// de yi gsang sngags du sang shig na ni 'grub// cho ga bzhin du dang por 'bum bzlas
417b6(rgyud): nas// de nas sngags pas bsgrub la 'jug par bya// des na dngos grub myur du thob 'gyur la// gsang sngags cho gas yun ring nyon mi mongs// lus la sa yi dril byis byas nas
417b7(rgyud): sud chu chen rnyog pa med par zhugs nas kyang // ji tsam 'dod pa'i bar du khrus byas te// byung nas shar ram byang du kha bltas nas// chu yis lag pa rkang pa bkrus nas su// pus mo phyi rol du
418a1(rgyud): ni bstad byas te// bar du lag ban gcog tsog pur 'dug nas// sgra med dbu ba med pas nye reg bya// lan gsum bar du chu ni 'thungs nas kyang // mchul lan gnyis mongs/
418a2(rgyud): su phyi bar bya// sa la chags pa lce yis reg pa dang // sbrid pa byung na kha yang bkru bar bya// rab byung skyes pa bud med gzhon nu dang // gzhon nu ma dang bram ze rgad mo rnams// de la nams kyang
418a3(rgyud): sngags pas reg mi bya// sngags pas de dag rnams la mi bsam mo// brgya la de dag rnams kyis rig gyur tam// sgrub pos de dag rnams la reg gyur na// slar yang khrus dang 'thor 'thung
418a4(rgyud): byas nas su// de nas phyir yang bzlas la 'jug par bya// gtsang sbra la dang zlos dga'i snying rje can// rtag tu len pa las ni log pa dang // slong mo'i zas za lha yi zas la brtson// de yi lus
418a5(rgyud): la gsang sngags 'jug par 'gyur// 'ga' yis bud med gos dang nor rnams dang // bzhon pa rgyan dang byug pa bza' btung dang // mal stan rnams ni mang nyung byin gyur na// de la sgrub la gnas
418a6(rgyud): pas mi rung ngo // sa phung ba shang skor lnga ste mtshan la gsum// g.yon la gsum ste lag gnyis la bdun// yang nas dang chu yis ji srid du// drim dri bral de srid bar du bya// sos ka
418a7(rgyud): nags me mched pa'i me lce yis// ma bsgrims bzhin du tshang tshing kun sreg gyur// bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sba ra// brtson 'grus chen mo'i me lces sdig pa sreg/ ri Tar
418b1(rgyud): gangs la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// gdungs na gzi brjid mi bzod 'jub bzhin// tshul khrims nyi ma'i 'od zer gzi brjid kyis// gdungs na sdig pa'i gangs kyang zad par 'gyur// mur
418b2(rgyud): nag smag la mar me phyung ba yis// mud nag ma lus sel ba byed pa ltar// tshe rabs spyong nas gnas pa'i sdig pa'i mur// bzlas brjod mar mes myur du sel bar byed// ci ste sgyid
418b3(rgyud): sreg dang ni bzlas brjod kyis// gsang sngags bsgrubs kyang dngos grub ma thob na// 'jim pa las ni mchod rten 'bum gdab pa'am// yang na chu 'gram bye ma dag la gdab// des ni de mi
418b4(rgyud): sdig pa srid gzhan la// byas pa gang yin de ni zad 'gyur na// des na gsang sngags mthu yis 'di nyid du// mthong ba'i chos la bsod nams 'bras bu thob// sngags kyi rtsa ba dang po tshul khrim
418b5(rgyud): hed dade nas brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa dang // rgyal ba la ni bzod dang byang chub sems// gsang sngags dang ni le lo med pa'o// de ltar mi dbang yan lag bdun ldan pa// skyo ba med par
418b6(rgyud): skye dgu 'dul bar byed// de bzhin sngags pas yan lag 'di bdun dang // ldan par gyur na sdig pa 'dul bar byed// dang por bzlas brjod phal cher byas nas su// de yi 'og tu 'dir ni
418b7(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya// sbyir sreg dag gis gsang mchog myur du stsol// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'ang sbyin par mdzad// gang gis dpag tshad brgya yi pha rol nas// gsang sngags mthu yis
419a1(rgyud): bud med bkug kyang ni// bud med ma yin gnod sbyin bu mo ste// de gzugs cha byad kyis ni bsngags pa bsten// 'dod pa'i don phyir bsgrubs pa gang yin te// grub
419a2(rgyud): na'ang gnod sbyin bu mo sbyin par byed// de ni bud med de yi lus su yang // sprul nas mtshan mo 'dod pa sten par byed pa'o// ji ltar mi dag 'dod phyir bud med la// brten pa'i mini nar/
419a3(rgyud): ni zad 'gyur lhor// de bzhin gnod sbyin mo'am brang mo dag/ gsang sngags mthus bkug sted par byed pa'o// gzhan gyis chung mar yid la bzhag nas su// gang zhig de la 'dod gdungs ster/
419a4(rgyud): byed pa// mi shes yid kyis gzhan gyi chung ma la// 'dod pa spyad pas sdig pa mang du thob// rgyal ba la dang gnad la phan brtson pa'i// lha klu lha min gnod sbyid dri za dang // grub par bcas
419a5(rgyud): pa'i sngags bshad gang yin pa// de dag rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang sangs rgyas// de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems dpa' yis// ma 'ongs sems can mgor skyabs med rnams
419a6(rgyud): rab tu gzigs nas byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad// de dag 'bras bu rab dang 'bring dang ni// tha mar dbye ba rnam pa gsum du bstan// mkha' la 'gro dang dpal gyi phug tu 'jug/ 'dod
419a7(rgyud): dgu'i gzugs can mi sdang rnam pa dang // gnod sbyin mo yi khyo dang bcud kyis len// mig 'phrul sgyu ma mtshan mo rgyu ba ste// de dag mchog yin 'bring ni sa bdag go// grong dang nor dang
419b1(rgyud): dbye dang dgug pa dang // dgar dang bskrad pa dang ni gsad pa dang // klu mi gdon gyis zin pa gso ba dang // gang yang 'di lta bu dang mthun pa'i las// de ni mkhas pas phran tshogs yin par/
419b2(rgyud): bstan// bye brag tu ni klu dang gnod sbyin dang // byis pa gdon gyis zin dang gang dag tu// lus can rnams la ngo mtshar sna tshogs dag/ ston par byed pa phra mo phran tshegs yin// bya ba dang /
419b3(rgyud): khu tshur thal lkug sgra drang dang // rnam par bzlas dang dbang dang bskrad pa dang // gsad dang bcing la sogs pas tshar gcad dang // 'od dang rig pa'i gos dang // rdog pas bsnun dang
419b4(rgyud): rnam par bskyod pa dang // mig tu dug so ltar ni gzhug pa dang // khab kyis gzugs dang kha cig skyug tu gzhug/ phu zhes bud dang yan lag gzhan pa dang // zang gis 'gro ba dag dang /
419b5(rgyud): dgug pa dang // phyir yang bcing dang gnan par bya ba dang // rmongs par bya dang dug zar gzhug pa dang // dug ni gzhan la spo bar bya ba dang // lcags kyur ldan pas drang bar bya ba 'am/
419b6(rgyud): lus la zhen pa'i dug ni bslang ba 'am// zos par bza' dang zos pa gcad pa dang // sa bcing ba dang po nya gtang ba dang // bskrad pa dang ni klu la bsten pa dang // dung dang rdza rnga'i
419b7(rgyud): sgras ni bslang ba ste// rnam pa 'di dag dug gi rgyud du bshad// sa yi steng gi sbrul ni brgyad cu dag/ gzhan la gnod par byed cing rnam par 'khyam// de dag rnams ni nyi shu gdengs ka can
420a1(rgyud): 'khyil ba drug dang dud med bcu gnyis dang // de bzhin sbrul ni khro bo bcu gsum ste// sum cu gang yin rigs de'i nang du gtogs// sbal pa'i mgo dang sdig pa kha brgyad/
420a2(rgyud): dang // rnam par dbyen rab tu mang po yod// gcin drug kha chu reg dang mthong ba dang // mche ba btsugs pa las ni dug kyang gtong // de la dug ni rgyud la mkhas pa yis// rab 'bring
420a3(rgyud): tha ma rnam pa gsum du dbye// dug mdo khro ba'i dbang sgyur skrag pa dang // de bzhin sngags pa'am bkres pa'i zas phyir ram// sha khon yod pa'am gshin rjes bstan pa'am// lus la
420a4(rgyud): brdzis na de dag za bar byed// zos pa de yang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te// mche bas 'dzin dang sos bcad gtad pa'o// gang du mche ba gcig gis khrag phyung rjes// de ni dug chung bas ni
420a5(rgyud): 'dzin par bshad// gang du mche ba gnyis kyis btab nas su// khrag dag byung bar gyur pa zos pa'o// gal te mche ba gsum gyis sha bcad na// de ni bcad par gyur pa yin zhes bstan// /
420a6(rgyud): gang du mche ba bzhi yis btab nas su// sbrul gyis lus ni bzlog par gyur pa de// gtad nas zos pa yin zhes bshad pa ste// de ni sman rnams kyis kyang bzlog par dka'// me
420a7(rgyud): rang bzhin gnad rnams bral ba'i dug/ mtshon dang me dang gzi brjid mtshungs pa dag/ ji ltar sngags kyis rab tu ni 'gyur ba// de ltar sman pas sbyor bar mi nus so// ji ltar me dpung
420b1(rgyud): cher pos bud shing la// nges par sreg la char 'bab skad cig gis// zhi bar gyur pa de bzhin drug dag gis// me dpung lta bu'ang sngags kyi sa'i bar byed// dug gi mthu stobs shes nas
420b2(rgyud): rab bsgrims te// gsang sngags cho ga ji bzhin bzlas nas ni// ba lang lhu na seng ge ji lta bar// dug can sbrul dang dogs med lhan cig rtse// lha klu lha min gnod sbyin grub pa dang // drim
420b3(rgyud): 'byung po mtshun dang gsang ba pa// yi dgas sha za dag dang lus srul po// smyo byed dag dang 'phrog ma grib gnod dag/ sa yi steng na gdon ni sna tshogs pa// mi yi sha tshol za zhing khrag kyang
420b4(rgyud): 'thung // mi ngan 'dod gdungs khro bas nyam thag pa'i// glags skabs rnyed nas lus la 'jug par byed// de dag rnams kyis zin pa'i mi 'phyan cing // glu len gar byed dgod cing khro ba dag/
420b5(rgyud): dga' zhing rngam pa che la smra 'dod dang // spyod pa sna tshogs byed cing lha rnams dang // lha min lhar bcos skye bo bzhad gang byed// gtor ma 'dod pa'am rtsed mo byed 'dod pas// gsad pa'i don du
420b6(rgyud): lus la 'bab cing 'jug/ gsang ba pa rnams gzhig phyir rigs kyi mchog/ mthu can mchog sbyin rdo rje lcags kyu 'am// gzhan yang nga yi rigs las byung rig pa'am// khro bo bdud rtsi
420b7(rgyud): zab sbyor sogs pas gso// ji ltar gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i mi dag la// gdon rnams 'jigs par gyur pa de ltar ni// me min rlung min grong khyer sum brtsegs dag/ 'joms byed
421a1(rgyud): gzi chen nyi ma mes po dang // chu bdag ma yin lha min rnams kyis mid// nor bdag ma yin gnod sbyin rgyal pos min// lcug ma mkha' lding bya yi rgyal po dang /
421a2(rgyud): sa srungs bu non khyer 'jig rnams kyis min// 'byung po'i rig sngags 'dir ni kun mthong dang // gdon gyi spyod pa ma lus shes nas su// phyi nas gdon rnams dogs med dul na ni//
421a3(rgyud): gdon gyis mi 'jigs slar yang tshugs mi 'gyur// rig gsum 'phel dang srid gsum mthar phyir dang // nyes pa gsum spangs lam gsum thugs su chud// de yi sras dang de'i lam
421a4(rgyud): rjes 'gro ba'i// lha dang lha min sogs pas bshad pa'i sngags// bdag nyid chen po mun pa sel ba yi// gsang sngags kyis ni byin gyis brlabs de la// 'jig rten lha tshogs rnams kyis
421a5(rgyud): bsngags pa yi// gsang sngags mthu yis de la bskyod du med// rdo rje 'chang gi gsung thos lha de rnams// tshangs sogs lha min gnod sbyin grub pa dang // rig 'dzin klu dang gnod sbyir dri za dang //
421a6(rgyud): gsang ba pa dang mtshan dang 'byung po rnams// dad pas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshig gsol po// kye ma srog chags rnams la thugs rjes ldan//
421a7(rgyud): ma'o khyod kyis spyod pa sna tshogs pas// kha cig gis ni rdo rje 'bar bar mthong // gzhan gyis dbyug to gzhan gyis 'khor lo can// de bzhin gzhan gyis rtse gsum zhags pa can// gzhan gyis
421b1(rgyud): ral gri gzhu dang be con dang // 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mtshon cha kun thogs dang // gzhan dag gis ni zhi ba nyid du mthong // du ma'i sku mnga' dmigs med sku mnga' bar// lha dang gnod
421b2(rgyud): sbyin gyis mchod de la 'dud// lha min lha yis zhabs la phyag bgyis pa// byang chub sems dpa' mchog la phyag 'tshal 'dud// rig pa'i dbang phyug gzhu 'gengs khyod la 'dud// khyod
421b3(rgyud): la bdag cag thams cad phyag 'tshal 'dud// khyod la bdag cag deng nas skyabs su mchi// khyod kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du// mi yis legs par spyad par bgyis nas ni/
421b4(rgyud): dag myur du dbul ba'i mur bsal nas// nyi ma bzhin du shin tu rab 'bar gyur// yan lag mi nyams sems kyang mi nyams shing // nad dang sdug bsngal lus nyams mi 'gyur ba//
421b5(rgyud): la dad pa'i mis ni thob par 'gyur// de skad kun gyis tshig tu smras nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin la yang yang phyag 'tshal te// gzhal med khang du mngon par zhugs nas kyang // ji ltar 'ongs
421b6(rgyud): pa'i nam mkha'i lam nas dong // lha rnams dong nas phyag na rdo rje yos// dpung bzang la ni tshig tu yang gsungs pa// lha rnams kun gyis mdo 'di shes zin gyis// khyod kyis 'jig rten 'dir
421b7(rgyud): ni grags par gyis// de skad gsungs nas dpung bzang de yis ni// langs te gus par rab tu phyag 'tshal nas// gtsang byed sdig 'joms dpal yon ldan pa 'di// mi yi 'jig rten
422a1(rgyud): 'dir ni bsgrags par bgyi// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis nus pa'i le'u bcu gcig pa'o// / 'phags pa dpung bzang gis nus pa'i rgyud
422a2(rgyud): rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ swa d+h+yas hA pa ri Na ta rA dza sa man+ta// bod skad du/ 'phags pa yongs su spro ba'i rgyal po chen po sngags
422a3(rgyud): bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa// sangs rgyas dam chos 'phags pa yi// dge 'dun dus gsum bzhugs pa
422a4(rgyud): rnams// ma lus pa la skyabs su mchi// mi dge thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bar// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskul ma
422a5(rgyud): 'tshal// kun mkhyen sbyar gyis gzigs pa yi// bdag dge chung yang gang mchis pa// des ni gtan du bral ba dag/ thams cad nye bar zhi gyur cig/ rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yi//
422a6(rgyud): stong pa shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin// byang chub par gyi tshe rabs su// rtag tu bde dang ldan par shog/ rnam par mi rtog lhun gyis grug// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag gyur cig/ zla yin//
422a7(rgyud): bu rol mo ltar// sems can don la 'jug par shog/ ji ltar rgyal ba mkhas pa rnams// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs bsngo// de ltar bdag gi bdag dkar po rnams// byang chub tu ni bsngo
422b1(rgyud): bar bgyi// dkon mchog gsum la dmigs pa yi// bdag gi lus ngag yid dge dang // sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab las byung gang // de dag
422b2(rgyud): kun gyis bdag nyid ni// tshangs par spyad pa ldan pa dang // 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa lo// rang byung mngon dga' dbang ldan zhing // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung rab kyi// gzhung don
422b3(rgyud): tshig la mkhas gyur nas// dam chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang // lus dang srog la dga' med shog/ bdag ni 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe// phyin ci ma log yid kyis su// sangs rgyas
422b4(rgyud): dpag med mthong nas// 'di nas bde ba can du mchi// bdud kyi spyod yul mngon gyur tshe// drang srong chen po che dpag med// rtag tu ston par mdzad gyur cing // sa bcu thob nas de dag/
422b5(rgyud): gi/ rnam par dag pa'i rim pa yis// byang chub dam pa thob par shog/ sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po nyid thob nas// bag chags bcas pa nyes bsags rtsa nas btor// ye shes
422b6(rgyud): bsgribs med snying rjer ldan nas su// 'gro ba rnams la sman dang bde ba bgyi// phyogs bcu'i mtha' yas pa na shes bya'i don ma lus par khyab pa'i blo mnga' ba phyogs bcu'i sangs
422b7(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho snyed la phyag 'tshal lo// sems kyi rnyog ma yid gnyis bsal nas dang por ni// shAkya'i rgyal po thub la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo//
423a1(rgyud): bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i rgyal po 'od dpag med// bla ma la yang dga' dang gus pas gdung bar bgyi// gang zhig phyogs kun dag na da ltar byung ba yi// 'gro la byams
423a2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas nges par bzhugs rnams dang // 'das dang phyis 'byung ba yi rgyal ba thams cad la// bdag ni dga' ba'i yid kyis yang dag mchod pa bgyi// 'di lta ste/ yang dag par
423a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma dang / sku mdog gser 'od dang / bden pa'i dbyangs dang / lhun po bzang dang / lhun po chen po dang / dbang po'i 'byung gnas dang / pad+ma
423a4(rgyud): dbyangs dang / phyag bzang dang / 'od kyi tog dang / mchog gi 'byung gnas dang / rin chen zla 'od dang / dpa' bo'i sde dang / kun nas snang ba dang / rnam dag zhal dang / rin chen tog dang /
423a5(rgyud): mdog bzang 'byung gnas dang / sA la'i rgyal po dang / rnam dag 'od dang / bde mdzad rgyal po dang / kun nas snang ba dang / lhun po bzang po gsal ba dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
423a6(rgyud): dkon mchog brdzogs dang / kun nas 'od dang / dpa' brtsegs dang / bkod pa chen po dang / sbyangs gsal bai DUR+Ya dang / dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / thob pa'i sde dang / rab tu lhan ne dang /

423b4(rgyud): dang / tog chen po dang / shin tu 'thor gshegs dang / phan par bzhed dang / drang srong chen po dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug hor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'od srungs
423b5(rgyud): dang / gser mdog dang / gzi brjid mchog dang / mtho ba dang / bkra shis dang / rin cher grags pa dang / gzi brjid 'od dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / dor yod gzigs dang /

423b7(rgyud): dang / rab ni dbang po dang / spyan dag dang / blo mchog dang / bden pa'i lha dang / drang srong sbas pa dang / thub pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / kun tu zhal dang / ma smad pa
424a1(rgyud): dang / bdud 'joms dang / lha'i rgyal po dang / legs son dang / gzi brjid bzang po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po dang / shin tu rnam par gnon pas gshegs
424a2(rgyud): pa dang / bsam yas 'od dang / zla ba'i rgyal po dang / bde ba che thob dang / snang bar gyur pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / dbang po'i mchog dang / me tog tog dang /
424a3(rgyud): ded dpon chen po dang / rnam par rgyal byed dang / me tog bzang po dang / bshes gnyen bzang po dang / rgyu skar bzang po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / tshogs kyi dpal dang / nor gyi dang
424a4(rgyud): dang / snang ba bzang po dang / 'od dpag med dang / dpal chen dang / stobs mchog dang / sgron ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa sngon byung ba dang / phyis 'byung ba'i rgyal ba gang dag yon tan
424a5(rgyud): gyi klung dpag tu med par gyur pa/ 'khor ba'i chu bo'i 'dam rdzab las yang dag par brgal ba/ gtong ba dang ldan zhing tshul khrims rnam par dag pa/ bzod pa chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa/
424a6(rgyud): brtson 'grus sbyangs shing snying po g.yo ba mi mnga' ba/ bsam gtan chen po dang ldan pa/ mkhyen rab rno ba/ thogs pa med pa ldan pa/ sems can la thugs rje dang / tshogs dang / rdzogs
424a7(rgyud): pa'i byang chub kyi thugs skye ba rab tu 'byung ba/ 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ don la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can gyi snying po skye dgu la byams pa/ g.yo mi mnga' ba
424b1(rgyud): rga ba mi mnga' ba/ chags pa mi mnga' ba/ byams pa'i thugs kyi bdag nyid can/ lha'i yang lha dang mi'i mchog gis rjed pa/ lha'i yang lta ste/ rgyal ba de rnams la bdag gis lus dang /
424b2(rgyud): ngag dang / sems gus pa rnam pa du mas phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba de rnams kyis bdag sdig pa las rnam pa thams cad du bskyab tu gsol/ sdug bsngal du mas gdungs pa'i sems
424b3(rgyud): can thams cad kyang rab tu brtson pas drang du gsol/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas bdag kyang ngan 'gro dag las drang zhing / de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub la myur du gzhag tu gsol/
424b4(rgyud): drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa'i// de ge ba bdag gis sgrub pa gang lags pa// de yis bdag ni tshe rabs thams cad du// thub dbang de dag lhan cig 'grogs par shog
424b5(rgyud): chos dang zang zing mchod pas bde bar gshegs// de la nyon mongs med par bdag gis mchod// mchod pa bgyis shing lam gnyis la brten nas// 'gro ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
424b6(rgyud): nyid gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan thos pa dang / mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / yongs su bsgrags pas sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur//

426a7(rgyud): dang / zla mchog dpal dang / mtha' yas dpal dang / rin po che'i 'dus pa'i dpal dang / rin po che'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mthul gnas pa'i dpal dang / rin po che de dag la 'byung ba'i/
