429b7(rgyud): dri ma med dang / ngan song spong ba la sogs pa de rnams kyi spyan sngar nongs pa nongs par mthol lo// bshags so// rnam par gzhig go// rab tu gzhom mo// smad do//
430a1(rgyud): byis pa blun po lta ba log par zhugs pa 'khor bar bying ba'i nongs par gzung du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
430a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser bsags stug po dge ba rgyas pa'i snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sa t+yes t+ye/ sa t+ya bi sho d+ha ni/ sa t+ya/ oM bu dza/
430a3(rgyud): bi lo tsa ne/ sarba A ba ra Na ni ba ra Na/ bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thugs rje chen po bskyed nas bdag la dgongs su gsol// gang
430a4(rgyud): bdag gis tshe 'di 'am/ tshe brjes pa de dang de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa rnams dang / mngon par 'dod pa
430a5(rgyud): rnams dang / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa rnams dang / sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang / spyod pa dang 'brel pa rnams dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams dang / phyir
430a6(rgyud): mi ldog pa rnams dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams dang / sa bcur bzhugs pa rnams dang / dbang ma bskur ba rnams dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams dang / dbang bskur ba
430a7(rgyud): rnams dang / dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la brtson pa de dag la
430b1(rgyud): lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang / de bzhin du 'phags pa rang rgyal ba rnams dang / de'i lam
430b2(rgyud): la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / 'phags pa rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyi rol gyi mngon
430b3(rgyud): par shes pa lnga thob pa rnams dang / de las gzhan pa 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams dang / drang srong rnams dang / de las gzhan pa 'am/ yang dag pa 'am/ lam log pa la zhugs
430b4(rgyud): ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang ldan pa'i bar rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi khongs su gtogs pa de rnams la lus dang / ngag dang / yid rnam pa bcus nyes par spyad
430b5(rgyud): pa bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dus pa sa chen por chud pa ye shes chen po
430b6(rgyud): brnyes pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
430b7(rgyud): bcas pa de rnams kyi spyan sngar nongs pa nongs par mthol lo// bshags so// rnam par gzhig go// rab tu gzhom mo// smad do// byis pa blun po lta ba log par zhugs pa
431a1(rgyud): 'khor bar bying ba'i nongs pa nongs par gzung du gsol// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ prA b+he pra b+hA A ka re/ pra b+ha ba ti
431a2(rgyud): d+harma shud d+he/ karma bi shud+d+hir+N+Na ba tu me swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de bdag la dgongs su gsol/ gang bdag gis tshe 'di 'am skye ba gzhan du skye ba brgya'am
431a3(rgyud): skye ba stong ngam/ skye ba khri 'am/ skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma rung bar bgyis pa'am/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa
431a4(rgyud): 'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa dang / chos chos ma lags par bstan pa dang / chos ma lags
431a5(rgyud): pa chos su bstan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems btang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma rung bar bgyis pa nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bar gyi sems thang cig tsam
431a6(rgyud): yang 'gal bar bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa dang / sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas sa'i rgyu mi 'byung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu
431a7(rgyud): dang / gzungs kyi rgyu dang / mngon par shes pa'i rgyu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i rgyu dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rgyu dang / dbang gi rgyu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu dang / de las
431b1(rgyud): gzhan pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nas/ snang ba'i bar gyi rgyu mi 'byung ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa de/
431b2(rgyud): dag thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dus pa/ sa chen por chud pa/ ye shes chen po brnyed pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa byams pa dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/
431b3(rgyud): thugs brtse ba can/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin du dri med snang gsal dang / spobs pa'i rgyan dgongs pa dang /
431b4(rgyud): dri med zla ba dang / tog grags dang / me tog bkod pa dang / snang mdzad dang / gsal mdzad dang / rin chen mchog dang / 'jigs med gzigs dang / 'jigs pa dang / bag
431b5(rgyud): tsha ba dang / spu zing mi mnga' ba dang / seng ge bsgyings pa'i stobs dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa dang / de bzhin du byang
431b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' 'phags pa kun nas 'od zer dang / dri med rnam gnon dang / sgra 'byin dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par bskor ba dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi
431b7(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sgrib med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / dri med gtsang ma dang / mig yongs su sbyong ba dang / sems can kun la slu ba med pa'i blo dang / sgra snyan nges
432a1(rgyud): bsgrags dbyangs dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / bzang po sngon 'byung dang / sprin sgra dang / mchog dga' rgyal po dang / dga' ston dang / rtag tu brtson dang //
432a2(rgyud): lhun po rtse 'dzin la sogs pa skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de rnams kyi spyan sngar nongs pa nongs par mthol lo//
432a3(rgyud): bshags so// rnam par gzhig go/ rab tu gzhom mo// smod do// byis pa blun po lta ba log par zhugs pa 'khor bar bying ba'i nongs pa nongs par gzung du gsol/ tad+ya thAka sa ma
432a4(rgyud): yo ge tsit+ta bi brte/ a khe ma khe ma da ne/ bi b+haka te/ sa man+ta kune/ sa t+ya ra me muk+te/ pra muk+te/ hi le/ a si le/ a tsa ma tsa me/ a tsi Te/ ma tsi Te/ ra he/ mo tsa mA yo/ gra he/ he ma
432a5(rgyud): pa te/ tse ta pA de/ d+harma tsit+te/ a bik+She pre swAhA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdag khams gsum du bying ba las mngon par dbyung du gsol/
432a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag bdag g.yangs chen por lhung ba las gdeg tu gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de
432a7(rgyud): dag gis bdag khron pa chen po thibs po na mchis pa las drang du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdag 'brog dgon pa chen po'i nang
432b1(rgyud): du lhung ba las bskyab tu gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdag nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po 'das pa nas bsgral du gsol/ sangs
432b2(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdag 'khor ba'i rgyas zin pa las dgrol du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
432b3(rgyud): bdag sras gcig dang 'dra bar thugs brtse bar dgongs su gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdag sras gcig dang 'dra bar bstan du gsol/
432b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdag slob ma sdug pa dang 'dra bar bslab tu gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag
432b5(rgyud): gis dka' ba brgya stong de dag mngon du mdzad nas bdag la thugs dgongs su gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis smon lam chen po bcu po khri phrag
432b6(rgyud): grangs med pa de dag mngon du mdzad nas bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
432b7(rgyud): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du mdzad nas bdag la bskyed du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdag mchog tu zag pa med pa'i chos 'dul ba la
433a1(rgyud): gzhag tu gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi thugs rje chen po'i chab kyis bdag bkrur gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
433a2(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi stobs bcu po rnams kyis bdag la byug tu gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ngo tsha mkhyen pa'i na bzlas bdag la
433a3(rgyud): dgab tu gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog rnams kyis bdag la gtor du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
433a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bas bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi seng ge'i sgra chen pos bdag lung
433a5(rgyud): bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ d+ha re d+ha re
433a6(rgyud): d+ha ra ni/ ni d+ha ni/ a b+ha ya kalpe/ kalpa bi ga te/ a mi tA kalpa/ hu ta sha ne anan+ta mu khe/ A nan+ta tsak+ShaHung+ga te/ oM b+hU swA hA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
433a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/ gang bdag gis tshe 'di 'am skyo ba gzhan rnams su skye ba brgya 'am/ skye ba stong ngam/ skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis
433b1(rgyud): pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / bla ma dang / yon gnas dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod
433b2(rgyud): pa dang / de las gzhan pa yang dag pa dang / log pa'i lam la zhugs pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang ldan pa'i bar dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi khongs su gtogs pa rnams la
433b3(rgyud): zas kham gcig tsam sul ba 'am/ byams pa bsgoms pa 'am/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis phyi dang nang gi legs par spyad pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
433b4(rgyud): chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ste/ ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis chos nyid de mngon du mdzad
433b5(rgyud): nas yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bsngos pa de ltar bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar chos nyid de dang / ji ltar de bzhin nyid de dang / ji ltar yang dag pa'i
433b6(rgyud): mtha' de dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid de dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ma da ra ba'i bsung la phyag
433b7(rgyud): 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ bi dzi rim+b+ha/ bi dzi rim+b+ha/ uta pA da bya ya/ biM dzaM rim+b+ha/ staM b+ha/ ha ra/ su ba ha ra/ a nU na/ ta tha tA/ b+hU ta ko Ti/ bi dzi rims b+ha sAhA/ 'das pa dang /
434a1(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang lags pa de dag dang po bdag gis ji ltar sems can ma brgal
434a2(rgyud): ba rnams bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o/

434b1(rgyud): snying po dang / chung 'bring chen mo dang / mngon mkhyen rnam rol dang / rnam 'phrul dang ba dang / grags pa sprin sbas dang / seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po dang / lhun po mngon 'phag/
434b2(rgyud): rgyal po dang / dam chos kun srung tog gyur rgyal po la sogs pa gang lags pa de dag dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ ji tsam du dam pa'i chos gnas pa de'i bar du sbyin pa
434b3(rgyud): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba dang / smon lam chen po bcu po khri phrag grangs med pa bsgrubs pa gang lags pa dang /

436b7(rgyud): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang yang dag par ldan pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la mchog dang / gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / rab dang /

437b6(rgyud): na gnas pa'i lha 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lngas rtsen dang / lnga len dang / nor bu bzang po dang /

438a1(rgyud): sogs pa klu'i bdag po rnams dang / 'brog gnas la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnams dang / gang gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /

443b6(rgyud): a d+hi te/ a nu mo tita swA hA/ ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi rgya chen po zab mos pha rol tu
443b7(rgyud): byin pa drug las nges par 'byung ba sna tshogs tshad med pa'i mchod pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsgrubs pa dang / sgrub pa dang / bsgrub par 'gyur ba de dag las bdag gi bskal par 'gyur ba
444a1(rgyud): gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi lags so bar bzung nas/ bdag gi bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas sems thams cad dang lus thams cad btud nas/
444a2(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang bcas pa de rnams la dngul
444a3(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / sa thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgro thams cad dang / byang chub
444a4(rgyud): kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ Ta kre Ta ke/ Ta ke Ta ke swA hA/ gang dag srid pa gsum po 'di ni lha dang /

444a6(rgyud): dung / don zhing phyi ma segs pa bdag gi bde cing / yongs su bzung ba med pa gang 'gas pa de dag dag dang sems can thams cad thun mong du bgyis nas/ phyogs spya
444a7(rgyud): na gyi mams kyi rnam mamo nyid kyi 'das pa dang / mdzangs pa dang / dkar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang /
444b1(rgyud): rang rgyal ba dang bcas pa de rnams la dbul bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad lnga rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid mngon du gyur cig/ bcom/
444b2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhig gshegs pa blo yangs zab mo sgrog pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thAbi pu la swa re/ bi pu la yo ni she/ a na la se/ a na la sa/ saM b+ha be/ a na
444b3(rgyud): las gting ga te swAhA/ bdag nyin mo dang mtshan mo gnyid log pa dang / sad pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / langs pa nas/ dbang po 'gag pa'i bar du'ang lung
444b4(rgyud): bstan pa/ lung ma bstan pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis phyi dang nang gi legs par spyad pa gang lags pa dang / skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor bar bsngags
444b5(rgyud): pa gang lags pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bgyis nas/ gnyis su med pa'i
444b6(rgyud): tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ste/ ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byung

445a1(rgyud): rnam par gzigs kyi gzi brjid dang / shAkya seng ge'i brtson 'grus kyis/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dag/ nam yang g.yo bar ma gyur cig+sa / tAHthA/
445a2(rgyud): dza yan+ti/ bi dza yan+ti/ a pa rA dzi te/ mA ra sen/ pra marda nI ye swA hA/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can 'gro ba drug la brten pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
445a3(rgyud): pa la dgod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang /

445a7(rgyud): kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / snying rje bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

449a6(rgyud): rgyurgyas kyi zhing yongs su drag par 'gyur ba ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/

449b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams mig mi 'dzums dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tog de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan pa

449b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bkod pa dang / ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros tog gi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom

450a1(rgyud): mthus rab tu 'byung zhing / der de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /

450a3(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi zhing bstan pa de dag yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'gyur zhing /

450a5(rgyud): thos pa dang / dran pas lhan cig mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs
450a6(rgyud): su btang ba dang / mar mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes mi snyegs pa/ ngang tshul ngan pa/ sdig pa'i chos
450a7(rgyud): yang dag par spyod pa/ rgyud bsregs pa/ bsam pa bsregs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa/ ngan song la mngon par phyogs pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
450b1(rgyud): gtum po dam pa'i chos spong ba de rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'dus pa dang por 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gis de dag thams cad zhi ba'i lam bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la dgod par/
450b2(rgyud): gyur cig/ de nas ji tsam du khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can de rnams zhing der 'dus pa gnyis pa la 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gis de dag thams cad bag chags dang mtshams sbyor
450b3(rgyud): ba'o nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dung gi 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ shad+de/ shad+tha/
450b4(rgyud): shad+tha/ pA tA re swA hA/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dus pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang / byang chub
450b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i mdzad pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad bdag gcig pu gnyis su ma mchis pas/ rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'phel bar bgyi bar spobs/ sangs rgyas bcom
450b6(rgyud): ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid mngon du mdzad cing / de las gzhan/
450b7(rgyud): pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang mngon du mdzad nas bde bar bzhugs pa tshogs chung ngus bzhugs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rtse mo'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
451a1(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ shi khe/ shi khe/ shi khe/ b+ha da de swAhA/ de'i 'og tu bdag tshogs shin tu bsags/ brnag pa yongs su rdzogs/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs/ sangs
451a2(rgyud): rgyas kyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
451a3(rgyud): bskor bar bgyi ba/ de bzhin nyid kyi 'khor lo dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'khor lo dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi 'khor lo dang / skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / stong pa nyid
451a4(rgyud): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byung ba'i 'khor lo dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang / nam mkha' lta
451a5(rgyud): bu'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i 'khor lo dang / bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i 'khor lo dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / chad pa
451a6(rgyud): dang / bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par zhen pa'i bar mi dmigs/
451a7(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo dang / mdor na gang na 'khor lo med pa/ bskor ba med pa de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar gyur cig/ rab tu bskor nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid
451b1(rgyud): par gyur cig/ yongs su smin par bgyis nas sems can la sman pa'i slad du/ sems can gyi khams dang / las kyi khams dang / nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / nam mala'i khams btsam/
451b2(rgyud): pa de tsam du gnas par gyur cig/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ man+ta n+ye/ man n+ye/ sarba man n+tan+ta/ prah+ma Ne swAhA/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /
451b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan yongs su sbyong ba dang / de bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la
451b4(rgyud): mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / pha ma dang / bla ma dang / yon gnas dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dman pa dang / bkren pa dang /
451b5(rgyud): sdug 'phongs pa las bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / mthol ba dang / bshags pa dang ldan pa dang /
451b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang ldan pa dang / byis pa nas bzung nas da ltar ram/ skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag bsags pa nas/ phung
451b7(rgyud): po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar gang lags pa de dag thams cad dang thun mong du bgyis nas/ mchog dang / gtso bo dang / gya nom pa dang / rab dang / phul dang / bla na/
452a1(rgyud): ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang grong ma dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis
452a2(rgyud): pa dang / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang / nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / chags pa ma mchis pa dang //
452a3(rgyud): nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang / lus dang sems grol ba dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar 'das
452a4(rgyud): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid mngon du mdzad nas yongs su bsngos pa
452a5(rgyud): yongs su sngo bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar chos nyid de dang / ji ltar de bzhin nyid de dang / ji ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' de dang / ji ltar chos nyid
452a6(rgyud): kyi dbyings de dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid de dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de nas/ ji ltar de kho na nyid mthong ba'i bar gang la gnyis su med cing gnyis ma yin pa med pa de
452a7(rgyud): ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he/ bud+d+he/ sarba bud+d+ha/ bi Sha ya/ bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ 'phags
452b1(rgyud): bsungs su spyod de rgyal po sngags dang brnyas pa skyed pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya ga kyi mkhan pa bcug bab+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban sa shes kyang pos bsgyur
452b2(rgyud): chu rkyen gyi mi rtsi ba ngan bye dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa/ N+ya gang skad du/ Ar+yas na d+hi mA la ma hAtan+ta ba rnaMs
452b3(rgyud): dzA bin+da b+ha la na de shA d+ha ma hA Nirat+na koT+Ta shal lho ni de sham hA pa r-i Na man nA mA rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi 'phreng ba chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa ngas pa
452b4(rgyud): chen po bstan pa las nor bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bsten pa yongs su sngo ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas/
452b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che rdo rje rin po che'i rtse mo la bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub la rab
452b6(rgyud): tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi skyabs byed par 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pa blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems
452b7(rgyud): bskyed pa/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa'i tshogs nye bar sogs par 'dod pa/ de bzhin
453a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rab tu thob par 'dod pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyis rnam par rtse bar
453a2(rgyud): 'dod pa/ nam mkha' mdzod nyid dang lag na rin chen nyid thob par 'dod pas 'di ltar bsngo bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub
453a3(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams dang / rdo rje 'chang rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ lam la rab tu gnas pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa
453a4(rgyud): thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dus thams cad du yong ye 'bul zhing mchis na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnga' chen po can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
453a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po sa chen po brnyes pa rnams kyis bzhes shing bdag la rtag tu bsod nams kyi stobs chen po dang / ye shes kyis nye bar brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / brtson pa'i bdag nyid dang /
453a6(rgyud): zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i gnas dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ de'i 'og tu yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ thugs
453a7(rgyud): rje chen po dang ldan pa dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'khor bar lhung ba/ 'ching bas bcings pa/ btson rar chud pa/ chos kyi lam stor ba/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra bdo/
453b1(rgyud): pas mngon par gces pa/ mgon ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa/ skyob pa ma mchis pa/ gnas ma mchis pa/ dpung gnyen ma mchis pa/ ston pa ma mchis pa/ lam gol bar zhugs
453b2(rgyud): pa 'khor ba la mngon du phyogs pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis bltas pa/ ngan song la gzhol ba/ ngan song la 'bab pa/ ngan song la bab pa/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang grogs
453b3(rgyud): par lhung ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ sman pa la mi sman pa dang / mthun pa la mi mthun pa dang / dge ba la mi dge bar bzung ba/ slob dpon ma mchis pa/ de bzhin gshegs
453b4(rgyud): pa dang byang chub sems dpa' lta ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan gyi 'tshe bas gtses pa/ bde ba ma thob pa/ mi skrag pa ma thob pa
453b5(rgyud): 'jigs pa ma thob pa/ rtag tu mnyam par ma bzhag pa/ zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / sbyin pa dang / nges pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / bag yod pa dang bral ba/ ting nge 'dzin dang /
453b6(rgyud): gzungs dang / sa dang / bzod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gnas pa dang bral ba/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa dang bral ba/
453b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa rnam gsum la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes chen po dang bral ba/ shin tu gnas pa'i chos kun tu 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid la mi gnas/
454a1(rgyud): par mngon par shes pa dang bral ba/ stobs rnams ma thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang mi ldan zhing mi gnas pa/ mi brjed pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i skabs dang mi ldan
454a2(rgyud): pa yon tan gyis stong pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi gos kyis ma g.yogs pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis bgrod pa dang bral ba/ sdug bsngal brgya stong phrag du mas
454a3(rgyud): mngon par gtses pa/ rtag tu gdungs pa/ rtag tu dman pa/ rtag tu rmongs pa/ rtag tu mnyam par ma bzhag pa/ rtag tu nyon mongs pa'i rjes su zhugs pa lags na/ thugs rje chen pos
454a4(rgyud): dgongs te bdag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bdag gi dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol/ bdag gi byang chub chen po'i lam dang / byang chub kyi lam dang / byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs
454a5(rgyud): par mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin
454a6(rgyud): dang / rnam par grol ba dang / gzungs rnams skya bas mdzad du gsol/ bdag gi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs
454a7(rgyud): par mdzad du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang mthu chen po mnyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
454b1(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la mchod pa dang bkur sti chen po bgyis nas bdag 'bul lo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkod pa chen po rnams kun tu gnas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi rin po chen
454b2(rgyud): gzhal med khang rnams dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa rnams dang / rin po che'i ri rnams dang / rin po che'i gdan rnams dang / rin po che'i lan kan rnams dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba rnams dang /
454b3(rgyud): rin po che'i gdugs rnams dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan rnams dang / rin po che'i chun po rnams dang / rin po che'i mug tig gi dra ba rnams dang / rin po che'i snod rnams dang / rin po che'i
454b4(rgyud): 'phreng ba rnams dang / rin po che'i 'bar ba'i tshogs rnams dang / rin po che'i gling brgya dang / nor bu chen po rnams dang / mar me'i sdong bu gtsang ba nor bu dang rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras
454b5(rgyud): pas 'tsher ba/ gser gyi tsong tsong mang po btags pa rnams dang / pad+ma 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi ge sar chen po can rnams dang / gser gyi 'phreng ba rnams dang / gser gyi gzhal med khang
454b6(rgyud): rnams dang / rin po che'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i char rnams dang / rin po che'i snying po can gyi khang bzang rtsig pa nor bu rab mchog sna tshogs kyis spras pa rin po che'i lan kan can
454b7(rgyud): rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang chen po'i skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba rnams dang / gnas nyams dga' ba rnams dang / gzhal med khang nyams dga' ba rnams dang / skyed mos tshal
455a1(rgyud): nyams dga' ba rnams dang / lha'i nye bar spyad pa nyams dga' ba yongs su ma spyad pa ji snyed pa mchis pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams//
455a2(rgyud): cad la 'bul lo// gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling na mchis pa'i sman rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams dang / bcud kyis len gyi rigs rnams dang / gang dag dus thams cad pa'i nor bu dang / gang
455a3(rgyud): dag zhal zas ro zhim po phun sum tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa rnams dang / gang dag dri bda' ba'i ljon shing rnams dang / tsan dan gyi ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
455a4(rgyud): tsan dan dmar po rnams dang / rtag tu me tog dang ldan pa'i nags tshal chen po rnams dang / spos kyi ngang rgyas pa yid du mchi ba'i dri bda' ba'i ljon shing gi rigs rnams dang / gang dag dpag
455a5(rgyud): bsam gyi shing bdag gi ma mchis shing yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa rnams dang / gang dag rgya mtsho'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnams dang / gang dag ri lhun
455a6(rgyud): po dang / tri se dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang / ma la ya dang / 'bigs byed dang / man da ra dang / rdo rje'i ri la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi zom rnams la rin po che sna tshogs
455a7(rgyud): kyi khang pa brtsegs ma rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi phug rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi brag rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sa gzhi brtan pa rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs
455b1(rgyud): kyi gzhal med khang rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi them skas rnams dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi ka ba rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi
455b2(rgyud): khang pa'i tshar rnams dang / nor bu bai DUR+Ya sna tshogs kyi sgron ma rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi gzhal med khang blta na sdug pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi lha'i grong khyer gyi gzhal med
455b3(rgyud): khang yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi me tog blta na sdug pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi glu dbyangs kyi cha byad rnams dang / gzhal med khang stong pa rnams
455b4(rgyud): kyi char rlung gis bskyod pa na sgra snyan pa 'byin pa rnams dang / rol mo'i cha byad kyi rnam pa ma dkrol bar rang sgra snyan pa 'byin pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi bya'i tshogs gzhal med khang stong pa
455b5(rgyud): rnams na gnas shing skad snyan pa 'byin pa rnams dang / gang dag rin po che'i sprin sgra dbyangs chen po snyan par 'byin pa rnams dang / gang dag lha'i nor bu rnams dang / gang dag glu dbyangs
455b6(rgyud): rnams dang / gang dag dri bda' ba'i me tog gi ljon shing rnams dang / 'phreng ba'i ljon shing rnams dang / spos kyi ljon shing rnams dang / rgyal mtshan gyi ljon shing rnams dang
455b7(rgyud): ba dan gyi ljon shing rnams dang / rin po che'i ljon shing yongs su longs ma spyad pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'bul lo// gang dag sangs rgyas
456a1(rgyud): kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na mchod pa chen po'i sprin me tog gi sprin rnams dang / dri'i sprin rnams dang / 'phreng ba'i sprin rnams
456a2(rgyud): dang bdug pa'i sprin rnams dang / lhab lhub kyi sprin rnams dang / byug pa'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin rnams
456a3(rgyud): dang rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i gos kyi sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i ljon shing gi sprin rnams dang / rin po ches bkang ba'i snod kyi sprin rnams dang
456a4(rgyud): rin po che nor bu chen po spungs pa'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin rnams dang / mar me'i snod stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam la dri zhim po'i 'bru mar gyis
456a5(rgyud): yongs su bkang zhing snying po'i ras ri rab brgya'i tshad tsam rab tu 'bar ba rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'bul lo//
456a6(rgyud): de dag thams cad la gsol ba ni/ byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang
456a7(rgyud): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams la sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa mang por bzhugs par gsol lo// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su mi
456b1(rgyud): dmigs par bzhugs te bsngos pa ltar/ bdag gis bsod nams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs
456b2(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ngo // sdig pa thams cad kyang so sor bshags so// oM swa
456b3(rgyud): rasma ra/ bi mA na ska ra ma hA dza ba huM/ de'i 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin lha rdzas kyi mchod pa chen po'i sprin rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
456b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs rgyas dmigs pa yid la byed pas yongs su sngo ba chen po'i 'khor 'di nyin par ram/ mtshan mo 'don pa de'i sdig pa rnams
456b5(rgyud): yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang bsrabs par 'gyur ro// gong du smos pa'i yon tan rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig bzlas brjod byas
456b6(rgyud): tshangs pa brgya'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro// rmi lam na'ang rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags rnams kyang yang dag par grub par
456b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang gis yongs su bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi 'phreng ba chen po
457a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstan pa las nor bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bsten pa yongs su sngo ba chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so//
457a2(rgyud): kha che'i mkhan po d+harmA ka ra dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal 'byor gyis bsgyur ba las rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te
457a3(rgyud): gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pa ri Na ta tsakrA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yongs su sngo ba'i 'khor/
457a4(rgyud): lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che
457a5(rgyud): rdo rje ri'i zom la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rin po che/
457a6(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub chen po don du gnyer bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad sgrol bar 'dod cing byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa
457a7(rgyud): 'dzin par 'dod pa dang / byang chub chen por sems bskyed cing snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rim gro dang bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
457b1(rgyud): rnams kyi bsod rnams kyi tshogs yangs shing rgya che ba sogs par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub par 'dod pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam/
457b2(rgyud): par thar pa'i sgo dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rol par 'dod pa dang / nam mkha' la dbang ba dang mdzod chen po sgrub par 'dod pa dang / rang gi lag nas yid bzhin gyi
457b3(rgyud): nor bu bzhin du gtong zhing 'bul bar 'dod pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i
457b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dag pa'i lam la bde bar gnas pa ma thob pas/ deng byang chub
457b5(rgyud): tu sems bskyed de/ bdag gi lus dang sems 'di dus thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad du/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag lus
457b6(rgyud): 'bul gyis/ mthu chen po mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dpas chen po la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag bzhes su gsol/ bdag gi bsod
457b7(rgyud): nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / sems kyi rgya bskyed pa dang / rab tu zhi zhing dul ba dang / dbang dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
458a1(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ yang bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag
458a2(rgyud): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'khor ba na 'khor zhing bcing ba chen pos bcings par gyur pa/ btson rar gnas pa/ yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i dbang du gyur pa/ mgon med
458a3(rgyud): pa/ skyabs med pa/ mig med pa/ rten med pa/ gtso bo med pa/ 'dren pa med par gyur pa/ lam gol bar song ba/ 'khor ba la gzhol ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la rgyab kyis
458a4(rgyud): phyogs pa/ ngan 'gro la phyogs pa/ lam ngan pa la bsnyen pa/ lam ngan par lhung bar gyur pa/ rtag tu bshes gnyen dran pas zin cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ yang dag pa'i lam
458a5(rgyud): ma yin pa dang / phan par gyur pa dang / phan pa med pa dang / don yod pa dang / don med pa la rmongs par gyur pa/ dge ba'i chos dang bral zhing mi dge ba chen po bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas
458a6(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa rnams la rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ skyergan 'chi'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing mi bde ba chen po bsgrubs pa/ 'jigs/
458a7(rgyud): pa med pa/ bag tshab med pa/ sems rtag tu gsangs par gyur ba/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / zhi zhing dben pa bsgrub pa dang / bag byed pa dang bral bar gyur pa/ gzungs dang
458b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sa bcu'i chos kyi bzod pa la bde bar gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo dang mnyam pa nyid las ring du gyur pa/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang /
458b2(rgyud): dga' ba dang / btang snyoms tshad med pa bzhi mi sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan par gyur pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes
458b3(rgyud): chen po las ring du gyur pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu dge ba'i chos sgrub pa la bde bar gnas pa ma thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang bral bar gyur
458b4(rgyud): pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa la mi gnas pa dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid la spyod cing gzhol bar 'jug pa mi sgrub pa dang / bsod nams byed pa la g.yel zhing lta ba
458b5(rgyud): snyems pa dang / the tsom gyi sgrib pas byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mngon par mi rtog pa dang / de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi sgrub pa dang / nyon mongs
458b6(rgyud): pa brgya stong tshad med pas zil gyis non cing sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos sdug bsngal zhing yongs su mnar te rtag tu gdung ba/ bsam pa zhan pas khro zhing rnam par g.yeng ba nyon
458b7(rgyud): mongs pa brgya stong la rgyun du gzhol bar gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po la gnas pa rnams kyis bdag gi skyabs mdzad
459a1(rgyud): par gsol/ bdug girten mdzad par gsol bdag gi 'dzin pa mdzad par gsolabadag myur du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
459a2(rgyud): kyi lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem da pa' chen po'i tshogs sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bdag myur du de
459a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang /
459a4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par grol ba'i yon tan dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
459a5(rgyud): gyur cig/ yang bdag bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig/ mchod pa rgya chen po byed pa'i dus su'ang 'di skad du brjod par bya ste/ yang /
459a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po mnga' ba thams cad dang byang chub sems pa'i tshogs thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol deng bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub
459a7(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro chen po bgyis te lus 'bul lo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ji snyed rgyan dang yo byad bzang po thams cad rin po che'i
459b1(rgyud): gzhal med mang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang rin po che'i shing dang rin po che'i ri dang rin po che'i bdan dang rin po che'i/
459b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / rin po che'i dbyig rnam par bkram pa dang rin po che'i gdugs dang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i do shal gyi rgyan dang
459b3(rgyud): mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i snod dang / rin po che'i phung po dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba dang / rin po che'i gling dag na nor bu rin po che chen po rnam
459b4(rgyud): par dag pa'i mar me'i sdong po dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i sgra 'khrol ba/ gser btso ma'i spang khab can gyi dom dom po long sbyangs pas yongs su khebs pa gser
459b5(rgyud): bco ma'i me tog 'dzam bu'i gser gyi ze ba can gser gyi shing ljon pas dkris pa gser gyi pho brang sna tshogs rin po che'i sprin chags pa rin po che'i thigs pa
459b6(rgyud): char du 'bab pa/ rin po che'i rnam pa mang po'i mdzod kyi pho brang lha rdzas kyi nor bus rtsig ngos spras pa/ rin po che'i shing thams cad rigs 'dzin chen po'i skyed mos
459b7(rgyud): tshal gyi rab nyid du 'ong ba/ rin po ches ni pho brang dang / gnas dang / shing dang / nags tshal la sogs pa thams cad kyang yid du 'ong ba de lta bu bdag med pa 'dzin pa
460a1(rgyud): med pa thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yongs su sngo zhing 'bul lo// 'dzam bu gling na sman bzang po ring du 'tsho bar byed pa la
460a2(rgyud): sogs pa'i rnam pa ji snyed yod pa dang / nor bu rin po che sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong ba dang / ma g.yos par rang bzhin gyis bda' ba'i zhal zas bzang
460a3(rgyud): po dang spos kyi shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / tsan dan gyi shing dang / a ka ru dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / lo mche zhing me tog rtag par
460a4(rgyud): bsung gis bzhi bar byed pa'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang yid du 'ong ba'i rgyu rdzas kyi spos yongs su ma bzung ba yongs su gzung ba med pa/ dpag
460a5(rgyud): bsam gyi shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas byung ba nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la sogs pa dang / ri rab
460a6(rgyud): lhun po dang / ri ti se dang spos kyi ri dang rim la ya / ri btang bzung dang / rim ha la dang / rdo rje'i ri la sogs te rin
460a7(rgyud): rnam pa de dag gi rin po che'i zom sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i stegs dang / rdo ba rin po che dang / rin po che'i phug dang / rin po che'i pho brang dang rin po che
460b1(rgyud): nAdA du par 'gags pa dang / nam pal usang spa yodang / nor bya na mtha' lams mang ba dang nod bu na ma tsha gas mang po dang
460b2(rgyud): tshe sngon pa'i 'a'ajo ma mang po dang / bai rlud la sogs te nor bu'i rigs rnam pa mang po dang / ritsam du lha'i gnas na bdag po meng pa'i lha'i po zang dang skra'i nor nam
460b3(rgyud): bang ba srid du 'ong ming bas bar mos pa dang/ ma ngam ma mi byang rnam pa mang po rlung gi rang kyis bskyod ri tsam gyis sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang / rnam sa pa'i gnas kyi
460b4(rgyud): thang nas rnam pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang lha'i rol mo rnam pa mang po ma bskyod par sgra sbran pa rang 'byin pa dang lha ri mo byad sna tshogs nam mkha'i gnas kyi pho zang
460b5(rgyud): nas snyan pa'i sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa dang / rin po che'i sprin sna tshogs las snyan pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang lha'i nor bu rin po che dbyangs sman pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang
460b6(rgyud): gzhan yang lha'i rdo'i shing dang / me tog gi shing mang po dang / 'greng ba'i shing dang / byug pa mang po dang / bdug pa'i spos kyi shing dang
460b7(rgyud): sgron ma'i shing dang / rgyal mtshan gyi shing dang / ba dan gyi shing dang rin po che'i shing la sogs pa de dag thams cad ma bzung ba/ yongs su gzung ba
461a1(rgyud): med pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'bul lo// ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gyis
461a2(rgyud): gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na mdzod pa'i sbyin ldan tham rtag gi sbyin sras kyi sbyi dang 'byung ba'i sprin dang / bdag thos kyi sbyin
461a3(rgyud): zug+sa sa hUM sbyin rin mo rje'i bladags kyi sbyin du br-ina'i rgyal mtshun gyi sbyin dang rin pache'i bdun gyi srin
461a4(rgyud): dang rin po che'i gos kyi sprin dang rin po che'i rnam pa'i sprin dang / rin po che'i phung po'i sprin la sogs te/ rin po che chen po'i sprin
461a5(rgyud): rnam pa de dag dang / gzhan yang spos kyi brus kyi ma me'i snod chen po bkang ba stong gi 'jig rten gyi tshad dang mnyam pa mar me'i snying po ri rab kyi tshad tsam pa smon
461a6(rgyud): mang byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la mchod cing 'bul lo// de bzhin du mchod pa rnam
461a7(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i bsod nams dam pa ji tsam pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// gang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
461b1(rgyud): 'das rnams kyis dge ba mang po brtsams te dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bsod nams de dag thams cad/
461b2(rgyud): bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mardzam// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo chen po ni bskor
461b3(rgyud): bdud kyi sde rnams ni pham par byas nas/ mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par dgongs pa la/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bskal pa chen
461b4(rgyud): gcig tshang bar bzhugs par gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis bsod/
461b5(rgyud): nams ci bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sdig pa dang mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib
461b6(rgyud): pa thams cad bshags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang las kyi sgrib pa bshags shing yongs su sbyang ngo // de bzhin du mchod pa dang bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang
461b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon suM du dmigs pa'i spyan sngar gsang sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra bi ma na sa ra ma hA dza ba hUM/ gang gsang sngags de bzlas
462a1(rgyud): pas ci dang ci 'dod pa de thams cad 'grub cing lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am//
462a2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing / nyin mo'ang rung / mtshan mo'ang rung / yongs su sngo ba'i 'khor lo chen po 'di klog cing 'don na de'i sdig pa mi dge/
462a3(rgyud): ba'i las 'byung zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad khad kyis sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs snga ma de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig bklags pa tsam gyis kyang
462a4(rgyud): tshangs pa brgya'i dpal dang ldan zhing / rmi lam na'ang rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'das nas kyang yongs su dag pa'i zhing du skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa
462a5(rgyud): nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// yongs su sngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs
462a6(rgyud): so// / li'i dge slong sde snod gsum dang ldan pa kI la d+hams rgya gar gyi d+ha nga rgya'i yi ge las/ ngan d+he rnam par mi rtog gis bsgyur ba'o//
462a7(rgyud): rgya ga skang du/ brgya ga thag ta mi gal mtha yo ga du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bgrang gis tshigs su bcad pa da ni mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par
462b1(rgyud): snang mdzad ye shes dab pa mtsho chen ldan// zla ba nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa// dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed/
462b2(rgyud): shog/ pa 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gto mug rnam skyong ba// mnan pa yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas bkra shis pa// dge mnyam pas ma sems ldan pa'i bkra shes gang yin pa/ ba shis nges
462b3(rgyud): ni myi dgu rnams la 'i byed shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan can gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad cing // yang dag bden pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi slu ba// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i bas sa
462b4(rgyud): gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ bsam gtan ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing /
462b5(rgyud): tshe grangs med par byin gyis rlob pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sems can don gyi las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing // 'gro ba kun gyi
462b6(rgyud): 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa// thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis
462b7(rgyud): tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ rat+na tri sa sti gA thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/
463a1(rgyud): #// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// che ba'i tshe mchog ston mchog bla na med// chos rje nyim rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod
463a2(rgyud): pa'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med// dam chos bdud rtsi bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nyes pa'i
463a3(rgyud): skyon bral dge tshogs rnams 'phel ba// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba// rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa
463a4(rgyud): byin rlabs kyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang srung ba ma'i byir rlabs kyis/
463a5(rgyud): phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te// bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang // tshe ring nad med bde sgyid ldan par shog/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi
463a6(rgyud): tshigs su bcad pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des pa la gsungs pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen rgya mtsho ba ban d+hi
463a7(rgyud): ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
